reviews: {'title': u'Not Mat', 'text': [u'I was hoping this one would work for me from hearing all good things. This did not work. Left me looking shiny as if I never used this. {'title': u'great primer for those hot summer days', 'text': [u'I wore this primer mostly last year during the summer when I am at my most oiliest and it held out for an entire nine hours of work without having to touch up. For refrence my skin type is combo and sensitive.'], 'author': u'Smilieysusu ', 'date': [u'2016-01-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Perfect primer and moisturizer', 'text': [u'I\'m not sure why there are so many negative reviews, this stuff is amazing. People with oily skin tend to forget that they still need to moisturize (I know I do!) and this is honestly the perfect moisturizer/primer. My skin is the oiliest possible skin out there and this not only gives me the right amount of moisturization, it also is an amazing primer. The formula absorbs quickly and sets the perfect base for my foundation to blend into. At the end of the work day, my face does not look like a disco ball, it is just the slightest bit dewy. If you want your face still completely matte after 8 hours, use the Becca Ever-Matte. The Embryolisse gives a matte but more natural skin texture look to your foundation, The smell is also very light and pleasant.'], 'author': u'jstbee ', 'date': [u'2015-11-15'], 'location': u'Vancouver, BC', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'not terrible but nothing special', 'text': [u'its does help to mattify for about 3 hours but for $40 i would expect at least 6-8 hours, the ingredients are nice compared to most toxic primers that only make oily skin worse.'], 'author': u'Cbstacy ', 'date': [u'2015-11-01'], 'location': u'Hawaii, OAHU', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

reviews: {'title': u'mixed feelings', 'text': [u'So this moisturizer works great under makeup. It also gives me a nice radiant glow...HOWEVER, it looks greasy in my t-zone areas which is something I was hoping this wouldn\'t do, seeing as it\'s marketed towards combo/oily skin. name: Kakadu C™ Face Crème
reviews: {'title': u"Odd, but I can't tell", 'text': [u'So, a Sephora staffer recommended this line to me and said it would do wonders for my skin. I am not disappointed. My skin is brighter and glowing like it never has. The thing is, I was doing nothing with my skin prior to this, so it is hard to tell whether this is a result of me showing my skin some love, or the Kakadu C. Also, since I started using the whole line at once, it is hard to tell what effect each product is having on it\'s own. I will say that this face creme is thick-- thick like you either put on too much or feel like you didn\'t use enough to distribute evenly on your face. I follow this up with a Lancome SPF moisturizer, so that helps it along. I would not necessarily recommend this on it\'s own, but if you\'re going to splurge on the line, I would recommend it.'], 'author': u'Jolie83 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-10'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Face Saver', 'text': [u'This stuff is amazing, just amazing! I had been using a different day cream for about a month when my old fav had ran out and that entire month my skin looked just off. Pores looked huge, skin tone took on this dull, blah color, broke out...I finally realized that the reason my skin was struggling was because of that cream so I began my search for a new one. Read hundreds of reviews of different creams but I finally settled on this one since my first experience with this brand was so great (poetry in lotion) I no longer used that product but I remembered liking it so I gave this cream a shot. Wow.. In literally one night my skin transformed back to how it looked before I started using that other face cream. I use vitamin C, and retinol on a regular and this Vit C lotion is top notch. Comes with a heavy price tag but its so worth it I got the eye cream as well and it is equally amazing. I will slowing add the rest of this line as well. Great stuff! you wont regret it!'], 'author': u'Ashley2708 ', 'date': [u'2015-11-14'], 'location': u'Kansas City, KS', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'relatively light', 'text': [u'I bought the creme and the serum, and the creme is MUCH nicer than the serum. It\'s not sticky or heavy. name: Clear Difference Oil Control/Mattifying Hydrating Gel
reviews: {'title': u'Does not absorb', 'text': [u'I don\'t have acne but do have extremely oily skin with large pores and was hoping this moisturizer would help minimize the shine while still providing me with some moisture. First off, the product is gel/silicone-based so a little goes a long way BUT it never absorbs into your skin. It just sits there and feels like you have a thick film on your face. Even when I wake up the next morning, the feeling is still there and all the moisturizer just gets washed away when I wash my face because literally none of it absorbed into my skin. And worst of all, the product made me break out with tiny pimples all over my face. I never break out! Once I stopped using this the pimples cleared. Please save your money and try something, anything, else.'], 'author': u'jstbee ', 'date': [u'2016-10-02'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Clogs pores like crazy', 'text': [u'If you are prone to break outs with super oily skin I highly advise you don\'t use this product. It took me months to recover from all of the deeply clogged pores this stuff left me with. The sad part is it took me forever to realize this was the product in my regime that was responsible for my break outs :('], 'author': u'maddypeee ', 'date': [u'2016-06-21'], 'location': u'Houston, TX', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"Can't live without.", 'text': [u'So I\'ve been waiting for the "it," product for my first review. This is without a doubt the best facial moisturizer I have ever used. I\'m 27, with combination/oily skin, which is amplified working in a repair shop & outdoor sales. Through my teenage years, I had perfect acne-free, skin; now I not only struggle with controlling the oil, but also painful, under-the-skin occasional breakouts. I use this product in combination with Clinque\'s (oily skin) facial soap, then Clarifying lotion (#3.) followed by acne solutions clinical gel (on the lower part of my face.) Of course I use specialty eye treatments by Estee Lauder, but everything is followed by Estee Lauder Clear Difference.', u'I\'ve strayed away from this a couple of times once my skin is "perfected," under the assumption that my oily skin is under control from improved diet, or possible hormone balance, but it never lasts, and my progress always regresses.', u'Before foundation I use Becca\'s mattifying primer, which is my favorite right now, and a undereye primer by Smashbox. All of the products I use are tried and true for my skin, but I without a doubt would not have the results I do now, If I was not using Clear Difference on a regular basis. I still use a blotting sheet, once a day, generally around lunch. Oil is considerable less than with any other products/moisturizers I have used in the past... and honestly what oil the sheets pickup simply could be from environmental elements, outdoor humidity, heat, etc. ', u'My skin only becomes more beautiful over time, with consistent use of this product! I\'m eager to try the other products in the Clear Difference line.'], 'author': u'Sdareb ', 'date': [u'2016-05-28'], 'location': u'Lynchburg, VA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Winner!', 'text': [u'I don\'t give out 5 stars, I save that for products I deem perfection/ can\'t live without. However, I am in love with this. The product is lightweight and super hydrating, since I have an oil slick for a t-zone and some dry patches around my chin and mouth, it\'s been difficult to find a moisturizer than addresses both. This leaves my skin super soft, plump and moisturized, whilst controlling shine, It is amazing and a great investment for those with combination-oily skin', u'Packaging: Convenient, adorable in estee lauder fashionHydrating: Perfection!Shine Control: Winning!Texture: Light weight, fast absorption, no sticky, non oilyOverall: This is a can\'t live without type product'], 'author': u'smattox ', 'date': [u'2016-04-05'], 'location': u'pittsburgh, pa', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Triple Performing Facial Emulsion SPF 15 PA++
reviews: {'title': u'Light Moisturizer + SPF', 'text': [u'Today was my first day using this product and I bought it on a whim. I needed a moisturizer that had SPF when I want to lounge around the house or when I am not going to put on any makeup. I had to deduct a couple of stars because this is only my first time using the product and I have not seen any breakouts or my face being too oily. I also did not use this under foundation. I used this solely as a moisturizer. The reasons why I would give this product some stars are:1. fragrance - clean cucumber crisp fragrant2. light weight - when wearing alone3. hydrating - I only used this and a toner underneath. ', u'Overall, for the price and using the lotion as just a day wear when staying in the house or going out for groceries, I would say this is a convenient product. ', u'About me:combination skin29 years old; Asian'], 'author': u'Hairbeauty1 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-14'], 'location': u'Atlanta, Ga', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Wake Up Call Hydrating Treatment Gel
reviews: {'title': u'I love it', 'text': [u'I really do not understand all these negative comments! I tried this product after I found out how much my boyfriend loves it. All you need is a little bit. I use about a nickle size amount on my fingertips and pat it over my face (avoid your eyes.) It truly does wake you up! Did not irritate my skin (or his, even with shaving) at all.'], 'author': u'NeedMoreMascara ', 'date': [u'2016-09-26'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Good moisturizing lotion wt appealing ingredients', 'text': [u'Pros: Very lightweight, absorbs nicely - doesn\'t dry tacky, attractive packaging, natural, spreads easily on skin and can use under makeupCons: Price (!), strong smell (reminds me of lavender, but not sure if it\'s actually that).', u'I\'ve been using this lotion for about a month now and have enjoyed it overall but will not be repurchasing. {'title': u'BEST LOTION EVER!!', 'text': [u'THIS is the BEST lotion ever had!!! PLEASE NEVER DISCONTINUE THIS! I have combination skin which is dry on surface and oily in the pors. I have been using anything from Shiseido to NARS Skin car as well as Clarin\'s. Some work okay others not so good. Untill I randomly bout this one had no high hope but its AMAZING!!!! Simply life changing! The texture is so light and skily, non oily, very soft gentle while keeping your skin moisturized ALL DAY without leaving grease behind. I apply this after Yves Saint Laurant cleansing foam and Stella tonner, or DIOR serum. My problem skin that kept me in the dark for couple of yrs suddently felt soft, tight, and back to youth! Cant rave enough! I suggest applying this on top of tonner or fluid or serum, this lotion does amazing job sealing the moisture in and helps your super expensive serum to do its job!!!!!! This lotion is pricy but your face is worth the money! I don\'t usually apply face cream over eyes, but this one is so silky non drying I apply over my whole face after my eye cream is applied bahahaha,,,and guess what it seals eye cream too :) Just feel like a water protector film on your face all day!!!!! 10 stars!'], 'author': u'birdtj82 ', 'date': [u'2015-03-15'], 'location': u'Toronto', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Pore Tightening Day & Night Glowing Duo
reviews: {'title': u'Love the Varying Textures for Day and Night', 'text': [u'I am working on an assignment in a humid, hot area briefly and I took this with me. I am so glad I did. I loved that the day cream was light but oh so moisturizing...and my pores were definitely less of a problem....matter of fact, my makeup seems to longer when I have used this for my day cream. I also loved that the night cream/mask had me waking up with skin that was oh so supple and firm. I have been using this paired with the Caolion duo cleanser and I feel it works best using these cleansers along with this glowing duo. I will be ordering more and I think you should try this too!'], 'author': u'Astray ', 'date': [u'2016-10-31'], 'location': u'Houston, Texas', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Noticeable Difference in Pore Size', 'text': [u'I notice a difference in my pore size after using this at night but the day time cream is pointless for me. Also, I would recommend only using the night cream every other night. I have noticed that after a few nights in a row, I will get a pimple or two on my chin. My t zone is oily by the way. And I would highly recommend washing it off in the morning like the instructions say.'], 'author': u'wmiller93 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I actually really love this combo. I notice the effects of the night Cream more than the day cream, because I accidentally went two days without using the night stuff and my pores looked huge again. However using this stuff consistently had shrunken my pores and it makes my makeup go on so much better'], 'author': u'24andobsessed ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Mediocre', 'text': [u'The night gel is great, but the day cream does not do much to keep my oil under control. I can really feel the night gel tightening my face, it shrinks my pores, and my face is matte in the morning. But after I shower in the morning, I would apply the face cream, and then my make up. In less than an hour, I would need to use an oil-blotting sheet on my face. My face was actually less oily prior to using this day cream. I live in the swampy south, so it doesn\'t take much to work up a sweaty, oily face. Unfortunately the day cream doesn\'t work as well as the night gel. Wouldn\'t buy this combo again, but if the night gel was available solo, I\'d buy it.'], 'author': u'AlexyC ', 'date': [u'2016-09-08'], 'location': u'Lake Charles, LA', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

reviews: {'title': u'Very moisturizing', 'text': [u'I have dry skin (especially in winter) so was looking for a daily moisturizer, and one with SPF in it for some daily protection. {'title': u'works quick', 'text': [u'I\'ve been breaking out lately and my usual drug store pimple cream was not cutting it. I read some of the reviews in this and decided to take to bait even though the price was way more tha what I was used to spending. Like other reviewers, the scent is strong, but nothing that you can\'t get past. It dries up my pimples quickly! Love this product!'], 'author': u'chellemx2 ', 'date': [u'2016-04-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'great at first..', 'text': [u'The first thing I\'m going to say is beware of the size. I didn\'t really notice that it was so small until it arrived and probably wouldn\'t have spent the 30$ if I had. With that being said, after just two uses I started seeing results. I don\'t have severe acne, but the moderate amount I do have started to drastically decrease. However, after about a week of use every night, the results did a complete 180. I don\'t know if the tea tree oil was the direct cause but I started getting really bad blemishes all at once. I will continue to use every night, with hopes the acne will go away again.'], 'author': u'dobo ', 'date': [u'2016-02-28'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

name: Facial Moisture Cream
reviews: {'title': u'AMAZING!', 'text': [u'So after debating for the past 2 months whether i should purchase this or not i finally took the plunge to do so, and im sooooo happy i did! ive been using this for about a week now and i can honestly say that after 4 days of using i could see such a difference. My scars left behind from acne have actually gotten lighter, the texture of my skin is a lot more even and when i wake up ( i only use at night) my skin looks so hydrated. I also have sensitive skin and this has not broken me out or caused any irritation. One of the few products that actually delivers what its supposed too. ;)'], 'author': u'Anonymous ', 'date': [u'2016-06-22'], 'location': u'new york city', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'disappointed', 'text': [u'I was really excited to try this cream based on the reviews. I have dry skin, and fine lines and wrinkles that I was hoping this cream would help. The "slight tingling" burns my skin for hours after I use it, it makes my skin oily and I have actually broken out which I NEVER do, and I see my skin actually looking worse than before I used it. Tried this after trying algenist just to give it a shot and I will be returning this ASAP and going back to algenist.'], 'author': u'mommywrinkles ', 'date': [u'2016-02-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'HOLY GRAIL SKIN OIL', 'text': [u'As someone with oily skin, introducing an oil to my regimen was pretty scary. I love using my Tarte Maracuja Oil in the winter when my skin is dehydrated, but any other time of the year I found it to be too oily for me (it is an oil after all lol) and caused some closed comedones and mild milia under the eye area and around my orbital bones. This oil is perfect to hydrate, repair, and rebuild the skin without leaving a heavy greasy feeling. I apply this at night time and I wake up with soft, refreshed skin that doesn\'t feel like an oil slick. I love what REN stands for and the quality of ingredients they use, so I\'m more than happy to support this brand and hope they don\'t ever discontinue this amazing product!'], 'author': u'sheerbeauty ', 'date': [u'2016-09-02'], 'location': u'Toronto, Canada', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

For my test run of this product I used the Sap Serum followed by this, and didn\'t like it as much. My skin felt fine, not taut, but the surface felt a little sticky. {'title': u'Love this!', 'text': [u'Over the past year I have been struggling to find something that would help to reduce my giant pores and blackheads. I\'ve tried tons of different masks and products before this, and ultimately pulled the trigger on this mask because the price point wasn\'t crazy. I now use this sleeping mask 2-3 times a week. I found that the pore shrinking is better when I use it after a deep cleaning mask (like Glamglow). It\'s a little greasy and makes me a little oily looking until I wash it off the next morning. It\'s been about 6 months now (and I\'m only halfway through the jar) and can see a difference. It doesn\'t work miracles overnight- so if that\'s what you are expecting you\'ll be disappointed. {'title': u'luminous and moisturizing', 'text': [u'I love that it gives a bit of a glow after applying. I have very dry skin that gets super flakey around the t zone. This is the only moisturizer that lasts all day into the night with my makeup routine as well. My skin stays hydrated with a bit of a glow. Now for the critics... I feel the sizes should match up to the cleansers, etc. I use the Purity Made Simple facial cleanser I purchased in 8oz. I feel the moisturizer 2oz. should match up a little because I\'m out of the moisturizer before the cleanser. So it\'s a little inconvenient for me since I do not like buying things separately. Not too big of a deal, but it\'s a lot easier knocking a few birds with one stone.'], 'author': u'diamond1372 ', 'date': [u'2016-06-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Extra Soothing Balm
reviews: {'title': u'love this balm. perfect for winter', 'text': [u'i\'ve been using this for years now. i have a very dry skin. every time i do makeup (cream, sunscreen, foundation, sheer layer of powder), i feel my skin feeling more dehydrated. {'title': u'wonderful multi use product', 'text': [u'At first I thought this is a crazy expensive cuticle cream. But once I found out how and where to use it I love it. I use the tiniest amount under my eyes to help with the wrinkles and expression lines. On my lips (doesn\'t taste that great) on dried up skin left over by pimples, on my cheek bones for a healthy glow and of course cuticle cream. I had a little rash on my eye lid and used it to sooth and smooth the rash. Worked like a charm. I love it.'], 'author': u'Anonymous ', 'date': [u'2015-06-06'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'Revivifying', 'text': [u'I\'ve tried a number of sprays to use as a pick-me-up for my makeup during the day, and this one was a wonderful surprise. I like the fine mist, the delicate scent, and the way my face feels afterward. I have dry skin and it works like a charm for me.'], 'author': u'VickyV12 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-06'], 'location': u'Brady TX', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

It is refreshing as any misting spray is, but I didn\'t notice that it did anything special for my makeup whether priming or setting. I didn\'t think it was that hydrating, and I have dry to normal skin. I don\'t plan on re-purchasing.'], 'author': u'CliniqueSheek ', 'date': [u'2016-07-07'], 'location': u'Galveston, TX', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Rx retin-a users will love this stuff!', 'text': [u'I\'m using rx tretinoin on my skin for anti-aging purposes; needless to say, my skin can get very dry, red and irritated. This stuff has saved me time and again! It is super-soothing and injects new life into my skin mid-day (when the dreaded retin-a flakiesstart.) To be clear: it does not work like the UD setting spray but it is a lovely make-up finishing spray and is an amazing soothing treat for dry and/or dehydrated skin. FYI the scent is very fresh and non-descript so I can use it multiple times throughout the day (open-concept work-setting) without worrying about boosting the place with fragrance!'], 'author': u'GretschGirl ', 'date': [u'2016-05-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'very fine mist', 'text': [u'I love hydrating mist. I use it after I\'m done with all my make up to soften any powdery look. Sometimes I get a little heavy hand with my powder or blush. This hydrating spray softens that look. I love a nice glow to the face and this gives me that. I\'m pretty picky with the type of spray, meaning how the mist comes out. This is nice and fine. I\'ve stop using some other mist because I don\'t like how it comes out. This one is nice!! I also love how it smells. Fresh and light.'], 'author': u'luv2trysmthngnw ', 'date': [u'2016-05-05'], 'location': u'LA, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Clear Bloom Makeup Glideaway Cleansing Oil
reviews: {'title': u'Love', 'text': [u'I have oily skin and this was my first time to use a cleansing oil. This takes away all of my make-up, even the stubborn eye liners and mascaras. I do follow up with a second cleanse. Love this cleanser.'], 'author': u'ButtonsBelle ', 'date': [u'2016-11-05'], 'location': u'Charleston, SC', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Works well, but does not simplify routine', 'text': [u'I really wanted to like this product because I really love the Farmacy brand. I\'ve been using this for 4 weeks now but just can\'t handle the oily residue that is left behind. This product does a really good job of removing make-up initially, but you still have to wash your face again with a foaming cleanser to remove the product. Seems counter productive if trying to avoid using a foaming cleanser (like me). If you are okay with that two step process, then this product will work well for you. Otherwise, I\'d pass.'], 'author': u'JrRhodes ', 'date': [u'2016-11-01'], 'location': u'Chicago, IL', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Eh', 'text': [u'I\'m a skincare junkie and own many oil cleansers. I\'ve tried the best on the market, and I have to say this is not one of them. The formula is vey thick and drags on the skin. I followed the manufacturers directions and mixed with water. After trying to rinse this with warm, cool, and lukewarm water I had to go in with a micellar water to remove the residue and makeup it did not remove( mind you I am very thorough). I followed with a foaming cleanser and was fine. I really wanted this to work, but for me it was a definite miss. If you use long wearing makeup this may not be for you.'], 'author': u'gghairandmakeup ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'The Oil Cleanser To End All Oil Cleansers', 'text': [u'I\'ve read all the other reviews about this product prior to purchasing it. I\'ve only used it once but let me tell you. The results are miraculous! I pumped one pump onto my dry hand and massaged it into dry skin--full face of makeup (urban decay all nighter foundation, waterproof mascara)--and everything came off like a dream. Normally I would use six cotton pads of micellar water to get it all off but this product did that with only one pump. After a few minutes of massaging the product dry, I applied water to my hands and remassaged my face with wet hands. Everything came off. Everything. I went in with a damp white microfiber face cloth to cloth it off...and there was no trace of makeup left on my skin. Originally, I had planned on doing a second cleanse, but the moisturizing feel that it gives me skin made me reconsider. The "film" that it leaves behind is not uncomfortable. Honestly I wouldn\'t even refer to it as a "film" because that has such a bad connotation and it was definitely not that. It\'s the feel of using a few drops of facial oil on damp skin--after it has sank into the skin. That\'s exactly the feel and, let me just say, that because my skin is combo dehydrated acne prone sensitive...that feel was most welcome. I followed with my usual skincare routine (toner, exfoliant, serum, oil, moisturizer) and the next morning I woke up with such a welcomed glow...it was unmistakable. I don\'t think I need any other cleansers in my life.'], 'author': u'kathyvangg ', 'date': [u'2016-10-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I have been oil cleansing for years and thought I would give this one a try. The cleanser does a good job at removing makeup, but it leaves A LOT of oily residue on your face even after rinsing with water multiple times. I have to follow up with a second cleanser. Even though it leaves quite a bit or residue, I have not had any break outs that I can attribute to this product and I have very sensitive/acne prone skin.'], 'author': u'brittany1536 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-28'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

reviews: {'title': u'Just okay', 'text': [u'The good - The way this sprays out. Its a super fine mist that covers everywhere evenly, with no funny smell.', u'The meh - Effectiveness was just okay. I didnt hate it but it didnt blow me away. Worked about as well as my drug store setting sprays. My make up didnt stay locked down and started to break up at around 6 hours.', u'The bad - There is no way to know when you are running low on product, or in my case, about to run completely out, mid-use. You cant shake it and tell how much is in there at all. I didnt feel like this bottle went a very long way, or lasted long enough to justify the price.'], 'author': u'Rainey ', 'date': [u'2016-10-12'], 'location': u'Lancaster, SC', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

reviews: {'title': u'Not my Favorite in the Brand', 'text': [u'I absolutely love Dr. Jart sheet masks. I use them regularly and when I saw this I decided I may as well try it. {'title': u'too small for my face', 'text': [u'I don\'t know if my bid american face wasn\'t the right size or what but I had a terrible time in this mask. Once I hooked it to my ears it hurt! the whole time it tugged on my ears and almost felt like it was cutting! As for the neck part it did not stick to me at all. The whole time i was holding it on and felt ridiculous typing with one hand. Usually I love dr. jart but this was impossible for me'], 'author': u'lakesparrows ', 'date': [u'2016-01-18'], 'location': u'cleveland,oh', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"pleased (and it's not dry!)", 'text': [u'To those who think they received a malfunctioning product because it felt "dry" upon opening...you are incorrect. These are the hydroGEL masks so the part that actually touches your skin will feel like a gel while the top layer (not touching your skin) is dry, this is how it should feel. They\'re not all going to be wet and gooey. These are the slot treatments so you\'d be returning them for no reason if that\'s the "issue" you were having. That said, I liked this mask however pulling it over the ears was a little uncomfortable, my face isn\'t that big and I get its supposed to be a "lift" but my ears were kinda sore often 30 mins. And the neck portion was a bit difficult to keep in place. But the gel felt nice and soothing and I certainly lifted after that.'], 'author': u'masklady ', 'date': [u'2015-12-28'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Immortelle Divine Extract
reviews: {'title': u'flawless', 'text': [u'I so love this product was having so many second thoughts about getting this because of the price but I figured why not invest in me so I did it and I\'m so glad I did my skin looks beautiful and my pores have reduced so much I feel I have flawless skin now and I\'m just In love with this serum .'], 'author': u'RoyalT33 ', 'date': [u'2016-03-26'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Crazy Soft Skin', 'text': [u'I don\'t love experimenting with skin care because I have found so many bad products out there - drying, irritating, tacky, gross. The few products that I like, I tend to stick with. I received a sample of this and after one use, went out to buy it that same day.This oil absorbs immediately so I can then put my regular moisturizer and minimal makeup on over it. My skin is crazy soft after about 5 minutes... noticeable softness - pretty cool. My skin looks healthy and I can\'t stop petting my cheeks.The not so great is the old lady rose perfume smell, but that goes away or is covered up. The other con is that I can\'t stop petting my cheeks, which can raise some eyebrows when in public.This will last a really long time (it\'s been over 6 months and I\'m only 1/3 through the bottle), so the price isn\'t really as high as it seems.'], 'author': u'Amers ', 'date': [u'2015-12-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Bio-Performance Advanced Super Revitalizer Cream Whitening
reviews: {'title': u'Still heavy for combination skin', 'text': [u'Purchased it since many of the reviewers said it\'s lightweight...but for my combination skin it still feels heavy. I think I should stick with white lucent line. I\'m not seeing "whitening" effect either...I\'ve been better result with their white lucent products. Wanted to give Bio-Performance a try. Now that I did, I\'m going back.'], 'author': u'fgratton ', 'date': [u'2015-01-04'], 'location': u'Rochester, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Great for dry skin!', 'text': [u'I use this every night. I have dry skin and it really helps get rid of flakey skin. In the morning I put a touch of this under my eyes and in other dry areas. Love it.'], 'author': u'jheintz ', 'date': [u'2013-07-29'], 'location': u'Phoenix, AZ', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'Misleading.', 'text': [u'I purchased this VERY EXPENSIVE CREAM in hope that it would brighten my skin. Did nothing but clog my pores. Disapointed'], 'author': u'AriesBoss ', 'date': [u'2013-06-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'1 & ONLY', 'text': [u'this is my first product review as a VIB on the Sephora website. i never write reviews because most products ive tried are good but nothing special. however, the shiseido bio-performance whitening cream is EVERYTHING to me. i have combination skin; dry in the t-zone and oilier around which ive noticed most people have become lately. i was hesitant to purchase the moisturizer because of the "whitening" title it was given until i read boinninja\'s review. i also am a guy with acne prone skin which leaves behind dark acne spots after the breakout is long gone. i use the yu-be cleanser with my clarisonic, shiseido eudermine softner, and this moisturizer. my skin has never been more clearer from any moisturizer ive used, it\'s truly a miracle cream for me. it looks heavy in the jar, but to the touch its very silky and melts into the skin without any irritation. most anti-aging moisturizers are very drying to those with sensitive and dry skin because of the tightening element in the cream. this is a must buy even though some will think the price is crazy! its just enough moisture to balance the skin, corrects and brightens acne spots without forming new ones, anti-aging without irritation, smells zenful, and diminishes any signs of flaky, scaly skin. i deff recommend this moisturizer to anyone with problem prone skin!! they say guys have thicker facial skin, so if that\'s the case and it worked wonders on me then im sure the girls will love the results as well :)'], 'author': u'kyyle ', 'date': [u'2013-04-14'], 'location': u'chesapeake, va', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Good product but...', 'text': [u'This is a good product but I found a great product on my trip to fort de france last month : nuhanciam anti-dark spot cream. The result is really amazing !!!'], 'author': u'Tommynyc ', 'date': [u'2012-06-20'], 'location': u'New York', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

name: Youthful Radiance Set
reviews: {'title': u'A Must Have!', 'text': [u'I enjoy using a tinted moisturizer w/SPF 30 & LOVED Peter Thomas Roth\'s tinted moisturizer..until he discontinued it! Since seeing my favorite PTR products being discontinued I\'ve tried many others but they haven\'t lived up to my expectations. Until trying Perricone\'s daily moisturizer, I\'ve slowly been switching all my face products to Perricone. When I spotted the Tinted version in a kit WITH a travel size daily moisturizer, I knew I had to try it! I have fair-light skin tone & in the summer Medium tones after getting a tan. Not only does this product adjusts to my shade but it gives my skin a healthy glow. You only need about a nickel sized amount, start at the neck/d\xe9collet\xe9 & move up in circles getting behind ears, working your way up to your hairline. I use all of my other products first, i.e. "Needles No More" then apply Tinted Moisturizer then I put on my Smashbox Make-up Primer, then I\'m all ready for my makeup. Sometimes I use a sheer powder or blush, I\'ve never used & don\'t think any foundation is necessary. It has really cut down on the time I take to apply my makeup, only needing to focus on my eyes & brows! (Which my Husband loves)'], 'author': u'beautyrockette ', 'date': [u'2016-05-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Yikes! Just no.', 'text': [u'The face finishing moisturizer is lovely but steer clear of the tinted one. Irritated my skin, caused breakouts, caused my skin to be very oily, and the tint ends up looking orangey.'], 'author': u'marissa13 ', 'date': [u'2016-03-03'], 'location': u'Livermore, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'50/50 on this one', 'text': [u'I have olive skin and wanted an oil free moisturizer that offered all day sun protection. Representative sold me on all the benefits!', u'The little trial size night cream was amazing! Really rejuvenated the skin. Super sensitive skin but it did not make me breakout - in fact helped decrease redness! Worth trying but pricey! A little goes a long way!However the actual moisturizer - i tried it - it truly gives you a tan specially if you have light skin. The worst part was that it was super oily! Which was something i was trying to avoid!'], 'author': u'konny ', 'date': [u'2015-11-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love both of these!', 'text': [u'These are both incredibly good moisturizers. The tinted one is amazing - the way it evens out your skin tone. It\'s a bit more moisturizing than the untinted one. Both are excellent for making your skin ready for makeup. I love using the tinted one on days when I\'m not wearing foundation, or only a bit of BB cream. It does make your skin a tad bit darker, if you are fair-skinned like me, but that\'s not a problem for me. I break out easily and both of these moisturizers don\'t break me out. This is a very good value for the money, since both jars cost less than the cost of the tinted cream alone. You will not be sorry if you try these.'], 'author': u'momto4 ', 'date': [u'2015-11-01'], 'location': u'La Habra, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'lovely skin', 'text': [u'I\'ve been using these products for over a year. I have fair, sensitive skin which I need to protect from the sun. The tint in the moisturizer makes my skin look lovely, even without makeup! Plus, it gives me the sun protection I need daily. No product completely stops lines and wrinkles, but these products give my skin a healthy glow and definitely help!!'], 'author': u'daisy06 ', 'date': [u'2015-10-28'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: One Essential Mist-Lotion
reviews: {'title': u'Perfect for lazy people', 'text': [u'I used to have bunch of facial product, but not to use it because I am too lazy to open the bottle/jar and use them with my hands. I preferred to stay with dehydrated face.After I bought this product, I just pump it on my face directly. My skin did get so much better although I still do not use any other cream product.I am mid 20s, with dry & oily combo type and sensitive skin, but this product was very gentle on me. As other review said, it does contain scent, but it was not like one of those product that smells like chemical junk.'], 'author': u'EnaV ', 'date': [u'2016-08-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'NOOOO', 'text': [u'I wanted to love this!!! I really did!! The description and ingredients sounded wonderful, but the smell is so overpowering of perfume. Beyond tolerable, very very very heavy floral scent like your grandmother would wear, but not like a fresh flower; but a fake smell.'], 'author': u'sweetladyb ', 'date': [u'2016-07-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Refreshing mist spray', 'text': [u'This product is part refresher, part toner, and smells terrific as well. It provides a little bit of toning and is cooling when applied. It might not be a real necessity in one\'s skincare regime, but it is a wonderful little luxury.'], 'author': u'baxterd ', 'date': [u'2016-05-01'], 'location': u'Omaha, Nebraska', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Dior Dior Dior!', 'text': [u'This product just came out and it is an addition to the one essential line!!! The spray has a strong fragrance and it smells really nice. I use this product can be used in many different ways, before skin care products, after makeup for extra moisture and after skin care routine. My skin feels really smooth, firm and moisturized after using it. Still need to see how it works after a month of using but so far so good!'], 'author': u'misscloclo ', 'date': [u'2016-04-26'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Moisturizing Skin Guardian
reviews: {'title': u'Not worth the $', 'text': [u'This lotion has entirely too much fragrance in it, it smells like something you\'d find at the dollar store. I have sensitive skin and when I used this on my face it felt like I was applying acid. Definitely returning.'], 'author': u'Jennw816 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-25'], 'location': u'Portland, OR', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'smells like play-dough', 'text': [u'I was looking for a moisturizer <$60 and the reviews for this brand were stellar so I gave it a try. Overall the moisturizer works pretty good but you need a ton of it to truly moisturizer your face and neck! Even after serum I find myself putting two layers of this moisturizer on to feel like I have an adequate amount for the day. Also, there is no sunscreen in this blend, so be sure your foundation (or other layers) will cover you. Lastly, the produce smells like play-dough. If I can return the product I think I will. It\'s just not worth $45.'], 'author': u'CareBear94954 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-04'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Love the smell! It absorbs very quickly and isn\'t oily.'], 'author': u'irina86 ', 'date': [u'2016-04-26'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Amazingly soft skin', 'text': [u'I have normal to dry skin. The problem areas being of course the T zone. I have tried so many moisturizers but none have left my skin this soft. I cannot stop touching my face (bad idea) throughout the day because of how soft it is. The smell is great which is a plus!'], 'author': u'Kla7 ', 'date': [u'2016-04-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great!', 'text': [u'This is a great moisturizer. You can see a difference in your skin right after the first use. Also, a little bit of product goes a long way. It does have a sweet / clean scent that is a little strong. That would be the only con, but this is great nonetheless.'], 'author': u'Jen213 ', 'date': [u'2016-02-12'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Instant Radiance Sun Defense Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF 40
reviews: {'title': u'glowing', 'text': [u'I\'m the type of person that love more glow the better! I love this stuff and it make my skin look beautiful! I were thing a foundation with a little bit of my Origins mixed in with it! I swear by it!! Get a sample and try it! This my 3 time buying it!'], 'author': u'britt221 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Interferes with makeup', 'text': [u'I got a generous sample of this at Sephora the other day, and am glad I did so instead of buying it first. Sticky, shiny. Interferes with makeup application no matter how long I let it set first. Worst thing, though, is when I still had it on my hands and touched the white plastic cap of my concealer, it took the surface off the cap -- I had white plastic flakes all over my hands and face. Ick.'], 'author': u'kate123 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-25'], 'location': u'New England', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

I\'m 70, so I never break out otherwise.'], 'author': u'indenial ', 'date': [u'2016-09-07'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great Formula But Color Is Orange on Light Skin', 'text': [u'Goes on lightly and sinks into skin without a greasy or dry afterfeel. I dont think its meant to moisturize but in the summer I wont need to moisturize in addition to this product. The ONLY thing I would fix about it is that I have light skin, bought the light-medium, and the color came out dissapointingly orange -even for a sheer tint. I corrected the color with color correcting product and was ok but it\'s not something I can apply and go. If you have a medium skintone you should be fine. I think Dr. Gross might consider that there are more than 2 skin color categories in the world and expanding the color options would be smart. It will be hard to satisfy so many skin tones with just two tints.'], 'author': u'nicknamecc76 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-21'], 'location': u'nyc, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

Overall, loser.'], 'author': u'Anonymous ', 'date': [u'2016-08-19'], 'location': u'NY, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'really nice', 'text': [u'as a sunscreen this stuff is great. i dont normally get burned because of my olive skin but i wanted a good spf for everyday use. I run a lot when the sun is at it\'s worst (my track/cross country class is at 2) and this stuff doesn\'t clog pores or run. it\'s very lightweight for a NATURAL SUNSCREEN, but is a little sticky feeling over a thick moisturizer, it would be ok if it were for someone with dry skin or normal skin.'], 'author': u'jaska ', 'date': [u'2016-10-03'], 'location': u'Houston tx', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'13-17'}

It does leave a tiny white cast but nothing noticeable. i will definitely be purchasing the larger size.'], 'author': u'XNat23 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-08'], 'location': u'Corpus Christi, Texas', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: Nutritious Radiant Vitality Essence Oil
reviews: {'title': u'love it', 'text': [u'I have sensitive acne prone skin, and this oil works great. It\'s not too greasy or heavy feeling, and it has not caused me to break out at all. I use it at night as a moisturizer over my Advanced Night Repair serum. Also, it smells amazing!'], 'author': u'meeeghs ', 'date': [u'2016-09-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love it!', 'text': [u'A few weeks ago I had the worst skin of my life. It was bumpy, uneven, dry, and burnt. I hated touching it. I started using this for a few days and my skin feels SO much better! The texture is much smoother and my doesn\'t have anymore dry patches. It also smells fantastic! Also this is the only change I\'ve made to my skin care routine, so any changes that have happened I can safely say is due to this product.'], 'author': u'jessicaflowers ', 'date': [u'2016-03-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"Doesn't work on me", 'text': [u'I was very excited to try out this oil after reading good reviews online. However, it doesnt work well on my skin. I have combination skin and dry and flaky on the cheek. I was hoping this will provide a good amount of moist for my face. however, it doesnt, the oil didn\'t absorb well, it was just sitting on my face. Plus, there is a small amount of fragance in this product, not ideal for those with sensitive skin.'], 'author': u'jocelynng ', 'date': [u'2015-11-16'], 'location': u'Toronto,ON', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'truly amazing!', 'text': [u'I never really cared for an oil until my skin was getting really dry. I would try different moisturizers and nothing was keeping it hydrated! It was then my friend told me use an oil! So I decided to use Estee Lauder newer nutritious oil! I fell in love with the pomegranates and the radiant look my skin had! It helped A LOT with keeping my skin smooth and hydrated throughout the day!'], 'author': u'jca95 ', 'date': [u'2015-08-30'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'A Must-Have Face Oil', 'text': [u'I stumbled upon this one day while at Sephora. As I\'m a sucker for face oils, I figured one that promised a radiant complexion and smelled like pomegranates was worth a try. And I wasn\'t disappointed. This oil has become my staple winter skin care product - it\'s a very light-weight oil that provides enough hydration without making my face look greasy, and it sinks into the skin rather quickly. I\'ll use it as a nightly skin treatment under moisturizer and underneath my makeup during the day, as it provides enough hydration and gives my skin a radiant glow. I can\'t get enough of this product. Though the price tag is relatively steep for a 1 ounce bottle, I truly feel that this is worth it. I\'ve been using it steady for two months now and I\'ll wake up with clearer, brighter skin after use. I also haven\'t noticed any skin issues resulting from this - my skin has been quite clear since I started using this oil in conjunction with the 2-Step Treatment Mask from the same Nutritious line (unfortunately, it\'s not available at Sephora).', u'Now, I\'ve got a relatively normal skin type - a bit dry at times, but not overly oily either. If you\'ve got particularly oily skin, I\'d definitely get a sample of this before you invest in it. I know that facial oils can be a bit heavy on those with oilier skin types, so be careful with how much of this you use. Yes, it\'s a lovely formula, but if you use more than two or three drops I wouldn\'t be surprised if it clogged your pores. It is an oil, after all. Also, keep in mind that this does have fragrance in it. It smells divine, of course, but if fragrance irritates your skin, I\'d suggest giving it a good trial before you commit to it. Fortunately, my skin doesn\'t react to fragrance, so I haven\'t had any issues.', u'All in all, this is a wonderful, light-weight oil that definitely gives your skin a much needed pick-me-up while you sleep. It can also double as a makeup base to give you a bit of hydration and radiance underneath your foundation. I truly love this oil; it\'s one of the better ones I\'ve tried. I highly, highly recommend this.'], 'author': u'allysacxo ', 'date': [u'2014-12-26'], 'location': u'Toronto, ON', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Immortelle Divine Youth Oil
reviews: {'title': u'Exceptional', 'text': [u'I received this as a sample like many others and I love, love this oil. I was a bit skeptical about using this product because my skin is sensitive and if I use the wrong products will get pimples even at 55. Well, this product has become my hero. No breakouts, no red blotches only beautiful smooth hydrated skin that smells like I left a spa. I will use it every other night and will definitely buy a full size as soon as I could afford it. Still can\'t say WOW enough.'], 'author': u'Mariboo13 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-30'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Too much scent', 'text': [u'This youth oil felt great on my skin. Very soft and luxurious. The smell was way too strong for me. I smelled it all night and even could smell it in the morning still! I did not care for the scent and could not wait to wash my face.'], 'author': u'happyx4 ', 'date': [u'2016-03-12'], 'location': u'Chicago, IL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'smells like a spa', 'text': [u'This oil is luxurious, does not feel greasy, and smells like a spa. Feels nice and smooth on the skin.'], 'author': u'jubly ', 'date': [u'2016-01-25'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'hydrating, great for dry skin, great smell, pricy', 'text': [u'I adore this oil. It goes on smooth, and is absorbed into my skin quickly. I typically apply it at night, and I\'ve found my skin to feel softer and more supple since I started using it.'], 'author': u'deerose ', 'date': [u'2016-01-12'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Highly recommend for mature skin', 'text': [u'Initially I got a deluxe sample of this product. I find the scent pleasant and it is luxurious and rich - but too rich for daily use on my 28 year old combination skin. I gave the sample to my mother (she\'s 60) and she asked me to buy her the full size. She uses it daily and has been getting compliments on her skin, which looks much better than it has in a long time (so many products break her out, aggravate her rosacea, or don\'t moisturize enough). She loves how nice it makes her skin feel and I think it makes her look younger.'], 'author': u'zeromero ', 'date': [u'2016-01-08'], 'location': u'St. Louis, MO', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Ibuki Quick Fix Mist
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'Excellent product with hydrating properties but I give it 4 stars only because the pump needs improvement - it doesn\'t apply the even mist coverage I was hoping for.'], 'author': u'jackattack123 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-10'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'pretty good for what it is.', 'text': [u'This product is convenient to carry around unlike most other face mists. The flat part fits on your phone screen, which isn\'t really a huge selling point but makes for sleek toting in a smaller purse.', u'The product itself is great for target areas. For example, aim at the forehead to give light hydration and take away shine. If your cheeks are dry spritz once on either side, light refreshing hydration and mist. ', u'Very refreshing scent.', u'It\'s not my absolute favorite face mist but it\'s once of the best for the purse and for slightly oily skin that wants refreshment without shine!'], 'author': u'AirArtAirHeart ', 'date': [u'2016-10-01'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'made my skin look dewy', 'text': [u'I love how it blends through my combination skin. This come in last for my regular skin care routine. Will repurchase again.'], 'author': u'konbunTA ', 'date': [u'2016-09-29'], 'location': u'Edmonton, AB', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'amazing!', 'text': [u'let me start of by saying i never bother to do reviews on any products. But this spray definitely deserves one. I have oily skin and wear full coverage foundation for about 8-10 hours a day for my job. Ive tried multiple setting sprays and this is the only one that keeps my makeup longer and i don\'t have to retouch with a matte setting powder anymore throughout the day. I received this as a sample and I\'m going to go ahead and treat myself to the full size . Excellent product for us gals with oily skin.'], 'author': u'vintage6 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': u'phoenix,az', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Rose Balm
reviews: {'title': u'perfector and multitasker', 'text': [u'I was looking for an "all over" moisturizer, which led me to this. I was reluctant at first because of the price. But this little gem lasts a very very long time. The best thing about this product is that it\'s gentle enough to use for your eyes and lips, as well as skin anywhere. The key is swirling your fingers in the product (the consistency in the jar is like hard lip balm) so its warms up and melts, then apply to your skin. This product not only moisturizes, but firms the skin. ', u'This and perfume are truly the only beauty products I splurge on for the regular.'], 'author': u'lydi7 ', 'date': [u'2016-05-30'], 'location': u'Los Angeles, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'great product', 'text': [u'This balm does have a light rose scent but that\'s not really the important thing about it. I use this on my lips every night and in the last few weeks have noticed a major difference in the softness and smoothness of my lips. Also great for cuticles before painting your nails or after taking polish off. Who cares what it smells like when it works so well?'], 'author': u'athenavictoire ', 'date': [u'2015-12-02'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"Doesn't smell like roses. No smell at all!", 'text': [u'This rose balm doesn\'t have any smell at all, totally plain. I was attract by the descriptions about this balm "an extract made from over 350 rose petals " and the previous review by saying smell good. Wrong advtise. Yes, it did moisture and hredydrating for the lips. However with the price like this for a rose lip balm that doesn\'t even smell rose at all, I think it really not worth it.'], 'author': u'beautyqueen718 ', 'date': [u'2015-11-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'awesome !', 'text': [u'Smells good. Leaves my lips feeling so soft and none drying, hydrating!'], 'author': u'anicaaxo ', 'date': [u'2015-08-28'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'Great moisturizer', 'text': [u'I didn\'t feel the brightening, but it\'s in gel and it feels cool and light on your skin.'], 'author': u'talits ', 'date': [u'2016-06-22'], 'location': u'Orange County', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Amazing', 'text': [u'I love love love this lotion...It\'s perfect for applying in the morning before starting your makeup. Light and non greasy.'], 'author': u'LilyD321 ', 'date': [u'2016-05-09'], 'location': u'Coventry, RI', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Not worth it', 'text': [u'I have the Dr. Andrew Weil For Origins\u2122 Mega\u2013Bright Skin Illuminating cleanser and I love it so I thought I\'d give this a try as well. I have dry skin and wanted to add this to my skin care routine to give my face a more hydrated look. Because of this product I now have mild breakouts on my face that would have been worse if not for the rest of my skincare routine. I know this was the cause because everything else in my routine has been in rotation for a while now and this is the only new thing I\'ve added. It also didn\'t do anything astounding to justify the price. I\'m really disappointed and will not be repurchasing.'], 'author': u'MorganSmLw ', 'date': [u'2016-04-15'], 'location': u'Nyc', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Just Okay', 'text': [u'This was an ok moisturizer but not what I was looking for. I do like that it\'s lightweight and doesn\'t feel too heavy to wear under makeup. Does is brighten my skin? I don\'t think so. I will keep it as a backup but probably won\'t repurchase or recommend.'], 'author': u'emdoxie2 ', 'date': [u'2016-01-08'], 'location': u'Texas', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Love it', 'text': [u'I\'ve been using this for the past 1.5 months and I love it! I can\'t wait to finish the jar so I can see the final results. In the beginning, I found the lotion to be more like a light gel texture, hard to absorb and a little sticky. However I\'m used to rubbing it in gently in circles and patting my skin lightly until it is absorbed. Once absorbed you don\'t get the sticky feeling. I love how my skin looks now, it glows, it\'s luminous and brighter! I feel clean and fresh when I remove my make up at the end of the day and could not be happier with the results. I do have acne scars and redness on my skin that I\'m hoping will fade with use. At least some disappeared so far since I do see results! The scent smells fresh, like citrus and fruits. If you have a problem with dry patches, I just dab a little bit on those spots after make up, and gently pat it in. Takes care of the dryness, doesn\'t affect make up and adds a little glow/dewy look.'], 'author': u'jennnh ', 'date': [u'2015-12-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: Moisture Replenishing Day Cream
reviews: {'title': u'I love', 'text': [u'I have super dry skin and I love the way this cream makes it feel. It does smell like roses but dissipates quickly. I also love the rose hydrating spray.'], 'author': u'mmyl ', 'date': [u'2016-08-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I have really dry skin, to the point where my knuckles crack during the winter months. This is the only hand cream that works for me. Some people might think it\'s too greasy for their liking, but personally I love it. One application can last me half the day (after washing my hands a few times). I would recommend it to anyone with sever dry hands.'], 'author': u'vanevela ', 'date': [u'2016-01-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Better as a Night Cream', 'text': [u'At first I did not like this product I felt like it was heavy and greasy, especially during the day. I have very unbalanced skin: dry sensitive cheeks, but super oily everywhere else, and tend to be acne prone.. So about a month ago I opened this product back up and use it as a night cream, or after a cleansing/ detoxifying mask. I do this because it doesn\'t matter if it is little bit greasy looking when going to bed. For me to use it best I put it in my finger tips and rub them together to warm the cream up because it is so thick and instead of rubbing on the face dab it in like you are bending out concealer. If you have a little to much then you can gently buff it out. Using it like this leave my face very balanced when I wake up and makes everything plump and moisturized. Try what works best for you.'], 'author': u'sanells ', 'date': [u'2015-12-21'], 'location': u'Ontario', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Disappointing', 'text': [u'I bought this hoping I would really love it but boy I am disappointed. The smell is way too strong and not very pleasant, not really rose like either, the cream it self is so thick I had to really RUB into my skin instead if it gliding smoothly on it. I don\'t usually write negative reviews but this was NOTHING like what thought it should be.'], 'author': u'OrganicBeauty85 ', 'date': [u'2015-12-04'], 'location': u'Greenwich, CT', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Rénergie Lift Multi-Action Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF 15 For All Skin Types
reviews: {'title': u'love', 'text': [u'After using samples of this product, I decided to take the plunge. The only thing is that the sample did not specify that it was a day cream or that it even had spf, so I was using it as a night cream! Haha. Either way, I loved the feel of it: slightly thick but non-greasy, and absorbed quickly. I am not a fan of the scent, but have not had any problems with my eyes becoming irritated like others have mentioned. My skin was noticeably different when I woke up in the morning, even after the first use. It looked firmer, and more radiant. Hopefully, it should still work the same way if I actually use it as a day cream. I actually purchased a gift set at the Lanc\xf4me counter from Macy\'s that also included the night cream and eye cream so I am excited to try those out as well.'], 'author': u'jypark620 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-01'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Good lifting cream', 'text': [u'I like this moisturizer, it does really work for my lines and wrinkles. I mean I\'m only 36 but it does smooth them so that they don\'t become too noticeable. They won\'t go away either but it tightens lines and wrinkles around my face. I use the eye cream and that one is total perfection. I have noticed wrinkles around my eye area have diminished completely.'], 'author': u'bambinita ', 'date': [u'2016-09-25'], 'location': u'Colorado Springs, CO', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Got a sample of this and used it for a week. ITS AMAZING. My makeup glided on and my face had a natural glow with it. It even helped my oily zones dramatically! About to place an order for the full size! So worth it!'], 'author': u'ruthyb ', 'date': [u'2016-06-12'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Really good', 'text': [u'Wow! Amazing moisturizer. I tend to go way drier in winters. So decided to buy this. Excellent hydration. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because sometimes it made my skin break out. Since I\'ve oily combo skin, I think applying too much might have broken me out. Nonetheless, it\'s a very good moisturizer.'], 'author': u'Tj2891 ', 'date': [u'2016-04-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'heavenly', 'text': [u'I cannot believe this product. Dramatic result with 1 use! Seriously. I have been having just tired looking skin, dull, large pores, dry a bit on the top, oily a bit deeper down. I read that many people swear by this for `lifting` everything up a bit. I just put it on in a whim and holy cow. Felt like my skin went straight up to heaven. So I have been using a sample for a few days and my skin looks 5 YEARS younger. Just beautiful. Even tone, tighter, pores are small and even! I know this is `lifting` but the difference it made in my overall skintone is dramatic. I have 3 deep lines on my forehead and those are still there but softened. Oh, there is this Dry skin one and the All skin one. Both have very thick texture however they sink in completely and absolutely NO oil or grease left. Incredible texture! Normally all rich creams give me large pores but this actually made them small! I prefer the Dry skin one a tad bit but they seem almost the same to me. Oh, don`t use it under the eyes, as the fragrance might be irritating. Grab a sample, it is the only cream that made me look 5 years younger in a day or two. :-))))'], 'author': u'emodel ', 'date': [u'2015-10-17'], 'location': u'Seattle, WA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'works for me', 'text': [u'i never write reviews but felt the need - i have tried almost every body and face self tanner made. this one is perfect balance of light, gradual color with no orange tint or streaking. who cares if it smells bad, thats the price for many good self tanners. fades evenly too. a little goes a long way- economical. this and hampton gel product keep me from looking pasty pale'], 'author': u'judyvg ', 'date': [u'2016-04-08'], 'location': u'boston MA', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'No color but great for oily skin', 'text': [u'I was using this for a week before I realized it is supposed to be self tanner. I have very pale skin, so if it didn\'t show up on me, I\'m not sure who it will work for (as a tanner, that is)! However, I love what it does for oily/combo skin in hot and humid climates. It absorbs instantly and makes your skin feel toned, firm, and fresh. I\'ve noticed my pores seem a bit tighter and my skin texture is smoother and softer. A little pea sized amount goes a long way. I\'m just conflicted about whether I will buy again after it runs out. It seems a waste and extra chemicals since the tanner doesn\'t work. But the other results are so nice that I might consider it...'], 'author': u'hannahpoole ', 'date': [u'2015-06-25'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: HIGH RÉSOLUTION NIGHT REFILL-3X™
reviews: {'title': u'Fantastic night cream!', 'text': [u'I love this night cream, but not the price unfortunately. It smells nice, absorbs quickly, but leaves a soft, supple feeling on my skin. I am still in my 20s so using an anti-aging cream at this level is a bit unnecessary. I have been using this cream for 2 months and am really happy with the smoothness of my skin, but I will have to buy a different one once I run out. It\'s great for anti-aging though; my mother has been using it for years (in her 60s), and her skin is beautiful.'], 'author': u'faceshmace ', 'date': [u'2016-02-24'], 'location': u'Edmonton, AB', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Allergic to Night Refill - 3X Love DAY REFILL - 3X', 'text': [u'Sadly - I am allergic to High Resolution Night Refill 3X. I absolutely LOVE High Resolution Day Refill - 3X - so I was so disappointed to be allergic to the Night cream. Wish I would have tried the night cream first. I am sure they would have given me a sample. Live and Learn! I will continue to use the High Resolution Day Refill - 3X.'], 'author': u'plbc ', 'date': [u'2016-01-10'], 'location': u'Iowa', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'Not for me.', 'text': [u'I got this sample size with the fab Visionnaire, so I thought this would equally amazing. I tried it for three days, couldn\'t keep using it. It is sad, because I really like Lancome, I think it\'d work on a more mature skin (I\'m 28 with good skin).'], 'author': u'danniex ', 'date': [u'2015-01-30'], 'location': u'Tucson, AZ', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: BB Bounce Beauty Balm
reviews: {'title': u'Better as a concealer', 'text': [u'The first time I bought this product, I was expecting it to be like a typical Korean BB cushion with a light, watery consistency that could be lightly tapped onto the skin. This product, however, is much more of a paste consistency, and like other reviewers have mentioned, is difficult to blend out (giving a "cake face"). I have found, however, due to the thicker texture, that this product works well for me as a light-medium coverage spot concealer. I simply use a small kabuki to stipple over any blemishes that I may have and it usually does the trick! After my first one dried out (my mistake -- I left it in the Texas heat), I did repurchase one to use solely as a concealer. I have a difficult time finding regular concealer brands that match my skin tone as an Asian, and this just happened to match!'], 'author': u'vibmichie ', 'date': [u'2016-11-04'], 'location': u'Dallas, Texas', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Amazing with some stippling!!', 'text': [u'I love my skin to glow and look healthy - this absolutely does the trick. ', u'Did not emphasize my pores, or cake in the crease around my nose. ', u'It gave me enough coverage to reduce any redness in the centre of my face. I use a cream concealer underneath periodically if I need to cover blemishes, etc. :) ', u'Perfect no-makeup makeup for buildable light-med coverage!'], 'author': u'jeccabe ', 'date': [u'2016-11-02'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

Don\'t apply too much as I find it hard to blend, a little goes a long way.'], 'author': u'Maria394 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'not for acne prone skin', 'text': [u'First off this moisturizer has an extremely strong smell, it\'s not bad it\'s just very strong. I usually don\'t mind that but I know some people do so I figured it\'s worth pointing out. But the main reason why I didn\'t enjoy this lotion is because it broke me out within only two days. It\'s the only new product I used so I know it was this. Other than that, it left a very matte finish which I liked. So if you aren\'t acne prone and don\'t mind strong scents then you might like it! But if you\'re like me and have sensitive skin then I say you\'re better off with something else.'], 'author': u'nursejeanette ', 'date': [u'2015-11-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

name: White Marble Translucence Cream
reviews: {'title': u'Awesomely Effective', 'text': [u'When I was a young man, I didn\u2019t know better to protect my skin from the harmful UV rays being under the sun playing sports & my daily life activities. Now I just turned 43, I\u2019ve noticed some brown spot & uneven skin tone on my face and neck that just makes me look tired and old. So I decided to give this gel cream a try, man! It\u2019s awesome! I have a T-Zone oily combination skin, this gel cream is light and not sticky, moisturizing but did NOT clog my pores and did NOT cause any breakout! In about 21 days, I\u2019ve noticed the brown spot / acne scars have lightened and my skin tone is now even & healthy (younger) looking! Guys, you need to give this product a try! We men need to take care of our skin, too! I give this product two thumbs up!'], 'author': u'coolcalidude ', 'date': [u'2016-08-25'], 'location': u'Beverly Hills, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

name: Smart Broad Spectrum SPF 15 Custom-Repair Moisturizer for Very Dry to Dry Skin
Renewed Hope In a Jar Microrenewal Hydrating Mist
reviews: {'title': u'Natural Glow', 'text': [u'This gives me a natural, healthy glow- both immediately, and over time.', u'I use this essentially as a toner. I spray this on when my skin is completely dry and soft after cleansing and pat it in, then apply moisturizer once it is completely dry. It makes my skin look fresh and hydrated, and gives me a glow that I miss when I\'ve skipped it.', u'Over time, the glycolic gives me fresh, glowing skin.When I got this, I had bought a bunch of new Philosophy products and changed my routine to an anti-aging one. My skin looked incredible, literally the best of my life (many people actually noticed and commented on it), but it was hard to pinpoint what was doing what.', u'I stopped using this for a bit and realized my skin just wasn\'t "amazing" anymore. I immediately picked it back up, and the glow is back! This gives my skin a fresh, healthy glow that is what puts it over the top into amazing skin territory.', u'Its such a simple thing, and I never expected something like this to be such a game changer.'], 'author': u'kittymeowmeow ', 'date': [u'2016-10-10'], 'location': u'Brooklyn, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Lazy Girl MIst', 'text': [u'I\'m very low maintenance when it comes to makeup so I have to take care of my skin. This mist is AMAZING! If you want that dewy glow with natural highlight, I reccomend this. After a few minutes of a few sprays, my skin feels hydrated, tight and lifted - yes lifted. My skin looks younger and plump. I love it. $30 is worth it.'], 'author': u'BareFaceNative ', 'date': [u'2016-05-31'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Bienfait Multi-Vital Daily Replenishing Oil
reviews: {'title': u'Eat Your Vitamins', 'text': [u'If you really want that extra glow, take a few vitamin capsules, go for a run, and eat your veggies! This product has been causing a ruckus in just about every fall fashion magazine by editors and the like. I\'m not sure if it\'s just my skin, but I have normal to dry, and err more on the dry side. It might be a game changer come winter, but it is oily as all anything and actually caused me to break out in a few places. Use 1-2 drops and only during the day. I would thoroughly rinse your face and use something else for bedtime. I didn\'t notice much of a difference and I swear by Lancome\'s Advanced Genifique.'], 'author': u'jackie713 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-20'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Overall, I\'d say pretty great. I bought this because of the reviews, but also because I got a trial version of the Lancome line, and I wanted to see how they all worked together. Typically, my skin is dry/normal, not easily irritated, and only has hormonal breakouts. I\'ve never used daily oil before, but this one smells great, isn\'t too oily, and only a few drops cover my face and neck, so its going to last a long time. It works great on my face and I\'ve noticed a big difference in my skin\'s glow and radiance, but I don\'t know if I\'d recommend this to someone who has trouble with an oily complexion.'], 'author': u'Kalyn93 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'perfect with a qualifier', 'text': [u'I get dry patches on my chin and cheeks throughout the year and my makeup makes them more noticeable. This past winter I decided I was done looking like I lost a fight with a sandblaster so I purchased this oil. I started using 3-4 drops straight on my face at night and putting 1-2 in my foundation for my morning routine. I found that using it straight at night helped to get rid of my dry patches, but it gave me white heads in my T-zone and the creases of my nose. So I mixed it with my Clinique moisture surge lotion- total game changer. No more white heads and no more dry patches! I\'ve been using this oil for about 4 months now and my skin is noticeably softer and more moisturized throughout the day and I\'ve reduced my nightly amount (that I mix in with the Clinique lotion) to 2-3 drops per application. I still use 1-2 drops with my foundation in the mornings and it makes my makeup feel light and look even. I highly recommend this oil for any beauty entrepreneur looking to delve into the world of oils.'], 'author': u'MimiLizz ', 'date': [u'2016-05-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'I love it', 'text': [u'It worth the money that you pay. My skin is so hydrated. If you try it you going to love it.'], 'author': u'gsortiz ', 'date': [u'2016-05-11'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}
