name: Sunshine Oil
reviews: {'title': u'Hydrating oil-- good for dry skin', 'text': [u'I have combo skin and with the change in temps on the East Coast, I prefer a little extra moisture at night. After using a serum, I apply this oil, and then a moisturizing cream after washing my face at night. Not a total fan of the scent, but it is light. Not a fan of the rollerball applicator- I dont feel like enough oil comes out for me. It seems like a very thin layer so I have to go over my face a few times and then pat it in. Once I am satisfied with the oil amount, it does a good job of locking in moisture and my face definitely feels smoother in the am. However-- nothing super special about this oil and there are similar, if not better ones, out there with more natural scents and easier applicators (josie maran\'s argan oil as an example).'], 'author': u'peanut0205 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-25'], 'location': u'Trumbull, CT', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Favorite makeup remover', 'text': [u'This is my favorite way to remove makeup. My mom introduced it to me when I was in high school (I\'m in graduate school now). I\'ve used it to remove both liquid and powder foundation (with sunscreen and occasionally blush) and it\'s gentle, non drying to me (FYI I have oily skin), scentless and effective.', u'I use this at night; two pumps is enough to cover my entire (dry) face and I just spread it across my face and rub it in. Since I shower at night, I just step into the shower, wet my finger tips and rub my face to emulsify the oil and rinse everything off in the shower. Because I\'m very oily and breakout prone, I always follow up with whatever face cleanser I\'m using at the time.', u'I don\'t wear eye makeup anymore so I don\'t know how effective this is with stubborn mascara and eyeliner but it\'s been able to remove my Stila waterproof liquid eyeliner in the past.', u'I\'d say one bottle lasts me around 9months-1year. I\'ve maybe used 5-6 bottles of this since my first bottle at least 7-8 years ago.', u'I\'m at the point where I\'ve stopped trying other cleansing oils because they either don\'t come close in removing makeup or are as effective but more expensive for the same amount.'], 'author': u'cardboardboxes ', 'date': [u'2015-04-18'], 'location': u'Bay Area, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Honestly this product is decent!', 'text': [u'I researched this makeup kit before buying. Some reviewers were saying their pores were visible after wearing it for a few hours. The section in the bottom pan that looks like a highlighter is supposed to be something called a "pore balm". It\'s to prep your skin before the BB cream in the areas that have visible pores i.e. nose, cheeks and chin. It can also be a highlighter as well. Overall, this kit is not so bad. Yes, it only has two colors but after a few minutes of wearing it, it will oxidize and match your skin tone. However, if you are a lighter shade this is good for you but if not then well, don\'t get it. It is 50 bucks for a small compact. In my opinion, get it if you travel a lot or you need something for on the go. I will probably keep it since it doesn\'t irritate my skin.'], 'author': u'gibby26 ', 'date': [u'2016-05-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Horrible. Starts out pretty, then turns horrible.', 'text': [u'This looks beautiful for exactly 60-90 minutes. And it is so very pretty. Then, things quickly go downhill. It starts looking oily to very oily for the 2nd hour (and I have dry skin!). At the 3rd hour of wear, the normal-sized pores on my nose & near my nose looked like huge, greasy disgusting craters. So gross! I honestly have never seen my skin at any time ever look like that. Plus, all the product color was gone in those areas. Tried it another day, and exact same thing happened. Trust me, if you test this in Sephora, you are gonna look so pretty. Do Not be tempted to buy it! Wait three hours. The pretty will be gone. ', u'If for some reason you want to try this anyway, be aware that the lighter of the two colors is ghostly white. The dark color (that looks medium & quite dark tan in the pan) is actually very fair as well. It was the darker color that perfectly matched my fair-to-barely light with warm undertones skin. Also, fyi, the peach tint in the bottom section is for cheeks only (not mulit-use for lips too as stated), and is a very flat, cheap looking, light peach. Not flattering, even on my fair skin. The concealer seemed okay. ', u'Back to the foundation (bb cream-whatever?) I also didn\'t like that it was hard to tell how much I was using. Applying with the small puff provided & patting it on, it was impossible to tell how much product was being picked up out of the pan and how much I was getting on my skin (I had a very good color match and it melted into my skin). I couldn\'t tell if I over applied or under. And no way this could be applied with fingers. If it was liquid, I\'d see, oh, I used a pump\'s worth, but with this, no clue. I will say the foundation did not settle into my fine lines, which is nice (most do), but then again, I never wore it past 3 hours because it looked so gross that I had to remove it; maybe it would have settled into my lines if worn for a full day. Perhaps you could make this work with a not very moisturized face, a mattifying serum, a top-notch super oil controlling primer, and a loose setting powder -- but doesn\'t that defeat the whole purpose of this being an easy, on-the-go foundation compact? I mean, if you are carrying a jar of setting powder, and a big fluffy brush, then why would you need this? If you had access/time for primer, setting powder, etc., well then you\'d have access/time for an actual bottle of real foundation that wears well & looks good all day, not a cutesy compact from Korea on which the company spent more time designing packaging than thinking through the makeup itself! Personally, I bought this for touch ups, but it works terribly for that, not playing nice with other products under it, and adding a weird greasy sheen to my skin. Again, after one hour, not only disappearing, but breaking down the bb-cream and Kat Lock it Powder Foundation that was under it, plus making my pores look huge. Maybe they should rebrand this as a makeup remover. ', u'Note: I have worn & liked/loved BB creams, liquid foundations, powder foundations, and mineral foundations, from sheer to medium coverage, so it is not the formula nor fact it is in a compact that bothers me. I just can\'t conceive of a situation where I would be happy with my face looking good for only, and EXACTLY one, hour. Even for a dinner date, it needs to last 2 to 2 1/2 hours, which is way past when the pretty in this thing has left the building and it all goes ugly.'], 'author': u'LeeLeeBk ', 'date': [u'2016-05-08'], 'location': u'Orange County, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

name: Double Wear Brush-On Glow BB Highlighter
reviews: {'title': u'Too sparkly', 'text': [u'I bought this to use it under my eyes for extra highlighting on top of my concealer and at first I thought it was great, it blended well and didn\'t leave creases nor was it drying like some other reviews are saying. BUT as the day went by I noticed some sparkle in my under eye area and at first I thought it was eyeshadow fallout but then I realized it\'s this BB highlight! Unfortunately that\'s not what I was looking for so I will be returning it but if you don\'t mind the sparkle you will probably appreciate this product!'], 'author': u'bebidol ', 'date': [u'2016-10-07'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'Made me break out horribly!'], 'author': u'Befz ', 'date': [u'2016-10-02'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'It works for me', 'text': [u'I bought it last winter, I was bright last winter. But I thought it was because the weather. I did not continue using it. When I try last week during the summer, I found it definitely works on me ! My skin feels clear and bright.'], 'author': u'marcie23 ', 'date': [u'2016-06-11'], 'location': u'Buffalo, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I begun using this cream over the winter along with the Serum, my skin absorbed it quickly and I noticed dark acne spots starting to fade after a month or two.It didn\'t completely remove all of the dark spots but it definitely lightened and evened my skin tone. Over the summer, my skin wouldn\'t absorb it anymore so I stopped using the serum and only used the creme at night. It has lasted about 10 months but I am about to run out. I really liked this creme but I am looking for other options for the mere reason of seeing what else is available.'], 'author': u'TheCarolinaShip ', 'date': [u'2016-01-24'], 'location': u'El Paso, TX', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'it works!!!', 'text': [u'I love this skin care line from Est\xe9e Lauder. I don\'t have much dark spot but a tiny bit that I\'m trying to get rid of. The dark spots has faded a lot with this skin care. I use the serum and the moisturizer and my face feels so soft. Don\'t except it to fade over night. But with time it would slowly fade. I recommend this product if your tackling your dark spots, and be patient and you\'ll notice a difference.'], 'author': u'CoCoVH ', 'date': [u'2015-12-04'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Really good cream, keeps its promise', 'text': [u'I\'ve have sun damage on my face for the last year and I\'ve tried everything. I did internet searches and bought the creams that had the best customer feedback, but they did nothing. With this cream, I saw a difference in just a few days. I\'ve been using it for a couple of weeks now. It has brightened up my face, and the sun damage has faded quite a bit. This week I started combining it with the Cane+Austin miracle pads (peeling). That one is very strong, it stings for a few minutes after you apply it, so I immediately apply this cream to soothe my skin. I absolutely love it and will continue to use it. Note that it is a very thick cream, and since my face is very oily, I only apply a little because otherwise it does not absorb. And since it\'s so thick it seems that one jar will go a very long way.'], 'author': u'mariaks ', 'date': [u'2015-10-19'], 'location': u'Boston, MA', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

reviews: {'title': u"Didn't help at all", 'text': [u'I love Est\xe9e Lauder products for their consistency and smell. This serum is not an exclusion. I loved the feeling after applying it to my skin. {'title': u'seeing results', 'text': [u'I purchased this and the Enlighten moisturizer cream for my post acne dark spots. I have been using this and the cream daily for about 4 weeks now. I am already seeing my spots lighten. Enlightening and brightening products take 4-12 weeks to see any results and this is with daily use. Keep that in mind when reading these reviews. Many people don\'t see results right away and give it a bad review but this product is great. I feel like it also helps keep my face clear from acne and my makeup goes on a lot smoother. I would recommend to anyone wanting to lighten dark spots.'], 'author': u'jennacouture ', 'date': [u'2016-05-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Classic Essence Increment
reviews: {'title': u'Effective in improving skin texture', 'text': [u'I have been using this serum for more than two months. I\'m very happy with the result it gave to my skin. I have sensitive and dehydrated skin but this serum heals. It feels so good to apply and I love the scent. I use this serum follow by aqua bomb in humid summer and moisturizing bomb in dry winter to lock in the moisture. They work very well together and I\'d say they work very well on my skin. Highly recommend!'], 'author': u'Sheep812 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-31'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Dehydrated Skin Savior', 'text': [u'I have super dehydrated skin, it\'s dry but I never experience flaking or anything like that so thick "hydrating" creams never really do enough for me. Definitely soothes my skin and is lightweight enough that my face doesn\'t feel smothered in skincare.'], 'author': u'EmmaAB ', 'date': [u'2016-10-16'], 'location': u'Lowell, MA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Balancing Day Care Cream
reviews: {'title': u'Great cream for balancing tone', 'text': [u'I tried this while looking for a summer foundation. The beauty specialist applied this to even out any redness in my face before applying Estee Lauder DayWear BB cream. I love how even it makes my skin look and it will also be a great cream to wear alone in the summer. I do have combination skin and can see how others say it doesn\'t absorb well. You only need to apply a VERY small amount, though! Would definitely recommend.'], 'author': u'ClaireMcCo ', 'date': [u'2015-06-03'], 'location': u'Toronto, Ontario', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

Perfect for normal to dry skin in winter.'], 'author': u'tarheelblue ', 'date': [u'2014-02-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Most Jurlique products agree with my skin. This is no exception. Overall I love it, even the fragrance that others complain about.'], 'author': u'cschanel88 ', 'date': [u'2012-12-21'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Just ok', 'text': [u'I have pretty normal skin. Maybe a little drier on my cheeks and a little oilier on my T zone. This skin lotion sat like a mask on my face. name: Coconut Moisturizing Facial Mist
reviews: {'title': u'Great refreshing spray', 'text': [u'This is a very nice mist. I like to use it at night after a shower, or in the morning after I wash my face. It is a very refreshing mist. I would not advise spraying this on top of makeup as it is definately a SPRAY nor a MIST. You will get a nice bath of product.', u'I find the fragrance very strong and sweet, but still pleasant. If you are sensitive to scents this may not be a good product for you.', u'I like the size of the bottle. It seems small, but is the standard amount (even a little generous) for a facial spray. There is no empty/wasted space in the bottle, so you don\'t have to store a huge bottle in your vanity. It is also chic looking, which matters to me.', u'I have normal to dehydrated skin, and this is a hydrating mist for me. Doesn\'t make my skin oily or greasy. Only 4 stars because even though I enjoy it very much and love it, it\'s definately not life changing. It\'s not going to affect any skin problems you have - it\'s just a nice refreshing and lightly hydrating mist.'], 'author': u'ShannonAlexis ', 'date': [u'2016-06-13'], 'location': u'WV', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'LOOOOOVE!!', 'text': [u'Bought this on a whim...OMG this smells like I\'m on a beach in Hawaii. A faint coconut smell that reminds me of sunscreen but just barely. name: Pore Glowing Moisture Stick
reviews: {'title': u'Great! But...', 'text': [u'I do love how this feels on my skin, but there really is almost nothing in the bottle\u2014I almost mistaked it for a sample product. Definitely not worth it for the price. I also didn\'t realize that glitter was in it. I don\'t mind the glitter, but now I will take more caution when using it.', u'What is does for my skin is just fantastic though. I could smear this on my face all day! My skin is very oily. I put this on before bed and my skin still feels soft and moisturized (but not dry or greasy). In that sense, it is a good product, but I won\'t be purchasing anymore for the price that it is.'], 'author': u'HyenaHijack ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Sparkles', 'text': [u'I agree that the balm is absorbed into the skin quickly without any sort of slick feeling, which I like, but it tugs a bit which makes me concerned about how it would apply over make up. The tube is very small -- about 3" tall at most -- and the product itself is only about half an inch. The thing that made me return it though, is the fact that it\'s sparkly. It has microglitter imbedded in the stick so that when you put the moisturizer on, you\'re essentially coating your face in sparkles. (I\'m surprised that no one else has mentioned this! I never would have bought it if I knew!)In the end, it is a very small but great non-slick moisturizer if you don\'t mind the sparkles. (I gave it three stars because although the moisturizer itself feels nice, I docked a star for the size and a star for the microglitter)'], 'author': u'kurea ', 'date': [u'2016-09-15'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'so perfect', 'text': [u'I have very oily skin, but this product absorbed quickly, kept me moisturized all night but did not produce any shine over time, nor did it create any extra oils. I am so in love!'], 'author': u'IamMolly ', 'date': [u'2016-09-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

', u'The formula is lightly scented, but it\'s a clean scent and it washes off so there is no lingering scent. ', u'The cleanser is very good and it can even remove my stubborn waterproof eyeliner and mascara. I have gotten this oil in my eyes a few times on accident and it does not hurt. name: Illuminating BB Brush Broad Spectrum SPF 30
reviews: {'title': u'I love wearing this alone!', 'text': [u'I pride myself on my skincare and I like to think it shows. PRO TIP: remove the brush! Then it is just a tube you can squeeze the product out of. Great for those "no makeup" days and if you like dewy finishes.'], 'author': u'staceyfacey ', 'date': [u'2016-11-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Weightless, SPF 30 Glow', 'text': [u'I love this product. It\'s been added to my daily makeup routine and it fits in so well! The only thing I don\'t like is getting the product out. You squeeze the bottle and then it works it\'s way into the brush. I like the all-in-one brush-and-product style but I always end up squeezing too much out to get it through the brush and I\'m left with wasted product.Tl;dr - great formula not so great dispenser.'], 'author': u'Mandolynn ', 'date': [u'2016-08-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love the weightless glow with protection', 'text': [u'I love wearing this product because it provides sun protection. It gives me a nice dewy glow even when I apply a light powder on top of the cream. I use a beauty blender to apply the product. The brush applicator it comes with does not work for me. My skin is normal/dry. A++ if you do not require a lot of coverage.'], 'author': u'DavinaA ', 'date': [u'2016-07-26'], 'location': u'New Orleans, LA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'terrible.....back to Tatcha for me', 'text': [u'Jurlique\'s cleansing oil didn\'t remove my mascara, made my skin sting, and left it feeling dirty. I have very oily skin, yet a couple cleansing oils I\'ve tried left my skin feeling clean and soft, but not this one.'], 'author': u'jpjenk ', 'date': [u'2016-05-29'], 'location': u'Boston MA', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Love it', 'text': [u'First of all let me say that I did not buy this to take my make-up off. For that purpose I don\'t think that it would be very good. I use a gel cleanser to take my make-up off first and then use this with my Clarisonic and I LOVE IT. It\'s very moisturizing, gentle and makes my skin feel soft. It\'s not greasy and I find the smell very pleasant. It almost has an earthy, floral smell (reminded me of Aveda products). This was my first time buying an oil cleanser and I feel that using this has really balanced out my combination skin. I had previously received a sample of a Lancome oil cleanser and I find that I like this one much better. You also only need to use one pump because a little goes a long way. Also be aware that because it is an oil it can be a little messy, especially if you use it with a Clarisonic, but to me it is worth it!'], 'author': u'lovelovell7 ', 'date': [u'2016-03-04'], 'location': u'Roy, WA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}
ingredient: *From Natural Essential Oil.

name: Phelityl Pre-Cleansing Oil
reviews: {'title': u'Love!', 'text': [u'I was hesitant about applying oil prior to cleansing, but it is actually awesome! Smells nice, is a nice consistency, and works great in conjunction with the Sea Mud bar. I suffer from a bit of acne and rosacea, and felt these products were gentle and soothing when applied. I have noticed my skin to be clearing up more than usual and find my skin more hydrated.'], 'author': u'wanderess29 ', 'date': [u'2016-04-01'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Wow.', 'text': [u'Old school is cool! This is such a pleasure to use. My skin looks about 10 years or so younger at least to me. It smells not perfumed but elegant. I remember this on a beautiful skinned persons vanity! You get what you pay for with this product. Worth every darn penny.'], 'author': u'kardee5 ', 'date': [u'2016-03-24'], 'location': u'hilliard, ohio', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'a little goes a long way!', 'text': [u'Use this in conjunction with the black bar and sometimes before a very deep cleaning polish/scrub. Works great and you need very little product. You are supposed to apply to dry skin, just an FYI.'], 'author': u'blacklamb ', 'date': [u'2015-07-27'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'W O W', 'text': [u'i am just beyond picky about my cleansing routine. I like it thorough but non striping. I have dry skin and since I\'m in my 40\'s anything too harsh or drying or just not right, will show.I used the Eve Lom cleanser for a year, and quite frankly, though it says it could replace your toner and moisturizer altogether, it doesn\'t. It is alright but nothing crazy.So was in the hunt for something new. Until I saw a deluxe sample of this, together with the black soap. And though it is for combo skin, the black soap, tried it either way.OMG! I have no words to express how impressed I am! Will try to do it either way.The oil is thick. Real thick. It almost seem that doesn\'t run so well on the skin, but with the warmth of your fingers, it foes. You don\'t have to tug your skin at all. So you know.It has a fragrance...but nothing offensive. Smells vintage, I think.Then you are supposed to put the soap in hot water, and splash your face with it. Then use the soap twice.The soap smells soapy and would irritate your eyes, so recommend you yo remove your eye make up with something else before.Then you rinse and splash your face with fresh water. And then, only then, you notice the miracle. Your skin appear like porcelain, velvety, soft, clean, luminous and moisturized. You could just skip the moisturizer if you want... Not like I would do that, but your skin feels do balanced and suppled, nothing like ordinary cleansers that make your skin feel tight and uncomfortable. I am on tretinoin so my skin gets real dry. But this... This was something else. And though the soap is for combo skin, worked just to perfection on my dry skin.Now, the real miracle happened the day after... The glow of my skin!!! I noticed it before jumping in the shower. Just unbelievable.I never though I would happily pay a hundred bucks for oil and soap. But I did. I cannot recommend this product enough. Fantastic!'], 'author': u'CLovesBeauty ', 'date': [u'2015-06-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Hydrating', 'text': [u'Excellent cleaning oil to use with Sea Mud cleansing bar. Leaves skin super clean and moisturized. Wonderful for sensitive skin.'], 'author': u'nanie1 ', 'date': [u'2015-04-02'], 'location': u'Boston, Ma', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

name: Flawless Skin Purifying Cleansing Oil
reviews: {'title': u'Great for sensitive-skin', 'text': [u'Minus one annoying thing - which I list below - I can still highly recommend this cleansing oil. It is gentle for those with sensitive-skin and gets the job done without any stinging or that "stretched" skin after-effect. When removing makeup, however, it does take me two rounds of washing with Sephora\'s Precision Pore Cleansing Pad to fully remove my warpaint but I think that\'s primarily due to the fact that this cleanser hardly suds (which I like). Also, its application (you apply the cleanser onto a dry face rather than a wet one) and the pump require some getting used to. In the case of the pump (which knocked 1 star off my overall rating), like what most other reviewers already mentioned, it doesn\'t pump out cleanly because some of the cleanser seeps out from the pump\'s neck. It\'s clearly a defect that I hope Laura Mercier will correct because my patience with repeatedly wiping the bottle and my counter of the cleanser isn\'t infinite.'], 'author': u'wherespetra ', 'date': [u'2015-06-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I read the reviews regarding the bottle and put off purchasing this for a long time. I now own the product and it\'s great. The bottle does not leak at all and I\'ve had it for over a month now. I have very dry skin and this is perfect for removing makeup and it does\'t over dry my skin. I tried another oil based product and it left my skin flakey and dry. Love this stuff!'], 'author': u'JenBj ', 'date': [u'2015-02-22'], 'location': u'Fairfax, VA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'great oil, awful bottle', 'text': [u'Like everyone else, I love the product. My skin is soft with far less breakouts. I have acne so I use it after my acne wash to keep my skin moisturized and healthy. Love it!', u'But the bottle is HORRIBLE! If I pay $50, I expect to be able to use the product without mess, waste and more mess. Two days in and the bottle leaks everywhere and it can\'t be tilted to actually get it in your hand or it leaks worse. It leaks out the cap, the pump head and everywhere else it seems.I had a bottle of another cleansing oil, which I kept, as I heard that this bottle was awful. So I\'ve now poured the Mercier product into an old bottle and all is resolved, but I couldn\'t help but think how I spent 15 minutes scrubbing, cleaning and drying a bottle when I paid $50 for a face product.Laura Mercier...please fix the bottle, or I won\'t be buying again!'], 'author': u'weekell ', 'date': [u'2015-01-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love this!', 'text': [u'Love this cleansing oil! This oil cleanser is perfect for a gentle, deep clean on your skin. Cleansers that are not oil based can leave alcohol still on your face after cleaning. Have been using this cleanser for 2 years and will definitely be using it again in the future.'], 'author': u'dylan73 ', 'date': [u'2014-06-23'], 'location': u'new york, ny', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'great product in totally annoying packaging', 'text': [u'I am giving this product only two stars in the hopes that Laura Mercier decides to pay attention to the feeback provided by her customers and fix the packaging on this item. The product is really wonderful and makes my face feel clean but not at all dried out. But as mentioned by other reviewers, there are some pretty signficant flaws in the packaging and a lot a the product ends up being wasted, not to mention the mess it makes on my bathroom counter. There are other oil-based face washes out on the market that I will be giving a try.'], 'author': u'nooraa ', 'date': [u'2014-01-26'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

name: Melt-In Moisturizing Lotion
reviews: {'title': u'my new moiturizer', 'text': [u'I\'ve been on this quest for a good moisturizer for YEARS. My skin tends to get oily by mid-day and some products cause bumps or redness. This product keeps oiliness at bay (i still get some shine but my face doesn\'t look greasy) and i don\'t get the bumps or redness. A little goes a long way. One to two small drops, rub on both palms, then press palms on face and neck. That\'s it. My liquid makeup goes on smoothly and stays on. I think the scent is lovely. I will definitely explore other products in this line.'], 'author': u'aprilr ', 'date': [u'2016-08-15'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'I love this moisturizer!', 'text': [u'I use this at night as part of my skin care regimen and I love it! It can be a little sticky I think because it is a thin gel texture. It has a somewhat strong, floral scent that I liked. In all it made my skin feel plump and smooth.'], 'author': u'deezero ', 'date': [u'2016-05-11'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Sticky residue', 'text': [u'This moisturizer leaves a sticky film on my face that is terrible for applying makeup or trying to sleep. I can only use this as a moisturizer if I plan to stay at home.'], 'author': u'RobinChristinaf ', 'date': [u'2016-05-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Light, moisturizing, cost-efficient', 'text': [u'Some information about this product: It\'s 22$ for something like 6oz of product (great price-point). It comes out as a thin gel (more liquid-y than gel) so applies smoothly and you can apply a very thin layer without using much product. It is scented and the scent will last (although it does fade a little). It doesn\'t smell artificial, and I don\'t find it overpowering but if you don\'t like floral, do not buy this line.', u'This product is moisturizing but it\'s not intensely moisturizing, so if you have dry skin or use drying products, I wouldn\'t expect this alone to work for you. (If you\'re looking for something lightly moisturizing and have oily or mild combo skin, this would probably be fine.) I use this during the day after I\'ve washed my face at the gym or have showered, to tide me over until I apply my night cream.', u'You can use a very thin layer and it works nicely and absorbs well, but until it absorbs completely it can leave a bit of a tacky residue. I don\'t use this in the morning under my makeup for that reason. (It doesn\'t take forever to absorb but it\'s not the fastest absorbing product I\'ve ever purchased.)', u'Ultimately, I can use this product and I like the price, but I won\'t repurchase - it isn\'t the right fit for me. I would be willing to recommend it for someone who is just looking for something lightly moisturizing, who doesn\'t want an oily finish on their face.'], 'author': u'frametheface ', 'date': [u'2016-04-25'], 'location': u'Chicago, IL', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}
ingredient: Water, Glycerin, Alcohol, Propanediol, Methyl Gluceth-20, Nelumbo Nucifera Root Water, Phenoxyethanol, Ppg-26-Buteth-26, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/Vp Copolymer, Peg-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Parfum (Fragrance), Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Tromethamine, Sodium Citrate, Ophiopogon Japonicus Root Extract, Citric Acid, Camellia Oleifera Seed Oil, Polyquaternium-51, Butylene Glycol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Hydroxyisohexyl 3-Cyclohexene Carboxaldehyde, Hydroxycitronellal, Linalool, Ethylhexylglycerin, Nelumbo Nucifera Flower Extract, BHT, Tocopherol.

name: Sonic Radiance™ Skin Renewing Essence Boost
reviews: {'title': u'Waste of money', 'text': [u'This product did nothing except cause me to break out. Every single time I used this I wake to new blemishes. I tried to keep using thinking it was a coincidence but it was not. I now have more discoloration and repair to do to my skin then before I started this line. Very disappointed. This scent does have a slight alcohol scent to it that smells watered down. It is very liquid almost like water but upon placing on skin there is this almost cushiony feel to it. Very hard to explain. There is also this slip it has to it. Dried fairly quickly but leaves a residue feeling on the skin. Maybe it is not residue but the moisturizing properties? It is an essence lotion (again not actual lotion but more of a toner consistency) so that it you can feel it on the skin afterwards. It leaves a slight tacky and dirty feel on the skin that I do not like. It also dulls my complexion instead of helping to brighten. Bottle is huge so if it works for you then this is a good thing. So far that is the only good thing about this product. I feel product price is much too high for what this is.'], 'author': u'ABQ505 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-10'], 'location': u'ABQ, NM', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'taj', 'text': [u'Love using this product after i wash my face. Definitely feels beautiful under my moisturizer. {'title': u'This is not a lotion', 'text': [u'I loved the Clarisonic Radiance Peel Wash so I decided to give this a try. First and foremost it is in no way a lotion, it is a liquid. It was extremely watery and has a smell of alcohol. I thought maybe it was a very thin oil and gave it a try anyway. After one use my skin became incredibly dry and tight. This is going back immediately.'], 'author': u'fstar ', 'date': [u'2015-12-03'], 'location': u'Cary, IL', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: AMERICANA Soft Focus Moisturizer
reviews: {'title': u'perfect pairing', 'text': [u'This pairs perfectly with the Americana coverage concentrate, and it\'s nice on its own. A little goes a long way to leave a dewy glow. My skin stays looking hydrated and the make up looks better, too. I would compare it to NARS moisturizer combined with a light optimizing product - for nearly half the price, Ardency Inn is the better product. I also love the AI foundation concentrate. Such a great make up line! It\'s sad to see it taken off display at my local Sephora.'], 'author': u'lanarsfan ', 'date': [u'2015-04-07'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Light Moisture', 'text': [u'I bought this to use as a foundation when mixed with the Ardency Inn foundation concentrate, it works great. Plus I would rather have a faint smell of sunscreen than melanoma so it\'s a small price to pay as far as I\'m concerned.Overall I find this to be a great light moisturizer, you don\'t need a lot and it doesn\'t leave your face sticky or shiny like other SPF 15 moisturizers'], 'author': u'hcw217 ', 'date': [u'2015-03-27'], 'location': u'Whitehorse, YT', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Pure Truth™ Vitamin C Youth Activating Oil
reviews: {'title': u'Good product but Very Tinted', 'text': [u'I got this oil with an Ole Value set. First impression is that it smells awesome HOWEVER if you apply it wrong it does leave a nice tint of orange on your face because it is so orange but it does smell good. I would probably not recommend it for those with lighter skin tones. However I applied it incorrect but that was first time using and look forward to see what results I get following this awesome product.'], 'author': u'Jazzymatazz ', 'date': [u'2016-11-10'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Awesome Product... Truth!', 'text': [u'I love this oil. I got into face oils about a year ago when they became really popular. I usually use Boscia\'s Tsubaki oil. I decided to try this recently, and I love it... I can\'t go back to the plain oil anymore! I love the scent and it feels amazing on the skin! For the people who say its too greasy or doesn\'t absorb, I think a big thing about oils is the way you apply it. I thought the same thing until I went to a rouge event last year and the Sephora associate did a demonstration on how to apply them. The best way to apply is to put a pump in the middle of you palm and rub your hands together to heat the oil and spread it around your hands, then press your hands all over your face and hold your warm hands on your face for a few seconds each time, then rub it in. This helps your skin absorb it so much and it won\'t be overly oily! I recommend this product!'], 'author': u'88Jess88 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-02'], 'location': u'Hamilton, ON', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'good ish', 'text': [u'I like this because it\'s super hydrating, and I love the smell, I only used this at night though because I found it to be a little heavy. I would recommend this for dry skin. Although there are alternatives for dry skin that are probably cheaper'], 'author': u'Amber7777 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-02'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'....eh', 'text': [u'I ordered this oil a couple months ago and have since stopped using it. After one month, I found I wasn\'t really seeing any dramatic results in my skin. During this time I was struggling with ruddiness, sun spots, acne and rough texture--this oil wasn\'t enough to solve my issues. Additionally, it made my face and neck feel greasy to the touch...and my hair, too! I had to wash my hair more often because it came into contact with my face and the oil spots on my pillow from this product.'], 'author': u'Amiphi ', 'date': [u'2016-11-02'], 'location': u'WI', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'IN LOVE!!!', 'text': [u'In LOVE!! Great product. I use this product at night after I clean my face and then I finish with a moisturizer to seal the oil. The results smooth skin in the morning. Every product will work different in different skin. This is why you see different reviews. The best way to know if work for you is to ask for a sample. Try it a few days and then make your decision. For me works amazing!'], 'author': u'SephoraDunia7 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': u'Santa Clara CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Cherry Blossoms Mist
reviews: {'title': u'overpriced', 'text': [u'It\'s not a bad mist and per bottle it doesn\'t seem so expensive but going by ounces its pretty high up there. It\'s more expensive than the caudalie grape water and I don\'t think it works as well, either as a moisture mist or a setting spray'], 'author': u'EriT1999 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'okay', 'text': [u'Not bad. Not amazing. Just a nice hydrating mist for the face. I used it for a trip to Europe so I just wanted something that smelled nice was light and refreshing to the skin, durable and easy to travel and throw in my backpack without worrying it would break or unscrew. I am a facial mist hoarder so I\'ve tried and I have a lot. Personally the one I enjoy the most with the best results is the tatcha luminous dewy skin mist but, it\'s glass and I didn\'t want to bring it on the plane. Please note I\'m talking about hydrating mist, not makeup setting spray... Anyways, if I was going to buy again I would probably get something different. This kinda reminded me of the Evian water spray... Both feel the same and pretty much had the same result minus the scent.'], 'author': u'zoe7 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Meh', 'text': [u'Not a fan, didn\'t really seem to do much. reviews: {'title': u'Just OK', 'text': [u'Bought this because I was looking for a moisturizer that would provide a subtle glow. {'title': None, 'text': [u'Love this moisturizer!!! Not too heavy not too light just perfect! Have combination skin and its evened out. Since I started using Koh Gen Do products my skin has improved. Well worth the money.'], 'author': u'cmbg ', 'date': [u'2015-11-25'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'A great all in one moisturizer', 'text': [u'I was perplexed when I saw the lower rating since I love this and the other KGD skin care products. This is a "new" product and after reviewing the lower reviews I saw they went back a couple of years. The newer reviews are spot on in there praise for this all in one moisturizer and absolutely correct that you only need to use a very small amount. The Koh Gen Do website has more information explaining how to use the products. In addition their beauty consultant is very good in answering questions via email. I\'m very pleased with their skin care and after using a few items started adding more of their line to my skin care regimen with good results.'], 'author': u'KadyMom ', 'date': [u'2015-08-02'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Amazing', 'text': [u'This felt super refreshing, and though it left my skin feeling a bit tacky, I didn\'t mind it at all. I use it at night since I\'m afraid the texture will interfere with my makeup. I\'ve used this for a couple of days now and my skin feels super nice. I love how this doesn\'t contain synthetic fragrance since my skin can be extremely sensitive. Also, the packaging is quite nice, and I like it more than Koh Gen Do\'s Oriental Plants Cream because the pump for this product is much more sanitary than having to dip your fingers into the cream everyday. Thank you Sephora for carrying this product! This has truly become a staple in my skincare regimen, and I would recommend it to anyone who just needs that extra boost of hydration.'], 'author': u'axu123 ', 'date': [u'2015-07-31'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Favorite Daytime Moisturizer', 'text': [u'I originally got a teensy jar (.35 oz) of this as a free welcome gift with purchase from Koh Gen Do, and I was so pleased with it that I also purchased the larger, full-size (3.53 oz) enormous jar with promotional set.', u'I know this is expensive up front, but a little really goes a long way; at the rate I\'m using it it will last me at least two years, so I find the price to be very reasonable when I take into account how well this works for me and how long I project it to last. After 1.5 months of daily use, I\'m only halfway through the teensy jar; I just give my finger a little dip in the jar and it covers my entire face and neck. I haven\'t needed to start on the full-size jar yet but I did see that it comes with a spatula inside the container (pro: hygienic), so I plan on using it to spoon out the moisturizer from the big jar to the little one for everyday use (pro: great for travel). As an aside, I don\'t think this has any SPF in it (which doesn\'t bother me), but I thought I\'d mention it so anyone who is concerned about sun protection knows put some over it.It wears perfectly under my makeup, and is a great emollient daytime moisturizer that softens and protects without making me oily throughout the day. The texture is very light, and it feels like something between a gel and a regular moisturizer. I do not find this to be sticky or tacky unless I use too much, and any tackiness does fade if you just give it a few minutes. I have had no bad breakouts since I\'ve started using this (though I also started using other KGD products at the same time), which is incredible because prior to this I had been struggling with pretty much weekly breakouts for several years.This is marketed as an "All in One" moisturizer, and I definitely agree that it works best when applied directly on my skin (so save your toning lotions and serums for nighttime use), with the exception that it mixes AMAZINGLY with a few drops of the Koh Gen Do Lotion II (which is basically a super-moisturizing toning treatment "lotion")--I recommend that anyone who needs a little extra moisturizing try combining them.', u'KGD products have completely positively transformed my skin over the last six+ weeks. I\'m so obsessed and am motivated to review them because there isn\'t a lot of information or reviews out there for this amazing brand. They are definitely an investment, but the payoff for every product has been totally worth it.'], 'author': u'lilyap ', 'date': [u'2015-05-01'], 'location': u'Buffalo, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Impressive', 'text': [u'I bought this because I was curious if it would actually do anything. I\'ve heard a lot about \'essences\' and about Korean skincare in general, and my skin tends to be very dehydrated so I thought I\'d give this a whirl.', u'It\'s meant to be used after you\'ve cleansed, but before your serums/oils/moisturizer, like a toner. The texture is like water; you can pour some on a cotton pad and swipe it on your face, or just pour a little into your hands and pat it in. I\'ve been doing the latter, just using my hands (I feel like it wastes product putting it on a cotton pad) and whatever\'s left over I put on the backs of my hands. I love it! I\'ve used it for about five days now, and my face is not dehydrated at all anymore, seriously. But the real results were my hands---my knuckles are always very dry and rough, but literally I used this ONCE and the dryness was gone. Like actually gone!', u'Some people might just see this as an unnecessary extra step in their routine; but if you suffer from dehydrated or dry skin and no other product delivers for you, I\'d say give this a try!', u'Also, here\'s a full ingredients list, just because I scoured the Internet and could NOT find one, even on Erborian\'s website:', u'aqua/water, methyl gluceth-20, 1,2-hexanediol, propylene glycol, glycyrrhiza glabra (licorice) root extract, dioscorea villosa (wild yam) root extract, panax ginseng root extract, kigelia africana fruit extract, equisetum giganteum extract, zingiber officinale (ginger) extract, peg-60 hydrogenated castor oil, butylene glycol, tocopheryl acetate, disodium EDTA, parfum/fragrance, hexyl cinnamal, alpha-isomethyl ionone'], 'author': u'krachael ', 'date': [u'2016-04-15'], 'location': u'Michigan', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}
ingredient: Water, Methyl Gluceth-20, 1,2-Hexanediol, Propylene Glycol, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Dioscorea Villosa (Wild Yam) Root Extract, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Kigelia Africana Fruit Extract, Equisetum Giganteum Extract, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Extract, Peg-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Butylene Glycol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Disodium Edta, Parfum/Fragrance, Hexyl Cinnamal, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone.

name: Future Solution LX Total Protective Emulsion Broad Spectrum SPF 18 Sunscreen
reviews: {'title': u'No complaints. Leaves skin soft and radiant.', 'text': [u'This is a great lightweight alternative to Future Solution\'s day cream. It moisturizes my combination skin well, and I don\'t get oily during the day. My skin stays hydrated and comfortable. When I first felt the texture, I didn\'t think it would give me enough moisture in places--it was so lightweight, but I tried it anyway, and my skin feels great and is looking great. I\'ve been using this line for about two months, and my skin tone is more even and my pores are less noticeable. I also have sensitive skin and haven\'t had any issues with this product.'], 'author': u'lareyna756 ', 'date': [u'2014-03-31'], 'location': u'Dallas, TX', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Shea Butter Face Soothing Fluid
reviews: {'title': u'My New Favorite!', 'text': [u'I\'ve been a fan of L\'Occitane for over 10 years now. I started with their shea moisturizer and then switched to Imortelle for the last 5 years. Both of those were slightly heavy for me but felt so great on my easily inflamed, super sensitive, combination skin I just dealt with the oiliness. This is a game changer. My skin feels perfectly quenched and protected from the elements after using. It seems to reduce my redness and my pores are shrinking. I\'m not sure why L\'Occitane products don\'t irritate my skin like any other fragranced brand. If you have sensitive skin but want luxury products, it\'s worth a try. I can\'t live without their moisturizer, Immortelle eye gel, perfume, and extra gentle soap.'], 'author': u'CandaceTabitha ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': u'Los Angeles, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Better than most', 'text': [u'Good straightforward ingredients no unnecessary bells and whistles. Does feel soothing on skin and it reduced my redness. Didn\'t have a strong fragrance,although I did detect a scent I\'m not sure if it was an added scent or the natural smell of the ingredients.No burning sensation when applied or itching later.Ideal packaging.This doesn\'t sink into skin like a moisturizer would, guess that why they refer to it as a soothing fluid. It forms a shield on skin in the way a good lip balm would in order to keep lips protected and moisturized.Doesn\'t look dewy or completely matte, looks like skin.I would say this can be incorporated into any skin type regimen. Oily skin types may find this to be enough on its own, Combo and normal skins can mix a small amount into their usual moisturizer or oil or apply a moisturizer to dry areas only and use this all over afterwards. Dry skins could use this as the last step to seal moisture in and add a bit more of it too.Packaging is small but less is more with this product.So far I\'m loving it.'], 'author': u'beautyyesplease ', 'date': [u'2016-07-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}
ingredient: Water, Coco, Caprylate/Caprate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea)Butter, Glycerin, Isononyl Isononanoate, Arachidyl Alcohol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Sodium Pca, Cetyl Alcohol, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, BehenylAlcohol, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Arachidyl Glucoside, Xanthan Gum, Polysorbate 60, Sodium Hyaluronate, Corn Starch Modified, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Sodium Gluconate,  Sorbitan Isostearate, Tocopherol, Fragrance,Citronellol - Linalool - Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone,Coumarin , Limonene, Farnesol, Geraniol.

name: Essential Power Essence
reviews: {'title': u'Pricey, but...', 'text': [u'I have been using SKII products for about a year now. I held off on this one due to the price and not sure it would really do anything. Well, I caved and bought a bottle. Not sure exactly how or why, but this stuff really makes your skin look better. Like as if you "had something done" I\'m back to buy another bottle now. Although, I think we all would appreciate it if SKII would give us more like 5oz instead of just 1oz. Four stars because of the price for 1oz.'], 'author': u'purrrsuasive1 ', 'date': [u'2015-12-20'], 'location': u'Chicago, IL', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Great results', 'text': [u'I used a sample of this product over the span of a week, applying it mostly around the t-zone. It certainly reduced the pores around my nose and it was noticeable after the first use.', u'I can\'t really say anything negative about this product, as long as you are willing to splurge.'], 'author': u'Ruth506 ', 'date': [u'2015-09-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Extremely effective', 'text': [u'I have used lots of wonderful products over the years. Last year my skin around my mouth and chin started to change suddenly and i was really upset to see the aging set in in a way I thought I had beat. Pores were getting large and wrinkles and omg. I had been using sk-ii essence and I swear by it but the essence alone doesn\'t do everything. I used the moisturizer for a time but it didn\'t make a big impression me although its very nice. I am now an sk-ii believer with the Essential Power Essence. My skin is softer where it had suddenly begun to harden. Yes, harden and thicken. sk-ii began to lift and firm my skin but not dry it as I had experienced with most retinol products which could tire even exhaust my skin. I am 62 and only now have begun to really address the aging process in my face. I\'m not interested in plastic or needles. Yes, this is expensive and it\'s about the ceiling for what i\'m ok with spending but it works for me now. I acknowledge that may change at some point but I feel and look so much better with this in my cabinet and on my face.'], 'author': u'petersgirl ', 'date': [u'2015-08-08'], 'location': u'Rimrock, AZ', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'Soft supple skin', 'text': [u'I was one of the skeptics. But after using it for 2 months (day and night), I\'m now a convert. It definitely takes more than 2 weeks to see results.', u'The SK-II Facial Treatment Essence balanced out my combination skin. And this serum (the Essential Power Essence) gives me the smooth supple skin that I\'ve wanted. It evens out these tiny fine lines that are starting to show on my forehead. The pores on the sides of my nose are now less noticeable.', u'The serum is definitely hydrating too. For my combination skin, it provides enough hydration throughout the day without my skin feeling oily or tight. I use it together with the SK-II Facial Lift Emulsion as my moisturizer. But if you have extremely dry skin, this might not be enough.', u'Yes, it\'s pricey. But I\'m a believer now.'], 'author': u'caramelgeek ', 'date': [u'2015-07-21'], 'location': u'Portland, OR', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Wonderful Skin not so Wonderful Price, Worth It?', 'text': [u'I tried a couple samples of this which lasted me around a week. Wow did my skin look amazing after that week. I seriously might considering getting this despite the price. However, it\'s so much for so little product. Even though I\'m sure you could make a little go a long way I am holding off for now. Instead I ordered the regular SK-II essence and that has been doing wonders for my skin as well.'], 'author': u'Madison84 ', 'date': [u'2015-07-21'], 'location': u'Madison, WI', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Wonderful hydration!', 'text': [u'Not oily - provides wonderful hydration morning and night!!!'], 'author': u'Rebeleigh ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': u'NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'good day lotion', 'text': [u'The scent doesn\'t bother me the way it has some other reviewers... I love the texture. Light, dries quickly. I\'ve been using it in conjunction with UFO dry oil and it is going very well for day under makeup. Before bed I use a pore minimizing toner, this aqua-gel, and then layer a heavier cream such as origins night-a-mins. This system works for me, but that being said I can\'t say how it would perform on its own. I think that it helps my other products work better, but on its own it may not provide enough moisture. I have been using two pumps morning and two pumps at night for four months straight and I am only halfway through the bottle, so I do think it is a good value.'], 'author': u'pollybirdie ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Hands down the BEST', 'text': [u'It\'s clear, thin, scent free and absorbs nicely. The ingredients are great. The thing about Japanese skin care products is that they might take a while to work, but once they do, man, you will never go back to your old Skincare routine. I use this with the SKII miracle water and the essential cream and I have the best skin of my life. Not to mention long term benefits of Japanese skin care.. Hello look at Asian women they do not age! I have super ultra dry skin that used to flake like crazy, and this stuff helps my dry skin in the California dry weather, not a flake! Going thru it pretty fast though; 2 months and already going thru 1/3 of bottle. I use it twice a day. Will repurchase for sure.'], 'author': u'mnvo11 ', 'date': [u'2014-06-05'], 'location': u'San Diego, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: Rose O12 Moisture Defence Oil
reviews: {'title': u'Addicted', 'text': [u'It\'s tough to pinpoint the results of one single product when you use multiple skincare items (cleanser, mask, toner, essence, serum, moisturizer, oil, etc.). However, when I started using this oil, I was a "dry skin" type. Now I\'m normal. I add 1-2 drops of this oil every single night to the CeraVe moisturizer I\'ve been using since I was a teenager. I think that says it all right there. Also, this oil smells BOOOMMMMBBBB and it never leaves my face feeling greasy. It\'s expensive but lasts a long time because a little really does go a long way. I highly recommend REN in general. There aren\'t many brands that I trust completely but I do with REN. If you\'re contemplating picking up this oil, I\'d go for it.'], 'author': u'kelseypk ', 'date': [u'2016-10-14'], 'location': u'Los Angeles, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

I have to take it back and try something else.'], 'author': u'FaerieMaggie ', 'date': [u'2016-05-25'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Oh, but no.', 'text': [u'I\'ll start out by saying I have normal skin. Every now and again, during season changes, the tip and bottom of my nose gets dry and flakey; however, it goes away after two to three weeks. I tried this based on the good to great reviews from other normal skinned informants. Such a bad idea for my face. At first, maybe three to four days, my face peeled.. and I don\'t mean a slight peeling from a burn I had, I mean IT! PEELED! EVERYWHERE! Under my brows, on my cheeks, on my burn! I KNEW it was from this moisturizer. I used a serum or oil under it for one day and that seemed to do the trick for 3/4 of my out-and-about day and then my face would start showing signs of peeling again. The next stage? I started to break out. For about 8 to 10 hours, I believed it was because I was getting PMS pimples. When I checked my face that night, the entire bottom half of my face had broken out! I had an immediate desire to pop everything on my face but they were all VERY sensitive to the touch.. washing my face that night was a horrible experience. I stopped using this moisturizer and was finally able to return it yesterday. On account of not using it for three days: the redness on the southern half of my face has almost disappeared, I have four left over pimples and one overly sensitive face demon on my cheek, and I am no longer peeling. I have no idea what was in this moisturizer but I will NEVER touch it again! Not even as a sample five years down the road. No way, no how. If this product works for you, that\'s great. For me, no.'], 'author': u'JordannL ', 'date': [u'2014-10-28'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Great Cream', 'text': [u'I love this moisturizer. I\'ve tried other brands with sunscreen, and they\'ve always been greasy and thick. This goes on smooth and absorbs quickly. I use powder on top of it and it looks great all day.'], 'author': u'Anne86 ', 'date': [u'2013-12-04'], 'location': u'Princeton, NJ', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Non-Irritating', 'text': [u'I have combo. skin that is very sensitive. I\'ve recently been seeing a derm. for special problems. The new meds. make my skin a little dry and I have to be careful with sun exposure. This stuff goes on very smooth, blends well and goes a long way. I was very impressed with a sample I received, so I am purchasing an entire bottle. The most impressive thing is that when I use this product, I get NO irritation and it\'s fragrance-free. I am a little disappointed that the price is so expensive, but I think this product is worth the cost. I also like the fact that they use natural ingredients.'], 'author': u'VenusDoll ', 'date': [u'2013-08-16'], 'location': u'Churubusco, Indiana', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

name: Day Cream
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'I really need to figure out which beauty blog I read about this day cream on so I can go back and buy everything else they recommend. I have been using this consistently for about 2 months and my skin looks fantastic. This has evened out my skin tone, reduced fine lines and I haven\'t had a zit since I started using it. I was worried about retinol in a day cream since I can be sensitive to retinol, especially when exposed to sun, but I have had no problems with this. (I read somewhere that it is marketed as having SPF in the EU, but it isn\'t in the US).'], 'author': u'caitster ', 'date': [u'2016-06-06'], 'location': u'Washington DC', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Seems overpriced to me but it\'s a good product; it seems to be calming and has virtually eliminated my breakouts, if I stop using it I start breaking out a few days later. I have to occasionally alternate with something more moisturizing, especially when I first started using it, as it can dry out my skin. I have sensitive skin, so using it with Verso\'s night cream in the same day is too much for my skin, so I usually use Caudalie\'s moisturizing mask as a night cream with this.'], 'author': u'easilyaddicted ', 'date': [u'2016-01-09'], 'location': u'Boston', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I don\'t usually write reviews, but this stuff is pretty much life-changing. I\'m getting older (early 30s) so I knew I needed to start looking into skincare with retinol and other anti-wrinkle properties. I found this product via Sephora\'s skin care quiz and the other reviews led me to spring for it even though it is quite expensive. However, it is worth every penny. I have had skin problems my whole life and my skin is very sensitive to everything -- except this product. I never breakout from it and my oily skin always feels perfectly moisturized without feeling greasy. I used to get random dry patches around my forehead and chin, but that never happens anymore! Even though it is expensive, I use just one drop and I am good to go -- this way it ends up lasting me for months (6 months for the last bottle I bought). I get compliments all the time and people are always asking what I do to make my skin glow and look so good. I really can\'t recommend it enough!'], 'author': u'brittlewoman ', 'date': [u'2015-06-24'], 'location': u'Los Angeles, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Amazing!', 'text': [u'I have never been so moved to write a review in my life. My skin was stressed, breaking out, dry in places, oily in others...it was a mess. I found this on Sephora\'s site and took a chance. I have NEVER had a skin care product do what it says it will for me, ever! But this one preformed amazingly! so much that I sprung for the rest of the line. Seems cheaper than going to a Derm, which now I don\'t have to do thanks to this amazing product!! I wish I had done before and after photos.'], 'author': u'Iiriish10 ', 'date': [u'2015-05-05'], 'location': u'California', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: HydraClear™ Hydrating Acne Gel
reviews: {'title': u"Run, Don't Walk", 'text': [u'As someone with sensitive, combination, acneic skin, who also suffers with seasonal bouts of rosacea, I can tell you this effective product is a pleasure to use. That\'s why I\'m heading out to my local Sephora at daybreak and buying every last one... Sadly, I just found out that Kate Somerville has discontinued this product and replaced it with DermalQuench Clear, which Sephora does not yet stock and I have not yet trialled. It\'s probably just as great, if not better, but I\'m not taking any chances.'], 'author': u'BeautyWarner ', 'date': [u'2016-10-16'], 'location': u'US/HK', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'overnight!', 'text': [u'I had an under the skin painful acne and I used this gel for the first time after a very gentle oxygen mask and the next morning I can barely feel the bump and it\'s not painful to the touch anymore! My skin is typically oily but it\'s been getting dry areas with the changing temperature so I decided to give this a try...I might have to start using this for winter! I can attribute it to this more than the mask because mask helps mildly exfoliate the skin but this gel actually treated and reduced the pimple. ', u'For those people with oily skin using this and complaining that it was making their skin too oily....WHAT DO YOU EXPECT??? ', u'It\'s called HYDRATING for a reason...if you\'re oily skinned and want something to treat your acne and also control oil...find products with the words Mattifying or oil control in it, NOT one that says hydrating. Common sense people.'], 'author': u'rubyz ', 'date': [u'2016-08-31'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'The best!', 'text': [u'I have had spot acne most of my life. Either tiny, annoying spots or nasty cysts. The worst thing is when your acne medicine dries out the skin in the breakout area, then the dreaded scaling and peeling happens. I\'ve tried so many different products, none really work well. Either they aren\'t strong enough to fight the spot, or they cause dryness that lasts for days. This gel has been perfect for me. It clears small spots within hours in some cases, and never dries my skin. I highly recommend this product!!!'], 'author': u'kmargelot ', 'date': [u'2016-08-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love this stuff!', 'text': [u'I received this as a Birchbox sample months ago and have been hooked ever since! I have been battling hormonal/cystic acne for years and have tried a ridiculous number of acne products - this gel is the best thing I have found. After a couple of applications, my breakouts shrink drastically and are completely gone in a couple of days. Though it is expensive, it\'s worth every penny and the tube goes a long way!'], 'author': u'vicbril ', 'date': [u'2016-07-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Preventive Only', 'text': [u'I have a serious bout of breakouts for the past few months and it is still an ongoing concern. Aside from doing peels and masks, I need something I could use under my moisturizer as well for all day prevention. I chose this since it reduces and prevents. It didn\'t do anything for my existing condition, didn\'t get better or worse. It does prevent somewhat as my breakouts are not as bad but still an on-going battle.'], 'author': u'SFFenix ', 'date': [u'2016-07-13'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

name: Nutritious Vitality8™ Night Detox Concentrate

{'title': u'28 days to gorgeous skin!', 'text': [u'This is to be used at night after your treatment, but before moisturizer for 28 days. Then you stop using it for at least two months, there is plenty in the bottle for 3 "cycles" or approx 9 months. As soon as I started using this my skin started to detoxify itself. This treatment really pulls all of the impurities out of your skin/pores. Using it for a whole month really helps get the toxins that are deep down in your pores. My skin looks and feels wonderful, the textural difference is noticeable! I\'m so glad I bought this!'], 'author': u'JaymiSue1204 ', 'date': [u'2015-05-12'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

It does smell like rose water but I personally don\'t mind that.'], 'author': u'CCL20 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-06'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Amazing', 'text': [u'I really enjoy using this product before I apply my foundation. I find it makes my makeup go on smoother. The staying power is good and I find I get oily less quickly throughout the day.'], 'author': u'fablash89 ', 'date': [u'2016-05-10'], 'location': u'Scarborough', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Hidden Secret', 'text': [u'I ordered this product on a whim to try something new and I feel lucky to have come across the Cinema Secrets Moisture Spray & Hydrating Mist.', u'General Info:My skin is normal to dry - Makeup Forever HD Stick - Tarte By the Sea Concealer - Cinema Secrets Translucent powder (under eyes) - Sephora Mineral Powder.I only listed the products I used for foundation and concealer. ', u'I have tried this spray multiple ways and I have been thoroughly impressed. I had better results than the UD setting spray. The way I used this product is as follows: I moisturized, spray this all over my face and while still damp applied my Make-Up Forever HD foundation and blended with a brush. It went on seamless. Then continued with concealer and set with powder and applied another spritz to set everything. I finished applying the rest of my makeup and then used another spritz to set everything. I spent the day outside enjoying the 80 degree weather and removed my makeup about 12 hours later and NONE of my makeup moved except on my nose where my sunglasses rest. My makeup DID NOT show any signs of breaking up or make my face oily. I was thoroughly impressed. ', u'I used this spray as a base, in between and finally setting and was 100% satisfied and would recommend to my family & friends. ', u'The only negative is I would prefer a finer spray mist.', u'Give it a try you won\'t be disappointed.'], 'author': u'mumbelina ', 'date': [u'2016-04-17'], 'location': u'San Jose, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}
ingredient: Water, Aloe barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf*, Glycerin, Chondrus Crispus Extract, Sodium PCA, Sodium Hyaluronate, Camelia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf*, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenethyl Alcohol. *Certified Organic Ingredient.

{'title': u'Love love love this CC cream', 'text': [u'I really really love this product--but, they are always out of it. It is great for aging skin--like mine--where too much foundation looks heavy. This product is light and doesn\'t dry out and isn\'t heavy--but, the reflective quality of the product makes my skin look fresh. I put a little powder on my nose after I apply to reduce the dewy quality--that\'s my personal preference, not to have a shiny nose. :)'], 'author': u'grannyzolla ', 'date': [u'2016-05-18'], 'location': u'Fort Worth, TX', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Like this better then most', 'text': [u'I prefer this contouring kit better than most liquid/cream contour kits. I find it much better to use with matte foundations (which is what I wear the most) and it wont pull off my foundation like the Anastasia kit likes to do. The colours are great for me, but I am pale. I think most people\'s issues with this item (other than colour) is they are not using it correctly. it is a concealer so it has that consistency, its not creamy, and you have to build with it. if you are looking for a \'creamy\' contour kit this is not for you.'], 'author': u'sayraht ', 'date': [u'2016-08-04'], 'location': u'Austin, TX', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great!', 'text': [u'The only thing I do no like about this product is the lack of color options for different people. The application is not great; however, I put it on the areas I want the color on--first with the step 1 neutralizer--then blend with my damp beauty blender..followed by the 2nd step of bronzer which is more of a contour..then apply the highlight with finger. It just so happens that the color goes great with my skin! Also, the contouring step has a green undertone which helps it not look as if it is dirty. I love it! I also put a light powder over it, which helps let it stay-stays all day long-and can achieve a matte or dewy look depending on your powder preference.'], 'author': u'MadiGray ', 'date': [u'2016-07-26'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I really wanted to like this. After hearing all the amazing reviews, I wanted this to work. I have laser damage on my face that resulted in severe texturized skins and loss of collagen & elastin. I am in my late 20s, and following fraxel laser, my face looked like it was melting in acid. After 6 months of trying different products, I finally decided to pay for this product. A little goes a long way, used it for 6 months (still had about half of it left), used it with cold serum & Serum prep... nothing.', u'I took pictures to track my progress... No progress.', u'I sadly had to exchange it for a different product. I am now trying Algenist\'s Genius. I hope this one helps my skin become plumper and smoother.'], 'author': u'llennej ', 'date': [u'2014-04-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great Moisturizer', 'text': [u'At last a great moisturizer that provides a physical sun protection at a reasonable price. This moisturizer is a dream. A little goes a long way and it sinks right into my skin. While it does have an initial whitish cast, that quickly goes away as the moisturizer sinks into my skin. It does not irritate my sensitive skin and doesn\'t get greasy by the end of the day. I have no problems putting foundation on top of this moisturizer - some of these moisturizers have products that cause everything to ball up when I put on foundation. And, it\'s a great price, considering that I like a moisturizer with a high SPF and was spending twice the amount for ReVive\'s moisturizer with an equivalent SPF.'], 'author': u'babymelsmom ', 'date': [u'2015-05-05'], 'location': u'Baltimore, MD', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

My greatest issue with this product is that it smells like alcohol and is very liquidy.I had to press the pump multiple times in order to get some product out. When I finished applying this to my face it left my skin so squeaky and dry if you were to touch it with your hand you can feel it tugging on your skin! I Which is a no no for me. name: Clear Difference Complexion Perfecting BB Creme SPF 35
reviews: {'title': u'Works great for mild acne', 'text': [u'I\'ve used this BB cream for two years now, and even after trying different brands I keep coming back to this for two reasons, it offers sheer coverage, without looking made up, perfect for everyday usage and it keeps my skin relatively clear compared to other BB creams, I have combination skin which tends to get oilier during the summer, and i figured the best way to use this BB cream is to layer it with a light weight moisturizer, I use the Dr. Jart ceramidin serum under this BB cream and this gives me enough coverage and moisture.'], 'author': u'RamzK ', 'date': [u'2016-03-08'], 'location': u'Foster City, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'great product', 'text': [u'Surprisingly, it does exactly what it says it will. I have neutral skin tone, the medium color was a perfect match for me. Doesn\'t cause any irritation on my combination skin, using it regularly, my skin seems to be in great condition even when I\'m not wearing it.'], 'author': u'francoisev ', 'date': [u'2016-02-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Poor coverage; good oil control', 'text': [u'Looking at the name of this product, you\'d think that it would be suitable for oily, acne-prone skin, right? Yes and no. Good oil control but at the cost of cakes texture. Hard to blend. When applying, you can feel it go from liquidy to powdery, which is nice, but blend QUICKLY. Once it sets to a powdery texture it will get cakey if you try to continue blending. Does NOT cover acne and scars. Looks like you\'re not wearing any coverage at all. Keep that in mind! Light/medium suits my Asian skin by the way. Has golden undertones.'], 'author': u'Tiena ', 'date': [u'2016-02-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Really Good!', 'text': [u'I live in a tropical city with a oily skin and this product has a good performance.'], 'author': u'Mafer18 ', 'date': [u'2015-10-08'], 'location': u'Caracas, Venezuela', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Really love this product BUT...', 'text': [u'This product is good for oily skin. I have medium/olive skin-tone and I feel that this product provides sheer-to-light coverage, making it look like you\'re not wearing a product though effectively evening out your skin-tone. I prefer the look of this BB cream over foundations because it looks more natural. I have gotten compliments when I switched from a light foundation to this BB cream. At the end of the day, there is slight cakey-ness; however, blotting with a tissue quickly resolves that. Though this product is part of EL\'s acne treatment line, I find that this product breaks me out horribly. I\'m not too sure why my skin is reacting so poorly to this BB cream. When I discontinue use of the BB cream for a few days, my acne clears up relatively quickly, but resumes the moment I start using this product again. I think that this BB cream is ideal for others like me with oily, medium/olive skin-tone - I just hope others don\'t have the same negative reaction to it.'], 'author': u'BOStoRDU ', 'date': [u'2015-08-02'], 'location': u'Raleigh, NC', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}
