name: Radiant Moisture Souffle
reviews: {'title': u'Not what I thought', 'text': [u'I adore TF beauty products but this was a dud. I am fairly certain this in intended for your face but it has glitter in it, actually glitter flecks, albeit a smallish, what person who is going to spend this much money on a face lotion wants glitter on their face?! I believe it could have been used nicely on the body, maybe the legs and shoulders for a night out but given the price and that it\'s not what I was wanting, it went back.'], 'author': u'coryc77 ', 'date': [u'2016-06-15'], 'location': u'Chicago, IL', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'IN LOVE', 'text': [u'Love love this product. Can\'t find enough things to say . First, my skin is very sensitive to breakouts and this never once broke me out. It gives the skin a nice radiant glow & moisturizes . I apply this every day after I wash my face and before putting on makeup . I see such a difference in my skin after using this product. Worth every single penny!'], 'author': u'Alexxandraaa ', 'date': [u'2016-06-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'such a beautiful product', 'text': [u'i love it so much. not glittery at all. it just give your face a nice glow that is beyond words .great as a primer as well.i will buy a back up for sure .a little goes a long way. my new holy grail.'], 'author': u'metoocool ', 'date': [u'2016-06-10'], 'location': u'toronto', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'SO GLITTERY!', 'text': [u'Boy oh boy am I disappointed with this. The texture is lovely, lightweight, while still being very moisturizing. It has this lovely, refreshing texture. However, contrary to some reviews online and the descriptions, there are indeed large pieces of glitter, as opposed to a shimmer. I was hoping this would give that ever-so-elusive glowing, youthful dewiness that I can\'t ever seem to find, and I loved the idea of a glowing moisturizer under makeup that could also be worn just by itself for those days that you don\'t want to wear makeup. Why doesn\'t that exist?! I just can\'t imagine how people would like this obvious glitter, it is just tacky looking.'], 'author': u'Mugsy48 ', 'date': [u'2016-04-23'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'holy grail buy NOW', 'text': [u'If this isn\'t the holy grail then it doesn\'t exist. So silky and smooth made my very dry skin having babies wish they had my skin. This made my skin look flawless and bright and not at all dry or oily. Even though you may have to splurge it is worth every penny.'], 'author': u'kittykatz202 ', 'date': [u'2016-04-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"didn't work", 'text': [u'Was hopeful but after using, disappointed. Sales clerk was so enthusiastic that I wanted to believe this would help my puffy eyes. Not so. Wish shopping in Sephora stores wasn\'t such a head-spinner: products are pushed on you (of course I could have said "no") but it takes a lot out of the experience when you have to fend off staff. My guy didn\'t know about this product until we read the label together!'], 'author': u'susangail ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Most Meh', 'text': [u'The packaging is very pretty but I wish the product felt like it was doing something. name: Nutri-Define Rejuvenating Overnight Cream
reviews: {'title': u'nice', 'text': [u'The great thing about this product is what it\'s made without. We don\'t need to be rubbing toxic chemicals into our faces, & Jurlique uses high quality ingredients. it\'s a nice lotion. It\'s not super nourishing or moisturizing, so I wake up with my skin feeling taught. I recently started adding 5 drops of Josie Maran Argan Oil to the lotion before application and that makes it a lot better. I\'ll use this container. I MAY repurchase. I may try out some other natural brands.'], 'author': u'marnie ', 'date': [u'2016-06-22'], 'location': u'San Diego, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

name: Skin Signature Melting Rich Cream
reviews: {'title': u'PETROLEUM', 'text': [u'Do not use if you are acne prone. It contains petroleum amongst other oils which together have an even larger possibility of clogging pores. I do love other SK-II creams and use them exclusively.'], 'author': u'instinct4beauty ', 'date': [u'2016-01-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Decent But Not My Favorite', 'text': [u'I\'ve used many of the SK-II products so I decided to try this one after using the Ultimate Revival Cream. The thing I didn\'t like about this was that it felt more like a lotion and it didn\'t blend into my skin as nicely. It was almost too moisturizing. I also didn\'t really notice as much of a brightening effect as I did with the other products. It\'s a decent product but for the price I wouldn\'t buy it again. I\'m not as big a fan of the texture. But SK-II doesn\'t make any bad products.'], 'author': u'benji09 ', 'date': [u'2015-12-14'], 'location': u'Boston, MA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'not good for sensitive skin', 'text': [u'Maybe this good for others but not me. I have combination skin and this cream made my skin terrible.I get zits'], 'author': u'moomooji ', 'date': [u'2014-07-31'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Really good but too expensive', 'text': [u'I was using the Essential cream and it wasn\'t moisturizing enough so I thought that this would bridge the gap at night.', u'It is a solid that you scoop a little out and warm it up in your hands. Then press your palms onto your face. Press, press press. It feels great too. Very plush. I would continue to use it but I cannot justify the expense when there are other products that work just as well for a fraction of the price. If it worked miracles, great, but it didn\'t.'], 'author': u'lissa5314 ', 'date': [u'2013-11-08'], 'location': u'Tampa, Florida', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'It is great, but it broke me out', 'text': [u'I am not using this anymore, but anyone who is interested, you should try it anyway. I love the SK-II facial treatment essence, and got a big sample of this cream from a Duty Free purchase. Initially, I loved LOVED this cream. The texture is amazing, and it just absorbs into your skin and leaves it so hydrated and baby smooth. However, after about a week, my skin broke out, and this was the only change I had made to my routine. I stopped using the cream and the breakouts went away. My skin must not like some aspect of this, but if you don\'t usually break out from a rich cream, you really should try this. I am recommending it even though I couldn\'t continue using it. It\'s that good.'], 'author': u'discolights ', 'date': [u'2013-08-21'], 'location': u'Ann Arbor, MI', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Blu Mediterraneo Italian Resort Moisturizing Face Lotion
reviews: {'title': u'bummer', 'text': [u'I never write reviews, but I feel like I had todincr no one else has commented. ', u'First of all I couldn\'t find anywhere on the website if it\'s unisex, male or female product. It does have beautiful smell typical of the Blue line, little bit masculine, but very subtle. I do own their several Eue de Toilette and love the smell.  The problem I had with it, is that it\'s advertised as a moisturizer. It\'s not a cream lotion. It\'s a tonic like lotion (liquid). I put it on my face and immediately my skin felt tighter, smoother, and still dry as it were before the application. ', u'I will be returning it.'], 'author': u'sunnygirlSD ', 'date': [u'2016-06-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

name: Eye Duty Triple Remedy Overnight Balm
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'I absolutely love this product! I\'m a volgger on YouTube { Life of Harry } and I have tried a lot of different types of eye creams to review, this is one is definitely one of my favorites! I am only 18 and don\'t really struggle with under eye bags/wrinkles but I am super super dry and it does hydrate my eyes like crazy! I let myMother, who just turn 50, use it for a couple days and she immediately noticed a difference! And it\'s super important to use a firming/hydrating eye cream while young so you don\'t get any of those fine lines and wrinkles when you get older! But I definitely recommend this product to anyone who wants to spend invest in a incredible product!'], 'author': u'harrymgray ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Canadian Winter Lifesaver!', 'text': [u'This past winter I started getting dry flaky patches on my eyelids... Because who doesn\'t love new skin issues popping up?? I loved it because it was sensitive enough to put under the eye, on the lid and up to the brow bone. I repurchased another run in the spring but found it was a little heavy for the hot summer we experienced this year. I will be repurchasing late fall in preparation for the winter months!', u'As a reference:', u'Generally I have oily eyelids and normal to dry and skin on the rest of my face'], 'author': u'steffsardelis ', 'date': [u'2016-09-11'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Resurgence® Age–Balancing Moisture Broad Spectrum SPF 30
reviews: {'title': u'Seems to improve my skin', 'text': [u'I have to say, I do like this product. It is a really great moisturizer. It smells nice and isn\'t too greasy. I use it along with Murad\'s Retinol Youth Renewal Serum. I normally would never spend this much on a moisturizer, but my skin has really started changing lately. I had to stop relying on the drugstore products I\'d been using and step my game up. I don\'t like wearing foundation on a regular basis, I\'d rather have nice smooth skin. I don\'t know how good this product would be on its own, but using it in the morning with the retinol serum at night, my skin has shown visible improvement. My skin looks way way better after only a week. It\'s pricey for what seems like such a small amount of product. But it is working for me.'], 'author': u'puremix ', 'date': [u'2016-09-19'], 'location': u'Houston, TX', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Love!', 'text': [u'So, I have been buying the Murad Resurgence kits for two to three months now. I really noticed that I go through the moisturizer quicker than anything else and use it more than anything else in the kit. Finally, I bought the full size of this the other day, and yes, it is expensive, as it is priced at $70; however, it is worth every penny. I have combo skin, and my T zone is more on the oily side. In the winter, my skin is drier. This product, in combination with the Murad cleansing wipes (which are in a white and blue package and the only wipes they sell) are the perfect combination for my skin. I will continue to repurchase this item, and I will more than likely purchase the full size of everything from the resurgence kit, except for the cleanser. The Murad wipes have pretty much replaced my cleanser, and the cleanser that comes in the kit lasts forever. I still have 1 and 1/2 bottles of cleanser left. I will use these, after O shower or before putting on makeup. (Skin care to me is top priority, and I will ALWAYS take care of my skin if I plan to wear makeup). I highly recommend this, and you will NOT be disappointed if you have combo skin like mine, drier skin in the summer, and you want something that is not greasy or oily. I also love that it is anti aging. I am only 24, but I feel it is a good time to start an anti aging regimen. I cannot speak on behalf of wrinkles, as I do not have any; however, I did have laugh lines, and this got kid of them very quickly. My laugh lines were not deep or insane, but this really has made them disappear, since they were something that I could always see, even though my fianc\xe9 kept saying I look the same.'], 'author': u'Shas17 ', 'date': [u'2016-02-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Not what I hoped for', 'text': [u'I have very dry skin, especially so in winter. I had hoped that this moisturizer would hydrate better. I won\'t be buying it again, but I will use it all because of the price factor.'], 'author': u'SaraLeighM ', 'date': [u'2016-01-12'], 'location': u'Reston, VA', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'Skin Brightening Non-oily Moisturizer - Amazing!', 'text': [u'I recently had a facial for the first time, and purchased this product as a result of learning what skin care regimen I needed to start practicing.I had used plenty of over the counter moisturizers in the past, most leaving my face feeling too greasy.This product is amazing! It provides a nice amount of moisture without that heavy feeling, and the absolute plus for me is that it has a very light glow and leaves you looking radiant! A few days into using the Resurgence kit, I noticed my skin looked so much brighter and full. I highly recommend this line! I never worried about caring for my skin, and now that I use these products, I don\'t know how I ever managed!'], 'author': u'MrsN827 ', 'date': [u'2015-11-19'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

reviews: {'title': u'Light and Long Lasting', 'text': [u'I have very oily skin, and wearing this primer feels so good. It helps my make up last all day without feeling heavy.'], 'author': u'KelseyLyz ', 'date': [u'2016-11-07'], 'location': u'Portland, Or', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Loved It', 'text': [u'This is a great primer! I have and olive/tan skin and have combo to oily skin and I do have occasional breakouts. I definitely don\'t have any severe acne or anything but sometimes with my diet and stresses of the day I tend to break out and they are red! This primer has helped so much that in some cases, depending on the size of the breakout, it\'ll be gone by the end of the day. It\'s a great barrier between my skin and foundation and helps to keep my pores from being clogged. I don\'t get any new breakouts while I have it on and I absolutely do see a difference every time I apply it. It also keeps my skin from getting oily.. leaves a demi matte finish and I absolutely love it. Would definitely recommend if you have the same struggles as me!'], 'author': u'Navi01 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-04'], 'location': u'Toronto, ON', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Easy, Convenient Sun Protection', 'text': [u'I carried the travel size version in my purse all summer and loved the convenience of being able to apply something light weight to my skin to protect me from the sun. I enjoy the refreshing, natural smell and I\'m mostly happy to have something that doesn\'t feel so thick that I\'m going to sweat it off in two seconds. I do wish it misted instead of sprayed so that it could be applied more easily over make up. I usually applied it to a mostly bare face and had to rub it in for even coverage.'], 'author': u'sephoragrlie ', 'date': [u'2016-11-05'], 'location': u'Baltimore, MD', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Great in Theory', 'text': [u'I love the idea of this product. It\'s definitely unique and has a nice scent. I does seem to provide pretty good protection. I found that it leaves a slightly sticky and greasy reside after a couple applications though. Its probably ideal for additional coverage over makeup during an afternoon outdoors or a one time spray to provide protection for a lunch outside. It would definitely be noticeably greasy if you applied several times and then returned to work though. I use it for random sun protection touch ups, but not on a regular basis due to the stickiness and greasiness.'], 'author': u'hotze ', 'date': [u'2016-11-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

name: Moisture Bound Refreshing Hydra-Gel Oil-Free
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'I put this one before bed after I wash my face & oh my goodness it works wonders. I struggle with an oily t-zone & dry under-eyes but it works really well in both areas. My skin instantly feels hydrated when I apply this I love it!'], 'author': u'lizannie ', 'date': [u'2016-10-12'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'lightweight and super hydrating', 'text': [u'I have been using this moisturizer on and off for many years. The cost is my biggest deterrent, but it is undeniably very hydrating and does not leave your face feeling oily. I love the subtle scent and how well it goes under my foundation.'], 'author': u'wenniec ', 'date': [u'2016-09-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Good, but maybe not worth the money', 'text': [u'So i got a sample of this and i LOVE it. Its luxurious and lightweight and the smell isn\'t overpowering. Though with a $100 price tag i think theres cheaper options out there that would be just as good.'], 'author': u'kelseljay ', 'date': [u'2016-09-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Amazing', 'text': [u'This product is really great for oily skin, however I think you need to make sure you are washing your face with a good cleanser too. It truly helps control my oily zones, I still have a little shine, but nothing compared to when I don\'t use this. Its not bad for the price, compared to other brands...and a little goes a long way. I first bought the sample package the little bottle lasted me almost 60 days, so I am sure I will be with the big jar for a while I also use the Amorepacific Treatment Cleansing Foam (which I love)'], 'author': u'BettyBoopXoXo ', 'date': [u'2016-08-21'], 'location': u'Atlanta, GA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'love this product', 'text': [u'I received this as a sample and immediately purchased. I have 45 year old oily skin and have tried many creams in the past. This one is the best I\'ve ever used! Lightweight, smells fantastic and spa clean, absorbs quickly and feels great going on. I\'ve had no breakouts and no reactions, it plumped my skin and I felt hydrated and smoothed. There was no irritation or redness and my skin didn\'t feel like it had a layer of anything on it. It has helped with fine lines and since it isn\'t touted as a heavy age cream for larger lines, I didn\'t expect more from it. I have repurchased and have been using for half a year. The jar when using twice a day lasts me 4 months. Worked great in winter and summer weather. I have recently been trying a heavier cream at night so am only using once a day right now but would not ever give up using this gel, its wonderful!'], 'author': u'momaddicted ', 'date': [u'2016-08-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'It smells so good!', 'text': [u'I just picked up a sample of this yesterday and can\'t stop putting it on my face. It smells so good. {'title': u'Just OK', 'text': [u'I bought this product when the Kate Somerville rep was in the store - I was looking at another product and she swayed me over to do the old - rub it on your hand trick. I fell for it hook, line, and sinker. This was an OK cream that absorbs well into the skin - but it didn\'t help with dull skin and it wasn\'t worth the price.'], 'author': u'slm5 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-25'], 'location': u'Arlington, VA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Residue', 'text': [u'Let me first by explaining my skin. I am 42 years old with a good, even complexion. I have some fine lines, loss of elasticity and a dullness that comes with age (for you youngins....I\'ve lost my glow...LOL). I tend to have dry skin as well. I wanted to kick up my moisturizering a notch and didn\'t mind how much it would cost...if it WORKED! Went to Sephora for advice and they suggested this brand. They gave me a 2 week sample (I was amazed they would give so much). I was so excited to try a $150 moisturizer, but my dreams were dashed the first day. First, it has a pleasant scent, it spreads smoothly and dries quickly (too quick for my liking). After it "dries"....it felt like I had residue or second layer on my face. After I applied my makeup it looked horrible. I know with new moisturizer, you need to keep at it...so I tried again (3x\'s)! Same thing each time...I gave up after my third attempt. So thankful I didn\'t buy this, as I would\'ve been out $150 dollars. I\'ll stick to Origin\'s "Three Part Harmony".'], 'author': u'rjv4EVER ', 'date': [u'2016-05-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Wait For It To Work', 'text': [u'Like any skin product you may need to use this for more than a week to see results. This is crazy expensive, but, it\'s like a serum and moisturizer in one. Serums take more technology and money to produce and this is no different. I frequently skip my moisturizer when I use this multitasking product. It smells wonderful, goes on smoothly and I have noticed more radiant skin and a more even skin tone since using it, and have experienced no allergic reactions. I have combination skin and this is perfect for it.'], 'author': u'jjm823 ', 'date': [u'2016-04-04'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'WORTH 100 STARS', 'text': [u'I wish I could give this moisturizer 100 stars. I\'ve been using Caudalie sorbet thingy and I\'ve been trying to find a cheaper, but good-quality, moisturizer. I just started to buy only cruelty-free makeups and found this brand. Caudalie sorbet is 2.5 times expensive than this FAB moisturizer so it was a "pass" for the price part. (I considered both the amount and prices) And I find this one way better than the sorbet one!!', u'I was a bit confused when I was thinking to get this because its name has the word "CREAM", which is so bad for the oily part of my face. But I ended up ordering this because I saw so many positive reviews that it is really good for oily skin.', u'When I tried it the first time, I could feel it was very lightweight which I love, and made my skin really smooth like baby skin! It has no scent so it is just so perfect. For the packaging, I was a but disappointed when I first found it in the parcel box, but as I am using it, I figured that this is the best packaging that a moisturizer can ever have. I really wish they never stop making this so I can use it forever!!'], 'author': u'littlefox032 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'13-17'}

name: Plantscription™ SPF 25 Power Anti-Aging Oil-Free Cream
reviews: {'title': u'Perfect for oily, sensitive skin', 'text': [u'My friend told me about the plantscription line after I voiced concerns about my face looking a little aged lately (I think it was just the acne I was going through) so I decided to get a sample of this oil free cream. I have incredibly oily, sensitive, acne prone skin and this moisturizer has been a miracle worker so far. My breakouts have gone away completely and I\'ve noticed a reduction in the overall oiliness of my skin. People talk about the smell but I honestly haven\'t noticed it! It smells like all other face creams to me. It goes on smoothly and is a great primer for my BB cream. I think I\'m going to have to save up and actually buy this! 10/10. Definitely recommend.'], 'author': u'Jordanrich ', 'date': [u'2016-11-01'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I\'m not sure how to feel about this. I wanted to make it work but it really is just another sunscreen for the face. I was sold by the anti-aging part part in the title but I really think that some drugstore products work better and not to mention are less expensive. It\'s got this weird smell and I have to drag it on to my skin which I didn\'t like because that would lead to premature wrinkles. I guess it\'s just like any other sunscreen in which it make your skin a little oiler after, but for the price I would want it to work better. Not a horrible product by any means, but I would not purchase again.'], 'author': u'mandyyy ', 'date': [u'2016-10-25'], 'location': u'Vancouver, B.C., Canada', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'great!', 'text': [u'I\'ve tried a few oil free moisturizers and each didn\'t really absorb and just sat on top of my skin and felt really tacky but this one doesn\'t do that and I also didn\'t break out when I started using it which is a great sign! I have weird combination skin where everywhere but my forehead is oily and my forehead is SO DRY and it gives enough moisture for my forehead to not look and feel like the Sahara desert and light enough for everywhere else!'], 'author': u'carebie ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love it!', 'text': [u'I really like this moisturizer. I have an oily skin and this Origin moisturizer is very good in all day it doesn\'t give my skin very oily. {'title': u'Very impressed!', 'text': [u'With extremely problematic skin, (oily, redness, rosacea) I am always stressed when trying new products. I have been using a high end moisturizer from a Canadian company, but I felt it made my skin greasier. When I received the product I was disappointed because it was extremely thick, and I thought oh no it\'s going to be so heavy, and greasy. I was wrong. I have only used it a few days but I love it! I don\'t love the scent, it smells a bit like citrus, but the results my lord! It absorbs, does not feel heavy at all and is great under makeup. My skin feels very soft, and isn\'t bothering my reactive skin. I find my skin is not as oily at the end of the day as well. This is a keeper.'], 'author': u'Deewri ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': u'Ontario', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

name: GENIUS White Brightening Moisture Softener
reviews: {'title': u"Moisturizes and that's it", 'text': [u'I\'ve used twice daily for a month now and there has been absolutely NO difference in lightening my spots. If I saw even a slight difference, I would continue using it. After all of the reviews, I thought this would definitely work. Algenist claims 90% saw a difference. I must be in the 10%. I didn\'t use a cotton pad, I applied it directly to my face so I wouldn\'t waste any of it. It\'s not watery like a regular toner, it\'s a little thicker so it\'s easier to use. It does moisturize, but so does a moisturizer. Thank you, Sephora, for your return policy, otherwise I would have been stuck with this.'], 'author': u'kellyrh ', 'date': [u'2016-10-25'], 'location': u'Indiana', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'baby soft skin', 'text': [u'Oh my goodness I love this stuff! My skin has changed dramatically since using this I had slight sun marks on my cheeks and they have almost fade it completely after using it for about two weeks. I honestly sit here touching my face constantly because I Can\'t believe how amazing it feels. I almost didn\'t buy it because of the price this is a receive some cards for my birthday I decided to make a splurge and now this is definitely going to stay a part of my skin care routine. You don\'t need a lot just a couple drops for your whole face I use my fingers because I\'m not wasting this product at all. it does say to use before moisturizer but honestly sometimes my skin feels so good afterwards if I\'m going to sleep I don\'t use it. And I do only use it once a day at night only.'], 'author': u'ahseeah ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'wow!', 'text': [u'It effectively works on my skin (I\'m Asian), within a week I noticed the difference on my skin, all the dark spots from acne and sun are faded, and now I\'m at my second week of using it, I see a HUGE difference! My skin has never as smooth, bright, and even tone! as right now! I have been using over the counter but nothing work right and effective as this product before (I also use clearasonic brush). I highly recommend anyone who\'s looking for affordable skin care product to try this toner! (Well make sure you get at least 7-8 hours of sleep as well ) it\'s really works! Trust me !'], 'author': u'Don82 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-28'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Really like this as a toner', 'text': [u'But it\'s an expensive toner and frankly it didn\'t do a who,e lot for my sun damage. I\'ve used the entire line, and I do like this product. I personally don\'t think it has been very effective and I\'ll keep looking. Everyone\'s skin is different, so I guess my damage is really stubborn. Next step, dermatologist for an in office treatment.'], 'author': u'newenglandgirl ', 'date': [u'2016-09-25'], 'location': u'Feeding Hills, MA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"Sun Spots Just Like Mom Said I'd Get...", 'text': [u'Sunscreen, pffft...who needs it says my teenage self! Well, this fair Irish 40-ish yr old DID! I have pigmentation on my face and neck that I had hoped would just all join together to make me look tan. Since that is not going down, I bought this product a few weeks ago and started using it once a day. I can honestly say, it does not break me out (everything breaks me out), it is not heavy, and I have seen my skin look brighter/hydrated and a little lightening in my sun spots. I use under my moisturizer (with SPF 30!). It is suggested to use twice a day and I need to get better about that so I can have better results- Long and short of it, I would definitely recommend Algenist Genuis. I have tried other potions from Sephora like First Aid Beauty and Clinique among others and have not had the same results.'], 'author': u'follywolly ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Liftra™ Contour Cream
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'I have never given a review of any product and I\'ve been shopping at Sephora for years. This is by far the best moisturizer that I have ever used. I noticed results within days of starting use and I regret any night that I miss using this product because my skin isn\'t as glowing! Only need to use a pea sized amount - a little goes a long way!'], 'author': u'ACrawfalert ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': u'Pasadena, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I noticed improved firmness and elasticity within the first week.I continue to see improvement after a month of use. Fine lines and even deeper wrinkles have softened. Very moisturizing and a great base for makeup. Highly recommended.'], 'author': u'sherpagirl ', 'date': [u'2016-09-05'], 'location': u'Waverly, PA', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'Perfect moisturizer', 'text': [u'Let me preface this by saying that I have never written a review. I have been shopping at Sephora for a decade, have spent more money than I care to admit as a self-proclaimed makeup and skincare junkie. I have incredibly dry skin that is also prone to break outs. I have been using Dr. Jart\'s ceramidin liquid and cream which I have been very happy with, but as I\'m getting older I wanted to add a face cream with peptides. A Sephora ingredients search led me to this cream. I mulled it over for awhile and reviewed the ingredients list. I pulled the plug and hoped for the best. I was NOT expecting this cream to be so wonderful. First off, I used too much the first time. You only need a very small amount. The texture of the cream seemed a little tacky and sticky, so I assumed it would not sit well on my skin or wear well under foundation. Boy was I wrong. After massaging into my skin over my serum, it felt so good and soothing. My makeup went on perfectly. A few hours later, I was shocked at how good my makeup and skin looked. It visibly looked smoother and tighter and I didn\'t have a dry spot in sight. I have been using it for almost a week now and I\'m in love. It takes a lot for me to say that. I am nervous to say this is my new holy grail moisturizer, but it is heading that way.'], 'author': u'smangelina ', 'date': [u'2016-05-31'], 'location': u'Nashville, TN', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Fantastic!', 'text': [u'I sampled this product a few months ago and like all the Dr Jart + products I\'ve tried I LOVED it. It has a very tacky consistency which is quite pleasant especially in the mornings before applying makeup. It almost acts like a primer. It\'s extremely moisturizing as well. Now to the real point of the cream- I have seen a visible improvement in my fine lines and skin texture. I\'m definitely a fan of this cream even with the price tag. It\'s worth every penny especially since this tube will last well over a year. Very little product is needed for an application. 1/2 a pea size drop or less! BUY THIS!'], 'author': u'RetroRhoda ', 'date': [u'2016-05-27'], 'location': u'Maine', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Really liking it', 'text': [u'Skeptical as always I tried this cream that is supposed to be amazing, and it is really good. I used it at night and in the morning, and honestly I don\u2019t feel any firmness (not that I need it, in reality), but especially when I put on my makeup I notice I difference on the application and the appearance of my makeup and skin. It gives me an appearance of my skin almost not having pores (like many, the pores on my cheeks are a bit large), refreshed. I am really enjoying this cream, and even when I don\u2019t believe I need really bad I might invest in it for just a great makeup day.'], 'author': u'kabukik ', 'date': [u'2016-05-02'], 'location': u'San Diego, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'hydrating', 'text': [u'I\'ve only used it once but I immediately liked it. Its very hydrating and comfortable to wear. It soaks into your skin so it doesn\'t get all over your pillow. {'title': u"I'm pleasantly surprised....", 'text': [u'I typically steer toward certain brands Sephora sells for skincare, which doesn\'t include Sephora-branded skincare. Usually, the stock of products that I regularly use would probably buy a day cruise somewhere. I don\'t pay much attention to hype or gimmicks, but rather ingredient lists and results.', u'With that said, it took three months of back and forth to Sephora to find a sleeping mask that was hydrating without either feeling like glue, nothing at all, or breaking out my combo skin, that also produced as promised. I\'m not a fan of additive fragrance in any skincare as the $ spent on perfumes could be replaced with beneficial ingredients. So yes, it does smell nice, but it\'s not a buying factor for me (especially when you look at the markup on parfumes - holy mother).', u'Overall, I can say this is my favorite sleeping mask for hydration, and I wake up with the softest skin that I almost hate to wash the mask off. Plus, I save a ton of time in the morning NOT having to peel my face off my pillow just to realize I need to cover an already-angry-and-it-isn\'t-even-six-a.m. zit. Win. Win.'], 'author': u'mordia ', 'date': [u'2016-08-25'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love it!', 'text': [u'This face "mask" doesn\'t feel like a mask after you apply it. It doesn\'t come off on your pillow or clothing and acts more as a moisturizer than a true "mask". I use it a couple times a week in conjunction with another night cream on other nights, and my skin feels great!'], 'author': u'Leo41 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-17'], 'location': u'Blue Ridge Mts', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Advanced Anti-Aging Repairing Oil
reviews: {'title': u'works wonders', 'text': [u'I was hesitant and skeptical to buy this oil for a couple of reasons: the price, the fact that I\'d be putting oil on my face, and I wasn\'t sure I bought the anti-aging claim. However, I\'ve been using this product for two or three months now and my skin has honestly never looked better. I haven\'t broken out once, only a very occasional spot, since I\'ve started using this product, and I feel like it\'s left my skin glowing. Even better, you can hardly even tell I\'ve been using this product religiously (3 drops a night) because there\'s still so much product left in the bottle. Definitely worth the price, and surpassed all my expectations.'], 'author': u'lap8693 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'tiny red textured bumps', 'text': [u'I\'ve been using using this oil mixed in with jojoba oil for the past 5 days. Now I\'ve broken out in tiny red bumps, not zits, just textured red bumps, all over my cheeks and forehead. My skin care consists of the Clarisonic and moisturizer. Adding this anti-aging oil was supposed to help, and that did not happen. I don\'t have sensitive skin, but maybe this oil has ingredients that are not compatible with my skin type. Don\'t know. Stopping use immediately.'], 'author': u'robynzentilli ', 'date': [u'2016-10-25'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'good stuff!', 'text': [u'I\'ve been using this for the past year and have seen dramatic results in my smile wrinkles. I put two drops on my hand, dab a bit on my smile lines and then mix the rest with Acure day cream and spread it all over my face. I\'m 32, and I\'ve been ID\'ed more this year then most of my twenties.'], 'author': u'chickijill ', 'date': [u'2016-08-26'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Life Changing for Dry Skin', 'text': [u'I love Algenist, it\'s all I use. I noticed in the past 2 years my skin had become dry - i think it\'s hormonal/aging and wasn\'t sure what to do. I added this in (2 drops) to my face cream in AM and PM. It is a game changer. My skin is so soft and dewy, but not at all oily. Plus the Algenist spf Sublime Defense day cream goes on so much nicer with this oil I didn\'t like it used under cream but love the mixture. My face is not happy if I skip an application. It\'s just the perfect product.'], 'author': u'maejlucky7 ', 'date': [u'2016-06-26'], 'location': u'Los Angeles, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'A Must Have', 'text': [u'Moisturizing, great for both day and night, and erases fine lines. I\'ve seen reviews that say this product is too oily. name: Clean Break™ Oil-Free Moisturizer
reviews: {'title': u'I FOUND IT!!!!', 'text': [u'Ok I\'m going to start by saying that my face is super oily....like SUPER oily. Like I blot my face multiple times a day and every moisturizer is crazy heavy. Well let me tell you....I got a sample through an online order I placed, which Sephora, by the way, providing those samples is genius, because I thought "meh...I think this is supposed to be for men, not really sure, but whateves, I will try it." I\'m floored by this moisturizer because it is PERFECT for my skin. It feels like it hydrates, it\'s not heavy at all, I don\'t need to blot until like noon now (before I would legit blot by like 8:30 am) and it feels so nice!! I love love love this stuff and ended up buying it. It\'s my new go-to and I think Sephora needs to advertise this one more!!!!!'], 'author': u'Laura0388 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-03'], 'location': u'Guelph, Ontario', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: GenOptics Spot Essence
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'I was very anxious to try this product, yet hesitant at the same time. My skin is sensitive, but luckily I didn\'t have any bad reactions. There\'s no overwhelming smell, and had it not been for the lovely Ohio summers, I\'m sure it would have absorbed into my skin nicely. Unfortunately, it\'s been very humid, and every time i used this product my face just felt very tacky, my hair would stick to it and just irritate me to no end. As for results I haven\'t noticed any difference, but most likely it needs to be used for more than a month. I will have to continue to use-especially during the fall and winter months and see what kind of results I have then. Thank you sk-ll for sending me this product complimentary to try.'], 'author': u'bethanyh34 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'SK-11', 'text': [u'I\'ve been using SK-11 for a month now and I have enjoyed the way it feels on my face. It\'s not greasy and mixes well with my lotion. I\'m not sure that I\'ve noticed large differences in my skins complexion, but I will definitely continue to experiment with it. I received a full size bottle to try complimentary from SK-11.'], 'author': u'danielleflorey ', 'date': [u'2016-09-14'], 'location': u'Sparks, NV', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Worth every penny', 'text': [u'This is such a great silky serum. I love the design of the bottle and the ease of the dropper. I have used this product for 5 weeks and have noticed an improvement on my 10 year old acne scars and hyper pigmentation. The formula is light and makes my skin feel fresh and smooth. I did notice the recommended dosage was a little too much for my face so I began to use half the amount. I would say the only down side to this product is the price, although for all that it has done for my skin I am willing to pay it. I have received this product complimentary from SK-II for my honest review.'], 'author': u'SailorBethy ', 'date': [u'2016-09-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Worked pretty well on my middle aged skin', 'text': [u'I have a lot of sun damage from my last pregnancy and playing a lot of pokemon go with my daughter over the summer. The pigmentation is still on my forehead from my last pregnancy, and around my neck from being in the car a lot. This product worked great on those spots. I do have an older spot on my neck that it did not work so great on back from my military days. But overall I am very happy with how the product performed, it feels great on my skin and I will be buying some on my own. I received this product complimentary from SKII in exchange for my honest review.'], 'author': u'raseco ', 'date': [u'2016-09-13'], 'location': u'Colorado Springs, CO', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Exceptional Skin Care', 'text': [u'My philosophy has always been beautiful skin begins with exceptional skin care. During my search for the \u201cexceptional\u201d product I have tried products, only to find that they have fallen short in relation to my skin care needs. Most contained parabens, sulfates, phthalates or a combination; but out of desperation I was willing to try them all. I have combination skin and my skin care needs change daily (I live in Michigan). I have uneven skin tone with dark & dry spots. Because of the uneven appearance of my skin, I was often perceived to be much older than I am. ', u'This product has meant the world to me. It has rejuvenated my skin & given it a glow that I have not seen in a long time! It REALLY works! I LOVE it because it does not go on greasy, it is easy to apply, it can be applied to combination skin, and the results are visible. Although the price point is somewhat higher, I will continue to purchase it because it is worth it! Finally, a product that meets all of my skin care needs! Thank you for my complimentary bottle of SK-II GenOptics Spot Essence! It definitely will not be my last!'], 'author': u'Red731 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-12'], 'location': u'Kalamazoo, MI', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'DOES NOT REMOVE MAKE-UP', 'text': [u'I bought this cleanser because I love the product line, not worth the price, does not "dissolve" anything. If you have extremely dry skin and want to create a barrier on your face, using this cleanser on clean skin may work for that. I rarely return products but this one had to go back.'], 'author': u'AllysonAmber ', 'date': [u'2016-10-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Not bad, not great', 'text': [u'Bought because Tatcha\'s camellia cleansing oil was out of stock both times I tried to buy it last week. Figured I\'d give this one a try. Nothing terrible, except the pump. Not a huge fan of the strong scent but it fades pretty quickly. Overall, nothing great about this either. Will not repurchase after this bottle is empty, going back to Tatcha. I just prefer it over this one.'], 'author': u'selary ', 'date': [u'2016-09-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'use it as a cleaser, not makeup remover!', 'text': [u'I had extremely dry and sensitive skin. I use La Mer moisturizer but it only soothes my skin, it doesnt heal the driness. I bought so many products I lost count how much money I\'ve spent until I met this oil cleanser! IT HEALED MY SKIN! My face is no longer red, and it doesnt sting anymore! I use it as a facial cleanser am and pm. I usually add 4 to 5 drops of rosehip oil I bought from Australia as well. It leaves my skin so soft amd hydrated. It created a barrier that seals the moist inside and no greasy feeling at all.And most amazingly, it makes my La Mer absorbed so fast! Before I had massage minutes before the moisturizer can be fully absorbed, but now it\'s absorbed in seconds! I trully love this product. it is a life saver. I can actually swim in a pool now without feeling stinged in my face. HOWEVER, it doesnt work as well as a makeup remover, especially when you have thick makeup on. Luckily I only use tinted cream or CC cream. Overall, its fantastoc for dry and sensitive skin. its probably not suitable for other skin types.'], 'author': u'LexieC ', 'date': [u'2016-08-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Fair', 'text': [u'I see my skin getting brighter and whiter! I love to look at my skin in the morning after one week using it!!..My skin looks dewy and smooth!!! However, Im not sure if this cream makes my face starting to have break-out or not since I have combination skin which gets oily sometimes and Im using it combined w other SK II (essence and lotion) but I didnt have any pimple when I use the other two products alone!.. This cream also absorbs slower than the others! I\'ve just bought it since early October! So far, I have stopped using it for one night but I will give it another try since the price is so expensive.. I thought/hoped it would be my skin problem solver but I guess I have to be more patient!!...-.-..'], 'author': u'YanChun ', 'date': [u'2015-10-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great clinical alternative', 'text': [u'I love this product. I was looking for something to clarify and brighten by skin at night, while refining lines and reducing pores. I have sensitive and congested skin, so things like retinol and harsher prescriptions wreak havoc on me. But this is great. In only a month of using, I feel as though I have much younger, clearer and dewy skin. It\'s a bit pricy, but a little goes a long way. Readers should know however, that it\'s not moisturizing at all, in fact I was a bit flaky in the first week of using it. For a night cream I expect a certain amount of hydration, but I figured this means it is really working at exfoliation. To remedy this, I\'ve been using the Essential Power Cream over it within a few minutes of applying. I think a basic face oil would also really enhance the moisture factor too, but haven\'t tried that. All in all, a great product that has been key in changing my skin for the better.'], 'author': u'hannahpoole ', 'date': [u'2015-06-06'], 'location': u'International', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'Clings to dry patches', 'text': [u'I wanted this to be the go to product when I don\'t have time to put on a full face and can\'t be bothered with makeup brushes or sponges. {'title': None, 'text': [u'I am taking off a star because I feel like my combination skin is definitely more shiny and oily during the day after using this product compared to other Dr Jart BB creams I have used (I bought this one on the recommendation of the sales person) and the coverage is VERY natural, which is great - as it is a great skin match - but not always what you want if you are using BB cream to stand in for foundation which I have done with some of the other thicker Dr Jart BB creams. reviews: {'title': u'CUCUMBERS', 'text': [u'I truly love this lotion. It\'s lightweight and adds a slight illumination to my face. The scent is so fresh as well, to me it smells almost like cucumbers. It spreads so nicely and evenly over my face that it doesn\'t take but one or two squirts from the bottle. {'title': u'great', 'text': [u'Really great light moisturizer. I have dry sensitive skin and I personally use it in the morning and let it soak in before applying the Fresh Peony SPF lotion and then my makeup. It hydrates and smooths skin beautifully. It is also a really great value'], 'author': u'LoganLiz ', 'date': [u'2016-07-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Wooonderful smell and texture', 'text': [u'I love this moisturizer! I have dry skin and it\'s not as heavy as I hoped but it\'s great for layering. It has the most amazing scent and the texture has wonderful \'slip\'. Great for a top sealing layer over other moisturizers, or for folks with less dry skin than I have. Good absorption and light weight but not intensive in my opinion.'], 'author': u'oceans ', 'date': [u'2016-07-13'], 'location': u'Gladstone', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'My Favorite!', 'text': [u'I love this moisturizer. I have combo skin leaning on the oily side and this stuff works wonders. It\'s very light and sinks into the skin almost immediately. It feels like nothings on my face but my skin is just better, super soft, bouncy, and far less dry than it has been in the past. Also, I love the smell (very light and subtle, like fresh cucumbers). My only gripe, the price of course. This bottle is teeny tiny. I have managed to make it last nearly six months by using it only once a day and because I\'m on the oilier side I only use a small amount. But if you are heavy on the moisturizer, just be warned. This bottle is very small for the price. I have another (cheaper) moisturizer already lined up to replace this when I run out but if I\'m not into it then I\'ll be coming back for this one.'], 'author': u'ellavi ', 'date': [u'2016-06-12'], 'location': u'Atlanta, GA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Love / Hate Relationship', 'text': [u'I bought this because it\'s the light weight version to the cream in the jar. I LOVE the jarred version because it makes my skin so moisterized and plump. But with the summer coming my skin can get greasy and this seemed like a good alternative to the jar cream. WRONG!! So darn wrong. Why you ask?! Because this goes so fast. I use this once a day and have had it less than a month and it\'s half way gone. The jar cream lasted me almost four months with twice a day use! Looks like I will be sticking to the other version because it lasts MUCH longer than this!! You do not get your money\'s worth if it has to be repurchased that often. Great product but not if I have to repurchase that frequently. Returning this for the jar cream ASAP!'], 'author': u'VIIIXXIMMXI ', 'date': [u'2016-06-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

name: Orchid Youth Preserving Facial Oil
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'I am in my mid-forties, and I have sensitive, combination skin. Last year, my skin went haywire. I had acne breakouts and my skin just began to look older. I bought this product in late March of this year, but didn\'t start using it regularly until a couple of months ago. I SEE THE DIFFERENCE. I have added a regiment for the acne, and I use this as my moisturizer once-twice a day. I was afraid the oil would be too much for my sensitive skin, but it\'s been great. My skin looks good. This is a staple for me now.'], 'author': u'KimberGdlife ', 'date': [u'2016-11-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Ageless Skin', 'text': [u'Takes 10 years off. Clean product and re-texturized the area around my eyes. name: DoYou Azulene Gel Cream
reviews: {'title': u'Impressed', 'text': [u'Went into using this with an open mind, as there weren\'t a lot of reviews for perspective. After washing my face, I applied the moisturizer right away. {'title': u'amazing', 'text': [u'This gel moisturizer hydrated and calms my sensitive skin. I am a skincare junkie and used everything under the sun and I have to say that this one is my HG. I love the delicate scent, how hydrated and Plump my skin feels. ', u'People are complaining about the jar not being filled to the top but it\'s DOUBLE the size of most moisturizers for a really decent price. ', u'As for the complaints about whiteheads- I\'ve never heard of a water based gel causing this - only oils and balms. I live in hot humid weather and this has not caused even 1 whitehead for me. I\'ve been using this for about 3 weeks now.'], 'author': u'808sakura ', 'date': [u'2016-11-02'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'I love this moisturizer!!', 'text': [u'I bought this from recommendation of a senior sephora consultant. A little goes a long way and it doesn\'t break me out at all. I do think it is a bit thin and not as thick and moisture boosting as other products but I do like it and its 3.5oz!! for 46$ thats a great deal especially when a little goes a long way and you can take the amount you need with the spoon instead of using too much.'], 'author': u'makeuplovaa28 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-28'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'13-17'}

Pricey, but worth it.'], 'author': u'Sweeteztseven ', 'date': [u'2016-10-30'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

It rejuvenates and plumps my skin for the next day!'], 'author': u'Shutes15 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'On my second jar. Very pleased with the results.'], 'author': u'keholmes ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'SO STICKY', 'text': [u'Maybe this has good moisturizing properties - I wouldn\'t know, because I couldn\'t force myself to use it more than a few times. And trust me, after dropping 60 bucks on it, I really really tried. First off, the gel has a strong alcohol smell that reminds me of nailpolish remover, and definitely stings when applied over any blemished. But I could forgive that. What I couldn\'t get over was the stickiness.. on my face it didn\'t bother me so much, since I try not to touch my face throughout the day regardless, but my HANDS stayed sticky for hours after applying this stuff. You definitely cant put this on and rub the residue into your hands, because they will feel gross and unclean for hours afterwards. You really have to wash your hands - soap and water - to get rid of that super unpleasant feeling. Still have the whole jar sitting in my washroom, untouched.'], 'author': u'annapremy ', 'date': [u'2016-10-14'], 'location': u'Calgary, AB', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Ships safely!', 'text': [u'Thank you for your reviews! The botanical ingredients in Sake Balm\'s natural ingredient blend sometimes possess slight differences (for example, no two naturally occurring ingredients look the same), which in turn, can result in a variance in the product\'s color or scent. However, this does not alter their benefits, and the moisturizer can be used as directed. Having Sake Balm shipped to you as opposed to purchasing in store will not alter its appearance!'], 'author': u'bosciaskincare ', 'date': [u'2016-10-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

IN MY FIRST SHIPPIN ONE OF THE VIAL WAS BROKE AND THEY REPLACE THE WHOLE ORDER.'], 'author': u'nature1 ', 'date': [u'2016-02-16'], 'location': u'MIAMI', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

name: Peat Miracle Revital Cream
reviews: {'title': u'Went in for the other eye cream, left with magic', 'text': [u'When I get stressed my eyelids start looking like a desert. Reddish, dry, terrible, and I\'d finally had enough. I researched my eye creams, and was all ready to purchase Belif\'s older formula, but they sold out. Not to be deterred, I went to my local store to see if they had any. They didn\'t, but they recommended the new line of the same brand. Am I glad I checked it out, because I was able to swatch it against the sample of the other formula. This is very thick, but not greasy at all. It takes hardly any product to cover both eyes, just pat it a couple times with one fingertip and you\'re good to go. Even when my eyelids were dry and sensitive, it didn\'t sting at all, which has not been my experience with other eye creams. It\'s definitely pricey, but I anticipate this lasting for a long time. Highly recommend for sensitive skin.'], 'author': u'curiousneuron ', 'date': [u'2016-10-04'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love this stuff!', 'text': [u'This mask has been amazing for my skin. I use it 3 times a week and after I wash it off my face I\'m glowing! The same day I started using this I also starting using Skin Inc\'s revival peel so I can\'t say this mask is completely the reason for my skins glow but it definitely helps. It also draws out anything clogging my pores. I had a large pimple, one of my many symptoms of PMS and I could literally see the gunk from the pimple pulled out and sitting on top of the mask. Gross but Insane!!!', u'Also this jar is PACKED with product. It is buttery smooth and completely lacking any sort of chunks (like rose petals, tea leaves, etc). I have used it at least 5 times and I\'ve barely put a dent in the jar. I love this stuff.'], 'author': u'JupitersGlow ', 'date': [u'2016-09-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Make A Difference™ Plus + Rejuvenating Moisturizer
reviews: {'title': u'Great for dry skin', 'text': [u'I have dry skin and I use this in the morning and Origins Nightamins at night. Absorbs quickly making my skin feel hydrated but not greasy. The smell kinda threw me off at first, but it grew on me. I\'m very sensitive to scents and I managed to live with it. Once its in your skin the scent diffuses quite quickly.'], 'author': u'erica10 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-26'], 'location': u'Alberta, Canada', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Amazing!', 'text': [u'Love this! I use this in the morning, sometimes on its own or after a serum depending on what my skin needs. I have dehydrated skin that still gets oily, so it\'s difficult finding a moisturizer that helps control oil yet is very moisturizing. This does great, absorbs quickly and makes my skin feel so moisturized and smooth. It looks fantastic under makeup and does not feel greasy, even though it is a thicker moisturizer. I do not like the packaging, as I wish it was in a bottle with a pump, but that really does not effect the way the product works, as it is still a great product.'], 'author': u'ohnorebecca1 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-17'], 'location': u'La Verne, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'My Go To', 'text': [u'I tried another Origins moisturizer, and I liked it, however it burned my eyes no matter how careful I was, so I tried this one when I used up that jar. It has a unique texture that I haven\'t come across and I have tried a lot of creams to help to reduce redness and prevent flaking around my nose and eyebrows. This thankfully has really calmed down my skin. I will probably venture out and try new creams every now and again but this will be my official go to.'], 'author': u'MavisV ', 'date': [u'2016-07-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Finally found something that I love!', 'text': [u'I have combination oily/flaky with severe acne prone skin. I\'ve tried many moisturizers before, including hope in a jar & origins daily defence, and they\'ve all been too weak or greasy, etc. This moisturizer is amazing and has transformed my skin completely. I recommend using it paired with Josie Maran Aragon oil light. This mixture of products has already balanced and evened my texture and has cleared up my acne and reduced redness!'], 'author': u'panbeauty ', 'date': [u'2016-05-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'INCREDIBLE PRODUCT', 'text': [u'I went in to Sephora with the intent to buy a completely different moisturiser. I told the girl what I was looking for and she asked me my skin concerns. She put the information in the computer and came up with this product. I was sceptical at first because it wasn\'t what I went in for at all. She told me she could give me a sample since it doesn\'t come in a smaller jar, but I decided to go for the full size, and I LOVE IT!! I am so glad she recommended it and the smell is to die for. I will be purchasing this again in the future, and I\'ll look in to their other products.'], 'author': u'ellemidge ', 'date': [u'2016-04-16'], 'location': u'Muskoka, Ontario', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Daywear Advanced Multi-Protection Anti-Oxidant Creme Oil-Free Broad Spectrum SPF 25
reviews: {'title': u'Very good product.', 'text': [u'This has an amazing jar. You can\'t stop looking at it. It;s just -yes-. The moisturizer its amazing too, but I have to say that if you have oily skin, this is definitely NOT for you. I know, it says "Oil free", well, maybe. But that\'s not enough, when you have oily skin, it feels grasy. I got oily t-zone, so I apply the product just everywhere but my t-zone, and it\'s working very well for me. Sometimes you have diffrent needs in your face and you can\'t use just one product, let\'s face it. But, for my chins and the rest of my face, it works perfect, it gives you a natural glowing wich it;s not an oily look, and it really feels moisturized.'], 'author': u'carolinameloalz ', 'date': [u'2016-11-01'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'I love this stuff', 'text': [u'Wish I had discovered this sooner before I spent so much money trying other products!! I have oily skin and I am getting close to 40 so I have that weird dilemma of oily and dry simultaneously. This product makes my skin moisturized and "dewy" and fresh and does not break me out. It minimizes all my fine lines. I love it!!'], 'author': u'llm11 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-27'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I have used this product for a month now and really like it. I have combination skin and this lotion has done a good job of moisturizing my skin but not over doing it. The only thing I don\'t like is that it sort of smells like chemicals.'], 'author': u'kendrajean1989 ', 'date': [u'2016-04-11'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great lightweight moisturizer', 'text': [u'Makes my oliy t combination skin feel sooooo soft. The smell takes a little getting used to in my opinion, but its light and dissipates quickly.'], 'author': u'Anonymous ', 'date': [u'2016-03-06'], 'location': u'NY, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Like, not love', 'text': [u'I have combination skin, that seems to get worse during the winter, and I pile this moisturizer on my face, wait about 5 to 10 minutes, then put my makeup on top (no primer). If I do this, my skin can look very dewy (if it looks too dewy an oil blotting sheet works perfectly) and I don\'t notice any flakiness through out the day, my makeup stays put and I can even touch up throughout the day without it looking heavy. I should also mention that because I apply quite a bit of this it does feel heavy and takes time to absorb. It does have a strong cucumber scent that dissipates during my wait time.'], 'author': u'Anonymous ', 'date': [u'2016-01-10'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Pleasantly surprised', 'text': [u'I tried a sample and immediately purchased. My skin is very sensitive - so any product that my skin responds well to over a period of time is a blessing. This product makes my skin glow and I love the light fragrance.'], 'author': u'AMF1960 ', 'date': [u'2016-03-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'Great everyday moisturizer', 'text': [u'I bought this when my skin was going through a dry spell in the winter. It cleared my dry winter skin right up! I love this because I can feel the moisture in my skin all day, and it feels amazing! I haven\'t noticed much, if any, scent, so I wouldn\'t worry about that. The one thing I will say is that this is a great product for your daily moisturizing routine, however, I wouldn\'t recommend this for \'emergency\' dry patches. For example, I recently had a reaction to a face product that left dry patches all over my skin and this product did not help much. It wasn\'t until I applied it 4+ times/day and really massaged it in that I started to notice a difference to those dry patches. At $64 a pop, I don\'t want to be re-applying this all day! So overall I\'d say this product is great great great for a daily moisturizer but I wouldn\'t reach for it in emergency skin situations.'], 'author': u'mms734 ', 'date': [u'2016-01-12'], 'location': u'Atlanta, GA', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'This product is definitely a heavy moisturizer. I find that it is too greasy and heavy feeling on my face. I have found myself suffering from a breakout here and there (I never break out), and I feel like I still have dry spots. Definitely a night time only moisturizer for me. The packaging is sleek and nice, but not my favorite moisturizer overall.'], 'author': u'nicolemarie033 ', 'date': [u'2015-12-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: CC Crème
reviews: {'title': u'best CC cream', 'text': [u'This is a great product and I love that the color adjusts to your skin tone. All the people saying it is too orange must be applying with fingers. If you hear up the cc cream with your fingers it does get darker. This needs to be applied quickly if using fingers so that you don\'t transfer or create heat. I like applying with a flat foundation brush. This is a medium coverage and it smells good.'], 'author': u'DianaAvila ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Orange-y :(', 'text': [u'It turned out orange on me (I have a lighter skin tone with pink undertones.) Even the beauty advisor at Sephora said it was a no-go for me after the color match. But the BB cream matches well! Maybe they\'ll add a wider range of colors in the future.'], 'author': u'zeba888 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'BEST CC creme, my go-to foundation', 'text': [u'I\'ve tried several brands of CC creme and this is the best. It is medium coverage that blends really well and keeps my oily skin from getting too oily during the day. Pairing it with the smashbox primer is even better at controlling oil. I was tired of using a full foundation and wanted something to even out my skin tone, I have sunspots and acne scars, without feeling too heavy. A little goes a long way. I am 3Y07 and it\'s a perfect match.'], 'author': u'An258 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-15'], 'location': u'St. Paul, MN', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Extra–Firming Day Cream All Skin Types
reviews: {'title': u'Cured my acne', 'text': [u'I\'m 22 years old. I bought this cream about four months ago along with the Night Cream and Neck creams because I\'d been struggling for years to find a moisteriser that doesn\'t break me out. I got a sample of the Multiactive and the smell reminded me of the cream my grandmother used, and she had the most amazing skin. She was 78 years old and people always thought she was her 40s or 50s. So I went to Sephora and tried to find the jar I remembered her using.I actually failed, she used the Super Restorative and only used the Extra Firming, but I\'m so glad I bought this one.Within a week, my acne was clearing up. I still had to let the ones I had run their course, but within three weeks, no more acne.Whenever I forget to wear my Clarins for even one day, my acne comes back, so it\'s not just that this doesn\'t cause me breakouts, something about the formula actually is helping prevent breakouts. I will use this cream until I turn 50 and move onto the Super Restorative.'], 'author': u'gypsyflyerose67 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-25'], 'location': u'Austin, TX', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Good Moisturizer', 'text': [u'Good Moisturizer but is it a good wrinkle cream? I haven\'t noticed a difference although it may be because the wrinkles are jjjjust starting. I received this either as a sample of with 100 points so I didn\'t use up a lot of cash (if I would have, I probably would have tried it until the end of the jar and then really been upset).'], 'author': u'DanielledeLaat ', 'date': [u'2016-07-10'], 'location': u'GTA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

name: B.B. Cream Light Broad Spectrum SPF 27 PA++
reviews: {'title': u'Could be better', 'text': [u'I tried this product from a recommendation of a sephora employee because of my dry skin. It is moisturizing however I\'m not 100% happy with the color. It feels nice to use but I have a light complexion and the product made for "light" skin (one of two options) seems to be 1 or 2 shades darker and is in my opinion noticeably different. Also it seemed to have a little bit of glitter in the product? I personally prefer matte finishes so that was a little off putting as well.'], 'author': u'adrinic7 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-26'], 'location': u'Smyrna, TN', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Nothing like it!', 'text': [u'I love this lightweight cream. I use it day and night and avoid buying different products. I can mix in a little foundation and use it as BB cream. It has a beautiful light scent that goes away quickly. After a few uses I was able to reduce the amount I use to about the size of a pea. Yup, It works that well. Great under make up. Lots of hydration and that made one of the greatest differences on my wrinkles ever. name: Triple C Peptide Firming Oil
reviews: {'title': u'Amazing', 'text': [u'Background: 35 yrs old, combination skin (dry cheeks, oily t-zone), acne prone, no wrinkles, but started seeing dullness in my face. I\'m a big fan of Dr. Dennis Gross products and this one didn\'t disappoint. I use it at night after cleansing my face with the All In One cleanser from this same brand (only one that stopped my breakouts although it makes my skin a tad dry). A few drops go a long way, the first time I massaged the oil on my face and I went to bed. The next morning I couldn\'t believe me eyes! My face was so plumped, bright, youthful again. This stuff really works.'], 'author': u'VanessaSd ', 'date': [u'2016-07-01'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

Absorbs well.'], 'author': u'petiesmom ', 'date': [u'2016-03-12'], 'location': u'little rock, AR', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: White Lucent Brightening Protective Emulsion Broad Spectrum SPF 18
reviews: {'title': u'My daytime moisturizer + sunscreen in one!', 'text': [u'I use this in place of my daytime moisturizer and sunscreen now. It absorbs quickly and has an illuminating effect which gives me a nice dewy glow. It\'s also a nice base for makeup and it smells nice!'], 'author': u'sunshine698 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-06'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'lightweight and hydrating', 'text': [u'Love the texture of this. Feels great on the skin!'], 'author': u'SlayMeg ', 'date': [u'2016-05-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Light and functional', 'text': [u'This is a lightweight emulsion, it doesn\'t feel heavy and greasy in my skin like most moisturizers with spf. It also soaks in very quickly and doesn\'t leave that white cast that some spf products do. I have oily, easily clogged, scarred skin. This is the only spf that I\'ve found that doesn\'t add to the oily feeling and has other functional ingredients as well. My skin responds really well and I haven\'t had any clogging or bumps in response to this in the month I\'ve been using it. My makeup goes over it very nicely, either a light BB or a heavier foundation, I switch off and both respond well. I wish the spf were a bit higher, but I\'m inside most of the time now that it\'s winter. I probably won\'t rely on the spf in this when I\'m outside all day and in summertime.'], 'author': u'snowzoe1 ', 'date': [u'2015-12-12'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Amazing', 'text': [u'I purchased this product as part of a set in March. After 3 months, my lotion had disappeared, but I NEEDED it, so I bought the full size. Love this product!'], 'author': u'bdenton64 ', 'date': [u'2015-06-26'], 'location': u'Oklahoma City, OK', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}
