{'title': u'Good mineral sunscreen', 'text': [u'I have oily skin that\'s prone to break outs but this sun screen didn\'t cause any problems.', u'You\'ll see it mentioned a lot that this product is shiny, and it is. But it\'s not the "cheap" shiny that you get with other sun screens, nor is it an oily shiny. It looks more radiant than anything. Also, the shine actually does go away - it just takes a little while.', u'It didn\'t make my skin more oily than it already was, so I consider that to be a bonus. There\'s also no issues with white cast.', u'For me, the biggest downside is the price point. Most people do NOT use enough on their skin to get the protection that\'s stated on the bottle! Therefore, it\'s easy to go through a bottle of this in about 35-40 days.'], 'author': u'Jenn088 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-05'], 'location': u'British Columbia', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

reviews: {'title': u'hummmm', 'text': [u'ok, so i bought this because it contains SPF. name: HydraQuench Cream
reviews: {'title': u'Lovely fragrance, hydrating formula', 'text': [u'I picked this up at the duty free section in the airport when I was traveling about a month or so ago as part of a Clarins travel kit. I\'ve been using this diligently to moisturize my skin at night after using salicylic acid products for my acne which can be slightly drying over time. I wanted something that was just hydrating without a whole bunch of other ingredients to minimize any irritation to my skin while I was aggressively managing my hormonal acne. I have not been disappointed. My skin is looking better and better each day, and it remains well hydrated. The product also has a pleasant light fragrance which is an added bonus.'], 'author': u'Saffron16 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love This Moisturizer', 'text': [u'I have very dry skin, and this moisturizer absorbs into my skin quickly and plumps it right up without being greasy or immediately dry again. And I love the scent. It\'s my go-to moisturizer now.'], 'author': u'bethennyb ', 'date': [u'2016-11-06'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I have very sensitive, redness prone, combination skin. This is the best moisturizer I have ever used. It feels amazing when it goes on and it absorbs very well. I do not like having fragrance in my skincare but the scent of this actually is nice. It is also very hydrating. I have repurchased it a few times but will most likely not buy it again though because I am trying to start using only fragrance-free, natural products (Clarins is not the best company for either of those criteria).'], 'author': u'blondebabe11 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-20'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Amazing moisturizer', 'text': [u'This moisturizer is the best I have ever tried, and trust me I\'ve tried TONS. It is great for most skin types other than extremely oily. name: Whitening Source Skin Brightener
reviews: {'title': u'In Love', 'text': [u'I love, love this moisturizer. I believe the proper name for this is actually Brightening Derm Moisturizer. After using this, my skin became baby soft and my skin tone looks brighter overall. I was so amazed at the results, I couldn\'t stop caressing my face during work in the first few weeks.', u'I have a very dry combination skin, so I used the Facial Treatment Oil with this and it was a great match. It leaves a kind of slight greasy feel/look at first but it absorbs into the skin and in a few minutes the "grease" is gone. This product does not claim to reduce dark spots. I saw no improvement on the dark spots on my cheeks.', u'The twist mechanism is more hygienic than a jar which is nice, but I prefer the jar since I can see how much is left. On the last day of using this, I only had enough to cover half of my face... It was a sad day.', u'I will definitely repurchase. It is now my holy grail skincare product. I don\'t care how expensive it is. The results are just so worth it.'], 'author': u'OhMai ', 'date': [u'2016-07-05'], 'location': u'Chicago, IL', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u"didn't work for me", 'text': [u'The product didn\'t work for me. Even though it was moisturizing, it didn\'t do what it said it would. I still have my sun spots and the area around my nose is still red. Will return product for something else'], 'author': u'minimalistretro ', 'date': [u'2016-01-12'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'love it!', 'text': [u'i have red acne marks on my tan skin and ive been using this a month and now my acne marks are very faint (: for me its moisturizing enough maybe because i put the sk-ii serum before putting this product'], 'author': u'GKAN ', 'date': [u'2015-11-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'not moisturizing enough', 'text': [u'I\'m in my 30s, and since switching to SK ii treatment face wash and essence, my acne finally healed. This moisturizer immediately calms the redness on my newly healed acne scar, which would take months to b gone I\'m guessing. It even makes my dark circle under eyes less red. I used it for a week and I could see these results immediately after I put it on. It protects my skin enough that I don\'t get wrinkles from the cold winter weather. But it doesn\'t feel like it\'s going into my skin enough to plump my face.... Since the treatment essence and the face wash is already working so well to repair my skin, I don\'t think this cream is necessary especially for all the cost of the products together. I\'ll just wait till my skin heals for the redness to be gone, and choose a more moisturizing cream that\'s cheaper like loccitane. For those of u like me suffering from adult acne with sensitive dry skin and have flaky skin on acne and acne marks and freckles from the sun as well, I started using SK-ii brightening clear lotion after washing. It actually started brightening my freckles on my nose and acne mark brown spots on my cheek so noticeable that I could tell only in just within a week. But this cream, after I wash it off, I don\'t think it actually did anything enough to repair skin. It does leave ur skin silky, but that\'s just a creams texture rather than actually retexturing ur skin. I would recommend this cream as a moisturizer to protect skin (not repair) and primer that brightens the complexion that u don\'t need much concealer or foundation after this.'], 'author': u'CAtoNY ', 'date': [u'2015-01-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'great for brighting', 'text': [u'Great moisturizer if you want a bright complexion. Make your skin matt and balanced. But not moisturzing enough for winter time.'], 'author': u'siacci0225 ', 'date': [u'2014-09-15'], 'location': u'Madison, WI', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'So torn....', 'text': [u'I used this last night, Thursday, after 3 hectic, sleepless days & then having spent all day at the dentist with some complications. So I figured with all the "makes you look non-zombie" reviews, it was the perfect time to swap this into my routine- PTR Rose Stem Face Wash, PTR 24K Toner, Sunday Riley Luna, Korres Wild Crocus - Saffron D\'Or serum, Perricone Pre-Empt Brightening Eye Cream, and then added my usual 3 drops of Drunk Elephant Virgin Marula Luxury Facial Oil to the Guerlain to make it a treatment/moisturizer. ', u'I woke up this morning looking like I had slept for a week!! My skin looked absolutely incredible. But.... it felt more dry than ever. Usually I can use the Drunk Elephant by itself otherwise I mix it with Fresh Rose Deep Hydration Cream on super yucky days. It seemed, however that the Guerlain cancelled out the marula oil.', u'So I guess for now, it\'s an emergency-only bottle on my vanity. The complete facial overhaul definitely makes it worth the price since you only need a teensy bit. I\'ll just have to hydrate a little more on the mornings after I absolutely have to use it.'], 'author': u'ViviB83 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-30'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Meh', 'text': [u'I\'ve been using it for over two months almost nightly and notice almost no change. I am 46 years old and showing the beginning stages of chicken neck, with wrinkles and sagging skin and this cream really did nothing except dry my neck skin out if I stopped using it for two nights in a row. I think the only thing that will make any true change is surgery, so consider saving your money.'], 'author': u'ChaiseShay ', 'date': [u'2016-03-28'], 'location': u'Ottawa, ON', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'Wow. Just. Wow.', 'text': [u'I have recently dropped a ton of weight (127 pounds to be exact) and was worried about developing loose crepey skin on my neck. At nearly 60 years old, this was not an idle worry! I tried a number of products before turning to this one. Quit simply, it works really well. It has made a very visible difference - the skin on my neck appears firm and the appearance of wrinkles greatly diminished. reviews: {'title': u'Excellent product!', 'text': [u'I use this serum all summer, it\'s a comfortable gel cream, not heavy for oily/combo skin with a lot of good ingredients . name: Multi-Perfecting Pore Corrector Gel Moisturizer
reviews: {'title': u'moisture and no breakouts', 'text': [u'So after years of fighting with oily af skin in the summer and horrible combination skin in the winter, I was introduced to this gem by a rep last fall. This stuff is awesome. I\'m someone who breaks out from any scents or oils and this leaves my skin moisturized and smooth. I use it in combination with a retiniod at night and the pore serum during the day. Worth the money ladies! Only reason I docked it a star is the $ but like o said worth it'], 'author': u'beachblondeinpa ', 'date': [u'2016-11-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'game changer', 'text': [u'I have oily skin so I never would moisturize in the morning. At night time I always did cleanser, toner, serum and moisturizing oil but in the morning just splashed my face with water and did my makeup.I always found that despite having clear skin I felt I had large pores, and why keep trying to hide skin with more makeup, I want that sin that we all dream about!I was recommended this product roughly 4 weeks ago and I have never been told that I had flawless skin until I started using this!I only use this in the morning. I rinse my face with water, then put on a serum then this product. I do this every morning before I put on my makeup and not only does my skin look flawless throughout the entire day, but the makeup stays on longer and looks seamless. Its a must buy!!All you need is a pea sized amount, it spreads quite easily.'], 'author': u'everydaygal17 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-05'], 'location': u'Grimsby, ON', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Absolutely Incredible!', 'text': [u'I\'m ordering my second jar of this incredible product. Very seldom do I reorder anything (let alone finish some products before I move onto the next big thing...). But Algenist has me hooked with its fast results.', u'I really love how quickly my pores shrank, and my skin was so porcelain-like. The moisturizing is very light - perfect for summer. No other product has delivered its promises like this has. I\'m in love with all of the Algenist products I have used so far - not a bad item in the bunch. I am a ginger, sensitive skin and all, and although this is a little more than I prefer to spend, it is SO worth it through the results. Fine lines dissipate, no dry patches, and the pores are virtually non-existent. I also use this and the facelift on my face, neck and decollete. There is no wrinkles or lines anywhere giving away my age. I am also picking up the exfoliant, and the SPF 50 oil... This whole line is one thing I can justify the selfish splurge on.'], 'author': u'delainie ', 'date': [u'2016-09-24'], 'location': u'Lacey, WA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'Not worth the money', 'text': [u'I was disappointed with this moisturizer. In the morning I\'d usually have a bit of a weird residue on my skin, and my make up never sat well over this product. I don\'t have a problem paying $80 for moisturizer if it\'s really awesome, but this one totally missed the mark. Maybe just not meant for my skin type...'], 'author': u'AlexMFurey ', 'date': [u'2016-08-01'], 'location': u'Abbotsford, BC', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Great product', 'text': [u'I really love this moisturizer. It\'s free of some questionable ingredients and still seems to be effective. I put this on at night before bed and when I wake up and wash my face my skin feels very soft. I use different products, as there are different ingredients that help provide anti aging benefits like retinol, peptides, and some of the acids found in this product. It\'s also oil free. I have oily skin so oil can clog my pores. Highly recommend this product!!'], 'author': u'bek207 ', 'date': [u'2016-05-11'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Abeille Royale Face Treatment Oil
reviews: {'title': u'practice makes perfect.', 'text': [u'I bought this because I have been switching my routine towards anti aging. I have very oily skin & only the Becca primer keeps my oil in control. So when I first used this I hated it, the tacky feel never went away & my skin was a disco ball by hour two. However, trust me, I just use this now at night before bed. Right after I cleanse with my Smart Profile & I wake up with plumped skin. It doesn\'t break me out or cause overproduction of oil, during the day, either from nighttime wear. So if you\'re looking for a face oil, serum, cream, etc for wrinkles than this is amazing. No it won\'t dramatically improve your wrinkles but it will plump you skin for a good 12 hours after washing it off in the morning. 4 drops is all it takes, so the price tag isn\'t that steep considering it\'ll last at least a year+'], 'author': u'BrentMaxey ', 'date': [u'2016-09-28'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

It goes away after a few hours. I would recommend this oil to those who are super oily and don\'t like the weight of other oils and serums.'], 'author': u'suckrfish ', 'date': [u'2016-07-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Nirvana Hydrating Treatment Mist
reviews: {'title': u'Does more than you think', 'text': [u'I\'ll start off saying I never write reviews cause I rarely feel strongly enough about anything to do so. I\'m always trying new products and looking for that elusive perfect routine. I bought this sort of on a whim cause I love a lot of the other Josie Maran products. I didn\'t really feel at first like this made a huge difference, especially as I had started using the Josie Maran lotion with SPF daily under primer and makeup and assumed my skin felt so much nicer with that addition (because it is a really nice moisturizer). I was planning on just using this till I ran out but not repurchasing. Expect then I stopped using it when I was almost out (it last quite a few months) and I noticed my skin not being as soft and supple. I didn\'t immediately think it had to do with this since I was changing up some other products I was using. However as soon as I went back to using this twice daily after cleansing and toning and before moisturizing, I noticed within a day or so that my super soft skin was back, and realized that this bottle was actually making a huge difference in how moisturized and soft and nice it felt. I have combo skin, some acne but also occasional dry spots so it\'s always a tricky balance with my skincare but this adds no oil or anything but really makes my skin feel more moisturized and honestly just so soft like my skin has never been. It\'s a bit pricey but it actually does a lot and lasts quite a while and for me it\'s worth it for beautiful skin. I highly recommend it and don\'t see why it would be a problem for other skin types. Also the mist isn\'t really steady but I just do a few spritzes on my face and pat it so it really soaks in and that works fine.'], 'author': u'amandab25 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'glow glow glow', 'text': [u'I bought this item and I fell in love with the aroma and the way it feels on my face very fresh. Awakes my face after a long morning and this just gives life to my full face. Doesn\'t feel oily or greasy and doesn\'t smear makeup. I have combination skin and dry skin but this is my go to mist!!'], 'author': u'PitaChula ', 'date': [u'2016-10-10'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

I just love it, will definitely repurchase.'], 'author': u'ericaashley ', 'date': [u'2016-10-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Calendula Redness Rescue Soothing Moisturising Cream
reviews: {'title': u'I LOVE THIS!', 'text': [u'I have rosacea and extremely sensitive skin, and this cream actually made a difference to my skin. I still have redness on my cheeks, but I have tried sooooo many products from many different brands and nothing ever works. Until I tried this one, I can actually tell that part of my redness has disappeared. I don\'t think my skin can ever be completely free of rosacea. This stuff is thick but it absorbs quickly and it works for my skin. I am on my 3rd one already and will continue to purchase'], 'author': u'alalso ', 'date': [u'2016-11-02'], 'location': u'Markham, ON', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'a little last long way', 'text': [u'it has a herbs smell, and when I press it on the face the smell make me feel relaxed. A little goes long way. I also like used it with different moisturizer. Very good. The only thing I give it 4 stars because I have many other moisturizer that I can give 5 stars. I would NOT repurchase it for a long time there are many new moisturizer that I want try!'], 'author': u'wuwu6 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-12'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'tacky and broke me out', 'text': [u'The cream is incredibly thick and my skin drank it up pretty instantly. Even though it\'s so thick, it always left me feeling a little dry and oddly tacky. In the second week of use it broke me out pretty bad (I exfoliate regularly so it was a gradual clogging of my pores I guess?). I returned it and won\'t be repurchasing.', u'note: In regards to the \'fishy\' smell that the reviews mention - I think it\'s a little fishy but also a little like cucumber? Either way, it\'s noticeable.'], 'author': u'sahar ', 'date': [u'2016-09-27'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Leaves skin feeling moisturized and matte', 'text': [u'I absolutely love this cream!! I have acne prone, combination skin and have always jumped from moisturizer-to-moisturizer, but finally think I can stick with this cream. It goes on thicker delivering intensive moisture, however it dries completely matte without the residue or greasiness so many other creams leave. My skin is also rather sensitive and this cream is completely non irritating..if anything it is soothing and calms the redness!'], 'author': u'NikkiDal10 ', 'date': [u'2016-06-01'], 'location': u'Toronto, Ontario', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

reviews: {'title': u'changed my skin', 'text': [u'There\'s not much to say about this other than my skin has reacted violently to every other moisturizer I have ever tried (and I\'ve tried them all). Will continue to purchase/stockpile in the event of emergency :P'], 'author': u'emilytrue ', 'date': [u'2016-11-01'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Not for dry skin', 'text': [u'My skin requires hydration as I age and my estrogen levels plummet. I was seeking a moisturizer that offered hydration, but wasn\'t greasy. I\'ve found some great products, but the consistency and texture were so rich (but effective) that I wondered if I could have the same result, but with a smoother gel-like consistency. So I gave tundra chaga a shot. I like the way it feels going on and I suspect it would work well on normal/oily/combination skin, but it doesn\'t offer much hydration for dry or sensitive skin. Not recommended for ladies with dryer skin types.'], 'author': u'Sheri52 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-30'], 'location': u'Brooklyn, N.Y.', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

name: Facial Treatment Oil
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'A bit expensive, but totally worth the investment. At first I was skeptical putting oil on my face (other than as a cleanser)... but the results are pretty amazing. Let\'s face it, there are no "miracles" out there... but this stuff is really gentle, smooths skin, and hydrates. I only use it at night, and when I wake up my face feels pretty awesome and looks a bit more radiant and is definitely hydrated.'], 'author': u'b1nk ', 'date': [u'2016-08-22'], 'location': u'Los Angeles, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Want it again!', 'text': [u'I have purchased this product 4 months ago and once I started using it I could never stop using it again. I\'m huge fan of Sk2 even though price is so evil.. Now Sadly It is almost gone and I needed it again .. I wish price was a bit lower. Too expensive for the small bottle ( it last pretty long time tho). I would give 5 stars but 4 because of the price.'], 'author': u'skincareover ', 'date': [u'2016-08-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'must-have product', 'text': [u'I never received any complimentary SKII treatment oil for my review . I bought this product in Singapore duty free when I saw it because I\'m a big fan of SKII products and Since my face is super dry because of my pregnancy I wanted to try this oil and after trying for 3 weeks I can say that it is a wonderful oil !!! It is not greasy at all , my skin feels soft and plump in the morning and my dry patches and desquamations around the nose disappear ! I use it at night before the RNA cream and am really happy of the result !'], 'author': u'daisythaithai ', 'date': [u'2016-07-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Expensive & just not necessary', 'text': [u'It smells nice, but treatment oils can be purchased from other brands for $15. I had hoped there would be a bit more to this. I admit I purchased this impulsively because I tend to stick to SK-II for my skin regimen, but for this small bottle of beautiful smelling oil, it wasn\'t worth the extreme price tag.'], 'author': u'Skempoz ', 'date': [u'2016-07-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Oil on your face? YES!!!', 'text': [u'When SK-II graciously offered to send me a complimentary bottle of their Facial Treatment Oil in exchange for my honest review, I have to admit, I was a little concerned. I have combination skin, and I thought that adding oil to my already oily areas would lead to massive breakouts. Before I accepted SK-II\'s offer, I did a little research. I\'m so glad I did!', u'I learned that adding high quality oils to your face, not only hydrates the dry skin areas, but it also controls the natural production of sebum (the nasty, natural oil that your face produces) by tricking your face into thinking it has already produced the sebum that the skin needs. The difference is, adding oil to your face actually PREVENTS your face from producing too much sebum. This was mind blowing to me!! You mean, I can actually control my embarrassing breakouts with oil?!? All while hydrating my super dry facial areas? I very quickly accepted SK-II\'s very generous offer. ', u'I was sent a full size bottle of SK-II Facial Treatment Oil. The bottle is 50 ml or 1.6 OZ. It looked rather small to me, because I like to use a lot of facial product, but as I was soon to find out, a little goes a loooooooong way. ', u'The first thing I noticed was the very classy glass bottle packaging. From doing my research, glass bottles are very important when dealing with high quality oils. Plastic can ruin the integrity of the oils. The second thing I noticed was the ingredients label. SK-II is not messing around here folks. This Facial Treatment Oil is packed with wonderful ingredients like Squalane oil, which is very close to the natural sebum that our face produces, Jojoba oil, Avocado oil, and many other skin loving ingredients. I was extremely impressed. I decided to start using the Facial Treatment Oil the following morning. ', u'I love trying new products, so I was excited to try the SK-II Facial Treatment Oil. I washed my face, and dried it well. The instructions explain to shake the oil well. This is very important because the ingredients do separate. I know I mentioned that the bottle seemed small to me, but you only need about 5 drops. This bottle will last a very long time, making it very cost effective! The dispenser makes it extremely easy to dispense one drop at a time, so you don\'t accidentally spill too much of this precious oil treatment into your hand. ', u'I dispensed 5 drops, and rubbed my palms together. I noticed a very light, pleasant smell. It is so light, that it would not bother anybody who is fragrance sensitive. I smoothed it on, making sure I got my whole face, and continued on with my regular facial routine. I noticed after the first day that my T-zone was a little less oily. I only needed to used powder twice, instead of three to four times. Within a week, I noticed a serious difference. My dry patches weren\'t dry anymore. My skin started to feel smooth all over. By 6 weeks, I noticed my skin started feeling silky (Yes!!) and dare I say, a little glowy. As of today, my skin is fantastic. It is no longer combination skin. My friends have commented that I\'m glowing, which is the ultimate compliment, AND.....I no longer have to use powder during the day. I am beyond thrilled! Though the price is slightly steep, the results are nothing short of amazing, and the bottle will last a very long time, making SK-II\'s Facial Treatment Oil a must have product. You will be thankful that you tried it!!!'], 'author': u'sirenajen ', 'date': [u'2016-06-03'], 'location': u'Shakopee, MN', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}
ingredient: Galactomyces Ferment Filtrate*, Squalane, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil/Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Olea Europaea Fruit Oil/OleaEuropaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Oryza Sativa Bran Oil/Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Water, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Phytosteryl Oleate, Sodium Benzoate, PVP, Methylparaben, Benzyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Hyaluronate, Xanthan Gum, Tocopherol, Fragrance, Linalool. *Pitera.

name: Future Solution LX Concentrated Balancing Softener
reviews: {'title': u'Amazing', 'text': [u'I\'ve been using this softner now for a little over a month, amazing that\'s how I can sum it up. I didn\'t want to spend so much on it but decided to try. My skin is loving it! After I use it my skin is so soft it literally feels like a baby\'s butt. Expensive YES worth it ABSOLUTELY!'], 'author': u'luluxoxo ', 'date': [u'2016-10-28'], 'location': u'Sarasota, Fl', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Dreadful packaging...excellent product', 'text': [u'Love the product but be xtra careful handling the bottle. Since the product is slippery anyways, the bottle is slippery on its own. It fell from my hands and dropped on my floor and crashed in half! I lost about 50% of the brand new product...about 45$ down the drain...so be very careful! Why do companies insist on fancy, but non-durable packging? I only care about a good product that I can use efficiently, and that won\'t break easily....I\'m a busy person and need my stuff to last! Not to be unnecessarily fragile, totally bummed out.'], 'author': u'ktkoala ', 'date': [u'2016-03-27'], 'location': u'LA, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Best toner! Not just a watery toner, but it is very moisturizing. The large bottle also lasts a long time.'], 'author': u'666wisteria ', 'date': [u'2015-10-30'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: High Potency Evening Repair
reviews: {'title': u'My forehead wrinkles disappeared!', 'text': [u'I love the way my skin just absorbs the product. It\'s not greasy and leaves your skin feeling smooth. The only MAJOR downside is the smell. It\'s almost sort of like rotten fish...I\'m in my early 20\'s, pushing to my mids. {'title': u'this stuff works!', 'text': [u'Im surprised by the low number of reviews but I guess it\'s because of the high price point. If a product works, I\'ll pay the money for it. My skin was looking awful after a 3 week trip to Europe. It was dry, covered in melasma & I looked like K had aged 5 years in 3 weeks. I splurged & purchased this and I woke up this morning (after 1 week of use) and couldn\'t believe how dramatically my skin had improved. It looks like my skin pre-trip. Im writing this review at 7am after I just woke up & saw my reflection in the mirror. Invest in this stuff...it works! My skin is brighter, tighter & more even.'], 'author': u'LilMary ', 'date': [u'2016-08-31'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Tsubaki™ Cleansing Oil-Gel
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'I really wanted to love this cleanser, as I\'m in my 30\'s now and really wanted an antioxidant packed non-foaming cleanser. Unfortunately I don\'t like it as much as the Makeup Breakup Cleansing oil, which I only ever use on the very rare occasion I use some make up. It is a really cool concept, it is like a thick oil/gel combo that is very smooth to apply and comes off quite easily. But I had the same problem that I did with another oil cleanser with emulsifiers in it (they\'re what turn it creamy and make it rinse off when you apply water), which is I felt like I still had stuff on my skin afterwards. Not oil, just some sort of film that wasn\'t really going away and all my other products felt like they weren\'t really absorbing so I\'d wake up oily every morning. I think it\'s a great product, just not right for my combination skin type.'], 'author': u'Keila84 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-28'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great for dry, sensitive skin', 'text': [u'I want my skin to be squeaky clean after washing my face but not dried out. This product does the job and more. {'title': u"doesn't remove my make up effectively", 'text': [u'i was looking for a natural cleanser that could remove my tinted moisturizer and blush without stripping my skin; being a huge boscia fan, i decided to try this product. This cleanser is not as drying as Fresh soy face, and does not leave a firm on my skin like boscia purifying cleansing gel. I wouldnt purchase the full size though because it does not remove my minimum makeup. When I tested its make up removing ability by putting some tinted moisturizer and tinted lip conditioner on the back of my hand, I rubbed the back of my hand for at least one minute, but the marks were still there! I guess you will need to pair it up with a sponge to remove your makeup'], 'author': u'ivy151 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-12'], 'location': u'TORONTO, ON', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

reviews: {'title': u'This stuff is the best', 'text': [u'This is part of my daily routine and I\'m loving it. My skin looks great after months of use. A'], 'author': u'looks4days ', 'date': [u'2016-10-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great Product', 'text': [u'I have been wearing this a couple years now. It is one of very few products with sunscreen that does not irritate my skin. {'title': u'Blackheads and Transfer', 'text': [u'This has very, very sheer coverage, which gives my skin a beautiful natural, but improved look.', u'The added bonus: the "dark" shade, before they re-did the packaging, was too light for my skin - now it\'s the perfect shade.', u'However, this transfers onto everything, leaving greasy smudges behind, it turns patchy on my face, by the end of the day, and so far, every MDSolarSciences product I\'ve tried has given me a ton of blackheads. {'title': u'Not Great for My Skin', 'text': [u'This is actually a very fine SPF. It does not irritate my skin or eyes and it dries to a smooth film after a bit. I have two tubes and will use them on the backs of my hands for now.'], 'author': u'femme ', 'date': [u'2016-05-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'great for sensitive acne prone skin', 'text': [u'This cream has been a life saver! I have acne prone sensitive skin which is also dry and flakey. I needed a cream light enough that my skin can breath but also super moisturizing. I use this every morning before my makeup routine and use a tiny amount (which is nice because it isn\'t super cheap) - honestly a little goes a long way. Like pea size drop for my whole face. Since using it I do not have any new breakouts, my scars are healing, and I do not have flakey or ashy skin anywhere.'], 'author': u'MelissaFlora25 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Sublime Defense Anti-Aging Blurring Moisturizer SPF 30
reviews: {'title': u'This is my third', 'text': [u'I used to use L\'occitain\'s day cream with SPF 15, but it is no longer available in the US.I have tried many samples from various makers and I finally found this.It has higher SPF, the smell is not too strong and not too drying or oily. I will be using this cream till discontinued.'], 'author': u'umisoba ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': u'Pittsburgh PA', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'love this', 'text': [u'Great scent, texture and longevity. It takes me back in years and protects my future face.'], 'author': u'Flowerfaery ', 'date': [u'2016-10-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'amazing', 'text': [u'I am in my early 40\'s and have very oily skin. This is the ONLY moisturizer I have ever used that prevents the terrible, embarrassing shine. If you use too much it will leave a white film but you\'ll quickly learn the proper amount and it\'s not a lot. If you touch your face you can feel it on there but as I said, I don\'t have that awful shine with this product and my skin gets proper hydration plus spf protection. I couldn\'t live won\'t out this.'], 'author': u'momstyle7 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-30'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'leaves white casting', 'text': [u'This moisturiser leaves a white cast on your face, and it doesn\'t disappear for a while. It\'s also very fragrant. I open it and smell it when I miss my grandmum. This has a matte moisturiser, with the smallest amount of slip to it. It\'s almost like it doesn\'t want to blend and soak into your skin. It doesn\'t adhere makeup well. I never have any problems with makeup coming off during the day until I used this. It makes my normal skin feel dry, but with a sheen of grease overtop. Hopefully you have better luck with it.'], 'author': u'LaurelKo ', 'date': [u'2016-09-26'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'finally a non greasy SPF!', 'text': [u'I got a sample jar of this product and expected it to be greasy because of the pasty texture, but once I put it on it dries to a velvety finish, and my face wasn\'t greasy at all even after a few hours! I don\'t wear make up so this is the only product on my face during the day. Very convenient. Will purchase the full size as soon as I run out.'], 'author': u'riverm ', 'date': [u'2016-09-01'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Benefiance Concentrated Neck Contour Treatment
reviews: {'title': u'moiturizing but...', 'text': [u'I just finished using the whole bottle of this cream. I put it on twice a day, at the end of my morning and evening routines. This cream is rich and moiturizing, and unlike what some reviewers have said, I really liked its fragrance. This said, I didn\'t see any improvements around my neck area -- the cream failed to reduce the visible signs of wrinkles and aging around my neck. It\'s too expensive to simply be a neck moisturizer (I can use my face cream on my neck), so I don\'t think I\'ll repurchase this again.'], 'author': u'cocommi ', 'date': [u'2016-08-11'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great Product', 'text': [u'I had wrinkles forming on my chin and after a week started noticing smoother skin. Now after a month wrinkles are gone.'], 'author': u'Kmcdo ', 'date': [u'2016-07-19'], 'location': u'Tyler, TX', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'leaves a sticky feeling', 'text': [u'I personally like the fragrance and didn\'t find it too strong. However, the product doesn\'t seem to absorb very well on my skin, so every time I use it I\'m left with a somewhat sticky feeling... Need to look for something more easily absorbed.'], 'author': u'kokomo7 ', 'date': [u'2016-03-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"doesn't spread well", 'text': [u'I need for my whole neck but this product sinks in fast rather than spreading - e.g. a pearl size amount covers only about 2 square inches. I will be finishing a whole tube in little over a month, so too expensive for the regular use that is needed for it to be effective. I notice younger reviewers say goes on easily so maybe it\'s better for preventive on young skin rather than corrective for old skin. Didn\'t notice smell one way or the other.'], 'author': u'WrinkyDink ', 'date': [u'2015-10-15'], 'location': u'San Francisco CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'the best', 'text': [u'I read about it, and it smells, and I thought I\'m not going to be able to tolerate this smell, but believe me after 3 seconds the smell disappears. It\'s not oily at all which I love it, my skin absorbs this cream so good, and I think it\'s working, I\'m 31 year old and my neck has a huge winkler, that\'s the reason I choose to use this product, the only negative point is the amount, I think the packaged it\'s not full, it lasted me a month using it every night.'], 'author': u'linreve ', 'date': [u'2015-04-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'I like a natural light look. Just something to even out my skin tone. So I just conceal & then use this stuff. Used it before it came as a compact. Terrible.'], 'author': u'chemmary ', 'date': [u'2016-02-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'i can stop my search', 'text': [u'i will always buy this . my skin looks bright and vibrant . looking into the mirror makes me more confident . got the medium . perfect for my skin . a dusting of peachy blush, a swipe of lipstick and black eyeliner, im good for at least half the day . couple of touch ups and im a very satisfied customer . thanx clinique .'], 'author': u'raemom ', 'date': [u'2015-11-13'], 'location': u'Las Vegas, NV', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Perfect for dry skin!', 'text': [u'I love the Moisture Surge CC tube, but I needed a compact for easier travel -- LOVE this. It\'s perfect for my dry, sensitive skin. I do wish it lasted longer but it\'s so easy to reapply; TIP: it saturates quickly, so dab all over and then blend quickly.'], 'author': u'chloe127 ', 'date': [u'2015-01-16'], 'location': u'Chicago, IL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Belle de Jour for a Face in Heaven White Lotus Care
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'Very surprising buy from Sephora. Was looking to replace my la mer, and decided to give this a chance. I\'m so glad that I did. Not as pricey as La Mer, but still a very good solid cream. It is gentle, soothing, and does exactly what it promises. LOOKS AMAZING under makeup, which La Mer doesn\'t do b/c it\'s too heavy. I love it when I find products that aren\'t fancy or popular, yet they out perform those that are. If you\'re on the fence, don\'t be, you will be happy with results.'], 'author': u'SCOX ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'\u2764\ufe0f\u2764\ufe0f\u2764\ufe0f', 'text': [u'I really love this product. I purchased 3 items from the line and this was the clear stand out. Really moisturizes and plumps the skin, almost like the Glow Glow hydrating mask where you can feel it slip off when you wash your face in the morning but also looks awesome under make up. The only thing that would make this better to me is if it came in a pump.'], 'author': u'amanda2995 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-04'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"I'm in love", 'text': [u'The first thing I loved about this cream is the smell: it smells like paradise! Then, the texture: soft and thick and not greasy. And finally, what it did to my skin: I glow, literally. My skin looks so good, I\'ve been using this cream for more than a month now and I\'m amazed every day by it. I\'ve also use the eye cream and night cream. I\'m really in love!'], 'author': u'marieisa ', 'date': [u'2016-04-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Intense Hydration and Baby Soft Skin', 'text': [u'The entire Kenzoki line is fantastic. Everything I\'ve tried has been amazing, this cream included. In combination with the Lotus Eye Cream, I wake up with soft, supple skin. The texture of my face and neck have seriously improved. It fills out fine lines and wrinkles. This really is a very lightweight cream that provides serious hydration.', u'It\'s perfect for the spring and fall months. I use it every day and my face loves it as the heavy creams can cause some breakouts. During the colder weather when my face has been beaten down by the weather, I use this for 4-5 days out of the week and a heavier cream like the Caudalie Premier Cru for the other 2-3 days.', u'The scent of all the Kenzoki Lotus products is intoxicating. It smells sooo good. My husband loves it and tells me how good I smell when I finish my nighttime regimen. I\'ve even got him using it..and his skin rivals mine now. I have yet to try some of the other Kenzoki products but they\'re definitely on my list. I highly suggest this cream to anyone looking for a lightweight nighttime moisturizer. Great for men and women!'], 'author': u'adrishangwen ', 'date': [u'2016-01-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great for very dry, flakey skin', 'text': [u'Such a great product! I use this as a last step for my very dry skin. I\'ve also found that it\'s great if my skin peels unexpectedly during the day (like if I forgot to use it) -- using it as a spot-treatment helpfully hides any flakes while preventing more from forming. ', u'My neighbor recently told me that I look "glowier" recently, and I definitely credit this :)'], 'author': u'kippster91 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great Absorbing balm ...love it !', 'text': [u'Had a few crow lines around the eye area and very dry skin in the winter (live in Quebec) ! Tried several expensive creams and treatment regimes ... I then fell on this and my dryness problem along w the diminished lines were the results after less than 2 months of morning and night use ! I then ordered the cream in the tube but was not as pleased !! Returned to my daily routine w the balm !! I suggested it to my friends that have a combination skin , my daughter that was pregnant and developed scaly skin .... And my husband who swims on a daily basis ... I see the results it had on their skin too ! Result : Moisturized, Glowy skin !!! Love it !!!'], 'author': u'NanMini ', 'date': [u'2016-07-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Tsubaki™ Deep Hydration Sleeping Mask
reviews: {'title': u'irritating', 'text': [u'i love boscia but not all of their products agree with my skin. This sleeping mask is more like a thick night cream. A little goes a long way. I applied a tiny amount on my face on the first night; it was a bit more sticky than my usual face oil bed time routine. I guess it was because of the Dimethicone in it? I used it again on the second night, and my chin was so irritated on the next morning. I felt the skin on my chin was about to peel off, while my forhead and cheeks were about to break out. If you have sensitive dry skin, please stay away from this product.'], 'author': u'ivy151 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-15'], 'location': u'TORONTO, ON', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

name: Clinique Smart Treatment Oil
reviews: {'title': u'it really is SMART!', 'text': [u'I\'ve always had skin on the drier side, with dry patches that were larger and more noticeable in the winter. I tried this m, as reviews had some of the most positive for any facial oil. I tried this one day under my SPF before makeup, and immediately received compliments on my skin and makeup! This really does have smart technology - although I had predominantly dry skin, I\'m still acne prone with clogged pores in my t-zone, and this both hydrated my dry areas and soothed any blemishes I had without adding more. Product is an oil, but is silky once applied rather than greasy. I use 2x daily; under makeup and before bed. Doesn\'t make my face feel greasy when used under makeup during the day. I will highly recommend this to EVERYONE with dry skin, and it will be a new HG skin product.'], 'author': u'Anonymous ', 'date': [u'2016-11-06'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Only oil that has not broken me out....It\'s not greasy but light, almost matte feeling compared to other heavy oils Leaves a light veil of moisture.I use it as a last step to seal in everything.'], 'author': u'askquestion ', 'date': [u'2016-11-04'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great oil', 'text': [u'My skin suddenly became very dry this fall and this oil is great for moisturizing it without causing any breakouts. My skin\'s texture looks improved and I can go more frequently without makeup since using this.'], 'author': u'Britin ', 'date': [u'2016-10-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

No more dry patches.'], 'author': u'EleDiaz23 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-10'], 'location': u'Tegucigalpa', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Hydra Life BB Eye Crème
reviews: {'title': u'This is not a concealer', 'text': [u'It doesn\'t completely cover dark circles because its like a BB eye cream. It\'s also very hydrating and it de-puffs my eyes when I\'ve had less that 7h of sleep.'], 'author': u'satvroulamav ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': u'Atlanta, GA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Love it! !!', 'text': [u'I am a mom of 3 don\'t get much sleep and have little time for makeup. This stuff last all day covers under eye darkness but blends in natural I just put this a little mascara and go. Always getting told how young I look I swear it\'s from my Dior concealer.'], 'author': u'Jnassar84 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I wear this on my no makeup days in order to look not dead. It doesn\'t completely cover my awful dark circles on its own (I didn\'t expect it to), but it definitely lessens them and looks natural. It also layers well over color correction for more coverage. I love that it is hydrating as 99% of concealers dry me out and make me look older than I am (32). I will continue to repurchase unless I find something better.'], 'author': u'emily1024 ', 'date': [u'2016-04-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'creases, low coverage', 'text': [u'I retuned this. I\'m 32 and have some minor lines under my eyes. This creased a lot on me and provided little coverage. It does have spf though, so if you\'re looking for an eye product specifically with that, this may work for you if you can use setting powder. Setting powder makes me look like the crypt keeper, so it\'s not really an option for me.'], 'author': u'areis ', 'date': [u'2016-03-12'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

name: Smarty Plants™ CC SPF 20 Skin Complexion Corrector
reviews: {'title': u"Didn't work for me", 'text': [u'I have so much pigmentation on my face!!! I tried the darker 2 shades in a sample I got and the lighter shade was kind of too light and the darker was way too dark. The light could prob work if I added some powder but the product itself didn\'t really cover anything. Don\'t see myself buying this. For someone who doesn\'t have a lot of dark spots, this could work but on me, just didn\'t have enough coverage unfortunetly. Gave 2 stars for effort, nice on my sensitive skin & liked the smell was hardly there.'], 'author': u'inkedCaligrl82 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-20'], 'location': u'Bakersfield,Ca', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Very nice product', 'text': [u'I\'ve tried a million BB creams, and fell in love with this CC cream instead! My skin is very sensitive, with rosacea and eczema. This doesn\'t irritate my skin at all, and looks very natural. I don\'t look like I have anything on my skin after I use it, which is a huge plus in my book. I really like the light citrusy scent to this product as well.'], 'author': u'sk8514 ', 'date': [u'2016-04-12'], 'location': u'Grand Rapids, MI', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Used this for several years. Just enough coverage, pleasant scent, not too oily, and it has sunscreen! It also doesn\'t make me breakout, which is a miracle. Love this!'], 'author': u'JessinNC123 ', 'date': [u'2016-04-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'absolutely amazing', 'text': [u'I absolutely adore this. I don\'t spend nearly anything on makeup, but this is the ONE thing I splurge on, and I don\'t regret it. I\'ve been a regular buyer. It cleared up my acne. One thing is if you\'re as pale as I am, but not super pale, it\'s either too light or too dark. Blending down the neck a little works perfectly for me. 10/10 would recommend to anyone and everyone.'], 'author': u'Amanda333 ', 'date': [u'2016-04-02'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great CC cream', 'text': [u'I have been using this CC cream for several years now and love it. I put it on top of my normal moisturizer and SPF and the color blends in perfectly with my skin tone. I use the light-medium color. I have tried other CC and BB creams in the past and always come back to this one. I wish the amount in the bottle was more because I am purchasing a new one every 4 ish months but I love the product and use it every day.'], 'author': u'tholowka ', 'date': [u'2016-03-19'], 'location': u'Washington, DC', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Kale + Spinach + Hyaluronic Acid Age Prevention Cream
reviews: {'title': u'Holy Grail Product', 'text': [u'MY GAWD my skin feels as soft as a baby\'s bottom after I use this. I like the fact that this comes with a little plastic spatula so that I can scrape every last bit of cream out of the jar. I use this at night on top of a serum for maximum hydration overnight.'], 'author': u'Juicy008 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-25'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'perfect', 'text': [u'I have oily/combo skin- leaning more towards combo as winter is coming on. I have red areas at the bottom by my jaw that I hate. Since starting this stuff my face has completely even out, even around my eyes, and I just look healthy with an even skin tone. I originally bought to use as a nighttime cream but this still really absorbs into your skin and doesn\'t leave you feeling greasy or oily. On days where I\'m not really going out and putting on makeup I\'ve been reaching for this one too, instead of my Belif Solutions moisturizer that I normally put on for daytime. There\'s a reason why this is always sold out and that\'s because it really does work. I\'m in love and very happy with this purchase. The jar should last a long while and I LOVE that it came with a spatula to help keep the cream from becoming contaminated. Maybe one day it will be in a pump?! Fingers crossed.'], 'author': u'audsome790 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-25'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love this superfood cream', 'text': [u'I\'ve been using this cream for the last month. Completely in love with it. It absorbs really quickly and feels so clean. The Hyaluronic Acid makes it good for age prevention - when I first started using it, I felt a very very gentle tingle from the Hyaluronic Acid so I knew its ingredients were working. My skin is glowing. I use it at night and in the morning. under my sun protection. I love that it\'s full of superfoods like Kale and Spinach too. And it being vegan and animal cruelty free is huge for me.'], 'author': u'AlesandriaS ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

After reading what this cream will provide I was looking fwd to trying it out, and I am disappointed with this product. I have not seen any skin evenness or radiance that they claim, this product is sticky and smells like a glue stick. I do not recommend this product'], 'author': u'luckydc14 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-18'], 'location': u'Albuquerque, NM', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Crazy hydrating', 'text': [u'This formula definitely takes a little getting used to, but for dry skin, it is amazing. I went through a bit of a learning curve as far as how much I needed to apply. When I first started using it I applied too heavily, and ended up with some extra bumps/breakouts along my cheeks and jawline in the morning. A little less product and a little more massaging it in, and it was perfect. Then once I started Clinique\'s acne 3-step line, it was back to needing more moisture and therefore more product. Basically, the formula of this product adapted beautifully to my skin\'s needs, and it was super easy to control a thin vs. heavy layered application.', u'You definitely feel the radiance right when you apply it. It\'s more of a gel-lotion texture, smoothes on easily, and makes your skin feel cool and clean. The price is a little intimidating for just 50mL, but luckily a little bit goes a long way.'], 'author': u'brittk ', 'date': [u'2016-09-09'], 'location': u'Fargo, ND', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'i woke up like this.... ***flawless', 'text': [u'After I wash my face at night before bed, I apply this and let it dry a little before putting my face on the pillow since it is a mask and is kind of sticky. But girl, I wake up flawless. I don\'t even wash my face or moisturize in the morning after I\'ve used this at night because my foundation even applies on it so well like a soft little primer. FAB could put out anything and I\'d buy it at this point because I\'ve never been disappointed.'], 'author': u'eringabriel ', 'date': [u'2016-08-16'], 'location': u'Chicago, IL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

It seemed to ball up and flake off when I applied my liquid foundation. I typically just use this moisturizer when I know I won\'t be wearing any foundation that day, and it keeps my face nice and matte.'], 'author': u'Cat00 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'A nice moisturizer. I haven\'t noticed much of a change in my skin, however I love the matte finish as I\'m a tad bit oily.'], 'author': u'Anonymous ', 'date': [u'2016-09-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Matte Until Makeup', 'text': [u'Bought this hoping it would keep my super shiny skin matte.. I first used it without any makeup, since my makeup makes me more shiny than usual anyway. I was completely matte all day. Success!! When I added my makeup back into the mix, the shine was back. I put foundation over it, still shiny. I mixed it with Cover FX Custom Cover Drops, still shiny. I put powder over it all, still shiny.', u'I also found it was less moisturizing than the vinosource moisturizing sorbet, which is totally fine for summer, but when my skin started feeling too dry I switched back over to the sorbet, since there is no difference in shininess when I wear makeup.'], 'author': u'614tw ', 'date': [u'2016-09-28'], 'location': u'Columbus, OH', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: Vital Treatment Essence for Hydrating
reviews: {'title': u'V.S.P. = Very Special Product', 'text': [u'I bought this product as an afterthought because I liked the ingredient list. After having used it for about a month, I can\'t believe how much I like it. It\'s not a moisturizer, but it does seem to seal moisture into your skin. I have also noticed that since I\'ve been using it, my skin heals very quickly and the redness and eczema from my rosacea seem greatly soothed. When it runs out, I will definitely repurchase.'], 'author': u'trumpbunny ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': u'New England', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"idk what this is but it's wonderful", 'text': [u'I love this! The texture is almost like aloe but not sticky at all. Hydrates right away. Before I was using this, my skin was dry and flakey and although I use a moisturizer, it didn\'t stop being flakey under I started adding this underneath. I have dry and sensitive skin so I was hesitant that this would do anything but it\'s been great.'], 'author': u'larazeitoun ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Gamechanger', 'text': [u'After just one day and night of using this toner alongside the Tundra Chaga Pressed Serum, my skin looks noticeably supercharged. Near-flawless hydration, zero fine lines--like those Kpop celebs omg.'], 'author': u'Litaly ', 'date': [u'2016-10-12'], 'location': u'Orlando, FL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'This product makes me so happy!', 'text': [u'Yes, yes, 1000x yes! I am quickly falling in love with this Vital Treatment Essence, and with Blithe in general. ', u'I have been using this essence for a little over a week as my step after toning but before serum or day moisturizer. I bought it bc I was looking for an additional step in my day routine to give me an extra level of hydration without going too much heavier with my cream - just wanted an extra splash of water-light hydration (not oily or fatty) to make my skin smoother and better able to receive serums and moisturizer on top. I wanted the feeling of a sheet mask without having to buy a kajillion sheet masks.', u'After doing a lot of research of mainly Kbeauty skincare, I discovered Blithe and this treatment essence. It seemed like absolutely everything I was looking for, and I was so happy to see it available on Sephora. Picked it up the moment I could, and gotta say, it looks like my instincts were right! This is a water-light serum type product - thicker than a toner, but lighter than most regular serums or ampoules. I empty a few drops onto my hand, dot my face with the essence and then gently message in. My skin feels INSTANTLY soft and hydrated, and I swear it helps to make any serum or cream sink in that much more easily afterwards. You can use this day or night but I have been using it during the day only so far. I love dabbing this gently under my eyes especially, since that area needs all the hydration it can get. My skin reacts to EVERYTHING, and so far no weird bumps or breakouts from using this product.', u'Blithe has really impressed me so far, and I am anxious to try their Pressed Serums, as well as the Vital Treatment Essence for Lifting (8 Nourishing Beans). I would recommend this product to pretty much any skin type, and for those who feel they want to boost their routine with an additional level of water-fresh hydration.'], 'author': u'elci ', 'date': [u'2016-10-07'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'magic in a bottle', 'text': [u'This CHANGED my skin. I used to have lots of bumpy skin around my cheek area especially and within a month of using it, it cleared it up. It\'s a very mild formula, very soothing. I use it as a toner morning and night.'], 'author': u'goldengrahams23 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Polyphenol C15 Broad Spectrum SPF20 Anti-Wrinkle Protect Fluid
reviews: {'title': u'love this stuff', 'text': [u'This is my favorite facial moisturizer/sunscreen, hands down - I\'m at the end of one tube and buying two more. Everyone\'s combination skin is different -- but I use it generously in the dry areas and they stay moisturized all day, and it doesn\'t make me break out (which is a big deal because I have adult-onset acne and easily irritated skin). I tried this product because I wanted something that wasn\'t heavy or greasy that I could wear under my foundation -- The Clarins product i was using was discontinued, and gel products never work for me -- and this is perfect. I have never had any incompatibility between it and my other facial products (I mostly use urban decay). And my skin feels so much healthier I have stepped down some of the Rx skin products I was using before. Also, I love the smell - it is citrusy and fresh and not too heavy. I hope they keep this product in their line permanently.'], 'author': u'avarael ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Amazing for Oil Control', 'text': [u'I absolutely love this product and it\'s become a product that I almost always have a backup of. I tend to come back to this moisturizer whenever I try a new one because it\'s really just that good. Other moisturizers might break me out, but not this one. It keeps my skin hydrated, but it never broke me out. In fact, if I use this on my face after cleansing, I find that it helps my acne heal better than to no moisturizer the affected area instead. This is an absolute must try for someone that\'s going through an acne phase, because that\'s when I started using this and my skin has calmed down significantly.'], 'author': u'DuchessGracie ', 'date': [u'2016-03-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Too moisturizing', 'text': [u'I love Shiseido products and thought I would try this for a night cream. I need something moisturizing, but not too moisturizing since I\'m oily combination and that can cause breakouts. Unfortunately, this was too much and caused breakouts on my cheeks and chin. Once I stopped using it my breakouts cleared up, so I had to return it. This might be good for customers with less oily kin.'], 'author': u'Sejones424 ', 'date': [u'2015-12-14'], 'location': u'Washington, D.C.', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'A nice light gel-cream for the summer, but may not be for everyone or for year-round use. This does leave a dewy sheen so people who prefer matte finishes should stay away from this cream. If your skin gets oily like mine, the combination of oil and a dewy finish might make your face glow more than you\'re used to. This absorbs quickly and leaves skin hydrated, but I think I might need something heavier for the winter.', u'This cream also contains fragrance (I strongly dislike skincare products with fragrance) so people with sensitive skin should be wary. However, my slightly sensitive skin has yet to break out.'], 'author': u'xChunkyMonkeyx ', 'date': [u'2015-08-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love this!', 'text': [u'First off I love the FEEL of this on my skin. It is NOT greasy or oily at all. And the smell is divine. It feels like I\'m getting a spa treatment every time. Also I have very oily, acne prone skin and this does not cause me any problems at all. In fact, since I\'ve switched to Tatcha cleansing oil and this my skin has never been clearer.'], 'author': u'marciejo ', 'date': [u'2016-04-12'], 'location': u'Saunemin, IL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Extra Illuminating Moisture Balm
reviews: {'title': u'LOVE the Sample', 'text': [u'I was wandering around the mall before an afternoon job interview and ran into a BB rep who was kind enough to offer me a make-over for the interview. WOW! Totally naturally looking, and I bought just about everything she used on me (which was WAY less than I expected and spent on other brands). She was so kind to send me home with a few samples, one of which was this Xtra Illuminating Balm. Oh my. I ADORE this product and used the sample up in almost a week. I have very dry skin and have resorted to Botox years ago (no judgement please - not for or against). This product not only did what it\'s supposed to - illuminate and glow the skin - but it also moisturizes pretty darned well with a light serum underneath. I\'m done with my sample and am headed to the mall tomorrow morning.'], 'author': u'gdr2768 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-03'], 'location': u'Washington', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'Pricey for the size, but a perfect product!', 'text': [u'I got this as a dupe for the Victoria Beckham x Est\xe9e Lauder Morning Aura and was not disappointed! It\'s lightweight enough for my sensitive skin, but leaves the perfect fine sheen of luminosity on the high points of the face. I was skeptical at first, but I\'m glad I picked it up! Four stars only because of the price. Will definitely repurchase!'], 'author': u'Zurelladybug ', 'date': [u'2016-11-02'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'wonderful', 'text': [u'This is amazing, gives a fresh healthy look to the skin.its part of the extra range so has all the good stuff for your skin as well. One thing with it, it has a strong ylang ylang smell to it, which i LOVES!! But if you don\'t like that smell you are not going to like the smell of this.'], 'author': u'jemmann ', 'date': [u'2016-06-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

Moisture, healthy looking skin, everything a girl needs for summer just needs a different smell.'], 'author': u'Katie32 ', 'date': [u'2016-06-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Dew me!!', 'text': [u'A makeup artist used this on me and wow, the results are instant!', u'She first used to prep my entire face before foundation, then applied to the high points of my face to finish the look.', u'Nothing compares, you don\'t need powder or shimmery highlighters if you use this. No noticeable reduction in forehead wrinkles, otherwise great product.'], 'author': u'moondymon13 ', 'date': [u'2016-01-12'], 'location': u'Pittsburgh, PA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Love it! Back for more.', 'text': [u'This is just what my slightly sensitive, dry skin needed. I\'ve been in search of the right moisturizer, and I bought this one on a whim at another unnamed store because it was on clearance. I usually do not spend this much on moisturizer, but I\'m sold on this product. I\'m in my late 30s with dry skin that turns combination at certain times of month and when the weather is humid. I\'m also prone to rosacea and my skin is sensitive to many skin products. I didn\'t believe this product would actually firm -- I was just looking for a moisturizer. It actually works. My skin tone is better, my skin is softer, and my jawline is firmer. I\'m back to Sephora to buy more, because I saw in the reviews at other discount sites that some online sales of Bliss were watered down products, and I want the real thing if I\'m going to pay this much.'], 'author': u'redrita ', 'date': [u'2015-10-12'], 'location': u'Boise Idaho', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'great moisturizer', 'text': [u'I recieved a sample tube of this moisturizer. I have very dry, sensitive skin with rosacea. I am very particular about any products I use on my skin. I really like this as a night cream. I have been using it nightly for about two weeks. It only takes a little and it leaves my skin feeling moisturized without the oiliness and without irritation or breakouts. I didn\'t see a difference in my complexion or in the firmness of my skin but I will be buying a jar to continue to use as a night cream.'], 'author': u'56neys ', 'date': [u'2014-11-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Excellent Antioxidant Product', 'text': [u'I have a combination skin (with dry cheeks area), and I have been looking for a perfect cream/ gel for such a long time. Unfortunately, most of the emulsion-type moisturizers are oil-absorbing or drying and are targeted towards just light moisturizing. This cream actually provides great moisturizing, antioxidant effect, and is very light! It leaves my skin so soft, radiant and I see changes just after few days! Try it - if you have normal or combo skin: you won\'t regret.'], 'author': u'KatKay ', 'date': [u'2015-09-29'], 'location': u'Philadelphia PA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Perfect for oily skin', 'text': [u'I have been using Est\xe9e Lauder serums for the past few years, since I\'ve turned 30...the CP R and ANR to be specific. I have combination skin that\'s prone to breakouts so I\'ve had some awful experiences with moisturizers, even gel moisturizers. However, at my last visit to the dermatologist, he suggested I start using a moisturizer. The ones sold in his office are double the price of this one and contain almost many similar beneficial ingredients so I went ahead and stuck with my trusted brand of choice. This is probably the only moisturizer that didn\'t make me oily, or cause a breakout, and it seems to be helping with my fine lines and overall skin texture. It wears very well under makeup and I like that it has more skin benefits than simply, moisturizing. I also like that it hydrates my combination skin but doesn\'t cause excess oiliness is my t-zones yet helps to moisturize the areas that are dry or flakey. Another winner from Est\xe9e Lauder. My grandmother, who is 76 and looks 60, swears by the brand and now I know why.'], 'author': u'Dara813 ', 'date': [u'2015-09-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'not worth it', 'text': [u'I am not sure what this is supposed to do because I don\'t feel it does anything! Nothing positive but also nothing negative. {'title': None, 'text': [u'I\'ll have to admit, it is a pretty pricey item but it does an amazing job with keeping my skin super hydrated throughout the day. Haven\'t found a spray that keeps my skin hydrated till now.', u'I first started using the essence when I was pregnant. Before pregnancy, my skin was normal to dry. During pregnancy, my skin became dry to extra dry with flakiness on my chin, around my mouth and nose. ', u'My regimen would consist of using the spray before a serum and moisturizer. If I am wearing makeup I also set it with the essence which helps make my foundation look more like skin considering the textured areas I have on my face.'], 'author': u'maleesah177 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Greek Sleeping Beauties
reviews: {'title': u'love everything', 'text': [u'I bought this when it was $29, so glad I did. I already had both sleeping facials before this so I knew I liked them. The greek yogurt one is very moisturizing, so it makes my oily skin a little greasy by the morning. I prefer the rose mask because I like the smell more and it doesn\'t make my face as greasy. I\'ve been using the sleeping oil for a few nights now and I really love it! It doesn\'t make my skin greasy at all the next morning. I use just 2 drops for my whole face and it provides enough moisture for the whole night. It does take a few minutes to set in so your face will feel greasy at first but that goes away.'], 'author': u'tara12 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-13'], 'location': u'St. Petersburg, Fl', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'good value', 'text': [u'I got this when it was $29,it wasn\'t at the price for very long but is still a good value. I like how both creams feel like they heat the skin up (maybe the Protien?) They\'re hydrating enough for sleep, I have very oily skin but still use oil only at night and almost always get acne with oils and new products but will continue to use and have hope for results.'], 'author': u'frostalla ', 'date': [u'2016-10-12'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Greek Is Good', 'text': [u'I bought this when it was $29. I had a sample of the sleeping oil and loved it for my acne prone skin. I had also had a sample of the wild rose sleeping facial. It is nice as I love sleeping facials or mask. I tried the Greek yogurt last night and woke with less redness in my skin. It left no visible residue on my pillow either. Great set for $29, but with the price increase I don\'t know if it is still worth it at $45. Also my store did not have this in stock I had to buy it online.'], 'author': u'kstar12 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Wonderful little kit', 'text': [u'This is a wonderful little kit! I bought it online when it was $29, so I\'m happy I bought it before the price increase! I have received a sample of the firming sleeping oil, so I was happy to get it in this kit. I have not tried the sleeping facial before this kit, but I can say that the greek yogurt was not as thick as I had hoped. It felt like a normal moisturizer to me. If you haven\'t tried any products from Korres, this would be a great starter kit!'], 'author': u'vamanda95 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-06'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Mineral Water Spray Duo To Go
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'When I run out, I always think I can substitute these for actual water by spraying my brush and I guess yeah you can DIY a bottle spray with filtered water but c\'mon! These are awesome!! They are convenient, fit in my purse, used as a quick pick me up, also used when I feel like my face is dry and patchy. I use these also to wet my beauty blender when I\'m too lazy to walk to a sink and actually soak them. Works just as well. I also use these to spray my brushes for better pigmented shadows. These are life savers and will continue purchasing!!'], 'author': u'Kimberly001 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'Favorite Moisturizer ever', 'text': [u'I have tried 100s Of different moisturizer and never reorder because none have given me the results I want for my dry, wrinkly, acne prone face (lovely).
