{'title': u'Good but not worth the price IMO', 'text': [u'I purchased this a long time ago and really liked the consistency of it and the fact that it absorbed quickly. So when I was looking for a new moisturizer I decided to go back to this and try it, even though it\'s pretty pricey. I can\'t say that I was entirely disappointed but I didn\'t see any changes that would warrant purchasing this again. In addition to that, I had some days where my skin would sting a little after putting this on, and I wouldn\'t say that I have sensitive skin. Lastly, as rich as this cream feels it didn\'t prevent me from getting the dry patch that I tend to develop along my left smile line when it starts getting cold, and keep in mind I have combination oily skin not dry.'], 'author': u'sandiegan ', 'date': [u'2015-10-15'], 'location': u'Cincinnati, OH', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'super silky', 'text': [u'This cream seems luxurious yet light and my skin immediately absorbed it, leaving it soft and not greasy. Unfortunately, I only used it 2 days and immediately began to have icky pimples filled with the yuck stuff, so something in it doesn\'t work for me even though it\'s not supposed to break you out. Recently switched from Clinique (used 7 years) and love the Wrinkle Revenge facial cleanser, but this cream is a problem. I\'m giving it a good rating, because it may just be my skin; the cream seems really nice otherwise. Wish I could give it a better chance but my skin cleared up when I stopped using it.'], 'author': u'liz3 ', 'date': [u'2015-08-31'], 'location': u'St. Louis, MO', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'moisturizing, smooth, not heavy', 'text': [u'This product is far and away the standout in this line of skincare. I picked it up anticipating that I would use it at night but, while it is intensely moisturizing, it\'s light enough and absorbs quickly enough that I prefer this to be what I use in the morning under my makeup.', u'A little goes a long way - it isn\'t heavy, and it absorbs in a timely manner without leaving a residue. My face doesn\'t look shiny, oily, or greasy after using this. At night I might put one layer in and then reapply a second layer after five minutes for more intense hydration.', u'It is scented (floral) and it never dissipates entirely, but it does fade after a period of time. I have sensitive skin and I don\'t find that this product stings or burns (even if applying after exfoliation). ', u'I would recommend this night cream to anyone - it\'s appropriate if you want something intensely moisturizing, but it won\'t leave you greasy or oily if you apply it to oilier regions like your t-zone, so it\'s appropriate for combo or oily skin as well.'], 'author': u'frametheface ', 'date': [u'2016-04-25'], 'location': u'Chicago, IL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Balancing Moisturiser
reviews: {'title': u"The Moisturizer I've been searching for...", 'text': [u'I have combination skin and since entering the latter half of my 30s, I\'ve noticed my skin isn\'t looking as good as it once was and I\'m even starting to get breakouts (which I never used to have). I\'ve found this moisturizer is the one I\'ve been searching for my whole life. It soaks in quickly, makes my face feel silky smooth and has the most incredible spa-like smell. I love it! And I love the way my skin is looking. The stubborn dry spots on my cheek/nose area have disappeared and my oily forehead doesn\'t look as oily. I\'ve also noticed fewer breakouts.I find a little goes a long way so this product will last me a while. It\'s my new favorite must-have.'], 'author': u'DanniNav ', 'date': [u'2016-06-06'], 'location': u'Newburgh, IN', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'balancing but too dry for me', 'text': [u'ive been using this moisturiser for 3 months. i had oily and combination skin before using this. after using this moisturiser, my skin changed to not that oily but very dry. definitely not for winter. and now my skin is more like dry and combination..will find another moisturiser after empty this bottle because of dryness.'], 'author': u'Liangxm ', 'date': [u'2016-04-04'], 'location': u'Louisville, KY', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'My favorite!', 'text': [u'My skin loves this product. I live in Colorado and have dry skin but prone to breakouts. It keeps my skin hydrated, balanced, and free of breakouts. I like it better then the illuminating moisturizer. It is my go to moisturizer and I will continue buying it. name: Repairwear Laser Focus Line Smoothing Cream Broad Spectrum SPF 15 for Very Dry to Dry Combination Skin
reviews: {'title': u'So far so good :)', 'text': [u'I will be honest this is one of the first daily SPF moisturizers I have tried (my doctor recommended I use Cetaphil which was really greasy so I started looking for other options). I am prone to cystic acne, and so far (1 week) it has not caused any breakouts. I follow up with a oil-absorbing sheet to mattify and eliminate shine, and it keeps me feeling moisturized all day. 4/5 because I have not noticed any changes in very fine lines or enlarged pores (which all started after moving to hot, dry, polluted city of LA--- so daily SPF is an absolute must!!!) Skin profile: 29 / F / combo skin'], 'author': u'JessaDL ', 'date': [u'2016-11-04'], 'location': u'Los Angeles', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u"Great Product - I've Used This For Years", 'text': [u'This recently underwent a name change. (I figured this out at the counter at Macy\'s.) So it is exactly the same product as the old moisturizer Clinique put out. I have very mild rosacea and this along with the Redness Solution cleanser and the green toner from Clinique solves that issue nicely. I can tell when I get lazy and don\'t use enough of this. So I know that it definitely works to keep my skin moisturized, smooth and no itchy rosacea flareups. I\'m 47, live in brutal Las Vegas weather and thanks to genetics and these clinique products I look much younger. I don\'t have any aging lines or dark shadows under my eyes at all and am frequently told I look to be in my early 30\'s. You must use this for an extended time (a few months) and day and night to get the benefit. Using for a week off and on isn\'t going to cut it. Nor would it with ANY product like this.'], 'author': u'Laneycakes ', 'date': [u'2016-07-01'], 'location': u'Las Vegas, NV', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'Moisture Rich but Nothing Else', 'text': [u'My skin is soft but my forehead is dry again after an hour. It\'s super thick but blends in non-greasy which is nice. But it didn\'t reduce lines, wrinkles, or pores. I\'m a non-smoker in my early 30\'s so my "lines" are not bad at all. I\'m disappointed for the price I paid.'], 'author': u'Louise13 ', 'date': [u'2016-05-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'smooooth', 'text': [u'I decided a while ago to up my skincare routine, I\'m looking at 30 and wanted to start preventive measure: I have been using this product for the past 3 weeks, day and night. I wear it after I moisturize taking special attention to the areas prone to lines/creasing. My skin is so smooth, I love the spf protection, a line that I was watching is less prominent, and it doesn\'t make my face feel oily after applying. Give a few minutes to absorb before putting on makeup!'], 'author': u'pollyspocket ', 'date': [u'2016-04-25'], 'location': u'Toronto, ON', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Thirsty Like the Wolf', 'text': [u'That describes my skin. Dry. Flaky. Hurts after I wash my makeup off. I\'ve been using this cream day and night for a few days. My skin feels as smooth as a baby\'s bottom. Choice stuff.'], 'author': u'themamapajama ', 'date': [u'2016-02-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Wonderful!', 'text': [u'I love this product. I\'ve been using it for about 12 months, and I\'m on my second bottle. I use it every morning as the last part of my skincare routine. It has generally cleared up my skin, and it just looks smoother and less splotchy. I don\'t *love* the packaging, because I can tell I\'m not getting everything out of the can. But, the results I see make up for it! I would definitely recommend it to a friend.'], 'author': u'CrimsonAK ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Dewy Skin', 'text': [u'I first tried this product during a make-up application at the store. They told me it would keep my skin dewy with or without foundation and a highlighter over it -- they were right. I always have a very flat, matte look after make-up application which this product mitigates. I now have a healthy glow all the time.'], 'author': u'Lex19 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-13'], 'location': u'Chicago, IL', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'smells', 'text': [u'I\'m almost 30 and have pale skin, so I don\'t have a lot of skin issues and it\'s difficult to get my pale skin to really show a glow. However, after using it I did see some illuminating of the skin and it\'s not too oily nor does it sit on the skin like most illuminating BB creams. Hopefully with time it will clear up some minor hyper pigmentation I have on my nose and cheeks, but I\'ve found when a product does start to have an effect on that it usually takes a month (philosophy\'s when hope is not enough serum is a wonderful start, especially if you have scars). BUT the problem with this product is the smell! It\'s not overly strong, so I\'ll keep it, but there\'s definitely a bad odor--like urine almost. I\'ve never used a retinol cream so perhaps it\'s that. I will say if my hair, skin and perfume didn\'t all smell nice if probably notice the scent more and maybe take it back'], 'author': u'curlypalechic ', 'date': [u'2016-06-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Potent stuff!!!', 'text': [u'I initially received a sample of this and liked it enough to buy a full sized bottle. It gives my skin a healthy glow without being overly greasy or oily. I use it in conjunction with the Overnight Resurfacing Serum and have had tremendous results in just a couple weeks. I had a small spot of hyperpigmentation on my face that is now completely gone. Highly recommended!!!'], 'author': u'jenvlo123 ', 'date': [u'2016-05-29'], 'location': u'Fort Worth, TX', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'best Lancome moisturizer in my opinion', 'text': [u'I have combination skin and sometimes a little more on the dry side. I decided to give this a go and i fell in love with it. Ive tried countless moisturizers and this one has been my favorite, not too heavy and the scent isn\'t too strong like some of Lancomes other moisturizers. It is not too oily and my makeup sits perfectly on top of it. I can also tell a difference in my skin, it has been dull lately so thats why i decided to try this. Ive been using it for a month, the improvement isn\'t drastic but it is significant, my skin is a little more glowy and less ruddy or red. The only thing i don\'t like about it is the price because it may only last about 3 months and that it comes in a jar and not a pump. I will most likely buy it again though'], 'author': u'MorgMcG ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': u'Virginia Beach, VA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: TRUE OASIS™ Oil-Free Replenishing Gel Cream
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'I was super excited about this purchase since I love the bare minerals line, but I was left unsatisfied and disappointed. I used morning and night for about 4 months and I never felt like the product fully absorbed into my skin, leaving it with a funky layer of stickiness on top. I also didn\'t like how it did under my bare minerals powder as I felt like it made my lines and pores more prominent. I wouldn\'t recommend this product.'], 'author': u'HaloNreverse ', 'date': [u'2016-08-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'I can tell a difference', 'text': [u'I am to the bottom of my first jar of this true oasis moisturizer! I have had it for about 4 months now. So it\'s about a six month supply. In the morning I apply this under my make up and after a couple weeks I felt my skin didn\'t get anywhere near as oily as usual and my skin tone also has evened out and looks more refreshed and replenished! This product is no gimmick! I\'d almost consider it life changing! {'title': u'Not bad, not amazing, just good.', 'text': [u'I have combination skin that gets very, very oily in my t-zone. I bought this because someone who had combo skin highly recommended it. name: Perfect Cleansing Oil
reviews: {'title': u'great product', 'text': [u'This takes all my makeup off and leaves my skin feeling like silk!! Ive been using it for a while now( 2months) and i havent had any problem. I thought this was expensive but it lasts so long. To be honest ive always had problems using oil to remove my makeup. This is the first time an oil product dont break me out. So glad I spent my money on it but not a bunch of cheap useless products.'], 'author': u'VincyNgNg ', 'date': [u'2016-11-04'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Removes Make Up like a Dream', 'text': [u'Please don\'t be turned off to this awesome product because of some of the reviews citing mineral oil! If you don\'t know much about mineral oil, I urge you to look into and read about it before forming opinions. The mineral oil you find in skincare products is perfectly safe, and very good for your skin, especially if it\u2019s dry. It doesn\'t clog pores and removes every bit of my make up so quickly. This does have fragrance which I find light and pleasant so if that doesn\'t bother you this is worth a try.'], 'author': u'yumikonee ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love this cleansing oil', 'text': [u'I love the fact that this cleanses my face fully, without any dryness, and leaves my sling soft.'], 'author': u'LAliving ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': u'Calabasas, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'Mineral oil - ew', 'text': [u'I purchased to add to my double cleansing routine and noticed I was breaking out, a lot! I loved how it removed all of my makeup but it\'s not worth the acne. I quickly checked the ingredients and the first one is mineral oil - yuck! Much better cleansing oils out there that provide a better oil for your skin.'], 'author': u'picklesj ', 'date': [u'2016-09-28'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love this!', 'text': [u'I\'ve tried a lot of cleansing oils but this is definitely the best one I\'ve tried so far! It really does thoroughly remove make up and it leaves my skin feeling so moisturized after I\'ve washed it off which is surprising. I was recommended this while I was shopping inside the Duty Free of an airport!'], 'author': u'itssarakang ', 'date': [u'2016-09-10'], 'location': u'Jonesboro, AR', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: Xtend Your Youth Face Cream
reviews: {'title': u'Staple Lotion', 'text': [u'I never make product reviews, however recently I have been considering changing my moisturizer... but then I started thinking about this product. I have absolutely no complaints about this product. I live at the beach in the summer and my skin is constantly in the sun, sand, and salt. Typically, by the middle of the summer my skin is so dry it could crack. Not this summer. This lotion left my skin moisturized all day, yet not greasy. It absorbs so quickly and looks great under makeup. It does its job and I only use 1 pump at a time. Also, this is the first skin care product I have entirely used up.'], 'author': u'SICbound ', 'date': [u'2016-09-07'], 'location': u'Philadelphia, PA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'repairs skin!', 'text': [u'Out of all my makeup and skincare products this by far is my favorite. It smooths,tightens, brightens, and moisturizes my skin. It makes me look ten times younger. It obviously can\'t make you younger but it sure tightens my skin and really makes me look younger. I\'m very impressed with this product and very happy it is worth the price in my opinion!'], 'author': u'solana711 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-28'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love it!', 'text': [u'I really like this face cream. I use it in following Pores No More cleanser. My skin feels hudrated but not oily and my breakouts have decreased a lo. I wish it was a lower price. I use 1 1/2 pumps and it still seems to disappear too quick.'], 'author': u'Gnargar ', 'date': [u'2016-04-11'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'this stuff works', 'text': [u'I have been using this for almost 3 years. I work inside and outside in harsh elements. This face cram has never failed. My face looks so healthy and I never break out. I can honesty say this one is the right one for me.'], 'author': u'jjmiggy ', 'date': [u'2016-02-28'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'So So', 'text': [u'I have really dry skin so I have to use a lot (4 pumps)and doesn\'t leave my skin feeling moisturized. It almost feels like I just used a really thick primer. Only redemption is it looks really nice under foundation'], 'author': u'hellolola ', 'date': [u'2016-02-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

name: Plantscription™ Youth-Renewing Face Oil
reviews: {'title': u'Fantastic eye treatment', 'text': [u'I was looking for a new eye cream (currently use Benefit eye bright), and got a sample of this stuff (little pod). I have combination sensitive skin that is prone to breakouts with anything oily. I gave this a shot as a substitute eye treatment (after a few glasses of wine, I was throwing caution into the wind). And who knew, it was amazing! The next morning my fine lines had started smoothing and my under eyes were bright and youthful! I\'m in my early 30\'s so I\'m frequently fighting those new little lines.That single pod has lasted me nearly a month now, using it every day. I use 1 drop under each eye at night and I don\'t think I\'ll be going back to my previous eye creams.I don\'t think I\'ll use this on my entire face since the level of hydration it provides is a bit much for my habitually oily areas.', u'Happy hydrating!'], 'author': u'renems ', 'date': [u'2016-04-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'compliments on the 1st day!', 'text': [u'Ok, yes it CAN be oily, so I use only a drop or two. It absorbs nicely, feels good, and must make some difference- the morning after I tried it, four people complimented my skin, and nothing else had changed. Worth it!'], 'author': u'barady1201 ', 'date': [u'2015-11-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'For Normal/Dry Skin', 'text': [u'I have combination skin and this face oil was a little too oily on my face. It didn\'t make me break out or anything but I also didn\'t see any results after two weeks. It was very hydrating but left my face oily, and woke up with an oily face if I used it as a night cream...I guess that\'s how you achieve a glowy face? Oil. It makes light bounce off the face?'], 'author': u'taro876 ', 'date': [u'2015-07-19'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Works as advertised!', 'text': [u'I truly love how it makes my face feel. It is moisturizing without being greasy. All the reviews about the easy-to-spill bottle almost made me not buy this, but I haven\'t had any issues. I\'ve used it daily for a few weeks now, and you can\'t even tell...the bottle is still full. The skin care specialist at Sephora told me - 2 drops in hand - rub hands together - gently press on face. That\'s it.'], 'author': u'WorkingSFMama ', 'date': [u'2015-07-12'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Absorbs quickly, Non-greasy moisture', 'text': [u'I started using this by mixing 2-4 drops of it with the Origins Genzing moisturizer. I\'ve been using this combination with the Checks and Balances cleanser (I remove this cleanser with water and a square cotton pad in order to get it all off) and the new Original Skin mask and my skin looks great, better than it has in years.', u'This product absorbs quickly when I add it to my moisturizer.', u'I also apply 1 drop under my eyes and on my eyelids at night. I would read the directions to see if that is recommended or not, but it\'s adding moisture to my very dry under eye area.', u'Overall this product is gently moisturizing my sensitive skin. I would repurchase.'], 'author': u'Schnickerfritz ', 'date': [u'2015-07-05'], 'location': u'Lake Forest, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Satin Perfection BB Cream Sunscreen
reviews: {'title': u'me and my mom both love it', 'text': [u'We both love this silicone free BB cream. It\'s very light, even out the skin tone, gives skin a very nice nature glow. It might be not enough coverage for some people, but it\'s perfect for us.'], 'author': u'babynicholas ', 'date': [u'2016-11-04'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Not what I wanted', 'text': [u'I was in need of a day time face moisturizer with an SPF. This product caught my eye because it was a seemed to have the benefits I was looking for with the added bonus of being a cc cream. Unfortunately it was a miss for me. 1: It only came in a light to medium shade and I\'m medium to tan. Which wouldn\'t be that much of an issue once I applied foundation over it, but there was no way I could wear it alone. 2: The texture of the product was rough on my skin. It felt very drying and did not have a smooth application. Which could be from the active ingredients but I\'m not sure.'], 'author': u'Vallenc0urt ', 'date': [u'2016-05-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Silicone free!', 'text': [u'Finally, a quality BB cream that does not contain Dimethicone or any other silicone ingredient. This wears beautifully, stays matte and doesn\'t break me out. SPF too!'], 'author': u'wittgirl ', 'date': [u'2016-05-09'], 'location': u'Great Falls, MT', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Not Maximum Coverage', 'text': [u'I really liked the feel of this product on my skin as it was silky smooth, but it did not cover as well as I was hoping for. It was much more sheer than I like.'], 'author': u'travelingpath ', 'date': [u'2016-01-12'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Need More Shades', 'text': [u'I love this product, however, it doesn\u2019t match my fair/pink skin tone. That aside, the consistency is great \u2013 very easy to blend and lasts all day. You can easily build this up for whatever coverage you desire. I just wish they made this in more shades!'], 'author': u'MissElizabeth10 ', 'date': [u'2016-01-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Purity + Take a Deep Breath Oxygenating Gel Cream Duo
reviews: {'title': u'favorite facial cleanser', 'text': [u'This is my favorite cleanser of all time. Light smell, takes just a small amount to be effective.'], 'author': u'freezetime75 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'yay purity!', 'text': [u'I love using Purity cleanser on both my face and on my brushes. It\'s not overly expensive and a little goes a long way (especially as a brush cleanser!) Before this, I had been using a sample size bottle of the cleanser for months; I was really surprised how long such a small amount lasted...', u'in the other hand, I don\'t like this moisturizer. at all. I don\'t even care that it was basically free, (since the cleanser is always that price for this size) I just really don\'t like it. For being a gel, it\'s awfully heavy and leaves my skin really greasy, like it won\'t sink in... but the worst part is the smell. Ugh. I don\'t know what it\'s fragranced with, but girrll, it\'s strong. nose crinkling strong, and even once I was done, I could still smell my own face for hours!', u'A on the face wash (I think it just smells fresh, not chemically or otherwise bad) and D- on the moisturizer for getting wrong everything the cleanser got right!'], 'author': u'jonirae319 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-30'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'over drying', 'text': [u'I have EXTREMELY oily skin & within one week of daily use my face was over dried & breaking out all over my face. I had to return this product.'], 'author': u'KDB8806 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

My large pimple flare ups have gone down but I have noticed that I have gotten a larger amount of small zits and whiteheads.'], 'author': u'koak91 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': u'ND', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: Hydrating Essence Toner
reviews: {'title': u'Surprising find!', 'text': [u'I saw a good review for this and thought why not just pick one up its a great price and my skin is loving it! So many great ingredients and a fraction of the cost compared to other brands "essences". Well worth the try!'], 'author': u'adamchayce ', 'date': [u'2016-10-11'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Good for combination skin', 'text': [u'I recently repurchased this toner. I think that the price is reasonable. It lasts me about 3 months of daily use. I transfer some of the toner into a never used travel perfume spray bottle. I mist my face with it every time after I wash my skin.', u'Most toners have too much fragrance or harmful ingredients and this one has very little of those things. Many are concerned about the witch hazel water, but it doesn\'t dry out my skin. The fragrance is very light and natural smelling.', u'I have combination skin that leans towards oily. I like this toner because of the way it leaves my skin feeling refreshed, soothed and not tight. It has green tea extract and other antioxidants as well as peptides and soothing plant extracts that are good for the skin.'], 'author': u'hanami ', 'date': [u'2016-10-05'], 'location': u'New York', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love', 'text': [u'A great toner that refreshes and keeps my skin clear. Perfect for sensitive/combo skin!'], 'author': u'sarahsk ', 'date': [u'2016-09-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love this toner', 'text': [u'Does a great job. Cleans off extra dirt after cleansing, a very light scent, does not leave a film.'], 'author': u'jessjessjess ', 'date': [u'2016-07-15'], 'location': u'San Francisco', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'love!!!', 'text': [u'This is the best toner I\'ve ever used. It balances and moisturizers my very dry skin. I tend to be start the day very dry then go very oily. This does not go oily. I even skipped a day of washing my face (unexpected hospital visit) and on the third day my skin was still quite fresh feeling. I have not adjusted my moisturizer so it had to be this toner. I can\'t wait to try their moisturizer!'], 'author': u'Bellbaby ', 'date': [u'2016-07-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Turnaround Daytime Revitalizing Moisturizer
reviews: {'title': u'OK product', 'text': [u'I actually bought this thinking it was something else. Didnt realize it has a tint to it which I was excited to find out but then later wasnt really impressed with it. I love Cliniques Turnaround night creme and scrub and though to add to the collection. I wish this was just a basic everyday moisturizer that helped turnaround skin cells.'], 'author': u'PrettyLady99 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

Also the smell is pleasant and clean.'], 'author': u'SarahF0886 ', 'date': [u'2016-06-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'amazing', 'text': [u'I got a mini sample size with my 100 points in the winter I believe & it was amazing, a little goes a long way, very moisturizing, it made my face feel soft & in the winter I get dry patches on my whole cheek after putting this cream on in the morning just before my makeup it was gone in two days love love love this I just wish it was less expensive'], 'author': u'lalalalaaa ', 'date': [u'2016-05-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

A product with an excellent reputation for years.'], 'author': u'Pigeonlady ', 'date': [u'2016-05-10'], 'location': u'Florida', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

I wasn\'t a huge fan of the scent though but I found that it helped a little bit with redness and irritation.'], 'author': u'meikuei ', 'date': [u'2016-11-09'], 'location': u'Calgary,AB', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I use this throughout the day to refresh my skin. It feels amazing and I love that it does not ruin your makeup. After a little while it does have a bit of a smell to it but it is fleeting and the benefits from this mist outweigh the slight smell. I will definately be repurchasing this again.'], 'author': u'daniaura ', 'date': [u'2016-10-30'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great as a facial refresher', 'text': [u'I bought this to use on my client for her wedding as a facial refresher before moisturizer and after toner. I loved the results so much that now I will start keeping this in my kit to use on all my clients. I also have used it to set my face after my makeup is done. I usually use the rosewater/glycerin which I will continue to use but this is a nice addition for prepping the skin.'], 'author': u'vhill ', 'date': [u'2016-10-28'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Gentle and refreshing', 'text': [u'I\'ve been using this for several years. I mainly use it as a toner after cleansing with the Caudalie cleansing milk. It\'s a refreshing way to wake up in the morning! My skin is dry and sensitive, and this works great. I don\'t use it as a moisturizer.'], 'author': u'DrDisneyFan ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': u'Sugar Land, TX', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Refreshing', 'text': [u'I have used all kind of moisturizers for my dry skin. I ended up with acne or blackheads. I used this for one week and not only did it moisturize but my blemishes cleared up. I used a spritz in the morning and a spritz at night going to bed. I will definitely keep using this product.'], 'author': u'Maryj13 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Smart Night Custom-Repair Moisturizer -Combination Oily to Oily
reviews: {'title': u'awesome!', 'text': [u'Very moisturizing ! So pleased with this product. I\'ve been using this every night for a week and wake up every morning with smooth, moisturized skin. It absorbs very well and feels silky smooth. No noticeable scent..'], 'author': u'apcab ', 'date': [u'2016-10-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great concept,', 'text': [u'I really wanted to like this. It\'s a great idea but so far has not delivered for me. I\'ve been using it about a week now and so far it\'s fine but not anything special. I bought the kind formulated for my oily skin and I still found it to be greasy and slow to absorb, although it did eventually do so. In the morning, my skin does seem moisturized but I\'m not seeing much of a difference in terms of tone, texture or lines. In fact I\'ve noticed some new tiny blemishes in places I don\'t usually have them, which could be from something else, but this is the only new product I\'m trying right now. I do use the 3-step system regularly (skin type 3, combination oily). I can\'t decide if I want to finish the jar and see if it gets better or send it back. Either way, I don\'t think I\'ll be purchasing this again. I really like the repair wear laser focus and turnaround overnight radiant lines and was hoping this would replace both, but not so much for me.'], 'author': u'sabriel77 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-11'], 'location': u'Eastern North Carolina', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'my go-to summer night moisturizer', 'text': [u'I had this sitting around and I finally started to use it. In the summer I have normal skin with an oily t-zone. I find myself worrying about texture more during this time of year. After the first few days of use as the last part of my nightly skincare routine, I found my skin to be even toned, rid of texture, and more radiant. I\'ve been using it ever since and could not be happier with the appearance of my skin when I wake up!!!! I love the feel of this night cream and amazed at all the work it does when I am sound asleep. :)'], 'author': u'mwoohoohh ', 'date': [u'2016-06-25'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great For Combo Skin!', 'text': [u'Love this Cream! I use it day and night as I don\'t react well to creams that have sunscreen in them. I use a separate sunscreen. This is great as a moisturizer under a CC cream or foundation!! It is great as a night cream, does not break me out, and is a great skin brightener and wrinkle reducer. I have combination skin that still breaks out in my 40\'s. I love this cream!'], 'author': u'luckycat45 ', 'date': [u'2016-04-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I bought this because it says it\'s specifically for oily skin. I\'ve been using it for about 2 weeks and I wake up with a very oily face??? reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'this is a great moisturizer, and it smells great for being a self tanner, but it isn\'t a very effective self tanner at all, at least for me. i see no color from this at all! literally none after using for almost a month. maybe it is better for girls with fairer skin? i had high hopes, but unfortunately had to return :('], 'author': u'katedici ', 'date': [u'2016-10-26'], 'location': u'Red Bank, NJ', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'How can anyone like this', 'text': [u'I have good but fair skin. I don\'t like to go in the sun without a great sun block but I wanted a bit of a tan. Because it was so well reviewed I purchased it. I am careful but it was messy to put on, streaked horribly and thank god its off now. I\'d rather go to a tanning salon (not the bad kind) which gives u a gprgepis even tan and lasts for days. {'title': u'like it!', 'text': [u'It makes my skin slightly too oily at the end of the day, but other than that delivers perfect color for my light- medium skin tone. My skin is fairly sensitive.. {'title': u'Love for the acne/dermatitis prone', 'text': [u'I don\'t write reviews often but I must say this product is so great. Very easy to use, amazing under makeup, not greasy or oily. Provides a beautiful olive tone subtle tan. When I had extreme acne it made me feel comfortable enough to go outside without makeup, somehow it makes the redness less visible. try it out !'], 'author': u'Lyndsayk ', 'date': [u'2016-07-01'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Worth A Try', 'text': [u'After using this for 6+ months while living in Miami, I\'ve concluded that this is my go-to moisturizer. Having really tanned skin already, this not only noticeably softens my skin and even out my skin tone, buy does create the glow with a pleasant ratio of ingredients. I have sensitive skin, and this moisturizer even seems to heal any break-outs (which have become sparse since using this product). I highly recommend to try this if looking for a facial tanner. It is best to use at night, but can definitely be worn during the day. If I apply it at night, I wake up with even toned, glowy (not shiny) skin. During the day, it can be a bit shiny on my oily skin, and do not recommend to wear under make-up due to the time-release dha. Wear it alone for optimal results.'], 'author': u'SKYOUNG ', 'date': [u'2016-06-11'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Bust Beauty Firming Lotion
reviews: {'title': u'good quality', 'text': [u'I bought this product to use only for my neck. I don\'t currently need firming but use it as my skin is very sensitive there and occasionally breaks out. It goes on smooth and keeps me moisturized. My neck feels smoother as a result of use. I will look into other creams or oils before I buy again. I\'m not expecting any cream to actually do a significant or noticeable amount of lifting but I am interested in SPF and anti aging properties.'], 'author': u'juleswkc ', 'date': [u'2014-12-31'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'Great moisturizer!', 'text': [u'I really like this moisturizer! First of all the scent is so lovely, it\'s floral but not overpowering. name: Hydra Sebum Control Essence
reviews: {'title': u'heaven sent!', 'text': [u'I absolutely 100% love this stuff. I have dry, oily, crazy skin that seems to change daily. I\'ve lived in NYC, Seattle, San Diego, and now super hot, humid, AL. I used it in S. Korea, Japan and S. America and it works the same in all climates/conditions for me. I put this first after I wash my face in the morning and it keeps my face balanced and evenly hydrated without any greasy residue. I still apply sunscreen/lotion and then makeup too. Even in 95+ heat and lots of humidity it keeps my face balanced and fairly matte all day. I do get some oilyness by the end of the day, but that\'s just how it goes as your body produces oil during the day-just use blotting paper to remove it.'], 'author': u'julesb8 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': u'NY, AL, CA, WA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"doesn't do what it advertises", 'text': [u'This product did not seem to help prevent oil or shine for me. I did however start using this product in the beginning of summer and it\'s been especially hot and humid in nyc this year so maybe it\'s been somewhat effective but I just haven\'t noticed. I gave it more than 1 star because it is moisturizing so I can apply this underneath my BB cream on low maintenance days and skip a moisturizer altogether. I would say if you\'re looking for a product to help control oil, skip this one.'], 'author': u'lc910 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-11'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Not Worth it', 'text': [u'I have combination skin more oily and this did absolutely nothing to reduce my oil production. After using it for a month I got small under the skin breakouts and I was just as oily before I began using it. I didn\'t even keep me oil free for more than an hour.'], 'author': u'GabbyVanity ', 'date': [u'2016-09-11'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'flabbergasted', 'text': [u'I bought this on a whim not really expecting much. I\'ve always had oily skin, like gulf oil spill kind of oily skin. my makeup usually melts off by midmorning. I\'ve been using this for about 2 weeks. about a week ago I added the belif crystal foam cleanser. I don\'t know if it\'s one of the 2 or the combo of both, but my skin is now "normal," for the first time in 30 years. my makeup lasts all day, my face isn\'t gross and greasy. I\'m completely in awe and in love with this brand!'], 'author': u'geekang ', 'date': [u'2016-07-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Multi-Active Day Cream-Gel - Normal to Combination Skin
reviews: {'title': u'Amazing!', 'text': [u'I was SUPER skeptical trying this new formula out. I had just started using the original Multi-Active Jour (day) cream when the discontinued it and released the two new versions. I had loved the old one and was so gutted that something good had to, of course, be replaced. But honestly, I like this version even better! ', u'I have very oily, sensitive and prone to break out skin so it\'s difficult for me to find anything that works properly. I can\'t seem to use their other products because they have silicon in them and I\'m allergy to silicon.'], 'author': u'Sophia5Stars ', 'date': [u'2016-07-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great Moisturizer', 'text': [u'I am always on the hunt for a good moisturizer. I have rosacea and use retin-A every other day. My skin is on the drier side and is often flakey if I don\'t have a good moisturizer. I found a great one, but it was discontinued, so my search has been on again. I\'ve tried SO MANY, that I\'ve gotten discouraged. I went to Sephora and returned the last one I bought and this was recommended by the sales associate. I\'ve been steered in the wrong direction before, but this time, I think she was right. Two days of using this, and so far so good. Normally I can tell in a couple hours if something isn\'t going to work for me, and this one is working!'], 'author': u'bmischiefj ', 'date': [u'2016-06-29'], 'location': u'San Rafael, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'So moisturizing without being greasy', 'text': [u'I love this stuff. It absorbs quickly but I don\'t feel dry or oily/greasy after applying. I don\'t feel the need to apply a primer before my foundation with this, unless I\'m doing a huge makeup to do (like for Halloween). I\'m hoping I won\'t change my mind in upcoming dry winter months, but I\'ve been using the product since spring (it\'s now Nov. 5) and I have nothing but positive things to say about this product. It\'s pricey, but I don\'t find I need to use a ton of it. I think it\'s worth it.'], 'author': u'LoloRVA ', 'date': [u'2015-11-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Didnt like it', 'text': [u'So the first couple weeks I used this, my face broke out completely and i stopped using this for next 3 months. Later I re-started to use this and... I still dont like it. I am still using this currently its almost finished (maybe 2-3 more uses left) and I\'m excited to replace this! I just hate everything about this moisturizer!! Though it says oil free, I find it extremely greasy and sticky and it smells BAD. I hate how there is SPF in the moisturizer, usually i get breakouts when spf is mixed in and that makes it smell just so bad. And i dont find this moisturizing at all -- it just sits on my face, making it shiny and sticky. Its horrible. I dont understand how people like this..'], 'author': u'jeezradz ', 'date': [u'2015-07-05'], 'location': u'Calgary, AB', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Daily Deflector™ Waterlight Broad Spectrum SPF 50+ PA+++ Anti-Aging Sunscreen
reviews: {'title': u'Really want to love this badly! but....', 'text': [u'This sunscreen is almost going to be my fav one, its very light weight, its not that greasy but you definitely will feel you have something om your face but that didnt bother me compare to other sunscreen its less greasy feeling. It does leave white cast on your face, and the worse part it broke me out so bad! Sigh. I will be returning this as soon as I get back home. Im still on the search of a sunscreen that will work for me. I have a very oily acne prone skin, if u guys know anything that works please let me know! Ty!'], 'author': u'Howzit ', 'date': [u'2016-11-01'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'This is a good primer. I think the people that are having issues with their face turning white are using too much product. It come in a tiny bottle and the solution is extremely liquid, so you\'re only suppose to use a few dots. I have combination skin and it does not feel oily even with a moisturizer and living in south florida which is great. I use it as a primer and it does a pretty good job at that. It also passes the photo flash test. It\'s pretty good and would probably buy again.'], 'author': u'Berlice ', 'date': [u'2016-09-10'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'White, or is it you?', 'text': [u'I received this in a sample size at my local sephora and a woman who was representing Kate Somerville did a full facial on me with the line. She explained to me how this works, and why so many people are seeing their face turn white after they use it. She suggested warming up the product in your hand and pressing it into the skin, rather than rubbing it in. I have used it in this way and I must say, it really does reduce the whiteness of the sunscreen. That being said, you have to pat it into the skin, and that takes a little bit of extra time. You don\'t want to put too much of this, though, because no matter how much you pat it in after that, you\'ll look white. I wouldn\'t say this is a bad product, it is just made for certain skin types. If you like a different spf product, use that instead.'], 'author': u'barkingbeauty ', 'date': [u'2016-08-14'], 'location': u'Lake Forest, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Decent', 'text': [u'I received this as a sample (0.5 oz) and it lasted me at least a month and I used it during the day. First off I have sensitive and very dry skin. This product was pleasant and light enough for me and yes it absorbed quickly which also meant that my skin felt dry about 30 mins after I applied it so I ended up either having to reapply it again within the hour or just going back my regular moisturizer. I liked it because it was free and came with purchase, but other than that I did not see any changes to my skin and most likely will not be purchasing the full size of this product.'], 'author': u'shuumerauser ', 'date': [u'2015-01-08'], 'location': u'Roseville,CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Flawless Skin Repair Crème
reviews: {'title': u'Smooth, plump skin.', 'text': [u'I have been using this moisturizer off and on now for 3 years. I was actually in fact 23 when I first tried this. I had used Laura\'s Mega Moisture and the hydrating mist and loved them. I have ver dry, eczema prone skin, and prevention was key. I have only gone through about 3 jars. Since I work in cosmetics I tend to try new things or just kinda alternate, hah. Every time I go back and try this I am surprised again at why I stopped. -1 star for jar packaging though. I use a spatula but generally prefer a pump.'], 'author': u'freshflesh ', 'date': [u'2015-03-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Did not work for me', 'text': [u'I got this mouistorizer on a kit and I hate it. I have combo skin mostly oily I get dry around the mouth (below cheeks) so I was hoping this would help me hydrate as is freezing where I live right now. This moisturizer is horrible on my skin it\'s super heavy, greasy OMGGG I look like Ive been outside on a summer day literally. My skin does not abosrb it so my skin looks oily oily oily. Wouldn\'t recommend for oily skin.'], 'author': u'Lupita1290 ', 'date': [u'2015-02-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love it.', 'text': [u'I am now 40, although at the tender age of 27 my skin took a (hormonally caused?) turn for the worse. Up until 27, my skin was flawless, low maintenance, and pimple free. Never used moisturizer, never used foundation, only washed my face when I showered daily. Not the case anymore. I have an extreme t-zone sitch going on: supremely oily on the forehead and chin and supremely dry everywhere else. That said, I tried this and surprisingly it works phenomenally well for my entire face. Even my chin. In fact, the milia on my chin have disappeared (except of one). Looks like my chin needed just a bit more moisturizing. I have tried soooo many other products, but for some reason nothing else worked. I don\'t need much either.'], 'author': u'erinkc ', 'date': [u'2014-12-12'], 'location': u'Fort Collins, CO', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'heavy, clogs pores', 'text': [u'I\'m early 40\'s, with aging, but combo skin and large pores in T zone. I had great hopes for this cream based on all the reviews, but I found it very heavy and thick, and hard to spread over my skin without serious rubbing. It made my pores more noticeable, clogged and dirty looking and after a week\'s use gave me white heads. The large jar without any kind of spatula is unpleasant to use. Perhaps better suited for dry, more fragile skin.'], 'author': u'paleperson ', 'date': [u'2014-02-21'], 'location': u'boston, ma', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I have dry skin and usually extremely dry in the winter. I LOVE this product. It keeps my face hydrated and absorbs quickly. It\'s moisturizing and light weight. Makes my skin soft... They used to have the day cream for this with SPF 15, I\'m not sure why they took it away.. I hope it comes back. There\'s something in this cream that just makes my skin glow. However I wish the price was more reasonable... I\'m constantly trying new face creams to replace this one because I don\'t think I can keep affording this face cream. :('], 'author': u'calichick27 ', 'date': [u'2013-11-16'], 'location': u'Los Angeles', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Hydrating Gel Cream
reviews: {'title': u'For oily to normal and non acne prone skin types', 'text': [u'My skin is normal to dry but I still get product related breakouts so I tend to stay away from heavier moisturizers. Not only was this not moisturizing enough, it left my cheeks feeling sort of rough and uneven, and I experienced two whiteheads on my chin within a week.There must be an ingredient or two in this my skin doesn\'t like. I exfoliate regularly so the roughness has to be due to a mild reaction, and then I don\'t get whiteheads anymore except from skin clogging products. Too bad because I love a lot of Bobbi\'s other skin care products'], 'author': u'kalex ', 'date': [u'2016-05-18'], 'location': u'Bellevue, NE', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Staple moisturizer', 'text': [u'This moisturizer absorbs quickly and does not leave my face feeling greasy or shiney. This "gel" moisturizer feels slightly cool when applying. Very light on the skin, but delivers the right amount of moisture. I use the vitamin based cream during the day and apply this gel cream at night. There is a light scent,but not perfumy. This is my 3rd jar.'], 'author': u'mesolovely ', 'date': [u'2015-07-05'], 'location': u'Miami, FL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'great lightweight for sensitive skin', 'text': [u'I love this, but I like the cream even better. The gel is perfect for the summer months.'], 'author': u'kmtatro ', 'date': [u'2014-12-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'I am shocked at all the reviews!!', 'text': [u'I am so surprised at all the reviews that rave about this gel cream. I am sitting here at day 7 of my reaction to this product and my face looks horrendous. I am not normally the type of person who gets reactions to products and if by some chance there were an adverse affect from using something new, it would be something like a few pimples here or there. I normally have completely clear and smooth skin. This cream made my entire face breakout in tiny whiteheads from my forehead, cheeks, jawline, and down the sides of my neck. I used this for 3 days in a row only in the mornings (it was the only new product in my routine.) and by the third day I could see redness showing up on my neck. Bottom line, this product was not great for me. It smells so strong (first time I\'ve ever complained about a products smell being too strong) it almost felt as if I was rubbing hand soap into my face. The smell reminded me of bar soap, I\'m just mad that I tossed my receipt. It was already in the trash by the morning of day 4 when my face looked like I was an alien. I wouldn\'t give it to anyone I know. I wish I could have gotten a sample before I wasted my money on this product. Grrr!!'], 'author': u'kpark1 ', 'date': [u'2014-05-31'], 'location': u'Denver, CO', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'feels like cool ice on skin :-)', 'text': [u'I am very impressed. Bobbi, you had me at hello with this gel.'], 'author': u'Rereboo ', 'date': [u'2014-01-10'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Plantscription™ Powerful Lifting Cream
reviews: {'title': u'Moisturizing', 'text': [u'I switched to this cream from the one with with SPF (plantscription line) and found this cream to be more moisturizing. I had a hard time with my primer after waiting 10 min or more after applying this moisturizer, as the primer would just ball up and roll off my skin. I have normal to combination skin. This cream would be great for winter, when my skin is drier. You need to use very little for good moisturization but it doesn\'t feel heavy even when you put on a lot. Overall I still really like this cream. I use it as preventative for aging, so I can\'t say much about it\'s effectiveness in this aspect'], 'author': u'CCT1 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-30'], 'location': u'Ottawa', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Great for Pores - Not for Foundation', 'text': [u'So I initially loved this moisturizer. It\'s especially good after cleansing or after you take off a mask. However, my makeup did not sit well on top of this moisturizer. I personally think that this moisturizer combined with a primer and foundation was just too much product for my skin and made my foundation seperate around my nose and get patchy in some areas. It\'s truly great for pores and makes your skin very soft. I love it for my night time routine but not before applying makeup. I would say just stick to a pore minimizing primer. name: Lotus Face Treatment Oil
reviews: {'title': u'Great Winter Nighttime Treatment', 'text': [u'I heard about this somewhere that this would be good for oily skin and acne prone skin. I bought on a whim, with very little expectations. And I ended up loving it! The formula can be very heavy. I recommend this at night, not for the day. It is good for dry, winter air. I have oily skin, like really oily, and this helps tame a lot of this without making me breakout. I get this healthy glow and I really love it. I don\'t use it every night, maybe 2-3 times a week and it really helps my skin. This is great for an addition to a regular skin routine as an added bonus in place of moisturizer before bed. But if you live in a humid place, be careful. It might get too oily for you, despite being made specifically for oily skin. ', u'But I always recommend it to all my friends. I am on my second bottle and will buy again and again.'], 'author': u'marimk ', 'date': [u'2016-11-06'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Hope but no', 'text': [u'I heard a lot of good reviews on how it treats acne. I felt lucky I only got a sample and did not buy it. It did not do anything with my acne accept leaving my face oily. Ugh.'], 'author': u'sumy ', 'date': [u'2016-10-27'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'GAME CHANGER!', 'text': [u'I have oily skin and I kept reading about face oils being super amazing for trying to tame the oil production. I spoke with my local Sephora skin care spealist about what I was looking to accomplish and he immediatly had me try the CLARINS Lotus Face oil. I actually didn\'t put it in my bag right Way because of the price!! But something told me to splurge and I DID! I will NEVER let myself run out of his life changing oil. I use it every day directly after i cleanse and dry my face completely. 3 drops, rub between my fingers and rub it all in!Y ITS LIKE I HAVE NEW SKIN!!!!!!'], 'author': u'ajBreneman5 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'oily skin', 'text': [u'I have an oily skin and I\'m over 45. I\'ve been using this during the day and feels my skin very hydrated. I think is wonderful for winter when my skin requires more protection.'], 'author': u'CrisGuedes ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Impressive', 'text': [u'I received this as a sample and had little to no expectations from this product. I have been pleasantly surprised.', u'I have rosacea, oily skin and large pores. I apply this in the evening after cleansing and allow it to absorb about 5 minutes then apply my night cream. Within 2 days I noticed a dramatic decrease in blackheads, whiteheads and pore size. Skin is clear and clean.', u'On my chest area I am extremely sensitive to creams, fabric softener, anything really. It is ALWAYS red, itchy and inflamed. Nothing to date has worked on this area like this product has. I apply it in the same way I do for my face, apply it after cleansing and apply my chest/neck cream afterwards. ', u'For those not seeing any changes, try pairing this up with the toner, moisturizer, or night treatment. Ever an exfoliant as well! I\'m sure you will see changes. name: Miracle Facial Oil
reviews: {'title': u'the ONLY oil', 'text': [u'This is the only oil I need! I wear under makeup, I wear it alone, I wear it at night, all the time! When I run out, my skin returns to patchy dry areas, oily t-zone, dark patches around mouth and dull dull dull. After about five to seven days of this stuff I get my even surface glow back! It goes on oily, let it sit a few mins before putting anything on top. I swear, I feel confident enough to do out in public without bb cream after I have treated my skin several days! I should say I ise Omorovicza\'s thermal cleansing balm and a washcloth every morning as well. And their foaming cleanser with a washcloth at night. This entire line is expensive but I save so much time with less makeup application and feel better with the face I present!'], 'author': u'TMBrownie ', 'date': [u'2016-08-01'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Amazing Product', 'text': [u'I would recommend this product to anyone and everyone. It gave me healthy, clear, glowing skin instantly. The best is the smell, very pampering.'], 'author': u'pokey71 ', 'date': [u'2016-04-17'], 'location': u'Chicago, IL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

ingredient: -Sweet Almond Oil: Softens and moisturizes the skin.

name: Vita-Mineral Daily Supplement Moisturising Cream
reviews: {'title': u'Absorbs quickly, but has a lasting effect', 'text': [u'I\'ve used Ren\'s Bio-retinoid oil serum before and adore it, but since it is summer time now, I thought I should give this one a try instead, and I love it. It comes out like a cream, and once you blend it out it does absorb quickly and has a slight cooling feeling like a gel. However, it doesn\'t dry out as fast as a gel-like moisturizer. Foundation goes well on top without any problem. ', u'I like the way I can still feel my skin being moisturized after a while. Some people don\'t like this feeling and I believe they refer to it as having a \'film\' of product on their face, but it definitely isn\'t as bad. If having vaseline on your face feels like a 10, this feels like a 2. It is definitely not sticky. Despite the summer weather, I don\'t get oily faster than usual.', u'The scent is quite noticeable once applied (smells herbal), but it does fade away fairly quickly. ', u'Quite frankly, some people complained that the pump gives out too much product at a time... but the pump is a very controlled one, and any one with functionary fingers can control the amount that comes out. In other words, you CAN control the pump and decide that only half a pump worth of product come out. I don\'t see what the fuss is about...'], 'author': u'tntt ', 'date': [u'2016-07-08'], 'location': u'Montreal, QC', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Unfortunately had to return...', 'text': [u'I really wanted to love this moisturizer. I liked the smell, texture and the fact that you don\'t have to put your fingers in a jar to get the product out, but I didn\'t like the fact that a lot of product dispensed with each pump. Nor did I like the fact that the moisturizer left a weird "film" on my face afterwards. It was like it didn\'t absorb properly or something? It\'s hard to explain but it didn\'t work well with my skin and facial skin chemistry. I\'m sure it\'s great for some people, just wasn\'t the daily moisturizer I was seeking, so I returned it!'], 'author': u'Alimill ', 'date': [u'2016-05-11'], 'location': u'San Diego, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'One of my first two-time buys', 'text': [u'Usually when a product is finished, I\'m looking forward to trying something new. But I immediately purchased this product again. I live in a hot, humid place and this cream is so lightweight and keeps my face moisturized without feeling sticky or shiny. I highly recommend it. (My skin is pretty normal and I only wash it with a gentle cleanser at night and with water in the morning.)'], 'author': u'brittanyjz ', 'date': [u'2016-04-12'], 'location': u'Hanoi, Vietnam', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Amazing', 'text': [u'A thick cream that soaks into your skin so nicely. This product keeps my skin so hydrated during the driest seasons. LOVE IT'], 'author': u'Natalieej11 ', 'date': [u'2016-04-11'], 'location': u'Los Angeles, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: Milk Oil Conditioning Cleanser
reviews: {'title': u'moisturizes eyelashes', 'text': [u'Like to apply to condition eye lashes and brows. It softens the skin after using a more harsh cleanser to remove tough makeup. After chemo my lashes were breaking and this has helped nourish them. Only takes 3-4 squirts on a pad to dab over face, let sit a minute then rinse off.'], 'author': u'lovecoconut ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': u'Sevierville, TN', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'Terrible makeup remover, but good for dry skin', 'text': [u'First, this is a horrendous makeup remover- so terrible that it shouldn\'t even be labeled as one. I don\'t wear much makeup at all, but I find that it still leaves some makeup on, ESPECIALLY my NONwaterproof mascara. Initially, I kept pumping out more product and washed my eye area about 4-5 times, but thats terrible for the delicate skin around your eyes. Finally, I\'ve resorted to washing my eye area with another product and then using this for the rest of my face. Honestly, I\'m not sure if I am going to keep this because it\'s expensive and you need like 7-10 pumps to get enough product to wash your face. I love that it doesn\'t leave my dry skin thirsting for my moisture afterwards- the only product I\'ve found that accomplishes this- but part of me wonders if it\'s really even cleansing my skin. I love other FAB products, but I will most likely never repurchase this again.'], 'author': u'Rose0326 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Amazing for those with dry, sensitive skin. Soothed my skin after wearing makeup all day while also removing a full face and moisturizing. Also didnt trigger my eczema.'], 'author': u'joanarose ', 'date': [u'2016-10-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Ultra Repair® Cream Minis Kit
reviews: {'title': u'great for eczema', 'text': [u'my husband and I both have dry skin and some eczema. I also wash my hands more often because I work in the medical field. This cream is perfect for keeping my hands soft and hydrated. The scent is nice- not overpowering. It\'s not too greasy. The sizes are also purse and travel friendly.'], 'author': u'LeafyBuns ', 'date': [u'2016-11-09'], 'location': u'Fort Worth TX', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

I bought it again for the same reason I bought it a few years back when I had skin irritation on my hands. It works well!'], 'author': u'PaLins ', 'date': [u'2016-11-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Into this kit!', 'text': [u'I have increidbly dry skin so I don\'t really shy away from anything with "cream" in the title. I have been wanting to use this, and thought these were the perfect size. The vanilla citron one is definitely a particular scent. I like it because it isn\'t sickly sweet and it does go away after a while but if you\'re someone who doesn\'t like fragrance.... this duo might not be for you. Great value for an excellent product!'], 'author': u'sarahshere ', 'date': [u'2016-10-25'], 'location': u'Seattle, WA', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'a holy grail and an absolute hate', 'text': [u'To keep this short and simple, the regular version is my holy grail and I am in absolute love with it and it makes me look and feel amazing! The \'skin protectant\' version made me look a little greasy which didn\'t bother me until I started breaking out like I never had before (and I mean 15-25 pimples covering my T-zone) so I suggest the regular type and maybe avoid the other version!'], 'author': u'mmua ', 'date': [u'2016-10-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Flawless Skin Mega Moisturizer SPF 15 - Normal/Dry Skin
reviews: {'title': u'Too heavy', 'text': [u'This might be good for some skins, but is way too heavy for mine...I use the rose oil only....'], 'author': u'Schipperke ', 'date': [u'2016-07-14'], 'location': u'Florida', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'Good for very dry skin', 'text': [u'I had been using the Sheseido Wrinkleresist 24 day cream for awhile and I wanted to switch it up so I tried this cream. I had been nervous purchasing it having read about "pilling" and not absorbing but I have not had that issue at all. It absorbs quickly lasts all day. My skin feels silkier than with the Sheseido. I have very dry, fair skin that is prone to flaking and also somewhat prone to breakouts, so basically my skin isn\'t very forgiving. This cream didn\'t break me out at all, and my skin has stayed feeling great even in the winter. For extra-dry days I also use a bit of the Josie Maran Infinity Oil and the two together are a miracle!', u'My only complaint is the low SPF. I am going to try the Origins/Weil day cream once I am finished with this due to the higher SPF, but if I find that lacking I will absolutely switch back to this. The jar is also somewhat poorly made, so the container that the cream sits in comes out of the glass container when you pull off the lid. NBD, but worth mentioning.'], 'author': u'LindsayJWK ', 'date': [u'2016-02-24'], 'location': u'Pittsburgh, PA', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'good but broke me out', 'text': [u'I want to like this cream so much, but unfortunately it broke me out and that does not happen to me often since i do not have acne prone skin. I know for a fact that it was this cream because i used it on and off to make sureit it causes me the problem and everytime I would start using it again , it clogged my pores and caused some red pimples ( sorry for tmi) :)Other than that, this cream is mousturizing, it looks great under makeup and it is not greasy. Everyone is different and with skin care products it is trial and error. So i hope it will work for you'], 'author': u'branzanna ', 'date': [u'2015-10-04'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'The Best of the Best', 'text': [u'This was the first time I ever put on this moisturizer.'], 'author': u'xxxdalexxx ', 'date': [u'2015-03-31'], 'location': u'Maryville,TN', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

name: Face Mist
reviews: {'title': u'Very Hydrating', 'text': [u'For a long time I only used face mists on long flights, mostly to help keep me feeling refreshed throughout the flight. I was recently in the market for something that offered a bit more benefits than just simply water and Bobbi\'s mist was the perfect fit for what I was looking for. It\'s not only hydrating, but sets makeup very well and can be used year around. The scent is also very natural with a mixture of chamomile and cucumber. Only thing I wish could be better is the nozzle, as each mist does not come out as refined and the coverage is too concentrated. I would actually use more at a time than preferred. Otherwise, an all around fantastic find.'], 'author': u'nyctrace ', 'date': [u'2016-09-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Perfect pick me up and setting spray', 'text': [u'I bought this while being rushed because I was getting on a plane the next day and i realized that i ran out of concealer and my setting spray. I went to my nearest Sephora and asked the woman to help me and she showed me this and i liked it and she said it was great if i was on a plane that it\'s very hydrating, so i bought it with one of their concealers. Next day i was at the airport and i had the bottle and i have to tell you this kept my face so refreshed. Now on the plane i had 1 hour left on my flight so i got out my makeup and primed with this and set it and it kept my makeup beautiful and i didn\'t look like a hot mess after a flight and a 3 hour car ride and greeting a group of people. I recommend this to everyone'], 'author': u'LeilyJ ', 'date': [u'2016-04-01'], 'location': u'Hillside, NJ', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'New fav', 'text': [u'The mist on this is perfect. I use this as a mist before I apply my makeup. And I love it.'], 'author': u'tbizzle82 ', 'date': [u'2015-08-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Tsubaki™ Glotion
reviews: {'title': u'Lightweight, pretty', 'text': [u'Unlike a lot of lotions, this is very lightweight (doesn\'t feel like an additional "layer") which for my oily skin, is a huge plus. It\'s softly tinted pink & leaves a pretty, overall glow to my skin (4y07) without looking artificial or chalky. A little goes a long ways!'], 'author': u'TamTam01 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great product', 'text': [u'I like this because I have tried many products that say they do the same- a nice soft glow on the skin. This gives you a finish that is not too shiny, but just dewy and fresh. I have combo skin and the part that are dry are very. It is lasting- also doesn\'t make my eye make up smear under my eyes.'], 'author': u'elaine12 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': u'CHICAGO', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'Not For Me', 'text': [u'I absolutely LOVE Boscia products. So I was really excited to try this. I think it\'s a great concept. I love the glow/shimmer it gives, looks flawless under foundation. The hydration is decent. My problem with this is that it made me break out, and for some reason, really emphasized some dry patches I can have towards the perimeter of my face. So I definitely recommend trying it, because I think it looks absolutely beautiful!! But I will have to return it.'], 'author': u'Winona11 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

name: Fresh Glow B.B. Cream Broad Spectrum 20
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'When I first initially used this product, I had to pump out the cream a couple times because at first, it came out the pump very liquidy, almost water-like, but after that it\'s wonderful! I love this B.B. Cream since it really suits my skin type (normal) although after 3 hours, I noticed it starts to "oil off"/separate on my skin if I don\'t set it - which is why I\'m giving it 4 stars instead of 5. I prefer to not set my B.B. creams with powders because it defeats the purpose of my "on the go" quick no-makeup make-up days (brows and b.b. cream). This product does delivery it\'s healthy-looking dewy glow promise but I would not recommend this to anyone who has oily skin. Also, I apply using a damp nude Beauty Blender and it gives me good results. I don\'t expect any coverage off of this but it did even out my skin tone.'], 'author': u'antoninalyssa ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': u'california', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'favorite BB', 'text': [u'This is by far my favorite BB cream. I have combo-to dry skin. This doesn\'t stick to the dry spots and doesn\'t make the t zone shiny. It is super easy to apply and great for a quick fix.'], 'author': u'hemp69 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'New favorite!', 'text': [u'Now that the YSL foundation formula has changed I was looking for something new for my go-to. This has a dewy, natural look. Where does my skin start and the makeup begin? good luck figuring it out! It is a BB Cream so don\'t expect a lot of coverage. I seal with the Laura Mercier transluscent setting powder and it lasts all day for a beautiful, effortless look.'], 'author': u'meglesleyx ', 'date': [u'2016-09-23'], 'location': u'Albuquerque, NM', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Hands down the best BB cream out there! It isn\'t thick like some. It allows your skin to breathe with still covering your problem areas. My skin is dry, 43yo, it leaves it fresh & dewy looking. A must have!'], 'author': u'K123072 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

Leaves an amazing dewy glow that I haven\'t found anywhere else-- Also makes a good starting base to layer under a foundation with more coverage.'], 'author': u'Jules01141991 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-12'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Self Tan Luxe Facial Oil
reviews: {'title': u'Great glow for fair skin', 'text': [u'I mix 4 drops with a heavy murad moisturizer EVERY morning. It gives me a nice glow throughout the day as I only wear BB cream and no foundation. It washes off every night with my salycylic face wash. I am very fair with naturally blonde hair, blue eyes and freckles--I\'m not sure someone with a dark complexion would see results but I love this product for me!!'], 'author': u'NYCitygirl519 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-05'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'this oil gave me a natural glow that seriously did last 5 days! Super impressed! and to make it even better it smells like fruit loops!'], 'author': u'ShellyPALM ', 'date': [u'2016-11-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Not a fan!!!!', 'text': [u'Okay, I never leave terrible reviews. However this product is truly terrible. I have been gradually adding this product to my nightly moisturizer and oh my goodness. This morning I woke up with an ORANGE FACE. That\'s right, not slight orange, I\'m talking bright carrot orange. I have been self tanning for years and I have to say don\'t waste your cash on this product. It isn\'t gentle on your skin, it\'s horribly drying and the color is just so unflattering on every skin tone (I mean unless you love orange skin, then his would be your new go to! Lol) better luck next time St. Tropez!'], 'author': u'hannahgriffith ', 'date': [u'2016-10-26'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I love the idea of this, a self-tanning face oil, but this isn\'t really an efficient face oil. Like other reviewers said, it\'s kind of watery, and the recommended 2-3 drops aren\'t sufficient to cover your whole face and neck. Also, it\'s not really moisturizing like a face oil should be. I have been using this religiously for about a week, and I haven\'t really seen a noticeable difference, so maybe this product is better suited for fairer skin. I had high hopes, but sad to say I\'ll be returning this :('], 'author': u'katedici ', 'date': [u'2016-10-10'], 'location': u'Red Bank, NJ', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}
