name: Deep Moisture Therapy
reviews: {'title': u'hard to get past the smell', 'text': [u'Have been using Deep Moisture Therapy for a week now. It feels light, yet is a decent moisturizer. Not the best by any means, but it\'s ok and doesn\'t dry out my skin. But I really have a hard time using this because of the smell. A few MUAers have said that it\'s Vitamin E smell, but I\'ve used Vitamin E before and it didn\'t smell like this. It\'s a rotten kind of smell that is overbearing and lasts a few hours. I\'ve been putting a light layer of a mildly scented moisturizer on top to cancel out the nauseating odor and that helps. This is my first Perricone product.'], 'author': u'dangercrow ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': u'Los Angeles, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'So Far So Good', 'text': [u'I was looking for a moisturizer that wouldn\'t make me oily. So far it works great. Ive been using it for 2 weeks. My T-Zone has not been oily at all. Have not broken out. I think this is a keeper lol. And yes, it does have a certain smell to it. Not a pretty smell, which is just fine with me. But its definitely not a fishy smell.'], 'author': u'JessyMR ', 'date': [u'2016-05-10'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Amazing', 'text': [u'Dr. Perricone\'s skincare line never ceases to amaze me. The deep moisture therapy leaves my skin hydrated, supple, repaired and soft. I love the neutral smell and a little goes a long way. At night I pair it with Fresh\'s black tea night mask for that extra boost. However, it\'s awesome just by itself. I wish I could bathe in it.'], 'author': u'Veronas ', 'date': [u'2016-02-07'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Good points and bad points', 'text': [u'Nice cream, more like a balm. Haven\'t smelled the so-called fish odor - it is just not perfumey, which is good because I don\'t want perfume on my skin. Not heavy once absorbed. Skin looks smoother and lines less, Didn\'t break out (sensitive skin). I would consider this on the treatment spectrum, but I wouldn\'t call it a luxurious cream. Feels good going on but the luxury disappears since skin still looks dry and have that itchy dry feel. I was looking for moisture and treatment. I got treatment but little moisture. I have sensitive normal to dry, and this didn\'t hit the mark on moisture despite its name. Wish it were a keeper, but I\'m back to searching.'], 'author': u'Carefulone ', 'date': [u'2016-01-14'], 'location': u'Long Island, New York', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'Love it!', 'text': [u'I have very sensitive and dry skin, and I love this cream! I have never found a lightweight cream that\'s hydrating enough for my very dry skin.'], 'author': u'Kisondra ', 'date': [u'2015-12-16'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: BB Night Beauty Balm
reviews: {'title': u'actually pretty nice...', 'text': [u'I took off one star because it doesn\'t provide a lot of coverage and the beads are kinda hard to get rid of. But. If you work in on the back of your hand for a minute before applying to your face, there are barely any white beads left, and it does make my skin look a lot better. The shade is perfect, and it does feel sticky at first but the sticky feeling goes away in a few minutes. If you can get a sample, definitely give it a try.'], 'author': u'Sylvia361 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Confidence booster, or daytime use!', 'text': [u'I bought this for my niece (who is 14) after she admitted to me that she often sleeps in makeup, especially at sleepovers/on overnight trips, because she is so self conscious about her (honestly, fairly mild) acne. She has been using this at night after washing her face on a fairly regular basis (most weekends) for about two months. Her face has mostly cleared up and she is feeling much more confident! I don\'t know that a night bb is necessary for most people, but if you (or your teenage daughter/niece/etc) tend to sleep in makeup, this is a great choice. Does not contribute to breakouts and can help with confidence! Also, it looks nice on my niece and would be fine for a light and easy look in the daytime.'], 'author': u'grace6824 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Really enjoy this as a daytime product', 'text': [u'I really love this product, but let me start by saying I do not and would not ever use this at night. I have normal to dehydrated skin that sensitive but usually clear.', u'I am VERY pale with neutral undertones, 1Y01, and most tinted moisturizers are too dark/orange for me, or you can just tell there\'s product on my face. This adjusts to a perfect shade that gives me a little color and evens out my skintone. This of course won\'t give you any coverage at all like a real BB or TM, but it makes my ghost-butt skin look human when I don\'t want to wear foundation. All other Dr Jart products are too dark for me.', u'It is originally a bit tacky/dewy upon application, but dries completely matte on me. I can\'t feel it at all. It doesn\'t look like product, just healthy skin. I will say that when it is hot and I\'m sweating a bit, it becomes very glowy, but I think it looks really nice. In a temperature controlled environment it doesn\'t really do anything.', u'You have to rub it in really well, or the pigments won\'t blend in and you\'ll get some streaks of color. I recommend applying it over top of a moisturizer. If I use a serum + moisturizer + this product it stays dewy for longer.', u' I can\'t attest to the skin benefits because I only wear it once a week or so. I wear it when there\'s not enough time for foundation, lazy Sundays with friends, or if I have a doctor\'s appointment or something.', u' If you don\'t want to wear this at night YOU DON\'T HAVE TO. I don\'t understand why people are complaining that it\'s a dumb product just because it says "night" on it. Make the product work for you and your needs.'], 'author': u'ShannonAlexis ', 'date': [u'2016-10-07'], 'location': u'WV', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'amazing!', 'text': [u'this is not full coverage, people!! I use this in the evening after i take a shower as part of my routine. use a small amount and massage it into your skin and you can see the white specks change color to match your skin tone. it\'s wonderful and I wake up happy every time. I have a white pillow case and there is no color transfer. however, i put it on 3 hours or so before actually laying down to sleep. I\'ve been nothing but pleased by this product and I recommend it to all my girlfriends and I recommend this to you too. My full size is out for delivery right now!!'], 'author': u'tigger95 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-07'], 'location': u'richmond, va', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Additional Research needed but I Loved it...', 'text': [u'I Like this product. It did give me a glow and my skin did look better in the morning. It does feel a bit sticky at first but once my skin took in the product I was left with a natural glow and the product did not carry over to my sheets. But I am torn- on the up side I can look my best at night with all the great effects of a night treatment. On the other hand I spend a lot of money so that cotton looks white at the end of the night. Despite the light tint and stickiness my skin did feel amazing the next day.'], 'author': u'Dwinc2878 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-03'], 'location': u'Columbus, OH', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Subtle, for sensitive skin', 'text': [u'Over the course of two weeks this made my skin dewy and skin tone even. I think it plumped out my cheeks a bit too. My skin is never dry when I use it. I\'m a label nut, and I picked this one up because I ran out of my old moisturizer and I liked the ingredients. I mix it with some more intense one active ingredient serums for optimal effects.'], 'author': u'BaiLiu ', 'date': [u'2016-03-02'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'REN is my mecca', 'text': [u'I discovered REN about a year ago and my face has been forever changed! Now, more than ever, people tell me I look younger than I am (29). My skin looks subtle, soft and vibrant. The Bio Rentinoid Anti-aging cream is light, not greasy at all, absorbs quickly and leaves my skin feeling nourished. Canadian winters can be dry but this moisturizer does the trick! Every so often I will double up for good measure. My only wish would be that there is some SPF in this cream. In addition to this product, I use the REN youth beauty shot, REN v-cense revitalizing night cream and the REN anti-wrinkle concentrate oil (which is MAGICAL!!). This combo seems to be working well for me.'], 'author': u'MsMiazyk ', 'date': [u'2016-02-17'], 'location': u'Canada', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I have combo oily skin and I like thicker moisturizers at night. I bought this one to use as a night cream, and texture was very nice, but BEWARE!! The product has a VERY STRONG scent. I can\'t describe it exactly, but it definitely made me feel nauseated every time I wore it. I tried multiple times, but because of the smell, I had to return it. I can\'t comment on the effectiveness of the product because I only had it for 2-3 weeks. I\'m not one to be affected by smells usually, but guys, this was really bad. I suggest getting a sample if you\'re interested to make sure it\'s not too strong for you. It\'s getting 2 stars instead of 1 because I did like the texture.'], 'author': u'nh0028 ', 'date': [u'2016-02-10'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'nourishing moisture for sensitive / oily skin', 'text': [u'I never write reviews, but this lotion works so unexpectedly well that I wanted to share. I use it with the matching Ren face oil at night which collectively makes my skin quite oily, so would never have thought to use it during the day except that I\'d run out of my normal moisturizer. When I put it on that morning, though, I found that though it\'s super thick it actually absorbs really well and doesn\'t leave a greasy sheen. I ended up using less oil absorbing sheets during the day (about 1) than I would with any other moisturizer I\'ve used in the past! My skin gets very oily very quickly so I was pretty amazed. I\'ve since switched to it as my go to daily moisturizer. My skin is combination but gets oily everywhere and is also rather sensitive (but no breakouts due to this that I can tell). I am quite impressed!'], 'author': u'gahlisa ', 'date': [u'2015-12-02'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'ride or die night moisturizer', 'text': [u'I received this as a sample first then fell in love. It\'s not for everyone. I have dry skin and it\'s very hydrating. It smells light and amazing. I\'m a big fan of oils, this being a gel to oil makes it easy to apply. I have noticed after 2 weeks that my skin is softer, my pores are smaller, and I don\'t have any more dry patches. So happy I got this duo.'], 'author': u'sammyeliz3 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Milky Hydra Balancing Moisturizer
reviews: {'title': u'pleasantly surprised', 'text': [u'A friend suggested I use this after I told her I still hadn\'t found a moisturizer that would satisfy my super combo/oily skin. I\'m glad I did because this has been the only moisturizer to not make me feel greasy in my oily areas but the dry patches on my cheeks are soft and I no longer feel that tight sensation.I really like it and will definitely repurchase.'], 'author': u'mferran7 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-01'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Advanced C Radiance Cream with Vitamin C Collagen Cofactor 10x
reviews: {'title': u'Wow!', 'text': [u'This was recommended to me when I visited Sephora to pick up some Ole Henriksen Truth Serum (which I had been using for a couple of years and gave me kind of meh results, but the amazing scent more than made up for this). The woman who helped me (I think she was actually a Lancer rep?) told me about this and the Lancer Retexturizing Treatment and said they could be used together to achieve the best results. ', u'I was kind of skeptical, and tbh I didn\'t want to spend that much money so I just bought this since I was after the vitamin C and collagen in the Ole Henriksen product anyway.', u'I\'ve been using this for a few weeks now and my skin looks noticeably brighter, I love it! I use it in the morning but the glow lasts all day long. It does sting a tiny bit, especially after I\'ve used an exfoliator, but it goes away pretty quickly and it\'s not at all painful.', u'I just bought the Retexturizing Treatment today and I can\'t wait to start using it. I know it\'s pricey, but I think it\'s absolutely worth it!'], 'author': u'nerdcake ', 'date': [u'2016-06-19'], 'location': u'Sunnyvale, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'does its job as promised', 'text': [u'Initially, I wasn\'t sold on the texture or scent, but eventually, the results clearly proved me wrong--this stuff really works to reduce brown spots/sun damage and brighten skin! I mostly use it at night because it sits on my skin and can create an oily feel, so I don\'t love it under makeup. I am on my second bottle, and despite me slathering it on (decolletage too) because I love how it is helping my skin, a bottle lasts quite a long time. Excellent skin care product!'], 'author': u'flathairnomore ', 'date': [u'2016-06-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Exactly what I wanted for collagen repair', 'text': [u'It\'s best to use this product with the glycolic acid cream by dr. Lancer or another product. I use to it with the neostrata foaming glycolic face wash (under $30!). Otherwise it won\'t be as effective. It\'s also important that your skin is properly moisturized on a regular basis otherwise it will not absorb. I was using an ineffective moisturizer at first and it would come off in like a weird paste. ', u'That said I love this product for its collegen benefits, repair of photo damage and protection of the dermis (under the skin) from UV rays. I had a consultation with the dr. lancer educator at saks. She told me that the products work in conjunction with each other, Dr. Lancer calls it interlocking chemistry. It is removing signs of aging on my cheeks, nose and forehead I didn\'t even know I had! But it really must be used properly or don\'t buy it at all.'], 'author': u'angelstar7774 ', 'date': [u'2016-04-09'], 'location': u'Los Angeles', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Amazing', 'text': [u'Love it. Made my red, sun marked face more even toned and radiant after just one use. I use this in the morning and the retexturizing treatment at night. Worth every penny.'], 'author': u'Cdngrl8 ', 'date': [u'2016-04-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'not for everyday use for sensitive skin', 'text': [u'I was very excited to switch over from Ole Henrickson\'s basic vitamin C serum that I\'ve used for years to something more intensive to match my age. Read great reviews about the brand and ingredients (except for the scented items that I am usually OK with). Used it for a week during the dry and cold weather and it was amazing. I instantly saw a brightness, glow, and increased moisture in my skin in the mornings. However once the weather became more humid, my skin could only tolerate using it perhaps once or twice a week or I\'d see some clogged pores. ', u'The only thing I do not like is the silicone feel. I did not anticipate "waterless" to be silicone-ish.'], 'author': u'yesyes ', 'date': [u'2016-03-10'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}
ingredient: Cyclopentasiloxane, Ascorbic Acid, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, DI-C12-15 Alkyl Fumarate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Dimethicone, Polysilicone-11, Retinol, Bisabolol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Linalool.

name: Bamboo Matte Lotion
reviews: {'title': u'Helps me skip powder', 'text': [u'It works. This keeps my skin matte enough that I can skip finishing powder and not have to worry about an oily T-zone for the rest of the day. It will also last forever, since you\'re essentially splashing a few drops on your face with every use.'], 'author': u'Emceen ', 'date': [u'2016-10-31'], 'location': u'Washington, D.C.', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'This really really works, love it!!', 'text': [u'This stands true to its name- I pat a few drops onto my face after cleansing, and go with my moisturizer and foundation- biggest benefit I\'ve seen is that it keeps my face oil free for over 12 hours, and also minimizes my pores- thereby completely nullifying the need of a primer!! Even with the best of primers (Hourglass mineral veil/ Tarte/Becca/porefessional), my face never stayed this oil-free! I\'m used to having oil back on my skin within 6 hours of even using a primer, but this lotion is beyond amazing! Never found anything (makeup or skincare item) that is so true to its name!! Been using this for a couple weeks now, and totally considering buying the other products from this line!'], 'author': u'KateM24 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-28'], 'location': u'Indianapolis, IN', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'omg in love', 'text': [u'Perfect for my skin love it love it love it want them to release more of the bamboo line!'], 'author': u'elloooo ', 'date': [u'2016-09-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

I love the fragrance too!'], 'author': u'dish68 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-10'], 'location': u'Concord, NC', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'Baby Buttface', 'text': [u'This leaves skin feeling so smooth that I\'d have to remind myself not to touch my face on makeup days! ', u'Use a little of this milky magic before serum and moisturizer and it will begin to amaze you after a week of consistent use.'], 'author': u'ProductionPlus ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great addition', 'text': [u'I was turned on to this after amazing results from erborian\'s gingseng mask, and I am so glad I picked up a bottle. I am working in a harsh, desert climate right now, and my skin has still never looked better. It\'s hydrated, even, and unusually bright, and I suspect it\'s this guy that did it. I use it after toner and serum, but before a heavier moisturizer as I have rather dry skin. I suspect this is doing some good for my skin\'s long-term health as well. Highly recommended.'], 'author': u'NYC23 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-09'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Works well helps products absorb', 'text': [u'This product is great at what it does. It is not a lotion so anyone using this as a lotion and complaining it doesn\'t work is using it wrong. This goes on after toner and before serum, oils, and moisturizer etc. It is designed to help these products absorb better. And that it does. This goes on after my Peter Thomas Roth unwrinkle turbo toner. After I apply this ginseng essence I use two drops of my Sunday Riley Flora and then my simple Cerave lotion. Flora would leave me slightly greasy but after using this ginseng it absorbs much better. One star off because something about the smell makes me cough. But that\'s just me other than that I recommend.'], 'author': u'jennpurr ', 'date': [u'2016-09-25'], 'location': u'Monterey, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Resilience Lift Night Firming/Sculpting Creme
reviews: {'title': u'Nightly Miracle', 'text': [u'To qualify, I am 60 and have years of experience with skincare regimes. From Loreal to Sisley (neighborhood drugstore to Bergdorf Goodmans). I received a sample when my girlfriend attended a Estee Clinic and was instantly hooked. Love the consistency and smell. My skin is radiant in the morning. Lines gone,skin dewy and tighter. I will be ordering the day creme also. Highly recommend if you are looking for a mature night cream.'], 'author': u'dehlilah ', 'date': [u'2016-07-27'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"smell is so overpowering it's not usable", 'text': [u'The scent of this is so strong I can\'t even use it near my face. I thought the formula would be nice and hydrating while still substantially thick for under my eyes, and I had to wash it off because of the fumes irritating me. I\'ve tried it on my neck and even that is too much.', u'I use it as a hand cream and it\'s certainly great for that. It soothes rough cuticles and leaves the back of my hands soft and plump, with no grease or stickiness - it sinks in nicely. I\'ll give it two stars for that - but the amount of fragrance in this is just shameful.'], 'author': u'phkate ', 'date': [u'2016-03-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'I Love It!!', 'text': [u'I have super dry skin and use this every night before bed. For me, it actually hydrates very well at night and it firms my skin. I wake up with radiant smooth skin. I have been using it for about a year. My only complaint is the smell- not bad but too strong.'], 'author': u'Jenniezet ', 'date': [u'2016-01-12'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great!', 'text': [u'This is a good product, BUT to get best results you need to use the Resilence day cream and EL perfectionist cp in purple bottle. The night time recovery serum is an extra plus. All of this works better if used together. Give it a month and you\'ll agree.'], 'author': u'bestyearsofmylif ', 'date': [u'2015-06-13'], 'location': u'GA.', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'Surprised at the bad reviews!', 'text': [u'I love using this product; I saw a really good review on it and happened to purchase a small trial size and loved the results. I admit to neglecting my d\xe9colletage as most women do and was watching lines and wrinkles start to sink in more deeply. Resilience Life Night has made a truly dramatic difference in only a few weeks, and I\'ll continue using it until it gives me a reason not to.', u'Some of the other reviews mentioned how dry this can make the skin. I\'ll clarify and say it absorbed quickly and didn\'t leave a greasy residue on the skin like many moisturizers do, but I didn\'t wake up with scaly skin either. I did use it underneath my eyes once and my skin was peeling the next morning, so I refrain from using it from those sensitive areas --just problem areas prone to wrinkling-- and stick primarily with my neck and collarbone region (I unfortunately have oily skin though, so I don\'t put on much moisturizer in general). For those with dry skin, augmenting this creme with a more hydrating one at night or alternating nights of usage should give you the best of both worlds. Overall, the wrinkle-eliminating qualities of this are wonderful, and I\'m very happy with my results.'], 'author': u'ohnosnowflake ', 'date': [u'2015-05-09'], 'location': u'Orlando, FL', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Protective Face Lotion
reviews: {'title': u'Nothing special at all', 'text': [u'I\'m surprised this has so many great ratings. I felt like for something this basic feeling I could have paid much less. I\'m also concerned about the lack of SPF mentions on the bottle. For my age, it\'s such a must. Pass.'], 'author': u'heatherellen ', 'date': [u'2016-09-05'], 'location': u'Jersey City, NJ', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Lightweight Moisturizer', 'text': [u'I used to use a different moisturizer by Bobbi that\'s discontinued but this one is just as good. It\'s lightweight and makes your skin feel soft. I personally put it on at night before I go to sleep and it really soaks in. 1 1/2 pumps is all you need to cover your face'], 'author': u'Calliec21093 ', 'date': [u'2016-05-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'pretty much!!', 'text': [u'I can\'t even think of one bad thing to say about this moisturizer! It balances my combo skin & it doesn\'t break me out. And FYI, it still contains spf. Anytime you see titanium dioxide or zinc in your ingredient list, there is in fact some sort of sun protection, it may not be labeled on the product bc it\'s not a substantial amount to pass the fda regulation. Plus you don\'t really want a high amount of spf in there anyways...the more spf, the less actual moisturizer you\'re getting. Annnnd technically, your are suppose to reapply spf every 2-3 hrs...who\'s wanting to spend $50 on a moisturizer with spf that needs to be applied ever 3 hrs to turn around and by another $50 bottle in a month.!? Not me ;)'], 'author': u'kyyle ', 'date': [u'2016-04-02'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I have acne prone skin and I\'ve yet to find a lotion to stand up to this one. Great for everyday.'], 'author': u'vicv ', 'date': [u'2015-09-11'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Perfect moisturizer for sensitive skin', 'text': [u'This cream is perfect for my sensitive skin. It absorbs well and lasts all day. The best thing about this cream is that it is non-irritating. I spent an afternoon with a Sephora rep and applied several creams to my face. All were recommended for sensitive skin but my skin became pink after applying most them. Ren was an exception and I have been using it ever since. I\'m so happy that I discovered this line. Also, the pump is terrific. I dispense only the amount I need and it\'s very hygienic.'], 'author': u'lms2 ', 'date': [u'2015-05-04'], 'location': u'Toronto, Ontario', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

reviews: {'title': u'love love love', 'text': [u'I discovered this over the summer and I absolutely LOVE this! {'title': u'Clear Complexion Moisturizer', 'text': [u'If you are looking for a single treatment that will completely get rid of your acne, this isn\'t it. I use this in the morning by itself, and then layered with an oil at night for an extra dose of hydration. I\'ve been using it for years, and continue to use it even during times when my skin is clear.'], 'author': u'LaLanglois ', 'date': [u'2016-09-23'], 'location': u'Edmonton, AB', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: Bamboo Waterlock Mask
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'I tried a sample of this and it left my skin so supple! I couldn\'t believe it was real. I\'m now buying the full size!'], 'author': u'AyaAziz ', 'date': [u'2016-11-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'AMAZING!!!', 'text': [u'Let my start by saying I have extremely dry, sensitive skin. I have also had to start a couple of topical acne treatments lately, and while my dermatologist prescribed the gentlest, least drying meds she could, I still found my skin even drier than usual with scaly, painful, red patches on my eyelids and neck. I would have to stop my meds for a couple of days at a time, and also tried every moisturizer I had in my arsenal (sadly, I have a lot from trying so different kinds). None of them were helping at all. Then, I found a sample of the Bamboo Waterlock Mask that I received with a previous Sephora order, and read that it could also be used as a moisturizer when applied in a thin layer. OVERNIGHT my skin was 100% better, and I am not over-exaggerating. After weeks of struggling with painful, scaly skin, this product fixed it literally overnight. Now I use it every night as my regular nighttime moisturizer (although admittedly, this is more often that the label recommends). I cannot explain how much this product has changed my skin. I can now continue my acne treatments as prescribed with no concerns, and my skin is just more healthy feeling in general. ABSOLITELY RECOMMEND TO ALL OF THOSE WITH DRY SKIN!!!'], 'author': u'KTcat22 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-31'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'*heart eye emoji*', 'text': [u'I was super skeptical about this stuff when I got it as a sample. Usually moisturizing products just leave my face oily as all heck. But I gave it a try and I\'m so glad I did! Instantly after using this, my face felt like a baby\'s bottom and lasted that way for a few days afterwards. No more dry, flaky skin. AND no more oily skin either! It\'s like magic in a jar. Love love love!'], 'author': u'gbracci ', 'date': [u'2016-07-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'so cooling!', 'text': [u'I have to say that I really really like this mask. I was a little iffy about it after the first use. It didn\'t immediately brighten my face or do anything super special but after repeated use I do have to agree that it does what it says. The mask does seem to plump my face a bit and my skin feels softer and brighter after multiple uses. The cooling sensation is an added perk since my skin is usually irritated due to my allergies and stress. This product, I find, does a good job of soothing my skin in general. I will say that I use this as a mask but I believe this might be a perfect moisturizer for us super oily girls. All in all, I would give this 5 stars if it wasn\'t so expensive. It does a good job but maybe not for $40'], 'author': u'KPS1221 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'So hydrating', 'text': [u'I love love love this stuff. I apply it to my clean face before bed a few times a week and just sleep in it. Makes my skin so soft and hydrated! name: FreshFace Instant Glow Luminizer
reviews: {'title': u"doesn't do anything", 'text': [u'I love a good glowy Dewey look to my skin. All about the supple appearance. This does nothing lol. No highlighter appearance, no glow, no shimmer. It\'s just a lotion to me. It doesn\'t do what it says. I wanted to love it though. Sounded ideal!'], 'author': u'Shellzaff ', 'date': [u'2016-11-01'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'The perfect subtle touch', 'text': [u'I love everything from Fresh, and this is no exception. When I first got this, I wanted to send it back right away, but I am so glad I gave it another shot. Here are my lessons for making this an everyday staple:#1- Use this over your makeup, not under. I\'ve also mixed a tiny dab in with my tinted moisturizer if I want to look especially dewy.#2- This is the most important part! You only need a TINY bit to use as a highlighter. Seriously, not even a third of the size of a pea to highlight cheekbones, bridge of nose, and cupid\'s bow does a beautiful job of giving you a well-rested luminous glow. Anything more looks tacky and overdone.I am a nurse and full-time student, and am chronically super tired. This makes me look human despite my serious lack of sleep. Additionally, I have very sensitive skin and this had given me no redness, breakouts, or drying. Perfect!'], 'author': u'burk0282 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-29'], 'location': u'Minneapolis, MN', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'glow!', 'text': [u'Utterly adore Fresh EVERYTHING. this illuminating glow cream is marvelously perfect but caution! Use only a pinky size dab over your full Visage if used as a primary. Truly you only need a dab on the apples of cheeks, a dot on nose forehead and chin. It blends beautifully with a pear-like glow. Do not go overboard!! It packs a beauty punch and I found a sheer mineral powder to create a glowing flawless finish. Less is more to really play up a cat eye with megawatt lashes, plumping gloss and that\'s all you need with a purrfect look. Try it!'], 'author': u'viciouskitten ', 'date': [u'2016-10-27'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Beam Team Hydrate + Glow
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'I\'ve tried out a handful of the Estee Edit products and this is the only one I love. It is great for those days when you don\'t feel like wearing makeup but still want to add a swipe of mascara and a little "spark" to your face. If your skin runs dry, you will still probably want to apply your usual moisturizer underneath, otherwise I think it is fine on its own (assuming you aren\'t using it as your daily moisturizer). I don\'t always use the bronze stuff in the cap, but it is an easy way to add a little something extra to your face on those no makeup days. I docked a star (well, a star and a half if I could) because, like all of the other estee edit products I\'ve tried, it is insanely over priced and I\'m not a fan of the texture.'], 'author': u'Chloesilverado ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'LOVE it', 'text': [u'Very pretty golden/sheer and shimmery moisturizer. I like to wear it alone or mixed together with my bb or cc cream. Can be used over make up too. Under the cap is a solid cream shimmery highlighter which is nice as well.'], 'author': u'ijetski247 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great as a primer!', 'text': [u'I received this as a gift and didn\'t think anything of it (I usually don\'t use bronzing products) but I wanted a more glowy primer/base for my makeup, not that I don\'t love my too faced hangover but I wanted a little something more as I\'ve been limiting the amount of foundation I wear on a day to day basis. This really does an amazing job! The smell is a little iffy but dissipates quickly and it honestly isn\'t that bronze-y which works for me (I use the lighter shade of the two)Probably wouldn\'t purchase again, just because of the $50 price and I get no use out of the highlighter built into the cap. It\'s far to greasy for my liking. The flash illuminators have a much better texture as a cream highlight than whatever was thrown into the cap of this.'], 'author': u'FrodoBaggins ', 'date': [u'2016-09-16'], 'location': u'Toronto, ON', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Super hydrating!', 'text': [u'I reviewed this product in my estee edit voxbox. I used the sheer golden bronze color. I applied this cream as a substitute for my usual moisturizer to see how it worked and was very impressed. My skin is typically dry so I need a lot of moisturizer. I did not have to use much of this and it made my face look so hydrated. The glow was an added benefit. Definitely would use this product again in the future. Side note: I received this product for free to review and this is my personal opinion.'], 'author': u'hannaherin ', 'date': [u'2016-08-31'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Seems pretty good!', 'text': [u'It\'s definitely moisturizing and absorbs quickly. I received a shade a bit too dark so i\'m not sure how well it blends.'], 'author': u'alyssacherise ', 'date': [u'2016-08-25'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Extra Repair Moisturizing Balm
reviews: {'title': u'love love love', 'text': [u'You may not like the texture of this balm. It is very hard to spread but it works wonders for my skin. I have super oily skin and I didn\'t think it would work for me but it did. It makes my skin super smooth and it evens out my skin tone. It even makes my pimples go away. I do not know what is the magic in this balm that works so well for me.'], 'author': u'Flute8581 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-07'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I was so excited when I got this product because, like most things Bobbi Brown, I thought it had to be good. Unfortunately I was extremely disappointed. This was super thick and I had to tug on my skin to get it to rub in, which just left my skin super irritated. It didn\'t spread evenly, even if I heated it up between my fingers, and I found that it didn\'t moisturize my skin at all. I would completely avoid this and I definitely will not be purchasing this again.'], 'author': u'fabulousgal360 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-06'], 'location': u'New York', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'If you have the $, spend it on this!', 'text': [u'I received a .24 fl. oz. sample of this cream and it is AMAZING. If you need intense hydration, this will not disappoint. I\'m not sure about the claims as far as skin benefits... but in terms of pure moisture, it delivers. I\'ve heard from other reviewers that the balm is too thick and takes too long to sink in for their liking; I personally love its thick creaminess. As others have said, a little goes a long way. If anyone makes a drugstore dupe of this, I will be in heaven. The ridiculous price is the only downside (as tends to be the case with Bobbi Brown).'], 'author': u'BackhandSlice ', 'date': [u'2016-06-21'], 'location': u'Spring, TX', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Amazing wonder cream', 'text': [u'This stuff is heavy and very sticky. But it gets 5 stars as it hydrates really well and provides an instantaneous glow. Usually powerful creams like this make me break out but not this. Also only a tiny amount is needed so the jar will last a longtime. I\'m hooked.'], 'author': u'josview ', 'date': [u'2016-06-08'], 'location': u'Tallahassee, Fl', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'Love this s product!', 'text': [u'This balm is amazing! I recently stopped taking bc and my skin was terrible. I had acne, extremely oily forehead, and very dry everywhere else! I had never had these problems before and started to invest in skincare immediately. This balm has saved my skin! My face feels buttery soft all the time now. This has corrected my dry spots and stopped the excessive oil. My acne is all but gone as well. I use this at night over my drunk elephant serum and a light layer of belief aqua bomb. Then use the Bobbi extra repair eye cream. In the morning I use one of the lighter Bobbi Brown creams instead as this balm as it takes a long time to absorb. My skin has never been better which makes my makeup look flawless of course! Highly recommend this is a staple for me now!'], 'author': u'KCheno ', 'date': [u'2016-05-10'], 'location': u'Boise, ID', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Hana Cream
reviews: {'title': u'glad I decided to try', 'text': [u'Got this during the vib rouge sale since it\'s so pricy and doesn\'t come with alot, but this is definitely worth every penny. Have to wait to see the long term results but I have really dry skin and this made my skin feel nice and hydrated. And I only had to use 1 for my whole fave and neck. Not greasy oily or any film type of feeling. This is definitely a repurchase for the future.'], 'author': u'amandarod ', 'date': [u'2016-11-10'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Interesting', 'text': [u'I just received my Hana Cream, and I am not sure about it. The little balls, when I opened the bottle, where slimy, and wet.. I don\'t know if that was due to heat from UPS truck, or if it\'s just because of humidity but I feel like putting it in the fridge. However, I did use 2 of the small balls last night and it felt really good on my face! My nose was a little tingly, but it could be because of the black head mask that I used prior. All in all, I\'m going to test it for a month and see where my skin stand then. ', u'Also, it smells really nice !'], 'author': u'SinnyaiaPtichka ', 'date': [u'2016-11-04'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'great for me!', 'text': [u'Defiantly super absorbent into the skin it make my skin feel hydrated and loved I love that it\'s pre portioned this isn\'t the most expensive moisturizer I have ever bought but the portions make it worth it gives me bang for my buck. It\'s an age defender so it has less oils and more treatments so if you are super dry it might now be enough, I do feel like this one is great for morning and afternoon uses and for my skin needs its superb I will recommend getting a sample and maybe researching a bit further to find if you will like it as I did.'], 'author': u'mooni ', 'date': [u'2016-10-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Never buying', 'text': [u'I got a sample of this, I am glad I didnt buy it. It is not the best I have tried many better creams in my recent days. Not a fan of it. {'title': u'One of most underrated products on Sephora!', 'text': [u'I\'m not sure how I started using this product, but I think it began while I was searching for finding moisturizers that have SPF AND didn\'t feel like I had that greasy sunscreen feeling! I ordered this on a whim and never looked back. I\'ve been using this product for the past two years. Hasn\'t broken me out. It\'s the only moisturizer THUS FAR that is light enough to moisturize and protect (thought probably not enough). I loved that it absorbed quickly, leaving my face soft and dewy. It\'s perfect for the summer for my oily/combo skin but not enough for the cold northeastern winters. The only downside to this product is that towards the end of the day when my face is grimy and oily, it stings a lot when it gets into my eyes! Otherwise, so glad to have found this hidden gem :)'], 'author': u'nayah ', 'date': [u'2015-06-29'], 'location': u'Massachusetts', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Extra–Firming Night Cream All Skin Types
reviews: {'title': u'Caused breakouts', 'text': [u'I ordered this as a step up from my usual Clarins night cream when Sephora stopped carrying it. I got a pimple after using it once, and thought maybe it was a coincidence. It wasn\'t. I tried to use it sparingly, to see if that would make a difference. I used it once a week, but it always caused a reaction on my fair skin. I finally returned it after I tried it one last time, using a liberal amount, and broke out all over. :( Very disappointed with this product, especially since I have loved all other Clarins products I\'ve tried.'], 'author': u'Amysprite ', 'date': [u'2016-04-11'], 'location': u'Lafayette, LA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Amazing Product', 'text': [u'I tried this night cream a while back as a sample from Sephora and immediately fell in love. I didn\'t want to pay the price for it so I tried something a little less expensive by Caudalie and that left my face extremely oily. After months of feeling frustrated with my oily/broken out skin, I took that product back and purchased this Clarin\'s cream, something I should\'ve done from the get go. It has a light scent to it which is one of my favorite parts. It\'s thick but a little goes a long way, I barely have to use any to cover my entire face..which is great considering this jar costs a pretty penny, you\'ll easily get 6 months use out of this, and when you look at it that way, the cost is minimal. I wake up every morning with smooth glowing skin. I have noticed a difference in my smile lines, they\'re starting to fade and diminish. I highly recommend, I won\'t be using any other face cream, this is it for me for life!'], 'author': u'MegTuck ', 'date': [u'2016-02-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'When my skin is not in a dry phase, this is my holy grail BB cream. name: Purely Age-Defying Firming Face Oil
reviews: {'title': u'Best face oil ever! hydrate but not oily', 'text': [u'41 yo "semi-mature" oily t-zone skin. This is the FIRST that works well just as described. I\'ve tried many different face oil before, including Origins and different argan oils. All worked well as night oil, but never for day time before make-up because would be too oily. But Jurlique is the first one I can wear under make-up. it gives my oily t-zone skin a nice glow but not shiny. my skin feels silky smooth. and it smells nice with a very slight hint of jasmine scent.'], 'author': u'landydog ', 'date': [u'2016-11-10'], 'location': u'Boston, MA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Better than expected!', 'text': [u'I read an article comparing face oils and this one was recommended for sensitive skin. My skin is dry so I mix two or three drops in with my moisturizer, daytime and night cream. I love it and the bottle will last a long time. My daughter asked me what I was doing different, she noticed the increased firmness. And my hands and nails love it, too!'], 'author': u'ac59 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-01'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'noticeable results', 'text': [u'Have been using for about four months & am thoroughly addicted. A little goes a long way- two drops does the job. My skin looks more even and believe it or not applying this "oil" seems to have made my face less-oily over time. After applying to my face every morning I rub the remaining product into my hands-a nice side effect has been that it\'s made my nails harder & I swear they grow faster. Backs of my hands look noticeably better too'], 'author': u'akglampergirl ', 'date': [u'2016-10-13'], 'location': u'Eagle River, AK', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'perfect', 'text': [u'This oil is light weight, absorbs easily, and shows visible results. I bought this because I was looking for a nourishing, natural face oil that also had a little retinol. I didn\'t think such an oil existed, but here this is! I\'m pretty young so I didn\'t feel that I needed high amounts of retinol, and this does jus the trick. It smoothed and plumped my forehead lines as well as a deep wrinkle I have in one of my laugh lines. Plus it\'s all natural so I love it!'], 'author': u'isaria ', 'date': [u'2016-06-11'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'Good find', 'text': [u'I am happy with this mask. It looks like it will last a long time. I purchased the full size after receiving a sample. {'title': u'Quick and effective', 'text': [u'This is a quick and effective product. Loved that it took three minutes to dry and I could easily do it while brushing my teeth at night. If you need a way to get a mask routine, this one is for you! For a quick product, my skin felt great afterwards without over drying. Only complaint is the smell (although quite a lovely perfume) is quite strong and could be too much for some who don\'t like the scent or who have reactions to perfume.'], 'author': u'JenRachel ', 'date': [u'2016-08-28'], 'location': u'Rural NC', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Impressed', 'text': [u'This product impressed me. I have somewhat weird skin (dry & dehydrated but ginormous pores, yet not prone to break-outs), and I have a hard time finding a pore-cleansing mask that doesn\'t completely and utterly zap what little moisture I have and turn my face into sandpaper.', u'My face truly looked brighter and refreshed after just one use. I also love the texture of this particular mask, and of course the fact that it only takes three minutes! I have babies and toddlers, I don\'t have much time to sit around with those 30 minute masks on ;)', u'Minus a star because I am in the camp that strongly dislikes the scent of this product, but it\'s a small price to pay for a wonderful indulgence!'], 'author': u'kimkays ', 'date': [u'2016-08-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

I do have sensitive skin and I was afraid this would make me break out but it did not.'], 'author': u'itinez ', 'date': [u'2016-07-12'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Super Aqua-Serum BB Hydra+
reviews: {'title': u'Amazing', 'text': [u'This product is a bit expensive but is worth every penny. I love the finish, it leaves my skin fresh, even toned and flawless. I\'m about to finish my first tube and I will definitely rebuy this product.'], 'author': u'klvb2502 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-11'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Pricey,but worth it', 'text': [u'Yes, the price point is a little nuts and the rose smell is annoying. But I am nearing 40, and my dry, sensitive skin has some "special needs" at this time. This foundation checked all my boxes! It blends easily, stays smooth all day, provides nice coverage without looking heavy or mask-like, moisturizes, doesn\'t settle into my lines, and doesn\'t cling to dry spots. My skin has yellow/olive undertones, so the yellow tint of this foundation works for me. However, if you have pinkish skin, I\'m not sure if it would look so hot.'], 'author': u'415Red ', 'date': [u'2016-05-26'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'average', 'text': [u'Agree with the last reviewer- I could not get past the fragrance. It seemed like the coverage was like a tinted moisturizer. It blended in well. Also wish that there were more colors- the light was the best choice but not ideal.'], 'author': u'illinigirl54 ', 'date': [u'2016-03-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Nice, but~~', 'text': [u'I liked the texture and feel of this BB serum. However, the fragrance was bothersome and it just did not provide the coverage I needed. I have a medium skin tone with slight yellow undertones and the Light shade worked well for me. I haven\'t noticed a \'plumping\' effect and found that I did need a moisturizer with this product. The fragrance and/or sunscreen ingredients were the deal breakers for me. We really don\'t need fragrance in skincare!!'], 'author': u'eastcoastgal ', 'date': [u'2016-03-13'], 'location': u'East Coast', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

name: Dark Spot Sun Defense Broad Spectrum SPF 50
reviews: {'title': u'Horrible', 'text': [u'I\'m glad I\'m not the only one experiencing this. I bought it two weeks ago, I noticed when I applied it that it was mildly itchy, but I thought my skin was getting adjusted to it. Then I noticed it was causing my skin to becoming itchy, as well small white heads would appear. I returned it after two weeks. If you have sensitive mildly oily skin do not get this. It may be too strong for your skin. If I could give this zero stars I would, especially of how much it cost.'], 'author': u'sheslikeglitter ', 'date': [u'2016-10-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

I a medium skintone so there is a white cast on my face after applying.'], 'author': u'joybodoi2 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-25'], 'location': u'Berkeley, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Daily skin care', 'text': [u'I use this product daily under my foundation. It provides great protection and a nice smooth finish. I have dry skin and never have problems with absorption. This product has become a staple.'], 'author': u'SparklingWine ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': u'Los Angeles', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Absorbs quickly, no greasy feeling', 'text': [u'I wear this daily underneath foundation. I t goes on easily and absorbs quickly. I have not any issues with becoming oily later in the day (I have combination skin with T-zone oiliness) or a white cast to my skin after applying as other reviewers have experienced. I use the Alpha Beta peels so it\'s important to wear sunscreen and this fits the bill nicely.'], 'author': u'EmmaFrances ', 'date': [u'2016-08-23'], 'location': u'Boston,MA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

name: Clarimatte™ T-Zone Balancing Gel Cream
reviews: {'title': u'Perfect for daytime use!', 'text': [u'I have the most frustrating skin: dehydrated, oily skin. My dry spots are oily spots. It is so hard to find a daytime moisturizer that gives enough hydration so that the spots aren\'t dry but doesn\'t also leave me greasy. Not to mention reacting with my sensitive, acne prone skin. This, however, could be my holy grail. I have spent hundreds and hundreds of dollars trying to find the right moisturizer. I was hopeless. Then I gave this a shot. It doesn\'t cause me to break out nor does it clog my pores. It hydrates my skin but doesn\'t leave leave me oily. It is the perfect day time moisturizer. I really recommend giving this a try. I was hesitant at first, but I\'m so glad I tried it. I can\'t use it as my night time moisturizer just because I do need a little more hydration, however people with oily skin could probably get away with it. Hope this helps!'], 'author': u'NicoletteK ', 'date': [u'2016-10-27'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'MUST BUY!!', 'text': [u'I have tried just about every moisturizer under the sun and nothing had ever actually been able to leave me without an oily or even too dry finish. This Ren moisturizer is the first product that I have used that works well with my face. I run it in until it has been completely absorbed, add primer and foundation over it, and my skin looks better than ever. So happy with this product.'], 'author': u'kallain10 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'dries matte', 'text': [u'This stuff is awesome. Yes it is very expensive, but it goes a long way. My face gets oily throughout the day if I use any other kind of facial moisturizer. But this stuff dries matte and keeps my face matte all day! If you have normal to oily skin this is a great buy.'], 'author': u'jorh ', 'date': [u'2016-09-18'], 'location': u'torrington ct', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Clearing my skincare concerns', 'text': [u'My biggest skin concern is clogged pores, those awful colorless bumps along the skin, primarily the forehead. I was recommended this product a short while back, and I was incredibly impressed with the samples I received. I bought the full product yesterday, and find that it is very lightweight and feels great on the skin.'], 'author': u'Lydiaanne37 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-11'], 'location': u'London Ontario', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'13-17'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I have a combo skin with an oily T-zone and this product alone manage to keep it shine free for several hours, without drying out the other parts of my face. It absorbs quickly and leaves my skin smooth and soft, with a nice matte finish.I never paid that much for an hydrating gel or cream product before, however it was well worth it. Only a small amount is needed for the whole face so it will last a while (I have used it once every day for 2 months and the bottle is still 3/4 full). Considering that it\'s made of natural ingredients, that it\'s a wonderful oil control gel and that the bottle will probably last me 6 to 8 months, it is definitely worth the 62$ CAD I paid for it. I highly recommend and will repurchase.'], 'author': u'Lazzarwa ', 'date': [u'2016-08-29'], 'location': u'Montreal, Quebec', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Dr. Andrew Weil For Origins™ Mega Defense Barrier-Boosting Essence Oil
reviews: {'title': u'worth the purchase', 'text': [u'I live in the Northwest Territories where the weather reaches -40 in the winter. This oil has been moisturizing without being too oily and I like that it protects my skin from the harsh winters.'], 'author': u'DeneMama ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Worth the price', 'text': [u'I bought this after seeing a good review in a mag. This is a soothing oil that sinks in really well. It doesn\'t leave you greasy and a little goes a long way. My skin is a bit dry so I use more than the recommended 5 drops. I normally use it during the day before going out. reviews: {'title': u'No Coverage', 'text': [u'To it\'s credit, this did not irritate my very very sensitive skin. It might work perfectly as a primer, but that is not what I needed it for. {'title': u'the best', 'text': [u'This is my second bottle of this stuff - it\'s the best mineral sunscreen with tint I have ever used. I used the medium/dark and I have a light/medium olive skin tone (but prefer a tanned glow). This product has a very dewy glow - it is light-medium coverage. I like wearing this because it feels like a drink for my skin and is extremely breathable (unlike other tinted sunscreens that can feel like a mask). I have worn this poolside , hiking, and in other situations where a heavy duty sunscreen would be called for but this is all I had. It protected me (and gave me that extra glow!) in all those situations. I LOVE this product. Thank you coola.'], 'author': u'pumpkin23 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-27'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'gentle VERY light coverage', 'text': [u'This BB cream is very expensive and gives very little coverage. {'title': u'Wow!', 'text': [u'I can\'t believe I\'m saying this, but this bb matched my skin tone better than any foundation, cc or bb in my entire life. I definitely didn\'t expect that. Yay!'], 'author': u'gurlygurl ', 'date': [u'2016-08-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'skin in heaven :-)', 'text': [u'I cannot believe this product. Dramatic result with 1 use! Seriously. I have been having just tired looking skin, dull, large pores, dry a bit on the top, oily a bit deeper down. I read that many people swear by this for `lifting` everything up a bit. I just put it on in a whim and holy cow. Felt like my skin went straight up to heaven. So I have been using a sample for a few days and my skin looks 5 YEARS younger. Just beautiful. Even tone, tighter, pores are small and even! I know this is `lifting` but the difference it made in my overall skintone is dramatic. I have 3 deep lines on my forehead and those are still there but softened. Oh, there is this Dry skin one and the All skin one. Both have very thick texture however they sink in completely and absolutely NO oil or grease left. Incredible texture! Normally all rich creams give me large pores but this actually made them small! I prefer the Dry skin one a tad bit but they seem almost the same to me. Oh, don`t use it under the eyes, as the fragrance might be irritating. Grab a sample, it is the only cream that made me look 5 years younger in a day or two. :-))))'], 'author': u'emodel ', 'date': [u'2015-10-17'], 'location': u'Seattle, WA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'This cream is my go to for light SPF for winter.', 'text': [u'This cream is great for the cold and windy winters.', u'I like this cream because instant touchable softness, a light scent, no oily residue (my oily zones are very grateful), prevents skin from cracking and peeling, and a light SPF. Its everything you would want in a cream for winter.', u'I use it under powder foundation and everything stays in place.'], 'author': u'meliw ', 'date': [u'2015-03-04'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Great for troubled skin', 'text': [u'I\'ve used every product under the sun to help with acre-prone skin, but the result always ended up trying me out. For me, a hydrating mist is not an essential as I have combination skin, but if your skin is dry you should give this a go, and give yourself a spray or five when you\'re feeling dry throughout the day. It\'s also got essential oils in it so if you react to those I would avoid this, but I have highly reactive skin and this causes no problems.'], 'author': u'lisakathleen ', 'date': [u'2016-08-06'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'love it and the smell', 'text': [u'the buying experience for purchasing this product was not a good one (involving a store in the mall and not being given proper help or service), but I\'m definitely glad I made this purchase without walking out! its a little expensive but I\'ve used this twice a day already for a week and haven\'t made a dent in the bottle. it states its a toner which it is, but it doesn\'t dry me out or feel sticky. the scent is amazing and that is coming from my pregnancy super smeller nose! I will definitely be buying another bottle once this one runs out, but I am looking for another facial mist to use more as an afternoon makeup refresher.'], 'author': u'britpollander ', 'date': [u'2016-06-23'], 'location': u'glendora, nj', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Effective product', 'text': [u'I had a dry/bumpy patch on my cheek ever the acne was below the surface of My skin and had been there for months so I figured it was permanent. I also follow up this cleanser with Kate Somerville Nourish Moisturizer but I\'ve been using that product for a while so I attribute the positive change to the cleanser. Highly recommended!'], 'author': u'stephanie2006 ', 'date': [u'2016-06-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'Not for me!', 'text': [u'I wanted to like this so much but was very disappointed. It always left my skin feeling and looking very oily. It also made me break out like crazy! I had never had worse acne in my life.'], 'author': u'MegMure ', 'date': [u'2016-06-22'], 'location': u'Naugatuck, CT', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'I wish it was a keepr for me', 'text': [u'I love EL products and this cream seems like a fine one but did not work for me. I found it to be tad oily but then I know I am not supposed to use it on face oil which I am addicted to. I can\'t stop using face oil because its just part of my morning skin care routine and therefore I decided to return this EE cream. BTW, other BBs work perfectly on top of my face oil and moisturizer. Yes, I have a dry skin.. I wish it was more dewy on me.. my dry skin turning oily is just not the best look going for me. It might work for others because I know EL is a great brand and I have used many of there products before and have loved them all!!'], 'author': u'daisylovely ', 'date': [u'2016-06-10'], 'location': u'Chanitlly', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Just okay', 'text': [u'I bought this along with the enlighten serum and moisturizer to lighten my post acne marks. I am pleased with the serum and moisturizer and have seen results but I will not repurchase this EE cream. It isn\'t a bad cream but I just think it is so expensive and does the same thing a cheaper BB or CC cream could do. It is very sheer and does not cover much of anything so I cannot wear it alone so I have been wearing it under my makeup as my primer. It works pretty good like that but no better than my regular primer. I have dry, acne prone skin and this does not break me out. It does make me look a tiny bit greasy so if you have oily skin then I wouldn\'t recommend this. It also smells very strongly of sunscreen. Which I do not mind but others may. So I would recommend the other Enlighten products just not the EE cream due to the price.'], 'author': u'jennacouture ', 'date': [u'2016-05-11'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Underwhelming.', 'text': [u'I want to love this so much. My husband compliments me when I wear this because it gives me a healthy/makeup free look, but it makes every pore on my face noticeable. It is very sheer, but it helps even my skin tone.', u'The BIGGEST downfall for me is I get so wildly greasy when I wear this in such a short amount of time. I will finish this tube, but won\'t be repurchasing.'], 'author': u'LiaRose ', 'date': [u'2016-03-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Lovee', 'text': [u'I love love love this product , it was great during the summer with a tan it just made the tan better , this EE cream gives a glowy look , but sometimes applying too much makes it look cakey . name: BB Radiance Beauty Balm
reviews: {'title': u'Very dark color, but lovely cream', 'text': [u'This bb cream should suit a fair, warm skin tone. I have porcelain skin, though, so it\'s way too dark for me and looks like I\'m wearing a spray tan! However, the actual consistency of the product and texture are great. The bb cream seems to blur my fine lines, and doesn\'t stick to dry patches too badly. It is more dry feeling than other Dr.Jart bb creams, but still presents a luminous appearance.'], 'author': u'snowbite ', 'date': [u'2016-10-12'], 'location': u'Spokane, WA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love love love', 'text': [u'This is the best Dr Jart BB Cream for light skin!! I have used other Jart BB Creams and while they look great, they were just a little too dark - it also provides a good deal of coverage for a sheer product.'], 'author': u'evaelaine ', 'date': [u'2016-05-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Nice, sheer coverage', 'text': [u'I got this in the 4-sample Dr. Jart set. ).5 oz of this has lasted me 3 months of almost daily use and I\'m barely through half the tube, so a little goes a long way. It goes on smoothly and gives a good amount of coverage by itself, so when I\'m going for a sheer no-makeup look, I usually mix it with a little bit of moisturizer for a tiny bit of coverage. Makes my skin tone even and bright. I noticed some reviews mention it goes on orange on fair skin. I\'m pretty much as pale as you can get and haven\'t noticed this, but am guessing it might be better on skin with pink (rather than yellow) undertones. All in all, would buy the full size.'], 'author': u'Ftgreene ', 'date': [u'2016-05-05'], 'location': u'Brooklyn, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Météorites Oxygen Care Moisturizer & Radiance Booster
reviews: {'title': u'I LOVE THIS!', 'text': [u'Will repurchase very soon, almost done my full bottle! I use the entire Meteorites line and it\'s great to moisturize my oily eczema rosacea sensitive skin! Yes my skin is a disaster, and this product soothes, colour corrects, and also acts as a primer! I love it! Great under the Meteorites Baby Glow or Lingerie BB cream or Lingerie foundation. I use all of this depending on the day, then I add the Meteorites Perles on top to finish. Beautiful!'], 'author': u'CCthegr888 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-15'], 'location': u'Montreal', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'this moisturizer\'s light formula give a boost to your skin and keep it smooth. definitely recommend!'], 'author': u'HayP ', 'date': [u'2016-07-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Drying.', 'text': [u'I have dry skin. Dry but good skin, since I take real good care of it. And of course, I\'m all about dew. Obviously.I use an essence, serum, moisturizer and spf. Why I mention it? Cause you would think that whatever I put on top of that, wont affect the moisture of my skin. Well, no. I got this and used it on top of everything else, as a primer, underneath my KGD foundation. It smell like violettes... Not a fan of that. It gives your skin a blurred angelical effect, which is quite nice. Not so much radiance, but more like a overal perfected look. Beautiful. YET, after 10 minutes, made my skin feel dry and stiff. Not pleasant. I tried to fix it with a moisturizing mist, but as the last one would dry up, the feeling would persist. Very unpleasant, and so, wont use it ever again. It looks beautiful, but feels awful. Maybe a good idea for more oilier skins? I dunno. Not recommend. My guess is that has a good amount of alcohol on it. The problem is that when you click in the \'ingredients\' tab, all it says is that it contains oxygen... The consistency is of a gel-moisturizer, so not a great idea as a primer, but as a base. I guess.'], 'author': u'CLovesBeauty ', 'date': [u'2016-06-30'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u"Dry Skin's Best Friend", 'text': [u'OMG I am in LOVE with this product. If you have dry skin, this makes a great hydrating primer. It gives your skin a subtle radiance effect and makes it baby soft! The price tag is on the higher end of the spectrum for what I consider a primer BUT I have not encountered a product like this in a long time. The smell is a traditional Guerlain smell but it goes away once blended into the skin! Hopefully this will become HG status!'], 'author': u'VictoriaButton ', 'date': [u'2016-05-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Probably the best out there for young adults', 'text': [u'I started using this about a year ago, been noticing this product has done wonders in correcting fine lines and keeping my eyelid a bit tighter. name: Even Better Skin Tone Correcting Lotion Broad Spectrum SPF 20
reviews: {'title': u'So greasy!', 'text': [u'I don\'t really understand how this is meant for oily skin. My skin, which normally gets a little oily in the T-zone by midday, was gross and greasy 24/7 after putting on this lotion. It felt like it wasn\'t absorbing into my skin and it was just sitting there and creating an oil slick. I can\'t be sure, but I also think this might\'ve also created some tiny little whiteheads on my cheeks. Unfortunately I\'m going to have to return it.'], 'author': u'r3beccachen ', 'date': [u'2016-08-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'amazing', 'text': [u'This stuff is so awesome I\'m so happy I found something that targets both protection against the sun and evens my skin. I have oily skin and after wearing it under makeup for about 9hrs I had zero shine. I\'m over the moon. Will re buy again.'], 'author': u'TeeV88 ', 'date': [u'2016-04-28'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'love it!!!', 'text': [u'Anything with SPF is going to make your skin feel greasy. This definitely makes my skin look dewy but my skin does not feel heavy or sticky. Under makeup it works fabulously. My friend and I discovered we both use it, and she\'s black and I\'m South Asian, so this tells you it\'s good for a variety of skin tones.'], 'author': u'PHaley ', 'date': [u'2016-04-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Greasy and made me break out', 'text': [u'When I first got this, I was actually pretty happy with it. I used it pretty infrequently though. Once I switched to this being my daily moisturizer, I started breaking out and feeling like my skin was very oily all of a sudden. I much prefer the dramatically different lotion and will be going back to that.'], 'author': u'MKristinaD ', 'date': [u'2016-01-29'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Yes and NO', 'text': [u'I seriously wanted to be head over heals with this one; unfortunately, It can make my skin a bit oily which isn\'t even my main complaint. Halfway through the bottle the pump completely stopped working. I can see this happening with a cheaper drug store brand; but, considering the brand and how much money I spent This is insanely frustrating. It creates a situation where I either have to contaminate the remaining product, transfer to another bottle, or just buy a different one. As a student my money is spent sparingly and having half a bottle of lotion that i can\'t use is unacceptable. I wish there were a way to resolve this problem because it\'s making me hesitant to purchase other products from Clinique that require a pump.', u'This was a long rant about a pump I understand but it has been the most frustrating product i\'ve encountered over the past year.'], 'author': u'Xmiller ', 'date': [u'2015-06-06'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Your Skin But Better™ CC+™ Cream with SPF 50+
reviews: {'title': u'Good, not great', 'text': [u'I have very fair skin that is also super sensitive and acne-prone. I bought the fair toned cream, and it does wear all day pretty well, and just one pump is enough for my whole face. My one issue with it - which is why I didn\'t give 5 stars - is that it\'s a bit yellow in the undertone, which will be an issue for more porcelain and cool-toned people.'], 'author': u'mereanne1 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Get a sample', 'text': [u'I bought this because I had heard Lloyd the hype about it but honestly I don\'t like it. It is EXTREMELY full coverage, very thick, by the end of day it looked caked and patchy and yes I use setting powder spray and primer. If your skin is at all dry don\'t bother to will highlight the patchy areas big time. My skin is normal or dry and I had a small patchy area that wasn\'t noticeable until I wore this. It seemed to separate note my face no matter what I did or how much I blended.'], 'author': u'Mindyb99 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Get a sample first', 'text': [u'Everyone raves about this for mature skin. I went and got it and it sits on top of my skin, no matter how much or how little I apply. It\'s cakey and settles in lines and wrinkles and is just not that nice for me. Enough people out there really like it, it could be that it just doesn\'t work for particular skin types.
