name: Facial Treatment Essence
reviews: {'title': u'You WILL see results', 'text': [u'I\'m a 24-year-old Asian female with combination skin, periodic breakouts on my forehead, and an oily T-zone. After much skepticism, I finally purchase a small bottle. Within two weeks of morning and night usage, I have noticed my T-zone become less oily, allowing my makeup to stay on longer, and an amazing dewy glow in my face. I do have dry patches on my cheeks and chin, and unfortunately this product has not helped eliminate this, but the glow in my skin is exactly what I was hoping for by using this product. Applying this is the best part of my morning and night regimen; it absorbs so nicely. I\'ve already repurchased a bigger bottle because I know this works!'], 'author': u'asianpersuasian ', 'date': [u'2016-10-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Perfect for oily skin', 'text': [u'I am 27 and have really uneven skin tone with visible pores and excess oil around the t-zone. I was afraid of using any essence anytime during the year until I was introduced to this essence. I apply one pump on my whole face twice a day after toner and clarifying water, and it amazingly improves my skin after three weeks, including evening my skin tone, minimizing pores and softening the skin texture. It is easily absorbed. It leaves my t-zone a bit oily after the night but does not bother me at all. I also use it with the power rich cream. I would recommend using this essence with other skii products for better results, such as the clear lotion and cleanser. Some people confuse it with the toner since the texture of this product is so light. But it is not a toner. And I don\'t think it improve firmness either. If you are looking for a product to reduce fine lines and lift sagging skin, skii has other products that are dedicated to anti-aging. It is expensive but worths it in a long run. I am in love with this product and can\'t live without it! Of course, not all people receive the same result so I would recommend you to try out the value set (with the clear lotion and one mask) before you buy the full size.'], 'author': u'LazyCrazyDaisy ', 'date': [u'2016-10-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Use entire bottle!', 'text': [u'So worth it! I have super oily skin to where it makes me not want to wear make up because my face looks so shiny when I do BUT... this has seriously changed something in my skin! I don\'t get so oily anymore and I\'ve noticed a difference in pores as well! I use the Olay face wash with the little beads in it to clean my skin and then I jump straight to my SKII Bottle. I pump this on my face and pat it really quickly and then let it soak into my skin. I\'ve been adding a moisturizer on my skin after using this to be sure my skin is staying super hydrated. This has really don\'t wonders for my skin because I\'m not so oily anymore and I can\'t believe that there\'s something out there to really help control it. It is worth the price y\'all! I\'m 22 and it\'s never too early to start :)'], 'author': u'bombshell01 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-27'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love it!', 'text': [u'I think the problem a lot of people have with this that they\'re not using it with the other recommended sk-ii products. I use this with the cleansing oil, clear lotion, and the night cream and I see my skin glowing after a few uses. Of course, all Sk-II products are extremely expensive but I think my skin will thank me in the long run. ', u'My review - fair skin, Asian, 26 years old with minor acne scars, blackheads on nose, and hyper-pigmentation from sun. This product does not break me out. I do 3 drops two times a day into the palms on my hands and gently pressed the essence into my skin until it completely absorbs. Gave it a four star for price.'], 'author': u'misschili ', 'date': [u'2016-10-26'], 'location': u'Tulsa, OK', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: T.L.C. Framboos™ Glycolic Night Serum
reviews: {'title': u"Beware if you're sensitive to Glycolic!", 'text': [u'My skin does not react well to Glycolic acids and I found out after trying several products with it in them. The sephora employee reassured me that this wouldn\'t irritate my skin so I gave it a try and paired it with the Marula oil like she suggested, which supposedly makes it more gentle. However after a few days of trying it my cheeks grew tiny little bumps all along the sides. It\'s like deep little bumps that won\'t surface. Anyways, this glycolic acid is indeed the most gentle of the ones I\'ve tried but sadly my skin won\'t tolerate it.'], 'author': u'kittiekisa ', 'date': [u'2016-11-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

name: BB Tinted Treatment 12-Hour Primer Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Sunscreen
reviews: {'title': u'Good product', 'text': [u'My friend recommended this BB cream for me at the time that I wanted to try a different BB Cream, and I picked this on a whim. However, I really enjoy this BB Cream since it has medium coverage, lightweight, and makes my skin so smooth. With just one layer, all your pores will disappear (only when you apply this BB Cream on, this product wont literately get rid of your pores). One plus point for this BB cream is it has SPF30. You will need a concealer if your skin has some acne scars, pigmentations, or blemishes. On the other hand, it is pretty pricey for a 1.0 oz BB cream ($36 with no tax) but you just need a little bit for your whole face.I got the light shade and sadly, it has pink undertone, I would love it more if it has yellow undertone. Overall, it is a really good option for someone who wants to have a natural skin, lightweight, and long-lasting BB cream.'], 'author': u'Zoey310 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-09'], 'location': u'San Diego, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Cicapair ™ Tiger Grass Color Correcting Treatment SPF 30
reviews: {'title': u'THICK and PASTY', 'text': [u'I thought this was going to be some sort of magical cream but it\'s just thick and makes my face look really pale.', u'I used a pea size amount to cover my whole face. At first, I thought, hm, this cream has some weird colors in it, but because of reviews, I was excited for the magical transformation I hoped for.', u'I massaged the cream into my face and noticed immediately how much it changed my skin color. The look? Like I had mixed Calamine lotion with some regular lotion and applied it to my face. The color is like putty. NOT GOOD.', u'The product also didn\'t absorb, so it sat on my face making it feel heavy and totally unnatural.', u'I used the cream twice before knowing that I had wasted my time with it. THANK GOODNESS FOR SEPHORA\'S AMAZING RETURN POLICY.'], 'author': u'honeypunch ', 'date': [u'2016-11-09'], 'location': u'Los Angeles, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Sorcery', 'text': [u'This stuff is sooo amazing! I have fair, light slightly olive toned skin (blonde hair, light, white but not pink pale white skin). I love the Jart BB cream but only in the summer and when I feel like having coverage - because that is a little too dark for me. This actually turns a color once it\'s on your skin. I have pretty good skin but I get flushed and red very easily and redness is my problem. This is way better than any concealer and foundation. It\'s not cakey and thick, it has mineral, not chemical sunscreen. It\'s moisturizing but not greasy. I still do have a light moisturizer on underneath because my skin is dry. My skin is very sensitive and this does not break me out either. I don\'t know for sure how it would work for darker skin but this is absolutely perfect for me and my absolute favorite product. I was thinking about getting a laser treatment from my PA friend to reduce redness and now I don\'t feel like I need to anymore. I\'m very happy.'], 'author': u'annmh ', 'date': [u'2016-11-09'], 'location': u'Omaha, NE', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Wonderful!', 'text': [u'This little jar of magic brushes away my red blochy skin and makes it look smooth and amazing. It\'s the perfect primer for either my Dr. Jart BB Cream or my YSL foundation. I LOVE THIS!!!'], 'author': u'Zoedenn ', 'date': [u'2016-11-04'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'A GAME CHANGER!!', 'text': [u'Alright, folks. Beauties newest game changer has ARRIVED!! This cream is the stuff of dreams. For years I\'ve dabbled with these "color changing" balms, meant to tone down redness or even out skin tone in general. Never before have I used a product that ACTUALLY WORKS. I put this on in the store, and wasn\'t blown away... YET. Within about 10 minutes, the product really set in and I was left with a basically flawless face. I\'ve attached a photo of this... no editing, no foundation, just the Cicapair and some KVD Lolita, straight from the iPhone. I normally look like a tomato. I cannot WAIT to see how this works underneath my makeup... and combined with my Algenist green drops. This stuff is TOTALLY worth it! You don\'t need much either, so you will get a TON of use out of the jar. I LOVE DR. JART!!'], 'author': u'oliviaalane ', 'date': [u'2016-11-04'], 'location': u'Burlington, VT', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'natural-looking, seems to help acne', 'text': [u'This is a natural-looking skin perfector; it acts much like some cc creams. It is a light green color that turns beige when it is applied to skin. I let it sit for around 10 minutes after application, and it does perfect skin nicely, covering red areas and the redness of blemishes. The finish is matte and you really can\'t tell that you are wearing anything.', u'It also seems to be helping with acne, which is of course a great bonus! Tiger grass is traditionally used for wound repair, so I assume it\'s the high concentration of this ingredient (plus probably some of the others) that\'s helping.', u'However, for fellow people with drier skin, I would not suggest using it as a moisturizer, as some have suggested-- it does not seem to be at all moisturizing for me, and unfortunately, if you have dry spots, it will cling to them terribly. For me, it works best when I use a face oil and moisturizer and then follow these with the Cicapair.'], 'author': u'katnap ', 'date': [u'2016-11-03'], 'location': u'Washington, DC', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'I have extremely dry, sensitive skin and recently had issues with some flaky patches on my eyelids and cheeks that really burned and hurt. I tried some really rich moisturizing creams that I had, but they were irritating my skin even more. I used this for 2 days and my skin is back to normal and I\'m so impressed and happy! It works incredibly well if your skin is irritated or sunburnt; I also used it on vacation when my nose was a little burnt and peeling and the peeling was gone the next morning. It\'s awesome.I\'ve found that I don\'t love this product for everyday use under makeup because I find my makeup just doesn\'t sit well on it, but I want to try the gel formula because I\'ve read that that works better for everyday use, as this can be a little greasy. Overall I definitely recomment!'], 'author': u'Jacqsullivan ', 'date': [u'2016-11-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Good so far', 'text': [u'I have both the lotion+ and gel. I have combination skin so I usually use the gel during the day and the lotion at night. At first, I wasn\'t a big fan of the thickness of the lotion, but I think it\'s because I was so use to the lightweight-ness of the gel. In reality, my skin gets very dry in the fall/winter time so the lotion is perfect. It\'s very lightweight in comparison with other moisturizers and the price is very fair. I have yet to see how it performs under makeup, but I can say that it works very well alone. Will repurchase!'], 'author': u'saeglopur ', 'date': [u'2016-11-08'], 'location': u'Long Island, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'best skin of my life', 'text': [u'I\'ve always had really dry, red skin, especially on my cheeks. I\'ve tried a lot of different moisterizers but never found anything that worked like I\'d wanted. Even the first night I used this lotion, I\'d noticed my skin was less dry and flaky, and after a few days even my skin\'s redness had improved! This product gives the best results of anything I\'ve ever tried, plus it\'s easy to apply and you don\'t need to use much. On top of that, it doesn\'t have a chemical smell and doesn\'t leave my skin feeling oily or greasy. So glad I found this product!'], 'author': u'pinkpuppy ', 'date': [u'2016-11-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Love', 'text': [u'This moisturizer has been my go-to for several years now. I have sensitive acne prone skin that tends to be very dry on the sides of my mouth, forehead, and cheeks. This lotion has NO scent.... Which is a huge plus for me. It is very creamy, hydrating, and leaves your skin feeling renewed. It does not clog pores nor does it leave you oily. Instead, it delivers a very comfortable natural moisture level which I really appreciate. It applies very well under makeup. I use this morning and night after washing and toning my face. I have yet to try a better moisturizer, even the more expensive ones don\'t do the job as well as this one!'], 'author': u'steffyb00 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-04'], 'location': u'San Fernando CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Holy grail', 'text': [u'I love this moisturizer so much for many reasons , One it having no scent which I love . Two , you only need a tiny bit and it will moisturize the skin so well .Three, it has different prices with sizes and I tried all the sizes and they all lasted me a long time and is well worth every penny I spent ,Overall best moisturizer I used ever used!!!!'], 'author': u'ambe24 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'MIRACLE WORKER', 'text': [u'I bought this because a YouTuber I watch made it seem like a miracle overnight. My skin was troublesome that day especially. I put my foundation on and literally took it off because my texture was so bad....I bought the Night-A-Mins along with the GinZing moisturizer, foam mask and a few other things. I washed my face with the cleanser and used the mask, that night i put Night-A-Mins on my face and woke up SO impressed. IT WAS LITERALLY A MIRACLE!! My skin was soft, and moistened and just glowing. I honestly cannot hype this product enough and i did see some negative reviews and it probably has to do with your skin, this product was 200% for me A + the bomb.com. Highy recommend.!!!'], 'author': u'angelicasilva ', 'date': [u'2016-11-06'], 'location': u'Santa Barbara, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: Luna Sleeping Night Oil
reviews: {'title': u'worth its price', 'text': [u'Despite my title of this review I will say that it is a tad overpriced but you\'re really getting what you\'re paying for. These oils do exactly what they say and untrue and moisturize your skin, I have oily skin and I put a very thin layer on occasionally and it makes my face extremely soft. And I have sensitive dry patches that I drown this on and it helps so much. Definitely worth it, but you can also mind a cheaper alternative easily I suppose but there\'s really nothing quite like it.'], 'author': u'AnAveragePerson ', 'date': [u'2016-11-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'transformational', 'text': [u'Best darn facial product purchased yet. Its completely resurfaced my skin to a glowing, smooth wonderkind - seriously have never gotten so many compliments on my skin before! ', u'Normal, combo dry oily skin does wonders with this product. And it smells great also.', u'I\'ve also started to put the tiniest drop in my makeup in the morning and my foundation goes on smooth like Picasso is painting my face. Make sure you wear a physical barrier sunscreen, though.'], 'author': u'alitam ', 'date': [u'2016-11-07'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Just Okay', 'text': [u'I\'ve used nearly the entire bottle so I\'ve given this review a lot of thought, and my take on the product is that I personally don\'t feel that it lives up to the hype.This product might be better suited for someone who is new to oils or retinols, as I prefer a thicker oil and a stronger retinol. I\'ve been using this product before bed for about 6 months now, and it\'s just okay, it does moisturize and keep your skin supple, the blue tint temporarily cancels out redness, but it just doesn\'t have the "wow factor" to make me buy again. It doesn\'t really sink into my skin the way I would like, even with massage, and I\'ve had better success with plain almond or jojoba oils. I personally don\'t mind the herbal scent, but it might bother some people.'], 'author': u'banshee9 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-07'], 'location': u'Cincinnati, OH', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'a must have!', 'text': [u'I\'ve been using this for a month in conjunction with good genes. This stuff is awesome! It sinks in well, leaves my skin feeling moisturized, has helped with some hyper pigmentation and I feel it has helped the appearance of my wrinkles. It makes my skin look and feel plump. My skin has never looked or felt better. I haven\'t made much of a dent in the product, a little goes a long way. It is well worth the money and I will absolutely be buying it again when I run out! Try it, you might just love it!'], 'author': u'missmel ', 'date': [u'2016-11-06'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'worth it', 'text': [u'I received a 5 day sample and after day 2 my skin was improved, but by day 5 my skin was glowing with significant blemish reduction. I bought the full-size and it continues to be the only retinol product I can apply that does not cause me peeling and significant redness from back-to-back applications. People used to Rx strength might be disappointed, but those like me used to using retinol products once a week tops (like me!) should try this product. I\'ve noticed people love or hate this product, hence why, considering the price, I\'d recommend getting a sample first. It\'s been about a month and I\'ve barely made a dent in the jar using a dropper-full per night.', u'The dropper makes application easy, I dispense it along the length of one finger to keep it from ending up more on my sink than face. I do not find the "plant" scent (typical of products heavy in natural ingredients) offensive, and I\'ve never ended up with blue stains on my clothes or pillowcases (how is that even possible?).', u'When I used the sample, I followed with a sample of a Sunday Riley moisturizer, and the combination was incredible. Currently I am using LXMI\'s, however. I have dry, blemish prone skin, so my skin soaks up both the oil and richer moisturizers.', u'I love this product. High quality, fast and visible results, beautiful packaging. Finally a retinol product I can commit to.'], 'author': u'ElleAMA ', 'date': [u'2016-11-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Amazing!', 'text': [u'A friend of mine recommended this and I was a little skeptical at first, but it has done wonders for my skin. I have dry, flaky skin around my nose/cheek area and I\'ve tried so many different kinds of oils for extra-hydration, but none of them hydrate like this product! My forehead and chin are usually oily, but I\'ve noticed that it has gotten much better. I love the gel texture -- it makes it super lightweight and fast-absorbing. My favorite part is the "aqua" effect it gives your skin at first application. It gives it a beautiful glow. My skin feels amazing. I highly, highly recommend this.'], 'author': u'ishoneeeo ', 'date': [u'2016-11-08'], 'location': u'Eugene OR', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Lala Retro™ Whipped Cream
reviews: {'title': u'LOVE', 'text': [u'First, I do not typically write reviews, but this product is so good I had to let everyone know! I purchased this based on the Beautypedia review and I do not regret it. It is like heaven on my skin. It is not heavy or sticky, it melts like butter and sinks in quickly. The breakouts I have been dealing with have subsided and are healing beautifully now. It also plays nicely with other serums that I use. I apply in the a.m. and p.m. I loved this so much I ordered most of the other products in this line during the 20% off sale. Do not hesitate to buy this it is worth every penny.'], 'author': u'shawna548 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-10'], 'location': u'Kansas', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'love', 'text': [u'This is my favorite moisturizer EVER! The first time you scoop it out you think it\'s going to be thick and heavy, but when you actually put it on your face it spreads like velvet and doesn\'t leave an oily residue. What I love about all of drunk elephant products is a little goes SUCH a long way.'], 'author': u'chrissylf88 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-06'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'best moisturizer. PERIOD.', 'text': [u'im one that does not like any type of silicone in my skin care because i dont like the slip and lack of absorption. so im very pleased that this doesn\'t have that.  THIS cream makes my skin feel deeply hydrated and comfortable and also does really make my skin elasticity feel thicker! gives a sort of bounce back/protective shield into my skin which i love. this review may confuse some but to put it simply, this gives amazing moisture to my skin, absorbs into my skin beautifully and makes my skin feel comfortable and hydrated. and also plays well with my makeup application afterwards.'], 'author': u'GlowBabe ', 'date': [u'2016-11-06'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Balancing', 'text': [u'I have been using a sample for about two weeks and decided to order the full size. I am very pleased with moisturizer because my skin is re-balanced. I was using the basic Clinique DD Lotion+ and it was making my skin very oily within a few hours, so I decided to try to look for a new moisturizer. I tried tons of samples (perricone MD, Fresh, Belif, L\'Occitane etc) and some worked but this one worked the best. Since there is are no silicones there is no immediate smoothing of the skin. My skin did not look very different immediately after washing and putting it on in the morning (I use a very gentle face wash so my skin is not shiny[over dried] or flaky after washing). It felt very comforted; I could move my mouth around without my cheeks feeling tight. My skin does not have large pores, but some moisturizers will clog my pores (like L\'Occitane); I did not experience any pore clogging with this moisturizer. When I looked in the mirror after work at 3pm, I was very pleased with the glow and balance my skin has (I do not wear foundation).', u'I warm up maybe half a pea size size in my fingers then pat it on my face.'], 'author': u'cambodian ', 'date': [u'2016-11-05'], 'location': u'Bothell, WA', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Good', 'text': [u'I like this moisturizer a lot! It\'s not sticky, absorbs well, and overall recommend! Personally, it\'s a bit difficult to spread but I think that\'s expected since it\'s very rich - yet still light. Although it\'s very moisturizing, my skin can still feel dry in winter, but this is because I am on RetinA and others shouldn\'t really have this issue.'], 'author': u'jamesjacob ', 'date': [u'2016-11-02'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel
reviews: {'title': u'Excellent Moisturizer', 'text': [u'If you have a normal, combination, or oil skin and need a basic moisturizer, this one is absolutely for you. It is a moisturizing gel formula, so it is really lightweight, absorbs quickly, and does a great job in order to hydrate your skin with fair price. However, in the winter, it won\'t make your face moisturized enough as this is gel formula, but Clinique also carries a heavier one, it is Lotion Formula, too. So you can switch to the Lotion Formula when the winter is coming. I have been using this for a couple years, I have tried so many different moisturizers because I always want to explore more, but when my skin is in trouble, I always go back to this one to calm my skin down. It is really an excellent product of Clinique that I keep repurchasing so far!'], 'author': u'Zoey310 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-09'], 'location': u'San Diego, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'back to basics', 'text': [u'I\'ve used Clinique on and off since high school. Their moisturizers have to be some of the best around. When I saw they had a gel I was delighted and am thrilled with the results. It\'s lighter and goes on easier than the lotion but I find for me it provides enough moisture that I don\'t have to use a separate night moisturizer anymore. And cost size, it works better for me than lots of expensive ones.'], 'author': u'freezetime75 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-07'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'not great', 'text': [u'Purchased this lotion twice with the entire line and the second purchase made my skin break out. Returning it.'], 'author': u'crimsnnclovr ', 'date': [u'2016-11-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'My only Moisturizer', 'text': [u'Great choice for someone in there 20\'s and 30\'s who doesn\'t need a heavier cream yet. I use it every day and never looked back!'], 'author': u'virginiaf ', 'date': [u'2016-11-05'], 'location': u'Port Charlotte, Fl', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Non-clogging, but not overly moisturizing', 'text': [u'I really like this moisturizer. I bought the sample because I very rarely get through an entire bottle of moisturizer before looking for another one. I have very acne-prone skin and am currently on some prescription-grade cream for it which makes me very dry. This moisturizer has not clogged my pores at all and worked well with my acne medication. It did not make me oily like other reviewers mentioned. I didn\'t give 5 stars only because its not as moisturizing as I would have hoped (especially with winter approaching!) But I just make sure to use a heavier moisturizer at night and that seems to be ok'], 'author': u'Leah9494 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-31'], 'location': u'Toronto, ON', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

reviews: {'title': u'Soft and Soothing', 'text': [u'I was hesitant to try this since it seemed so lightweight I thought it would just disappear on the skin and be used up quickly. However after trying and loving so many of the Sunday Riley products I gave this a try. ', u'It is incredibly soothing and feels so good on the skin. It sinks in but leaves a soft velvety layer on top that isn\'t thick or greasy. Just soft. My skin felt so protected and pampered and it sits well under makeup. Been using this at night to seal in my serums and in the morning as a makeup base.'], 'author': u'kittiekisa ', 'date': [u'2016-11-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great for brightening', 'text': [u'I used to have what\'s called oily-dry skin: oily skin but with patches of dryness. A Sephora associate recommended this to balance the moisture in my skin and help get rid of my acne scars. While the fragrance can definitely be overwhelming, the results are worth it. It keeps my skin a tiny bit too moisturized, but it did balance my skin and help fade old scars.'], 'author': u'bedazzled503 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-07'], 'location': u'Chula Vista, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Perfect', 'text': [u'I use this as a boost of moisture in the winter as my skin gets really dry (as most peoples do in the harsh winters of Winnipeg). I find using this in combination with the luna oil at night, I wake up with perfectly moisturized and glowing skin! For a little extra boost I\'ll use it in the morning as well if the weather is particularly harsh. A little goes a long way with this cream! lasted me almost a year last time! Worth it in my books!'], 'author': u'ChynnaLynn ', 'date': [u'2016-11-06'], 'location': u'Winnipeg, MB', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Tidal is the perfect lightweight, quick absorbing moisturizer that I needed. I use it morning and night, after all my other skincare products. It\'s very fast absorbing, and doesn\'t leave my skin feeling or looking greasy. The fact that I can used it in the morning is a miracle, because moisturizers make my skin goes crazy. I\'ve tried so many different kinds and brands and nothing has worked the way that tidal does. A little tiny bit goes a long way, like just a tiny dab. What\'s great about all the Sunday Riley products is that you need the smallest amount for them to be effective, so each bottle/jar will last a really long time. I also like that this has enzymes in it, so I\'m getting a little treatment as well. I have nothing negative to say about my experience with this.'], 'author': u'eggspoynge ', 'date': [u'2016-11-04'], 'location': u'Brooklyn, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

It\'s non greasy and absorbs directly into your skin leaving it bright and glowing!!'], 'author': u'BabyBash ', 'date': [u'2016-11-04'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Personally I liked this product, I\'ve been using it for years and it gives a great coverage, but the only flaw that I have with this is that my face is oily and I noticed that towards the middle of the day I get super oily....other than that I also notice that it matches my skin tone awesomely the shade that I have is Dark..pretty decent product :)'], 'author': u'ARP123 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-30'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Rose Deep Hydration Face Cream
reviews: {'title': u'not for dry skin', 'text': [u'So I have extremely dry skin and was recommended this at the store. I got a sample enough for two applications but this was so lightweight I had to apply another moisturizer 15 minutes after this one because my skin felt so parched. This feels nice and refreshing putting on but doesn\'t really deliver the hydration needed if you have dry skin. If you have oily or normal skin I think this would work better for you.'], 'author': u'Kabshz ', 'date': [u'2016-11-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I wanted to give 4 stars but I had to return it :( - I was originally so excited to get my hands on this after using a sample, but it did not work under my Laura Mercier tinted moisturizer (which I refuse to give up) so it had to go back. Caused my LM to just kind of sit on top of skin, as if there was a barrier (and I have a simple morning routine and didn\'t want to have to add a primer to it). I also have hyper-sensitive skin and I think the rose fragrance was an irritant for me as well. LOVE my other Fresh products but this one wasn\'t meant to be for me.. Sigh.'], 'author': u'taylortoo ', 'date': [u'2016-11-06'], 'location': u'Toronto, ON', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'good, not great for dry skin', 'text': [u'This is a nice product. It is priced well for what it is. I have combination skin that\'s very sensitive, and gets very dry on the cheeks. It gave me a decent amount of hydration, but nothing enough for me to stand up and exclaim about. I think if you have normal skin, this will be really hydrating and nourishing to the skin. But for dry skin, I would suggest pairing this with an oil underneath or a hydrating serum like Caudalie S.O.S, but on its own, it\'s not enough. Another thing is that the smell is just gorgeous. I love everything rose, so that\'s what really prompted me to buy this. I used it until it was finished, but probably wouldn\'t repurchase until summer. Again, normal and oily skin try this because it might fit you perfectly!'], 'author': u'diorista ', 'date': [u'2016-11-06'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I really like this cream. I use it as my night cream after cleansing. A bit too much for me to wear under makeup during the day with my sunscreen and daytime moisturizer. I love the the clean smell and it moisturizers my combo/somewhat dry skin well.'], 'author': u'alafair ', 'date': [u'2016-11-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

One positive is the great smell. I will return to the Black Tea cream.'], 'author': u'amerci ', 'date': [u'2016-11-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

name: Premium Beauty Balm SPF 45
reviews: {'title': u'new holy grail!', 'text': [u'This is my new holy grail. I\'m extremely fair, with temperamental combination skin, uneven tone and splotchiness, plus the occasional hormonal acne that can scar or leave dark marks. Because of hormonal problems, I\'ve also gotten a lot sweatier (on my FACE); on top of THAT, I recently moved to a new climate. A few months ago I was HORRIFIED to walk into a bathroom one evening and check the mirror and realize that my PREVIOUS "holy grail" foundation was now melting and beading all over my face! I was a sweaty mess! It was BAD. I had been meeting colleagues for the first time, oblivious to the state of my own face, and I was so embarrassed.', u'So I took a sample of this stuff with me on a trip to Austin put it to the test! It turns out, I can sweat ALL DAY in Dr Jart, even in sweltering heat, and I just look RADIANT. It covers my scars and evens my skin tone, but it doesn\'t look like I\'m wearing anything! (I did find, through sweaty expermentation, that I should periodically add a little transluscent powder to my T-zone--there IS such a thing as TOO radiant--but my foundation held up and definitely didn\'t melt or pill in the heat.) Since then I have always worn this on "sweaty" or "active" outdoorsy days (and every day!), confident that it will stay put. It doesn\'t break me out, and the added sun protection is just the cherry on top.', u'I think what surprised me most is how natural this looks once blended; usually these "one-size-fits-most" shades are way, way too dark for me. It\'s sorcery! I will never wear anything else. Please never go away!'], 'author': u'jennatar ', 'date': [u'2016-11-08'], 'location': u'San Francisco', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Everyday go-to, comes in Two shades', 'text': [u'I\'m Asian with medium-tone normal skin. This product feels light and gives a good coverage while looking natural, not too pink or too yellow. SPF 45 is a huge plus. On regular days, all I need is some concealer with this in the morning, and that\'s it. I also love that this BB cream comes in a deeper shade, I get pretty dark in the summer from outdoor activities and light-medium can make me look ghostly. I can use darker shade as base and lighter shade on highlight areas.'], 'author': u'2racy ', 'date': [u'2016-11-08'], 'location': u'Larkspur, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Protection and coverage', 'text': [u'I am a MUA who prefers light coverage foundations. Even then, I stick to BB creams or tinted moisturizers. This has light to light/medium coverage. It covers my slight uneven skin, from previous breakouts, but lets my skin show. The SPF is also key. The ONLY anti aging product is SPF, nothing other than it is truly anti aging.'], 'author': u'EBecks ', 'date': [u'2016-11-04'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'MUST HAVE', 'text': [u'This is a must have product for me. It might appear light when applying but it blends in so well, hides imperfections and makes skin look amazing. Plus it has high SPF and other good stuff for the skin. I\'m on my second bottle and a bottle lasts a long time. One pump is plenty for me.'], 'author': u'JenC585 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-01'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'T Zone Trouble', 'text': [u'I have mature combination skin.This product may work well during the dryer winter months but during the warmer months my face (particularly my T zone) turned into a shiny slick mess within a couple of hours if not less. Powder did not help much. Primer and powder did help more, but at least for me, defeated the purpose of why I like using a BB/CC cream in the first place (all-in-one convenience, etc.). I must say, when I first applied it, I really liked the way it evened out my skin tone with a nice natural finish. So, I will try it again in the colder months and hope it wears better.'], 'author': u'AgeToGrace ', 'date': [u'2016-11-01'], 'location': u'Paradise Valley, AZ', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}
ingredient: Water, Cyclopentasiloxane, Glycerin, Phenyl Trimethicone, PEG-10 Dimethicone, Hexyl Laurate, Dipropylene Glycol, Dimethicone, Arbutin, Cyclohexasiloxane, Butylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Magnesium Sulfate, Aluminum Hydroxide, Stearic Acid, Calcium Stearate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Propylene Carbonate, Polysorbate 80, Propylene Glycol, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Talc, Tocopheryl Acetate, Adenosine, Alcohol, Lecithin, rh-Oligopeptide-1, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, PVP, Platinum Powder, Steareth-20, Chrysin, N-Hydroxysuccinimide, Palmitoyl Oligopeptide, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Methylparaben, Butylparaben, Propylparaben, Iron Oxides, Titanium Dioxide, Zinc Oxide.

name: Color Control Cushion Compact Broad Spectrum SPF 50+
reviews: {'title': u'perfecting', 'text': [u'I snagged a generously sized deluxe sample of this a while back and loved this product. It is all-in-one so you don\'t need any separate brush, making it convenient for travel. It provides light to medium coverage with a dewy, healthy finish. I tried the Laneige cushion too and though they are the same parent company, I think this formula is much better and more natural looking. Got tons of compliments on my skin when I wore it but not with Laneige.'], 'author': u'rainicorn ', 'date': [u'2016-11-05'], 'location': u'Miami, FL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great cushion - high price', 'text': [u'I love this cushion. The coverage is dewy and buildable, they offer more shades than most Korean cushion compacts come in, and this company\'s patent on an anti-microbial cushion makes me feel better about using the cushion. I know some don\'t like the smell, but I actually love it. It is quite strong, though. I would recommend smelling it before buying the cushion.', u'That said, this product is pricier than most Korean cushion compacts. So much so that I only use this product for touch ups on the go. (Although it\'s absolutely perfect for that.) ', u'My other main criticism of this product is that you cannot buy refills. It is such a waste of plastic that you have to throw out the compact after two refills. And it\'s disappointing, because Amore Pacific\'s other lines (Hera, Iope, Laneige, etc) all sell cushion refills for their compacts. That\'s the only reason I may not repurchase this product that I, honestly, love.'], 'author': u'alleighw ', 'date': [u'2016-11-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great for dry skin, buildable,', 'text': [u'Love this, have been using it for a couple of years. Dewy finish, buildable coverage, sunscreen actually works. I go between using a brush and my fingers to apply. Too much product gets wasted in the sponge. I also FLIP the cushion in the compact when it seems to be running dry and get several additonal weeks of use out of each compact.'], 'author': u'AnnmarieLawson ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Hyrdating', 'text': [u'I love how extremely hydrating this foundation is. I have severely dry skin and was introduced to this foundation over a year ago and have continuously purchased it. The application is nice with the sponge applicator and is somewhat buildable - I would say light to medium coverage (my skin is not acne prone or oily at all). I definitely recommend this product for those with dry skin and looking for a great everyday look. The first ingredient is bamboo sap instead of water so the hydration factor is on point. I really enjoy this foundation.'], 'author': u'AdrienneMarieC ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'Eczema Relief', 'text': [u'Tried this and the aqua bomb (which my boyfriend with combination/oily prefers) and I liked this moisture bomb much better. The aqua bomb burned my eczema and made it a little painful to apply to my face but this one feels like a light dew. The consistency may be too thick for some people, but my dry skin needs all the moisture it can get. At its worst it gets dry and a little flaky but this moisturizer has prevented that so far. Will be using this to combat the dryness of the winter too. My boyfriend also enjoys this product, so we share. :) I struggle to find a moisturizer that won\'t affect my sensitive, easily irritated eczema skin. So happy I found this product. Definitely worth the money, and I\'ll be repurchasing on and on. Wish there was an even bigger jar too. I apply it post shower, pre-makeup, and after I take off my makeup. Love!'], 'author': u'bonbrizzle ', 'date': [u'2016-11-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'perfect for winter', 'text': [u'I\'ve used Clinique\'s dramatically different moisturizing lotion religiously for the last six years (since I was 16 and started to learn how important moisturizer is) but I\'ve noticed the last two winters that my face was getting noticeably drier, no matter how much moisturizer I put on. When I got the aqua bomb as a sample from Sephora, I immediately loved it but felt like I needed to use quite a bit as well. I discovered the moisture bomb for dry/normal skin and it\'s perfect for me. Since it\'s a lot heavier than my Clinique or the aqua bomb, I only use it at night. It really skins into my skin and my skin feels amazing by the morning. The only thing I wish was different about the product was that it was in a pump bottle. I generally don\'t buy products in jars because I hate dipping my fingers in it repeatedly, but this stuff it worth it. I don\'t think I would use this product in the summer though, as it would be a little too oily. I could see using it if I get a sunburn to help moisturize and prevent peeling.'], 'author': u'katybennett ', 'date': [u'2016-11-07'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Surreal Skin Argan Finishing Balm
reviews: {'title': u'In love!', 'text': [u'This product is amazing! It\'s the perfect primer for smoothing skin and leaving a matte finish even after foundation. My skin is combo/oily but this product keeps the oil from coming through all day, especially around my nose which was my biggest problem area. My only complaint about this product is the price. $36 is a little more than I like to spend on a primer/illuminator but then again you don\'t need a lot of this product at all! It spreads very well with just a little amount; I\'ve had mine for over a month, using almost daily, and I\'ve barely made a dent in it. Definitely worth a try!'], 'author': u'agrove23 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Good for some skin types, but not worth the hype', 'text': [u'So.... I wanted to like this more than I actually do.', u'My skin is combination. In short: this is nice for skin prep, but do not rely on this for setting your makeup--especially if you use lots of liquid makeups! Your makeup will be sliding within hours. Powder makeups play best with this mist.', u'Personally, I no longer use this on top of makeup. It is nice directly on clean skin in the morning or at night.', u'Those with very dry/mature skin may love this mist to add dewiness to makeup or to seal in moisture to the skin.', u'The shine factor comes from silicon. To learn more, please see my video <3'], 'author': u'PureSunshine ', 'date': [u'2016-11-07'], 'location': u'Toronto, Canada', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

name: U.F.O. Ultra-Clarifying Face Oil
reviews: {'title': u'amazing', 'text': [u'Okay this oil is saving my skin!!! Let me start by saying I am dry, sensitive & acne prone. Really annoying skin type... I also scar very very easily. Now after using this TWICE (mixed in with my Marula oil) I noticed a huge difference in my break outs, redness and scars... even all over texture & pores. After about a week my skin is much clearer and brighter. Everything is healing very quickly & my scars are seriously lightening!! I\'m very very happy. I will be using this in my routine for quite some time from now on (:'], 'author': u'littlemikaykay ', 'date': [u'2016-11-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'depends on your skin', 'text': [u'I had high hopes for this face oil but it wasn\'t right with me. The first day or two of using the sample I got seemed great- it DID seem like my skin improved overnight. I was really optimistic about it from the first results I saw, so I purchased the full size. After about four days it was really drying my skin out and my face was starting to flake and peel. Maybe this would be more effective for me if I wanted to put the effort into figuring out a regimen where I only incorporate it x time of day, x days a week, but I need something that requires less thought, so I returned it.'], 'author': u'dmn0489 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-07'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'love', 'text': [u'I adore this stuff. I have moderately oily, acne-prone skin.. nothing too serious. But this stuff ensures that my skin is in check. I thought it wasn\'t doing anything for awhile, so I skipped out on using it for a few days and found that my skin looked way oily and I started to notice blackheads resurfacing. I really do think this product combats acne. This stuff is a game changer for oily skin'], 'author': u'ajjaha ', 'date': [u'2016-11-07'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'Wonderful Surprise', 'text': [u'Great serum for a great price. This is an excellent serum, I only use one full pump for my entire face. I use these before primer, then tinted moisturizer for a smooth soft feeling and look.'], 'author': u'maryfrancis ', 'date': [u'2016-11-10'], 'location': u'West Bloomfield, MI', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'Not what I was hoping', 'text': [u'After reading reviews, i was quite excited to try this product. However, after using it several times for a couple weeks, the product didn\'t really do what I was hoping. It was my first time using a serum and I found that when I put it on, my skin would feel sticky afterwards and I had to put my moisturizer on right away. I ended up returning the product as for the price, I have now found another product which leaves my skin much more smooth and not sticky.'], 'author': u'beautyfirst07 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-08'], 'location': u'Victoria BC', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: FACE Anti-Aging Moisturizer
reviews: {'title': u'unfortunately way too tacky', 'text': [u'I used this for about a week day and night. I loved everything about it except for one thing. It stays tacky on my skin all day long! It\'s super annoying to have my face feel sticky all day. (Or night). I can seriously put this stuff on at 11 pm and wake up at 8am and my face is still a bit tacky. My dry skin even sort of feels like it looks oilier throughout the day while wearing this with or without makeup over it and that is just unheard of for me. I thought maybe I was using too much so I tried using as little as possible. But I needed to use a decent amount to get it to spread over my whole face/neck as it\'s pretty thick. I couldn\'t find a middle ground so I think it\'s just that way with my skin which really blows because I loved so many things about it. ', u'It smells like lavender, it obviously moisturizes really well, didn\'t irritate my sensitive skin, felt like it plumped/minimized fine lines, and the ingredient list made me happy. If it weren\'t for the very long lasting tackiness, this would be a 5 star rating all the way.'], 'author': u'jmich ', 'date': [u'2016-11-07'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Best Moisturizer', 'text': [u'I am 58 fair, good skin, but need moisture, moisture, moisture. Finally this does it. Got rid of the little fine lines, using with Dr. Gross Firming peptide Milk. OMG, so great! Love! Tried every moisturizer in Sephora and other department stores, this moisturizes!'], 'author': u'schmippy ', 'date': [u'2016-11-06'], 'location': u'Greenwich, CT', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'OBSESSED', 'text': [u'This moisturizer is amazing. I\'ve been trying so many different natural ones because I\'m trying to stay away from harsh chemicals now and they either make me break out or aren\'t moisturizing enough. This one keeps my face feeling super hydrated (but not greasy) and hasn\'t made me break out at all. It\'s too soon to tell if it\'s working on the anti-aging front, but I will continue to use it regardless! Please carry the eye cream and serums, Sephora! I would love to use them all!!'], 'author': u'Christina33 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-04'], 'location': u'Orange, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'very moisturizing, a bit on the heavy side', 'text': [u'For moisturizer, it does a fantastic job. There is a faint smell of lavender but it goes away pretty fast after applying on my face.  I use this in the winter only because it is quite heavy for my normal skin. I\'m not sure about the antiaging effect because I have not used it long enough. I\'m just very happy it does not break my out. ', u'Then again, i have fairly nice skin so I don\'t see much improvement.'], 'author': u'koreangirl237 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-30'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Organza for the skin.', 'text': [u'I have always loved the Resveratrol Lift line from Caudalie, even though I am just in my late 20s. The combination of hyaluronic acids, Resveratrol, peptides and emollients is extremely reparative for dry skin, regardless of the age. The added bonus is the antioxidant Resveratrol which keeps cellular communication going and fights free radical damage. The texture of this cream is also a win: it is more elegant then even the most high end brands, and without adding chemicals, toxic ingredients, or an exorbitant price tag. Don\'t be afraid of this not being enough. I know almost all skin types will love this. It\'s super light and silky. It reminds me of organza or cashmere (appropriate marketing for sure because it\'s accurate)! Just buy it. You won\'t regret.'], 'author': u'freshflesh ', 'date': [u'2016-10-11'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u"What I've been looking for", 'text': [u'I am a dance teacher and sometimes I just want to add a little something to my face even though I know I\'m going to sweat. It stays through hours of sweat and I\'m so in love! I have tried other ones but they always make my face feel tight and dry while this one doesn\'t. name: Cicapair™ Tiger Grass Cream
reviews: {'title': u'Love this stuff!', 'text': [u'A Sephora employee raved about this cream to me when I asked about a good night cream. I was skeptical but after using it for a week I think this stuff is really amazing. ', u'I\'m really into skin treatments - face masks, peels, etc - and this stuff is the perfect moisturizer to put on afterwards because of all the restorative and repairing properties. ', u'Usually I\'ll put this on before bed, enough that my face feels a little tacky to the touch but not more than that. Overnight, my skin really drinks it in and I wake up with super soft smooth skin. ', u'I don\'t know how I lived without it but I\'m so happy this cream is in my life!'], 'author': u'theSima ', 'date': [u'2016-11-10'], 'location': u'Los Angeles, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: B Hydra™ Intensive Hydration Gel
reviews: {'title': u'Best moisturizer for combo skin!', 'text': [u'Of all the moisturizers i have used this is for sure the best for combo skin! after cleansing my face no matter what i use my skin feel dry and tight and throughout the day i get more and more oily. this moisturizer makes my skin feel hydrated while still keeping my oil at bay throughout the day. it is also light enough to wear under makeup and absorbs quickly.'], 'author': u'mare09 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-08'], 'location': u'Toronto, ON', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'B Hydra', 'text': [u'I absolutely LOVE this gel. I used to use the Sunday Riley Bionic in the morning (which is a relatively thicker product than this but the company decided to discontinue that product. I need something that will provide hydration and keep my skin moisturized and hydrated throughout the day. I decided to give this a try (mainly because I was also testing out the rest of the Drunk Elephant line) and so far I am loving this. It doesn\'t absorb quickly into my skin and there is a slight tacky feel once t\'s on, but once it does absorb, that tacky feeling isn\'t there. Again, this is only my experience so you may not have to deal with this. I love the refreshing feel of this product and enjoy using it. It also keeps my skin hydrated and moisturized and i have a glow once the product has absorbed and dried.'], 'author': u'nia878 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-07'], 'location': u'NJ', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Amazing!', 'text': [u'This, along with the entire DE line, has changed my skin. I use this twice a day - in the morning I use it by itself and at night I layer the virgin marula oil over top. It has done wonders for my skin!', u'Backstory - for MONTHS I was experiencing terrible breakouts, my skin was suddenly super dry when it had always been combo, and I had terrible texture. This combined with the glycolic serum, the c-firma, and the marula oil has my skin back to it\'s healthy, balanced self!'], 'author': u'katimcg ', 'date': [u'2016-11-07'], 'location': u'Kansas City, MO', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Terrible results', 'text': [u'This moisturizer had a terrible effect on my skin. It went on okay, but stayed tacky far longer than I like. My face felt tight after application, which I disliked. After a couple days of use, my skin was visibly dehydrated. I wish I could give it zero stars.'], 'author': u'JanicefromNS ', 'date': [u'2016-11-06'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I use this along with the C-Firma serum every morning. It works great in conjunction with a serum as it will help that product go a long way and and easily absorbed, non-greasy boost of moisture. ', u'It works especially great in summer where my skin needs less intense, oily moisturizers. I think in the winter I will need to add something else in the mornings, but ill continue to use it to stretch my serums!'], 'author': u'HannahConda ', 'date': [u'2016-11-05'], 'location': u'Seattle, WA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

reviews: {'title': u'LOVE', 'text': [u'i got the Lotus mask and absolutely LOVED it. my skin feels and looks so amazing but i dislike the packaging because you can\'t reseal it.'], 'author': u'hannah014 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-10'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'4/5 for good reason', 'text': [u'I loved the product itself! I have an oily complexion and it managed to control the oils of my face and leave my skin feeling hydrated and gave it a nice, natural glow. Very happy with that. However, I\'m disappointed with the packaging. There are about anywhere from 4-6 uses in this one packet and it is not resealable. But, like I said, the product is wonderful!'], 'author': u'Juniper0329 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u"Not as good as I'd hoped....", 'text': [u'I was pretty disappointed with this moisturizer, though I\'m a big fan of Origins. I really love this line\'s face wash too! Unfortunately the moisturizer didn\'t work for me... It ended up making my face really oily more so than moisturized.', u'On top of that, if you use this product with other products (like sunscreen) it ends up leaving a white residue on my face which wasn\'t so appealing. For a night cream it\'s not a big deal and moisturizes well but I definitely have to wash my face in the morning.', u'I was happy when I finished using this moisturizer and don\'t plan to buy it again.'], 'author': u'didi259 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-07'], 'location': u'Anaheim, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'LOVE', 'text': [u'I have extremely sensitive skin so its extremely hard to find products especially skin care which don\'t break me out - This doesn\'t at all! I have been using this for over a year and a half and i will continue to repurchase. The smell is so refreshing and i find this to be a light yet very moisturising gel/cream - It isn\'t greasy at all so sits well under make up. It is a must have, my fave!'], 'author': u'Hayley250 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-07'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Not as moisturizing as I thought', 'text': [u'As a dry-skinned gal, I was expecting this to be really hydrating and nourishing because all of the amazing ingredients but it just wasn\'t enough. ', u'To start, the consistency reminds me more of a gel/lotion hybrid. Nothing like a cream like described but I definitely would recommend this for people with oily skin. ', u'It absorbs quickly but my skin felt a lack of moisturize (especially now when it\'s getting into the colder season).', u'If you\'re looking for a moisturizer that smells divine and is lightweight, then this is it.', u'If you\'re looking for something that is intensively hydrating then this won\'t cut it!'], 'author': u'DaisyHan ', 'date': [u'2016-11-06'], 'location': u'Toronto, ON', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'18-24'}
{'title': None, 'text': [u'Im so inlove with the scent.'], 'author': u'sepadik ', 'date': [u'2016-11-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

name: Future Response Age Defense Creme
reviews: {'title': u'Best Creme', 'text': [u'I got this as a sample and I am definitely in love! It is silky soft and smells amazing, glides on very smooth on your skin and even makes make up application seamless. It is very pricey but for what it does, it is 100% worth it. I have combination skin depending on the weather and I feel as though it has definitely smoothed the surface of my face immensely. Try a sample before purchase to see the hype!'], 'author': u'stacylam ', 'date': [u'2016-11-01'], 'location': u'Toronto, Ontario', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Moisture Miracle', 'text': [u'I have been using this moisturizer for about three weeks as part of a trial skincare routine with a deluxe AmorePacific sample set (treatment cleanser, enzyme peel, future response serum, and this moisturizer). After trying countless high-quality and often pricy products in a vain effort to reduce dullness, eliminate flakiness and get a little of my youthful glow back, I stared to worry that there was no hope for my aging 40-plus skin. In literally one use, these AmorePacific products did the trick. The moisturizer is lightweight on the skin, but a little goes a long way. My skin feels moisturized and refreshed with no residual greasiness. The smooth finish also improved the application and appearance of my makeup. As an added bonus, my sensitive skin usually breaks out briefly when I swap moisturizers, but I didn\'t experience any breakouts or sensitivity to this great product.'], 'author': u'instg8r ', 'date': [u'2016-10-30'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'big fan of amorepacific', 'text': [u'I love all the products from this line! First i got the cushion sample, then i have to go for the full size, then i got this cream for sample...and im here to get a full size. Just wish the price tag is lower, i want the face wash too! I\'m going broke'], 'author': u'llovespell ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'best cream', 'text': [u'I have used couple luxury brand skincare, this one is definitely the best. It does everything it says, I have only tried this set for a week, I can already see the different. I am combination oily skin, with acne and acne scars. After a week, my acne scars are less visible, my acne are pretty much gone (hope won\'t come back before period), the redness from acne are gone. My skin never look so dewy and healthy, it\'s not super moisture feeling on my face, but it moisture my skin, and my foundation is applying beautiful! I will continue finish the trial set, and will definitely purchase the full size.'], 'author': u'Sherryzhang ', 'date': [u'2016-10-15'], 'location': u'NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Thick & Luxurious but not greasy.', 'text': [u'Love this cream! I actually mainly use it at night. It\'s thick, silky and luxurious without being greasy. I feel like this actually skinks into my skin and moisturizers and not just sit on the top. I spent a hour or so with one of the amorepacific reps who went through and explained everything and ingredients etc. I know their stuff is pricey but totally worth the money.'], 'author': u'missscorinne ', 'date': [u'2016-10-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'A Trustworthy Staple', 'text': [u'I bought the smaller size as an interim oil cleanser until my usual cleansing oil balm came in the mail from Korea. Although the price is a little high for the amount of product, I found the cleanser to be highly effective and that a little goes a long way! 1 pump sufficed for a simple morning cleanse, whereas 2 pumps was better at getting off all my makeup. I was also happy that it didn\'t sting my eyes at all, and that it had enough substance that it didn\'t run down my arms. All in all, a great and trustworthy product! I plan to repurchase.'], 'author': u'Emma613 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-08'], 'location': u'Ottawa, Ontario, Canada', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'its ok', 'text': [u'Does a decent job of breaking down the make up on your face. after i apply, i use a washcloth to completely take off the oil and makeup from my face. not drying at all. once I\'m done with that, i then go in with my clarisonic and face wash to completely remove everything.'], 'author': u'nia878 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-07'], 'location': u'NJ', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Gentle, Takes Makeup Right Off', 'text': [u'I\'ve been using this oil for a number of years and love it so much I continue to pay its painfully high price. I have combination skin, and somehow the oil moisturizes the dry spots and gently cleans the oily spots clean as a whistle. It immediately breaks down makeup, even the most hardy waterproof mascaras. I use a Mia after I wash my face with this oil and my middle-aged skin has never looked better.'], 'author': u'ilakdala ', 'date': [u'2016-11-05'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'perfection', 'text': [u'Removes everything so gently, even stubborn liquid liner and mascara. I only have to VERY gently massage my eyes to get it all off, which is awesome. I always follow with another cleanser after to make sure I am squeaky clean.'], 'author': u'dagnys ', 'date': [u'2016-11-03'], 'location': u'Edmonton, AB', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Great stuff', 'text': [u'I am actually very impressed by this product. It\'s a nice oily consistency, but not overly cooling. I like how it turns into a face wash when you add a bit of water. It does an excellent job of getting all my face makeup off - when I go over my face afterwards with a bit of micellar water on a cotton round, hardly any leftover makeup is left on the pad.', u'My only complaint is that it\'s not great for getting eye makeup off. It will get the majority of your eyeshadow, but it doesn\'t remove mascara very well. I\'ve also found that the oil kind of gets in my eyes and takes a while to go away, so I always remove my contacts beforehand. Still a great product, though, and I will repurchase. I only bought the travel size one, and it has lasted me for a long time.'], 'author': u'twinklefairy ', 'date': [u'2016-11-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'awesome stuff', 'text': [u'By about September our weather starts to turn even drier and the winter winds pick up. name: Ceramidin™ Cream
reviews: {'title': u'Best. Moisturizer. Ever.', 'text': [u'I have been searching for my HG moisturizer for as long as I can remember and I can finally stop searching. I have fair, sensitive, combination yet acne prone skin that is dehydrated but not dry and this stuff hits all my needs in a simple tube. It\'s hydrating but not greasy, thick but dries to a light finish and the smell is heavenly. I am a fan for life and just stocked up with the VIB rouge sale!!!'], 'author': u'surfnstars ', 'date': [u'2016-11-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Favorite', 'text': [u'Another reviewer suggested trying it first and I agree; it may not be for everyone but it\'s perfect for my combination skin', u'This cream is pretty thick but doesn\'t set up greasy; it sets matte and serves as almost a primer before a makeup primer (I use Dr. Feelgood by Benefit) and has made my skin feel flawless ', u'The container is a metal tube with a key and a little goes a long way'], 'author': u'hannamichelle ', 'date': [u'2016-11-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'absolutely love this product.', 'text': [u'This cream when used with the ceramidin liquid works incredibly well. I absolutely love the calming scent, and the texture of this cream. I moved to Las Vegas from Miami and the difference it has made to my skin is incredible. I could not find a lotion that could moisturize my skin well enough to prevent dry patches, etc. One week of using this product and I can already feel a dramatic difference in my skins texture. reviews: {'title': u'An eczema sufferers dream come true', 'text': [u'I have had eczema since I was a child and have had to use medical grade ointments and creams for my face in the past. I got a sample of this a few months ago, and soon bought the full size version. I have extremely dry skin and use this product under my makeup in the morning, and at night when I\'ve taken my makeup off. This oil is super hydrating and not terrible on the wallet compared to similar products.'], 'author': u'nlglv ', 'date': [u'2016-11-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'hmmm.....', 'text': [u'It\'s just an oil, nothing attractive to me. {'title': u'Basic moisturizing oil', 'text': [u'I have oily skin but i always wake up with a very tight feeling in my skin. Im not dry but I guess my skin is dehydrated. or maybe its the sudden change in weather here. Who knows. bought this to mix with my moisturizer at night. I add a few drops to my moisturizer and although i look like such a grease ball when i go to bed, my skin is super soft in the morning and i haven\'t had that tightness since i started using this. I don\'t think its a miracle product but it has definitely helped with the overall tightness i was experiencing. there is a strong "earthy" smell to this oil but its not overbearing and its somewhat relaxing. as long as my products work, i don\'t care what they smell like. there is some fragrance added to this oil but its listed on the very end of their ingredients list so typically that suggests there isn\'t much added to the product. i could do without it but it doesn\'t seem that there is much of it.'], 'author': u'nia878 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-07'], 'location': u'NJ', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great for my oily combo skin', 'text': [u'I received a sample of this product quite some time ago and only recently did I finish the small bottle. I put this oil on once a day, before I go to bed. I must say, I never thought that an oil would work wonders on my very oily skin. It keeps my skin hydrated without making my face greasy looking the following day. It also gave my skin a nice glow! {'title': None, 'text': [u'I have been using this product for over a year and I love it. It has gotten me through the harshest of winters. Perfect for the dry, cold months ahead.'], 'author': u'Anonymous ', 'date': [u'2016-10-29'], 'location': u'Boston, MA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Beauty Water
reviews: {'title': u'the title says it all... "Beauty Water"', 'text': [u'I have been on the hunt for this product and finally after visiting 2 Sephora locations I found it and bought the last one on the shelf.This is only my second day using it but I can definitely say that this is already my holy grail toner/micellar water. This is the most gentle, hydrating, refreshing toner I\'ve ever used and the best part is that it feels like you\'re just putting water on your face. I use this on a cotton pad to take off any eye makeup, follow with a makeup wipe for the rest of my face, cleanse my face, and then wipe my whole face again with it and it takes off any makeup residue leaving your skin fresh and clean. I have asian skin and am obsessed with korean skincare so I was not surprised that I fell in love with this, just buy it you won\'t regret it!'], 'author': u'jennnle ', 'date': [u'2016-11-09'], 'location': u'Los Angeles, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Stung my skin', 'text': [u'For some reason my skin felt irritated after using this, it stung for a few seconds upon contact. I think one of the exfoliants in this product was too acidic/strong for my skin. My skin became so oily for a few weeks due to the irritation. It was the perfect toner but sadly my skin did not tolerate it.'], 'author': u'kittiekisa ', 'date': [u'2016-11-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'skin saver', 'text': [u'The weather is starting to get cold and I have all these dry patches on around my lips and chin. I never had this problem before and it\'s so annoying that my skin gets flakey. So my sister had this for awhile from sokoglam and I decided to try it. This product really helps my skin drink up some more water that it desperately needed. The dry patches are gone after a month of nightly use. I use a cotton pad and dab all over my face and let it dry before putting on moisturizer. This really saved my skin as I didn\'t know what else to do. I asked for so many samples at Sephora and really nothing helped my dry flakey skin but this product. You won\'t regret this purchase. I have Asian skin so I\'m always drawn to Asian skin care brands that really understand my skin the best.'], 'author': u'hawaiilove ', 'date': [u'2016-11-07'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Your Skin But Better™ CC+Illumination™ Cream with SPF 50+
reviews: {'title': u'not illumination, glitter', 'text': [u'This product should not be used by anyone other than tinkerbell. There is soooo much glitter in this product. It doesn\'t look like a healthy glow. It is obvious I have product on my face which defeats the purpose of a CC cream if it doesn\'t look natural.'], 'author': u'FLckohl ', 'date': [u'2016-11-10'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Meh', 'text': [u'I\'m not very experienced when it comes to makeup, but I still buy products to try out and experiment with in hopes of one day getting comfortable with wearing it outside of my house. I usually stay away from foundations because I have a hard time making them work on my skin; I find that they all look cakey and powdery which isn\'t something I like. So I saw this and figured I\'d give it a try because it claims to be illuminating and it is a sunscreen, tinted moisturizer, and cc cream in one. I had high hopes for this product and was kind of left down. I used this product a few times with a beauty blender and I also tried it with my fingers. I do prime before hand, but it just didn\'t look that good. I think it\'s a little heavy, but I am still going to keep using it and trying to find a way for it to work for me because it wasn\'t cheap and I don\'t want it to go to waste. I didn\'t find it to be illuminating I just found it to be glittery.'], 'author': u'BellaMorte ', 'date': [u'2016-11-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Not what I was expecting', 'text': [u'I\'ve used illuminating bases in the past and this wasn\'t at all like any I\'ve used in the past. It looks like I\'ve put a highlighter all over my face. Its not cute. Adding to the fact that the formulation is also different - do yourself a favor and stick with the original formulation and add a drop of oil or a little bit of a liquid illuminator.'], 'author': u'CherBear63 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-07'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'GLITTER BOMB!!!', 'text': [u'I was in store, once again trying to find a foundation for the upcoming winter season - as a side note I usually end up having to mix 2-3 foundations because my skin tone is a nightmare to match. I came across these, no matches in the regular line so tried the illumination ones. I found a near perfect match in the color \'light\'. The store was closing so I just grabbed and checked out. Played with it home, and I was still impressed. Wore it to work the next day and spent the day getting comments about how it looked like I dunked my face in a vat of glitter. Personally it was a horrible experience and completely unprofessional. ', u'I give anyone who is thinking about getting this product a piece of advice, play with the product, and let it completely dry. I never saw the glitter while the product was wet, but when it dries the illumination is just a word for a bunch of micro glitter.'], 'author': u'SarahJS ', 'date': [u'2016-11-07'], 'location': u'Indianapolis, IN', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Definitely worth ur money!', 'text': [u'long lasting and real skin finish. The extremely fine shimmer in it does nothing but brighten up your skin. Love love love!'], 'author': u'Babybliu ', 'date': [u'2016-10-30'], 'location': u'Frankfurt am Main', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}
