name: Juno Hydroactive Cellular Face Oil
reviews: {'title': u'Game changer', 'text': [u'I started getting dry patches on my cheeks while breaking out along my jawline a few months ago. This has been a total game changer for me, 2 weeks in they were gone and I haven\'t had a flare up since. I smell like salad when I go to but it is more than worth it.'], 'author': u'FritteredAway ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'The smell', 'text': [u'This is better for combo, mostly dry skin than argan oil. I find it absorbs very well and doesn\'t feel greasy later in the day. Unfortunately the earthy, kitchen cupboard is not very pleasant while applying. Thankfully, it dissipates after about 5 minutes or so.'], 'author': u'SunkneeG ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Life changer!', 'text': [u'After just one week of use, I have noticed a dramatic difference in my skin\'s appearance. I have dry, sensitive skin that was covered in small red bumps from an allergic reaction. Within a few days of using Juno, the redness and bumps disappeared! My skin also looks amazing under my makeup. I apply four drops to my face between cleansing and moisturizing, morning and evening. Highly recommend!'], 'author': u'pippaluc ', 'date': [u'2016-10-11'], 'location': u'Kansas City, MO', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I don\'t see dramatic change on my skin, but this oil definitely not making my skin dry which is a good sign! I have dry skin, so I need this oil to stay hydrate at night!'], 'author': u'BCQueen ', 'date': [u'2016-09-27'], 'location': u'NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Juno- Thick, Good', 'text': [u'I started with the Luna & Good Genes so I had to try this. It seems much thicker than the Luna which I was a little concerned about at first because it\'s meant to be used in the am before foundation but it melts into my skin great & doesn\'t seem to affect the use of my foundation. I\'m relying on the benefits for my skin now. So far so good'], 'author': u'Notbasic ', 'date': [u'2016-09-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}
ingredient: Rubus Fruticosus (Cold Pressed Blackberry) Seed Oil, Vaccinium Corymbosum (Cold Pressed Blueberry) Seed Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Cold Pressed Chardonnay Grape Seed Oil) Seed Oil, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cold Pressed Cranberry) Seed Oil, Rubus Idaeus (Cold Pressed Red Raspberry) Seed Oil, Daucus Carota Sativa (Cold Pressed Wild Carrot) Seed Oil, Nigella Sativa (Cold Pressed Black Cumin) Seed Oil, Brassica Oleracea Italic (Cold Pressed Broccoli) Seed Oil, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil.

name: Wild Rose Vitamin C Active Brightening Oil
reviews: {'title': u'Amazing!', 'text': [u'I struggle with oily skin and live where it is always humid and I have to say this oil is holy grail status! I use it after doing face masks/washing my face and it absorbs quickly into the skin leaving my face feeling soft and moisturized without being heavy like other oils tend to do. It does smell like rose, but not like the Fresh rose products which I was expecting and love. The scent isn\'t overwhelming for me but it was a little sweeter than I was expecting.', u'Using the rose oil as a moisturizer under my makeup has actually helped me control my oil throughout the day and even improved the makeup application. Because a lot of the products I use are meant for oily skin (Hourglass Immaculate foundation, Cane Austin mattifying primer, Skindinavia oil control spray, etc) they can initially have a drying effect, but the oil has helped counter that. ', u'Overall great product and 100% would recommend and purchase again!'], 'author': u'Kamlin ', 'date': [u'2016-11-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'on the fence', 'text': [u'It\'s gorgeous looking but I\'m not sure it\'s doing anything. It\'s VERY thin which normally I would be ok with but after using josie Maran Argan oil maybe I expect a different consistency--will keep using but I think it\'s not doing anything for me....'], 'author': u'tivolilou ', 'date': [u'2016-11-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Best. Oil. Ever.', 'text': [u'I\'ve never used an oil before, but I am addicted to this! You only need a little, it\'s very moisturizing, but it didn\'t dry greasy. My husband asked me after 5 days of using this, why I looked younger. That\'s literally all the validation I needed, lol. You won\'t regret this purchase, especially if you like the smell of fresh roses.'], 'author': u'momof3girls28 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great oil', 'text': [u'I received this as a delux sample with promo earlier this year. I actually used the promo with multiple order and I have 3 of these delux sampples. Boy am I glad I got these. For the longest time i didn\'t use it because I am a product junkie, I have lots of products and I did not have goodexperience with oils. This is sooo awesome. I started using this about a week ago after I came back from Florida and my skin was looking drab after sun exposure. My skin is so much brighter and some of my acne scars have started to fade. It\'s not a miracle but I\'m really happy with this. I use about 3-4 drops with a dab of moisturizer or sunscreen and it\'s perfect. Not oily. Absorbs quickly. I will def repurchase after I run out'], 'author': u'taztaz ', 'date': [u'2016-11-06'], 'location': u'Boston, MA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'will repurchase', 'text': [u'I don\'t have acne but I do have hyper pigmentation. I have fair skin so whenever I get a pimple, it leaves nasty red marks all over my face, making it look like I have acne. I\'ve had it for years and no matter what I use, it doesn\'t go away. I mix this oil with my moisturizer for about a few weeks and it has lighten my scars, tremendously. It hasn\'t completely fade but it\'s improving. It contains Vitamin C, which is known to have a great brightening effect. Definitely will repurchase, this is the best my skin has ever looked.'], 'author': u'sonyakim ', 'date': [u'2016-11-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}
ingredient: Isoamyl Laurate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Squalane, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate, Dimethyl Isosorbide, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Rosa Gallica Flower Powder, Alcohol Denat., Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Water, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Salicylate, Bisabolol, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citronellol, Eugenol, Geraniol, Glyceryl Caprylate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Hydroxyisohexyl 3-Cyclohexene Carboxaldehyde, Fragrance, Physalis Angulata Extract, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Extract.

name: Moisture Surge CC Cream Hydrating Colour Corrector Broad Spectrum SPF 30
reviews: {'title': u'Clinique moisture surge CC light', 'text': [u'I have been using this for many years & really love it. It is a light & natural "Cream" I use as my makeup. I also love Clinique\'s "Even Better" Makeup for a heavier type. Hope this helps someone else.'], 'author': u'rosebud20314 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-30'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Not what I had hoped for', 'text': [u'I ordered this CC cream in the lightest shade,which turned out to be quite a bit too dark still. I only wear it when I am tanned but find that it separates and becomes patchy within hours. I have tried it with numerous primers with no success.'], 'author': u'stodannes ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Why did they discontinue super moisture?', 'text': [u'This was suggested to me as a substitute for the Clinique super moisture foundation that was my winter staple. It is not even a poor imitation. The colors are far too limited but the texture is terrible. The super moisture was silky smooth and blended beautifully. This stuff is gunky and after a few hours it cakes up and makes little lumps if I touch my face. Really not a good product and certainly no substitute for super moisture.'], 'author': u'avaclare ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': u'Boston MA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great product', 'text': [u'I\'m ordering this for the second time, only a shade lighter (very light). I dab it all over my face then rub it in and it works as a great foundation. Occasionally I\'ll dab concealer with a sponge over sun spots- always use Laura Mercier\'s Translucent setting powder to finish. This product has never caused me to break out and it says a lot if I buy something a second time.'], 'author': u'skaren80 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-08'], 'location': u'Reading, MI', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'a little thick', 'text': [u'I only bought this because sephora stopped making cc cream...it\'s much less shear than I\'m used to cc cream being....closer to a foundation...but it\'s not bad. It blends really well. And it stays put for the whole day. I probably won\'t buy it again though.'], 'author': u'che11y ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

name: Vitamin Enriched Face Base
reviews: {'title': u'Holy Grail', 'text': [u'I absolutely live for this face base, it smells like a dream, is super creamy and hydrating and leaves me feeling so fresh!!! I have dry skin and this totally evens me out, couldn\'t live without'], 'author': u'tcc15 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Beware if you have acne prone skin', 'text': [u'I really wanted to love this product. I have heard people saying how much it has helped their complexion so I decided to take the plunge. My skin is oily in my T zone, occasionally acne prone with some hyper-pigmentation, and sensitive, so I am picky with which products I use. I enjoyed the lightweight texture, the citrus smell, and how soft this product made my skin feel, but it caused me to break out in places I never break out such as my cheeks and along my jawline. I took a break from using this for a few weeks and my skin started to clear up a bit. I gave it another try two days ago, and lo and behold a new pimple on my cheek has started to form. Pretty disappointed that this product did not work for me and I will have to return it, but maybe it would be better for someone with skin that is not as annoying as mine.'], 'author': u'av213 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-06'], 'location': u'Brooklyn, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'amazzzzeballz', 'text': [u'The best thing I could have ever put on my face, I\'m hooked for life!'], 'author': u'ekaays ', 'date': [u'2016-11-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Favorite primer!', 'text': [u'This makes your face so smooth and soft, and lasts for a really long time! I\'ve had the same jar for a year and four months now, and I\'m just now running out. I only use it once a day, but I\'ve used it every day since I bought it. You don\'t need a whole lot of product, it spreads really well! I don\'t moisturise my face at night, but if I have a dry spot I can just put this on before I go to bed and it\'ll go away within a week. When using this before you put on makeup, be sure to allow a few minutes between the time you put the primer on and when you start putting makeup on to allow it to really absorb into your face. It also smells AMAZING!! It smells like lemon and really wakes me up in the morning. All in all, I highly recommend this product'], 'author': u'emilyconradt ', 'date': [u'2016-10-31'], 'location': u'Seattle, WA', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'13-17'}

{'title': u'Dramatically Improved Skin Tone and Texture', 'text': [u'This was the only change in my routine (other than washing my hands immediately before touching my face, every time) and I noticed a dramatic increase in texture and tone improvements for my skin. It smells great, and it never caused me to break out even during the first couple weeks I switched to it. I use it twice a day, and it has lasted me about 5 months so far, just now needing to replace it. A little goes a long way.'], 'author': u'MyDerniereDanse ', 'date': [u'2016-10-25'], 'location': u'Grand Rapids, MI', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}
ingredient: -Grapefruit and Geranium Fragrances: Leave a light, uplifting scent on skin.

name: Black Tea Firming Overnight Mask
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'Even after just a few nights of using this product I have noticed a visible difference in the firmness of my skin. Can\'t wait to see how my skin can improve in the long term!'], 'author': u'megs0213 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-08'], 'location': u'Arlington, VA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Alert! Alert!! Alert!!!', 'text': [u'I really wanted to love this product but after using it one night I woke with little bumps all over my cheeks!!! This has never happened before and I don\'t have sensitive skin. My skin is combination and slightly oily in the t-zone. I\'m so glad that didn\'t buy this product but received a 7 day sample pack with my online purchase. I\'m still recovering from the breakout..so disappointed!!! Wish I would have read reviews before using this on my face.'], 'author': u'monica010 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-07'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Worth the Price!', 'text': [u'I know i know, its expensive! But let me tell you, you will see noticeable difference and your skin will appear so soft and flawless. When I forget to use this product, my skin isn\'t as refreshed in the mornings and I always regret it. This is a large size so it will last, as a little goes a long way. A great product for use in our mid-20\'s trying to prevent aging early. Would recommend any Fresh products - they work great!'], 'author': u'AmyWats ', 'date': [u'2016-11-05'], 'location': u'Denver, CO', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"You get your money's worth!", 'text': [u'As painful as it is to shell out the almost $100 for this product, I really can\'t afford not to have this product on hand at all times! ', u'After a week of using, my skin was supple,firm, and glowing! I have been using it for almost 2 years and I haven\'t found anything that is better. Totally worth the price tag and I will keep buying :)'], 'author': u'King88 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-29'], 'location': u'Atlanta, GA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

And nothing has givin results from the very first use like this cream has!! My husband commented on my skin after the 2nd night of usage.. I couldn\'t be more pleased!! name: 100 percent Pure Argan Oil Light
ingredient: Natural Argan Isostearylic Esters.
reviews: {'title': u'dries out my skin', 'text': [u'This product really helps when I am having a breakout. It helps my acne and my face looks luminous without being shiny or looking oily. After a week or so of use my face dries out horribly. I have tried using this several times thinking maybe my skin just needs to adjust but once my skin hits that really flaky phase I end up switching back to a lotion.'], 'author': u'mixedberry ', 'date': [u'2016-11-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Good for body', 'text': [u'I\'ve had my bottle for about 10 months now. That\'s because I actually don\'t like it for my face. It absorbs quickly into the skin but then I find that my face is a little on the dry side around 4 hours in (so I\'d apply in the morning and then face would be dry around lunch). So the bottle sat half full on my counter for a while. About a month ago I decided to give this another try, same results on the face. HOWEVER, decided to use this on my body instead by dropping little droplets along my limbs and rubbing it in. It actually works really well on my body. Hair not so much (it\'s a bit heavy). So if you\'re looking for a nice light body moisturizer this is an expensive option.'], 'author': u'ilikebread ', 'date': [u'2016-11-04'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'so far so great!', 'text': [u'I have very oily skin. I mean within 3 hours of makeup I\'m an oil slick. I was very skeptical about buying an oil but after reading reviews I went for it. First impression, way less oily feeling then the original Argan oil. Sinked into my skin within a few minutes. Doesn\'t make me feel greasy. Fave part about this stuff, I added a drop to my beauty blender and my foundation applied like a dream!! Will repurchase!'], 'author': u'jade2112 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'glowing skin!', 'text': [u'I use this at night after cleansing and before my moisturizer. I have oily acne prone skin and this does not break me out. I wake up in the morning and my skin is hydrated and soft. I also put it on the ends of my hair. Love this product!!'], 'author': u'ccsalter ', 'date': [u'2016-10-30'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Rainforest of the Sea™ Drink Of H2O Hydrating Boost Moisturizer
reviews: {'title': u'holy grail', 'text': [u'This product is one of my holy grails!! I went to sephora at square one about a week ago and i was at Tarte section when a girl came up to me (her name is Nancy) i think she works as a tarte specialist or something like that but nevertheless she let me try this product on my face and at first i was kind of hesitant of how sticky it felt but then minutes later she applied the Rainforest of the sea foundation after... oh my god this moisturizer is not just a moisturizer. Its also a primer!!! It keeps your make up intact and in place. So i purchased the sample at checkout and have been using it since every morning. Thank you nancy for recommending this and also to Tarte for having this line!!! Its awesome and its the best moisturizer i have ever tried!!! Will definitely purchase the full size!!! \u2764\ufe0f\u2764\ufe0f guys buy this one if u want a 2 in 1 product. A moisturizer and a primer!!!!'], 'author': u'tessajose ', 'date': [u'2016-11-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Amazing!', 'text': [u'Got the deluxe sample of this with points.. love love love! I have dehydrated skin, especially as we enter these colder months. {'title': u'Perfecting my skin', 'text': [u'I am 33 with mostly oily and extremely sensitive skin. I\'ve spent a lot of time trying different products to find one that works well under my makeup (absorbs quickly, not greasy, SPF) and doesnt make me break out. This is it. I use it in the AM only (I use a no-SPF moisturizer at night) either alone or mixed with a tinted moisturizer for color coverage and it performs flawlessly either way. I do feel like I should have bought the smaller jar because a little goes a LONG way and I have no idea how to use it all in 12 months, but this is my holy grail of daytime moisturizers. My skin is clearer, brighter, and softer. 5*!!'], 'author': u'Reinette ', 'date': [u'2016-05-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Bye Bye Redness™ Neutralizing Correcting Cream
reviews: {'title': u'Love', 'text': [u'Redness is one of my biggest skin issues. I have used creams to try to get rid of it and nothing worked. So I had to resort to trying lots or lots of anti-redness primers and tons of green color correctors. I have spent hundreds of dollars over the year. All of that is done now. This cream is amazing. I often wear only this because it totally covers my redness and looks great. It\'s perfect for my skin tone (light- medium with neutral undertones ). I am so happy to have found this. You only need a drop. I have applied with fingers, brush or beauty blender and all have worked well. I highly recommend. ', u'Just a note I purchased this at another store but not that Sephora calls it I will buy it at Sephora. Although it will be awhile before I need it because a little goes a long way'], 'author': u'LJ136 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'It really works!', 'text': [u'I have redness from rosacea and have tried just about every green concealer and color corrector out there with mediocre results at best. Either the color was off or the texture was wrong. I had pretty much given up on covering my redness. I tired this at a store on a whim and was amazed by the results. It covered the redness completely! Unlike the usually sticky green stuff, Bye Bye Redness is beige in color and has the consistency of a light foundation or CC cream. It\'s not heavy at all. It comes in a small jar, but a little bit goes a long way. It lasts all day. It\'s also formulated with all kids of good stuff including colloidal oatmeal, hyaluronic acid and aloe. You can use it just on the red spots or use it all over like a foundation. Before finding this product I used to use a a lot of full coverage foundation, but now I just use this to cover the red patches and follow with a light dusting of powder on my face. It\'s a miracle!'], 'author': u'ladivacarlotta ', 'date': [u'2016-11-08'], 'location': u'New York City', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'first time reviewing', 'text': [u'I have been dealing with post acne marks and active acne for over a year due to hormones and I have tried every foundation/ primer/ cc/ concealer out there and this truly is what I\'ve needed the whole time. I just use a tiny bit over cheeks where I have the most redness then use my IT cosmetics cc over everything and it covers redness all day. I have very fair skin that\'s why I use the cc over everything to help blend color. I have been an avid Sephora buyer with this acne issue and never felt so passionate about a product to write a review until now.'], 'author': u'slloos ', 'date': [u'2016-11-07'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'BEST', 'text': [u'I have dry fair skin and redness. This is hands down the best product for me. I buy three jars at a time. I apply heavily all over my face them dab with a stipling motion using a dry it cosmetics brush to smooth out and remove excess. My skin looks perfect. It\'s insane. I follow with a light dusting of setting powder such as bye bye pores or whatever I have nearby using a huge fluffy brush. For those who say it\'s too dark, try again and experiment with application. I have seen this on a friend with porcelain white skin and it works beautifully. She applied it all over, blended it out then applied a small amount of her foundation. Her skin looked perfect like a model. I have also seen this on olive acne prone skin, worked equally well. Just take your time learning how to apply for your skin type and complexion. Price is great in my opinion and can\'t live without it.'], 'author': u'ilovepugs ', 'date': [u'2016-11-02'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'not for light skin or overall use', 'text': [u'I\'m fair skinned, I have roseacea and dry skin.I thought this would work if I used it all over my cheeks and then applied my foundation, but I was so wrong.It\'s AMAZING at canceling out redness, but it\'s so freaking dark that it looks like I used a foundation for medium skin tones. Even after applying my fair foundations, it just was still too dark, and also really cakey from using 2 highcoverage products on top of each other.', u'If you have light-medium to deeper skin then this will work great, but not for the lifter girls. ', u'Even spot-concealing a pimple and then using really light concealer on top- it just didn\'t work for me.'], 'author': u'micaela101 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-01'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

The product is very thick but not greasy, a little goes a long way and it absorbs well. reviews: {'title': u'major breakout', 'text': [u'I\'ve never used a product that made me break out this bad. {'title': u'Thick but Moisturizing', 'text': [u'Echoing previous reviews, this product is EXTREMELY thick. If you have oily skin or you tend to sweat on your face on a hot day, I would not recommend this for you at all. When using this product, a little goes a long way and even then it takes a long time to absorb into your skin. I will apply this at least 30 minutes before I plan on putting on makeup. It will keep your skin moisturized throughout the day, but I am getting the sense that it is starting to break me out. Will probably not repurchase.'], 'author': u'thetanna ', 'date': [u'2016-10-12'], 'location': u'NYC, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Thick, but Awesome!', 'text': [u'This is a very thick moisturizer however, when used in the correct amounts it works wonders! I have extremely sensitive skin and super oily skin, as I am a teenager. This seems to be the best moisturizer I\'ve tried! Defiantly recommend this other than the fact they test on animals :('], 'author': u'1Emmi1 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-04'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'A little goes a long way! Too much and it makes my skin feel thick and oily, so be very careful in application - it\'s a very fine line between feeling bright and refreshed and feeling like wearing greasepaint. {'title': None, 'text': [u'A little goes a long way with this cream! I started using the Shiseido eye cream and night cream, and decided to give this one a try as well. {'title': u'Works overnight... seriously', 'text': [u'I usually have perfect looking skin, but I accidentally used a Kon Gen Do product line that started causing super redness and bumps all along my cheeks. I did the Blue Tansy mask, the Rose Water spray and then used Moon Fruit before bed... i just woke up and my cheeks are NOT RED!!!!!!!! The two months of redness caused by other products literally went away overnight. ', u'I will definitely be a loyal Herbivore brand follower. ', u'I also bought the blue oil, coco body scrub, and the rose water.'], 'author': u'dipraznjc ', 'date': [u'2016-11-06'], 'location': u'Arlington, VA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: GenOptics Aura Essence
reviews: {'title': u"Good for radiance, doesn't work on dark spots", 'text': [u'I\'ve been using this product for about 30 days every night before I go to sleep. I did notice a change in the radiance of my skin as people were complementing me every day on how great my skin looked. I use a little bit extra on a few dark spots on my chin but I have not seen any real improvement there. I would recommend for gaining radiance but not for spot reduction. I received this product for free from SK-II.'], 'author': u'turahbey ', 'date': [u'2016-09-18'], 'location': u'new york, ny', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Pricey but works great!', 'text': [u'I honestly have not heard of this brand before until I got a free sample to test and review. I was a bit hesitant to try it at first so did my research and was surprised to find out that the price is more than $200! I was curious on what this product is all about and why it is priced that high so I gave it a try for more than a week so here it goes:', u'PACKAGING: The bottle looks expensive. Its like a pearl and a bit heavy. It has a dropper instead of a pump.', u'PRODUCT: It is thick liquid. Very easy to apply and not sticky.', u'OVERALL: After more than a week of trying, it does helped smoothen my skin and put a little glow. Works well except that price is a bit high.', u'Product received complimentary for testing purposes.'], 'author': u'DheeDhee ', 'date': [u'2016-09-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Gen Optics aura Essence', 'text': [u'I ve been into Asian skincare products for some time now .I was very excited about the opportunity to try SK-II Genoptics aura essence complimentary for my honest review. I have never tried anything like this before. Aura essence is a thick textured serum, which promises to reduce any dark spots and uneven skin tone. The packaging of the product is amazing, bottle is heavy and looks very luxury. I have to mention auto-fill dropper pump, it lets you have exact amount of serum you need for the best result. Serum has a fresh scent. I do prefer my skincare products scentless, but its not an issue here. I really love the smell plus it fades away quickly and doesn\u2019t stay on my skin.I have been using this product for 2 months now. i usually apply it after I double cleanse and tone my face . I am lucky enough not to have serious problems with my skin ( no acne scars or age spots), just a little redness and luck of moisture. The product absorbs fast and dries completely in few seconds, without leaving my skin sticky or greasy.Its pretty moisturizing and I don\u2019t need to apply more creams after.My skin started looking healthier and radiant almost right away. My face is so smooth and glowing from the inside. What else can I wish for? May be for the better price? Its hard to pay 240$ for the product, no matter how great it works.I received this product complimentary from SK-II'], 'author': u'Shvedchik ', 'date': [u'2016-09-16'], 'location': u'New York,NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'SK-II GenOptics Aura Essence', 'text': [u'I wasn\'t really impressed by this product. I have used high-end skin care before and was super excited to try this! But I really saw no difference for the better. Actually my usually very clear skin started breaking out. Not something I\'m used to as a 39 year old! I actually tried it for a little longer than I should have just in case it was the crazy hot summer. But it still didn\'t help. I did receive this product from SK-II for free in return for an honest review but unfortunately this product did not work for me.'], 'author': u'blovish ', 'date': [u'2016-09-14'], 'location': u'Roxbury Township, NJ', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Whenever I see a product that can cost this much I have high expectations for it. After trying this product I was not dissappointed. Within the first week I\'ve noticed in difference in skin tone and brightening to my skin. After use of 3 weeks I decided to try and not use it for a week to see how much of a difference it made. My skin still looked even but lacked that brightness or glow that the product gave. This product absorbs fast into the skin. It doesn\'t feel tacky at all, almost to say matte but not quite. This product was sent to me by SK-II to review. I\'m glad I received it and it\'ll be hard to not have it once the product runs out.'], 'author': u'CelestieD ', 'date': [u'2016-09-12'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'A MUST HAVE', 'text': [u'I recently just finished my first full container of this (which lasted me MONTHS even though I use it absolutely every single day) anyhow, I have hereditary dark circles under my eyes and putting this on before applying concealer makes SUCH A DIFFERENCE. {'title': u'Love It - Holy Grail', 'text': [u'I\'ve actually bought this product more than once. A very rare thing. It\'s cool, cushiony and absorbs quickly. There\'s no sticky feel. I have extremely sensitive rosacea prone skin. This is a life saver. I use it on top of my RX creams. Making me nervous that it\'s out of stock in several places!!'], 'author': u'Kinelle ', 'date': [u'2016-08-20'], 'location': u'Virginia', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'3rd jar and still in love', 'text': [u'I\'m pretty sure this product is for older ladies but considering how bratty and sensitive my skin is, it works amazing which is why I am on my 3rd jar. I like that it\'s a physical sun blocker instead of a chemical one so I never lick my lips and get the awful taste of sunscreen or headache from the smell like other spf moisturizers. A good sunscreen is important that provides long lasting coverage and doesn\'t clog your poor and this product does that. Plus since my skin gets red and aggravated easily it calms it down and has a light luminizing finish that\'s a great prep for makeup. It\'s really rich so a little goes a long way. Which is why it may seem like it\'s expensive it really is not since it last forever.'], 'author': u'bonniefest ', 'date': [u'2016-08-16'], 'location': u'Austin, TX', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Great product. I searched high and low for a moisturizer with minimum spf 30 AND the right cosmetic properties. reviews: {'title': u'Amazing Creme', 'text': [u'I love the way this sinks into my skin. A little goes a long way so for me it lasts a long time. I use this at nighttime, so when I wake up, my skin is still soft.'], 'author': u'gapgirlmt ', 'date': [u'2016-11-07'], 'location': u'Billings,MT', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Perfection', 'text': [u'I struggle with VERY dry skin! I have gone through many different moisturizers and this is the only one that has worked for me. I can have combination skin at times where it gets oily throughout the day but it\'s usually because I hadn\'t exfoliated. This has become my go-to that I carry it in my purse now so I don\'t leave home without it. The only con I have is the price, but a little goes a long way with this product. I only use about a dime sized amount on my face every morning before applying makeup. The whole jar has lasted me almost a whole year. I\'m on my second jar now and will definitely buy a third one once I run out.'], 'author': u'danii007 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'My Miracle in a Jar', 'text': [u'I\'ve left numerous reviews for Ole Henriksen Products in the past so this one deserves my experience as well :). ', u'I found this cream a number of years ago, and after trying to venture off to find something better...once again I come back to the best day cream EVER. This stuff is a miracle worker. Its light weight, and absorbs quickly. Doesn\'t leave too much of an oily residue after appliaction(if your skin is super dry and has an issue absorbing product, I usually just brush a bit of Mineral Veil after application). ', u'For super dry skin that\'s also hypersentstive to almost anything- I love this cream and can\'t ever stray from it. Its one of the only day creams I\'ve found that is anti-aging and doesn\'t make me feel like I just slathered my face in butter. Also, if you love the smell of oranges this stuff is HEAVEN.'], 'author': u'csalley9 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-13'], 'location': u'Tallahassee, Florida', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'horrendous smell', 'text': [u'OK, Seriously I\'ve never written a bad review for any product so this is a first. I was so excited to try this because I\'m head over heels in love with the truth serum. The second I opened the jar, the scent was so disgusting that I literally checked the expiration date on the bottle thinking maybe I got an expired batch. Wrong! It just stinks! Like spoiled fruit with a lingering scent of rancid food that stays on your hands and face for over 30 mins. Moving on and forcing myself to get passed the smell, I then noticed my face looked oily and greasy. Like Crisco on my skin. No way could makeup go over this product so I decided to just use it as a night cream. Unless I wake up looking like Heidi Klum, this will be going back to Sephora. This smells nothing like the awesome truth serum and is honestly the most rancid smelling cream I\'ve ever tried.'], 'author': u'Cj858 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

name: Un-Wrinkle Night
reviews: {'title': u'Not for sensitive skin', 'text': [u'I have slightly sensitive skin. I can handle most products, but not all. Unfortunately this is one of the few that falls under can not. It\'s a beautiful texture and feels lovely on the skin. Without fail I wake up red and with minor breakouts the next morning that only become exasperated with continued use. I think it would be great for others who don\'t have that issue.'], 'author': u'zynthiar ', 'date': [u'2016-11-07'], 'location': u'Queens, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'this is the best!!!', 'text': [u'I bought this night cream based on a suggestion from someone at my local Sephora. It\'s the BEST product I have ever used! I have oily skin that\'s sensitive. A lot of retinol products cause me irritation that leaves my skin a red, flaky mess. This product give me smooth , glowing skin that I get tons of complements on! I\'ve had friends buy it after they have seen the difference it made in my skin. My skin feels smooth and moisturizer. It\'s clear and even. I\'ve seen my fine lines improve to the point where most are not even noticeable (I would say gone!). This is the best product I have ever used! I added the PTR Retinol Fusion PM serum under it and it\'s amazing!!! I LOVE this night cream and am on my third jar. I will continue to repurchase. I actually buy a new jar way before I run out because I don\'t want to ever not have it!!!'], 'author': u'pamelag203 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'This is worth the price tag', 'text': [u'I\'ve tried everything. As a 34 year old, I\'ve wanted to prevent and then some. I was at a Sephora when I asked a beautiful older lady what she used, she immediately grabbed my hand and took me to the PTR section. She could not stop raving about this line. That was years ago and you won\'t find me buying anything else. People say I haven\'t aged a day, while I\'m more critical I am very happy with the results. This product is thick, so a little goes a LONG way. I live in the desert, so extra moisture is always welcome. A Night creme that does both?!? SOLD!!! Give it some time ladies, but this product is awesome. If Sephora still sells the unwrinkle kit, try that first! It is such a great deal!'], 'author': u'Ames23 ', 'date': [u'2016-04-11'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Not for me.', 'text': [u'I bought this after reading the reviews. I think this is probably an excellent cream, just not for me. I have sensitive skin and after applying my skin was bright red for a few hours. It did go on nicely thought and I liked the texture. I just think it was too potent for my skin.'], 'author': u'happyx4 ', 'date': [u'2015-12-30'], 'location': u'Chicago, IL', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'Worth it: Firmer skin & less visible wrinkles', 'text': [u'I\'ve used PTR night cream for about two years, and I really love it. It\'s thick, so a little goes a long way. I use it around my eyes in the morning and night, and sometimes around laugh lines in the winter. My skin looks firm and moisturized with this product, and any wrinkles become much less visible. I would definitely recommend it in terms of effectiveness, but I recognize that it is indeed pricey.'], 'author': u'nybanjo ', 'date': [u'2015-07-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Pretty Amazing...', 'text': [u'I\'ve used many products in my 36 years-I\'ve tried to be proactive. name: Hydro-Dynamic® Ultimate Moisture
reviews: {'title': u'Love it!!!', 'text': [u'This is amazing. I used to have so much texture and now my face is so soft. Since day one you will see the difference. I love it so much I bought me a second one this past weekend. I had to with the 20% off!'], 'author': u'BlancaMTY ', 'date': [u'2016-11-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'great for dry skin', 'text': [u'best daily moisturizer i\'ve ever tried.'], 'author': u'sillysal ', 'date': [u'2016-11-01'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'holy grail', 'text': [u'This product is amazing! I have extremely dry sensitive skin and this is the first moisturizer that has worked for me. I had gotten a sample a little while back and it lasted around a month with me using it very sparingly and I noticed a difference from that alone, my skin was plumper, the texture I once had along my cheek bones was gone, and it didn\'t clog my pores or break me out. I never thought I would pay this much for a moisturizer but it has honestly changed my skin so greatly I had to splurge. You don\'t have to use a lot and it just sinks into your skin so nicely, I use it every night and if I\'m extra dry I\'ll use it in the morning before my makeup application as well. It leaves my skin silky and plump, I\'m just obsessed. It\'s worth every penny, this stuff is amazing.'], 'author': u'vicbby ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Murad hydro-dynamic ultimate moisture cream', 'text': [u'I am disappointed in the Murad cream. I cannot tell any difference in the Murad cream than in other much less expensive creams. The cream does not meet the quality I expected. I would not purchase this product again. I could not recommend this cream to anyone else.'], 'author': u'suzyreads ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'very hydrating', 'text': [u'I have combination skin, so normally I don\'t need something this moisturizing, but after I\'ve used an acne treatment or a peel, my skin tends to get very dry. I use this product at nighttime when my skin is flakey and feeling parched, and I wake up with hydrated, glowing skin. Heavier products like this usually break me out, and I\'m happy to say that this cream does not break me out. This product has no scent and is non-irritating. ', u'Again, it is a heavier product, so I don\'t recommend it for oily skin or daytime use for anyone who has a skin type other than really dry. I have used it in the daytime and it tends to make me really greasy. ', u'I also find that it is expensive for what it is. I do recommend it for mature and/or very dry skin, but I think you can find a good, highly moisturizing product for cheaper.'], 'author': u'Maddie4444 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Diorskin Nude BB Creme
reviews: {'title': u'Love and enjoy it!', 'text': [u'My best friend got me this Nude BB Cream on my birthday. She\'s been raving about this product and finally I got a chance to try it out. The texture is so light that you wouldn\'t feel that you apply something on your face. It also has a nice light perfume smell, not so strong, but it will fade away within minutes.I love the smell anyway so I don\'t mind. However, the coverage is really light, and it doesn\'t have a high SPF, so you still have to apply sunscreen before applying this. Overall, this is a nice luxury BB Cream, makes your face smooth and even out. But if your skin has some troubles such as acne scars or blemishes, you will need some concealer to make your face look flawless and perfect.'], 'author': u'Zoey310 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-09'], 'location': u'San Diego, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'The best I have found', 'text': [u'I\'ve looked for ages for a combination product that doesn\'t look weird on my skin and I\'ve found it in the Dior Bb cream. Many of these products settle weirdly into my pores and make my skin look worse than bare. But not this one. I apply it using a big, wide brush meant for mineral powder application. I just squirt the cream directly onto the brush head (only one squirt!), dab the loaded brush onto key spots on my face, then blend all over. It takes less than a minute. And then it lasts all day. ', u'Bonus, the light shade is perfect for those of us with pale skin with a pinky undertone. It\'s neither too yellow nor too kabuki white. Just perfect for this Irish-heritage lass.'], 'author': u'msroser ', 'date': [u'2016-10-25'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'love!', 'text': [u'I love this bb foundation! It is not full coverage and I would say not even medium coverage-- it does even out imperfectione and gives the face a true "natural" appearance (freckles show through). If you have scars, acne or other imperfections that you desire to cover with one layer- this isn\'t for you. But it really is a beautiful, radiant light glowy look. Perfect for summer coverage!'], 'author': u'GaBeautyGirl ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'This is definitely not one of my favorites and I would not purchase again. This makes my skin look like a mannequin; flat toned. I bought it on the sales girls recommendation when I had advised I was looking for something with some illumination and opulence to it. I used it about six times and now It sits in the back of my draw'], 'author': u'md70 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'my one and only!', 'text': [u'I\'ve been using this for 5 years, I think its about time i write a review. This BB creme is literally nude forreal, blends in flawlessly and effortlessly and makes it appear sooo smooth. Its sheer enough that I don\'t feel cakey, but it does its job to cover imperfections and tone out my skin. Don\'t even need foundation ever.'], 'author': u'nancee17 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': u'Boston, MA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Acne Solutions BB Cream Broad Spectrum SPF 40
reviews: {'title': u'MY HOLY GRAIL BB CREAM', 'text': [u'I have tried EVERYTHING under the sun, from drugstore to high end, foundations to tinted moisturizers & NOTHING compares to this BB cream!!!', u'The coverage is AMAZING for a bb cream, & it feels SO WEIGHTLESS. The finish is absolutely beautiful, & works well with my oily t-zone & dry cheeks! As promised, my skin loves it, I have never broke out, & my skin looks flawless. ', u'The ONLY downside is the amount of alcohol in the ingredients, but my skincare routine is top notch, so its not enough to stray me away!'], 'author': u'hayykidd ', 'date': [u'2016-11-10'], 'location': u'Kansas City, MO', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'beautiful product, awful colors', 'text': [u'I really love this BB cream. It\'s so beautiful on the skin and has light, but a little bit buildable, coverage. It\'s perfect for days when you feel low maintenance but want your skin to be a little more perfected. However, I don\'t love the colors. The lightest shade is really not that light, and it pulls quite pink. I would love to see them add some more shades to the range as this is such a beautiful product but it just doesn\'t match me and many others unfortunately.'], 'author': u'MissKittenn ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Using Daily for 6 Months', 'text': [u'Much. Love. I\'ve been using this BB Cream (nearly) every weekday for the last six months (which is also how long one bottle has lasted me). My make up routine is minimal and quick (I wake up at 3:30am). ', u'What I love about this BB Cream is that: ', u'I can quickly apply this with my fingers and layer up on areas for more coverage, if needed. ', u'My face doesn\'t feel like it\'s smothered in foundation (because it\'s not). It also doesn\'t feel like it\'s covered in SPF (even though it is - I never wore a daily SPF on my face until this beauty came along)', u'Lasts all day - in ideal conditions. Won\'t lie, I\'ve seen this break up a bit on my face on especially hot/ oily days. Usually a light dusting of powder and setting spray keeps me with a long lasting, natural finish. After finding it catch on my dry spots, I started using a light moisturizer as my base.', u'Initially, I thought this BB Cream was a bit of a splurge. After being impressed by it on the daily for six months, I say it\'s well worth the money.'], 'author': u'hazelii ', 'date': [u'2016-10-06'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Why is this so good?', 'text': [u'I never would have thought to try this foundation, but I\'m sure glad I did. I used to be a Sephora employee & got this in gratis & it\'s literally been in my foundation drawer towards the back. A few months ago I randomly decided to give it some love. HOLY YES! I tapped it out with a beauty blender & it just perfects your skin without the feel or look of a foundation. It\'s matte without looking flat which is another plus considering I\'m an oily monster but love luminosity. The icing on the cake is that this is the ONLY (you heard me only) foundation I\'ve tried that has legit kept me matte throughout the day. I could seriously cry... if you\'re oily you understand my struggle! Give this severely underrated product a try if you\'re problematic/oily & want a flawless face PLUS SPF 40 :)'], 'author': u'krystenlynn12 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-06'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I\'ve been using this product for over a year now. It\'s just enough coverage to blur my acne scars, but it still looks really natural! reviews: {'title': u'Wonderful Product', 'text': [u'I received a sample of this BB balm in my ipsy bag - used it a few days and ordered the full-size. The only reason I didn\'t give it 5 stars is my face does get oily and the balm will start to breakdown and slip - even with setting spray used both before and after application. Overall, the coverage is superb, the feel is wonderful and a tiny bit goes a long way. I apply with a brush and blends beautifully. Great value and I love that it is cruelty free!!'], 'author': u'LMSinMS ', 'date': [u'2016-11-10'], 'location': u'Brandon, MS', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: VitaZing™ SPF 15 Energy-Boosting Moisturizer with Mangosteen
reviews: {'title': u'Love it but broke me out :(', 'text': [u'I received this in my play box last month. Initially I wasn\'t really excited to use it because Origins has always made me break out. I gave it a shot anyway and really fell in love with this product until it started breaking me out. It made my skin was glow and slightly tinted which allowed me to go "bare faced" most weekdays. Once I started realizing that it was causing lots of tiny blackheads all over my forehead and cheeks, I had to stop using it. It\'s the only new thing I added to my skin care so I can definitely pin the breakouts on this. It\'s a shame because it\'s such a great product! I think it\'s going to be hit or miss with some people depending on their skin. ', u'Also, I\'m a little confused as to why this is considered a "one size fits all" with the shade, if you will. I don\'t think this would compliment deeper skin tones, and Origins should consider making other tint options. ', u'And no, it does not smell bad.'], 'author': u'ivyvinez ', 'date': [u'2016-11-05'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'LOVE THIS MOISTURIZER!', 'text': [u'I was a little surprised by some of the negative reviews in here because I absolutely LOVE this moisturizer. It INSTANTLY and I mean INSTANTLY brightens and color corrects my face. It\'s not super greasy or heavy. Can be worn alone to create an even skin tone or under makeup. I received it as a sample and then purchased a full size.'], 'author': u'Wilsoe86 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-04'], 'location': u'Lansing, MI', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'SMELLS HORRIBLE', 'text': [u'Received this as a sample, and I was originally excited until I squeezed it out. It smellls DISGUSTING. Doesn\'t smell like mangosteen at all, it smells industrial, like glue or paint. The tint is also REALLY orange. King of like a bad spray tan.'], 'author': u'diemeng ', 'date': [u'2016-10-31'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'It is good, however..', 'text': [u'I really enjoyed using this product. I received a decently sized sample, when I received a clutch full of samples, a few months ago. I wanted something that was moisturizing, light, and gave a very sheer tint. I wanted it to be enough to make my skin look healthy, radiant, and even out my skin tone. I had a couple of breakouts, and I had old marks fading. This was amazing! I tried it for the first time, and I didn\'t have any issues, until I woke up the next morning. I had a few more breakouts, and I thought it was because I was trying too many new products at one time; so, I stopped trying new things. I went back to my regular skincare routine, and my skin was clearing up, again. I tried to use the VitaZing again, and it broke me out. I tested this out several times, just to make sure that it was this product. Every time I stopped using it and gave my skin a break, then my skin would begin to heal and wouldn\'t breakout anymore. I took off one star for that reason alone. Everyone loves the Origins charcoal mask as well, and the same thing happened. It helped me the first time I tried it, but the second, third, and fourth time I tried it, it broke me out. I am going to hold onto this sample though. I didn\'t break out the first time that I used this product, and I am wondering if if may have anything to do with clogging my pores because of the hot and humid weather. If that is the case, then I will give this another chance, when it is into mid fall and winter. My skin changes from combo/oily to combo/normal. By this I mean, my skin is still combo because my T-zone can still become a bit oily, and I can have one small dry patch or so, but overall, my skin is normal. I no longer breakout, and it may work better then. I gave the mask away though. I love the Boscia Charcoal Pore Pudding mask! Anyways, I hope that this works better during the cold weather. I remember the first time I tried this, I stayed indoors, where there was AC, and it was cool inside. The other times, I was sweating badly. That is also why I deducted a star. This product will transfer, so you have to be careful. The Sephora cast member told me that this product actually broke her out, and she said that Est\xe9e Lauder has a product that is similar, but it did the same thing. She did mention that those two companies had some kind of link between them. I forgot what it was, and I don\'t want to just guess, but she did tell me that there is a link between the two companies. Sorry this is so long. I hope this helps anyone though. Always ask for a sample first and spot test! :)'], 'author': u'Shas17 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'My skin has been thirsting for this! ;)', 'text': [u'Over the years, I have tried one moisturizer after another trying to find "the one" that works wonders on my face. I believe that I have finally found what my skin has been thirsting for! I apply it every morning onto a clean face and I immediately notice a more dewy complexion. My face feels energized but not weighed down. Not only does it feel great it also protects from sun damage! Love, Love, Love!'], 'author': u'tricialynn1979 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': u'San Antonio, TX', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

name: Maracuja Oil
ingredient: Passiflora Edulis Seed Oil, Tocopherol.
reviews: {'title': u'Great product!', 'text': [u'I apply 1 to 2 drops of this to my beauty blender to help moisten the blender and hydrate my skin as I apply my make up. Believe it or not, it actually helps keep make up in place as well, at least for me. I find it very useful to apply different oils to my blender to help my skin, but this by far is my favorite oil to use! Awesome product!'], 'author': u'Juniper0329 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'More than meets the eye', 'text': [u'When I bought this, it was a last ditch effort to try using a cosmetic oil. Others I have tried broke me out and didn\'t do much but hydrate a bit. I was surprised that Tarte\'s maracuja oil not only hydrated me, but leaves my skin smoother and firmer and I swear my pores look smaller. It doesn\'t really claim to do all of that, but it works for me. I use one drop over a moisturizer at night and on my beauty blender when I apply foundation. My skin looks young and dewy all day, which is something at 48. It sinks in more quickly that others I have used,which I guess could be the reason I don\'t breakout with this one. Thanks Tarte!'], 'author': u'mkupmaniac1 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-06'], 'location': u'St. Louis Missouri', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'great product', 'text': [u'I have combination skin and this product works great. Does not clog my pores or leave it feeling too dry or oily. I mostly use it at night. I use it in the day during winter months. The bottle lasts long as not many drops are needed.'], 'author': u'Lippy29 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-06'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I add a drop of this oil to my morning moisturizer to give my skin a boost of hydration. I also like to use it on the ends of my hair. It leaves my hair super soft. It\'s great to use on your cuticles and when applied to nails, it gives them a beautiful, healthy shine. I was applying it under my eyes at night, hoping to fix skin issues there (lines and dryness) but I found I needed something stronger for that area so I switched to a stronger oil. The Maracuja oil has a nutty smell to it and I found that it absorbs pretty quickly. I love the packaging -it\'s so pretty and I\'ve yet to have any issue with the dropper. This is definitely a great oil to try out, especially for those who have never tried a facial oil before.'], 'author': u'daniaura ', 'date': [u'2016-11-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Beauty Staple', 'text': [u'I am obsessed with this product. I switched to this as a more affordable option from Kiehl\'s Midnight Recovery Oil and while I was willing to have an inferior product for a cheaper price, I found that this oil worked even better for my skin. ', u'I have dry/sensitive skin, and I wear this at night in the warmer months, and add it to my morning routine in the harsh winters. It doesn\'t make your skin oily, and it doesn\'t cause breakouts. You only need like 3-5 drops for your whole face. Also I found adding a drop or two to foundation helps for smooth coverage to prevent flaking in the cold.'], 'author': u'leishy ', 'date': [u'2016-11-02'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Argan Cleansing Oil
ingredient: Hellanthus Annus (Sunflower) Seed oil, Polysorbate-80, Polysorbate-20, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Arganla Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, Citrus Grandis (Pomelo Grapefruit) Seed Oil,  Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Tocopherol (Antioxident), Sucralose.
reviews: {'title': u'Essential Make Up Remover', 'text': [u'This stuff just melts your makeup off. Seriously, makeup just dissolves. You will NOT have Joker lipstick smears and raccoon eyes as you\'re rubbing it around, because the make up is gone. Where does it go? I have no idea, but it\'s not on my face anymore, which is the whole point. ', u'Even better, this oil is gentle on my skin. Now that I\'m getting older I avoid harsh, drying cleansers or those that require me to drag a cotton pad across my skin. I use this, then follow it with my regular cleanser (and then like 3 more serums, eye creams and lotions, to be honest). Afterward my full-face glamor-puss is clean, soft, refreshed and ready for bed.'], 'author': u'sleepercell ', 'date': [u'2016-11-06'], 'location': u'Nashville, TN', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'One of my favorite skincare products', 'text': [u'I have combination skin and this is the only moisturizer I have used that moisturizes my dry areas and leave my oily areas under control. name: Ibuki Refining Moisturizer Enriched
reviews: {'title': u'Exceptional.', 'text': [u'I seldom write reviews for anything... but this product deserves some serious praise. I have acne prone, oily, sensitive skin. This product was recommended based on all of these things... and it definitely delivers. I would say if you\'re using a lot of acne treatments that dry out your skin, this works amazingly to restore the lost moisture and oils you need to heal. It wasn\'t oily or greasy. The smell is light and pretty. My acne has already stopped popping up after 2 weeks. All the fine bumps have diminished. My hyperpigmentation is fading. If you have a solid acne wash and treatment, this is the perfect addition to the routine. I get this may not be for everyone.. but for my skin type, this is the best moisturizer I\'ve used hands down. For the price... just do it. You won\'t regret it. 5 stars all the way.'], 'author': u'kreich ', 'date': [u'2016-11-10'], 'location': u'Ontario, Canada', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Forever Light Creator CC Primer
reviews: {'title': u'Secret Weapon', 'text': [u'Seriously, this is the REAL deal -- color correcting! I have very good experiences with a YSL primer in the past, but I wasn\'t even expected this CC primer to be THAT impressive. I am Asian with light skin tone, so got the Lavender shade to contradict my yellowish and tired/uneven complexion. I put it on with my fingers and it does have textures that are easy to spread, but not too runny (think a bit like clay but spreads like very lightweight peanut butter), thus it gives my skin a matte finish. A little goes a long way. Once I put it on, my complexion totally brightened up; my skin tone evened; and the large pores on my nose and cheeks diminished. Immediately I looked at least 5 years younger!!! It also conceals some of my redness over my face. I do apply a bit of their green neutralizer to further reduce the redness. But I felt like I could wear this alone without BB/foundation. ', u'I have been using this for a few days so far. On none of them I ever felt dryness occurred. It\'s pretty long lasting as well since my face still looked bright and even after 10 hours, and I didn\'t have excess amount of oil on my t-zone, which is another nice surprise. Anyway, I know I sounded like a sales person but it\'s really that great. I am addicted to this now. Best cosmetic product I\'ve used; worth every penny!!'], 'author': u'Jleebee ', 'date': [u'2016-11-02'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love!', 'text': [u'I love this! It evens out my skin tone and I can use this without foundation! It feels great on my skin not heavy at all. reviews: {'title': u'Kind of let down', 'text': [u'I love Algenist products and bought this to add to my Algenist arsenal. Unfortunately, I was so disappointed. The smell and texture of this cream is just so decadent but after going through half of the pot over a month long period I did not see any results and gave it to a friend to try. For the price, I assumed it would be worth it, as this brand has never failed me in the past. But for me, it worked only as a "normal" moisturizer- which I could purchase at a much lesser cost. I didn\'t notice any "glow", change in skin texture and tone, or reduction of fine lines. reviews: {'title': u'Amazing!', 'text': [u'I live in an extremely dry climate with very dry sensitive, eczema prone skin. Even after masks, toners, and serums this soaks in beautifully to my skin making it baby soft. This is a little heavy for me in the summer and feels a bit greasy but during the transition to winter it\'s beautiful. For anti-aging I can\'t really tell, I\'ve been using this since I was 23 (I\'m 27 now) and people still think I\'m 23 but that could just be genetics. For people that don\'t like the smell, it\'s made with kombucha which is fermented tea; if you don\'t like the smell of fermented food (ie. pickles, sour kraut, kim chi...etc..) you probably won\'t like the smell of this, though it\'s not a strong scent.'], 'author': u'bendybee ', 'date': [u'2016-10-07'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'FANTASTIC NIGHT CREAM FOR DRY/COMBO SKIN!', 'text': [u'I typically use night creams like La Mer, La Prairie and Aveda. I tried this in a travel set and I liked the feel of it. I purchased the full size and was quite pleased with the results! Compared to some other very high end moisturizers, I feel like this really comes close to comparison. Having dry skin in the fall/winter, this quenches the dryness and takes away the flakiness. Not for oily skin, as this really is quite rich. Overall, this is fantastic! Highly recommend.'], 'author': u'vocalvixen ', 'date': [u'2016-10-03'], 'location': u'San Diego, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Okay, but Heavy', 'text': [u'I got this product in a 500pt perk. It actually isn\'t bad, but it is a little heavy for me. It is kind of greasy, but it does not break me out. I have trouble finding anti ageing products that don\'t break me out. This one didn\'t, but my face was left shiny. I wouldn\'t use it in the daytime. It was also thick, so I feel like I couldn\'t cover my whole face easily. I think I went through the product fairly quickly. It didn\'t irritate my skin, but I didn\'t notice any major differences either. I think if you are super dry, this would be very nice.'], 'author': u'beckalynn ', 'date': [u'2016-09-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: Black Label Detox BB Beauty Balm
reviews: {'title': u'love product hate the packaging', 'text': [u'I absolutely love this coverage!! It is light enough that it isn\'t cakey feeling but heavy enough that it smoothes my blotchy skin. The only thing I cannot stand is the bottle. It is plastic so you can\'t squeeze it out and right now there is so much more makeup in the bottle but every day I have to take off the lid and slam it against the palm of my hand 20+ times to get enough out! Until they change the packaging, I am ordering the dis-a-pore bb cream because it comes in plastic squeezable bottle.'], 'author': u'roxyjme ', 'date': [u'2016-11-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'not what i expected', 'text': [u'i purchased this product looking for an easy-application, skin-benefiting product to replace foundation for casual, daily use. the first issue i have with this product is lack of tint, which is crazy, as i have pale skin (burn in the sun, freckles everywhere type of pale). after application, my face had a very washed-out, lifeless look. when i tried to build the product to cover blemishes, it turned a strange green-grey colorthe product was much thicker than i any BB cream i\'ve tried before, making the application a little uneven and the resulting texture on my face seeming tacky or goopy. which turned out to be more than a feeling- i was walking to work, the wind kicked up dirt, and all the little specks of dirt that had flown at me stuck to the BB cream. it also seemed that the creamy density caused the product to highlight any flaws in my skin- larger pores, dry bits, protruding blackheads. this product was also very difficult remove at the end of the day. i use make-up removing oils to cleanse, and had to wash at least twice to get all the BB cream off my face.i tried the product for a full week to see if my experience would change, but knew that it would be a return after two days of use.'], 'author': u'bunnyhug ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': u'chicago, il', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'A MUST HAVE', 'text': [u'I have been using this for years and I absolutely love it. I have dry and oily skin and this works well with both of them!'], 'author': u'rachelw8119 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-30'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Dr. Jart+ Black Label Detox BB -simple perfection', 'text': [u'I was amazed at how quickly this became my "go-to" everyday BB. This stuff certainly lives up to its claims. However strange it may appear when first applied, the results are nearly flawless after a couple of moments to rest on the skin. This BB evens skin tone, adds enough of a glow without being oily, doesn\'t settle in fine lines and lasts all day with a little Guerlain Meteorites to set. I am back for more of this little gem. If it appears gray, give it a couple of moments and it calms down to look beautifully natural. I put this on first so it has time to set while I finish my look of the day, giving it just the time it needs to transform into a simply perfect complexion.'], 'author': u'jlibbyb ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': u'Charleston, SC', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Eudermine Revitalizing Essence
reviews: {'title': u'very bad design of the bottle', 'text': [u'The toner itself is a good product, I have used two bottle and got the third one half years ago. I was still using my skii and didn\'t open it right away, but when I open the package today, I found out that the bottle stopper has already fell out and I have only half of the product left in the bottle! I don\'t even know when did this happen but it must be a long time ago because the box isnt even wet anymore. If you do want to buy this toner, open the package and check when you receive it, and store it carefully! It\'s not a cheap toner you don\'t want to end our loss $20 because of the stupid design of the bottle stopper.'], 'author': u'Nikxdddd ', 'date': [u'2016-11-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'softens skin', 'text': [u'I struggle with keratosis pilaris (chicken skin) on my face so I\'m constantly looking for better ways to exfoliate and Moisturize. I\'ll be honest, the gorgeous packaging is what drew me to purchase this product. However, I\'ve been using it for over three months now and I\'ll never stop! I use it before my serum and moisturizer and it really does an excellent job of softening my terribly dry skin and prepping it for my heavier duty moisturizer. I notice a big difference in the texture of my skin and how it plumps up after each use. If the age of the product doesn\'t sway you to its usefulness, then I hope this review does!'], 'author': u'Rhov ', 'date': [u'2016-09-27'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Generally love!', 'text': [u'I have been using this product for years, I have slightly yellow undertoned, medium pale skin and it blends perfectly! I have noticed however, as some of the other reviews mention, that it does separate after a while and even vigorous shaking does not remix it very well. For the price, it should stay a nice consistency. However, I will continue to use the product as I love what it does for my skin and complexion. I can wear it with out or without blending the laura mercies powder foundation on top. I like that this gives me a strong spf base.'], 'author': u'leigh373 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-03'], 'location': u'Colorado Springs, CO', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'This crime works great when you first get it. It gives a nice matte glow. However. {'title': u'Mixed review', 'text': [u'I ordered this product once & was so pleased with the way it felt on my skin & how it made me look - bronzed & glowing. So, naturally once I ran out I purchased another. This time, I experienced the same thing as many other buyers. The liquid had completely separated from the cream itself & caused a seemingly unusable product. I unfortunately got too busy & missed the deadline for returning the cream so I decided to try & use it. Honestly, after squeezing all the liquid separation out and struggling to get the cream itself out of the tube, I find that it still does nearly the same thing the original did. There is less shimmer in this one, I assume because that is all in the fluid, but applying it with a damp beauty blender gave me the same results. So although I love the original, the 3 stars are for the separation prone formula and the difficulty it causes!!'], 'author': u'mgal7 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-25'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'Worked at first', 'text': [u'It was effective for the first month - my skin felt calm, smoothed, and radiant. {'title': u'Great cream for smoother, younger looking skin!', 'text': [u'This review is based on my 65 year old mother\'s experience. This is my go-to birthday, Christmas, mother\'s day gift for my mom because she absolutely loves this cream and the improvement in her skin is very noticeable. She has used it religiously for the past three years as a night cream and her skin is smooth, glowing, firmer, and younger-looking! She gets compliments all the time about her skin and she swears it\'s because of this cream. I\'ve read some reviews that say this cream is too heavy and the consistency is a bit thick, but it works well for my mom\'s normal skin.'], 'author': u'awesomekitty ', 'date': [u'2016-08-28'], 'location': u'Long Beach, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'best cream ever!', 'text': [u'This cream is fantastic! I see a difference immediately! My skin is smoother, plumper, calmer, and looks hydrated and younger. Wrinkles are less pronounced. Btw, I am 56 so these benefits matter! I have very sensitive skin with rosacea and have no problem with this cream or any of the bio performance line. This cream is definitely worth the money. You only need a little bit, literally the size of the scoop provided. A jar lasts me 9 months. I use it at night and use a sunscreen during the day. I also use the ultimune concentrate and shiseido hydrating water, in the red bottle, don\'t know the name. These are also fantastic. My skin has never looked better!'], 'author': u'andohir ', 'date': [u'2016-07-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Bot for me', 'text': [u'Had lots of break out after using for two days. Too heavy for me as a day/ night cream.'], 'author': u'papergirl1101 ', 'date': [u'2016-05-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Fast and effective', 'text': [u'A few weeks before Christmas 2015 I was out shopping, my hands cracking (as in, bleeding randomly). I was near a store, and got a sample of this product from the clerk. I rubbed it all over my hands. Within 10 minutes the cracking stopped. Overnight, the cracks healed, and the next morning my hands were considerably smoother. I was blown away!I decided I wanted to try it properly, as a face cream. I received it as a gift for Christmas, and started using it twice a week at night from that point onward.This product is intensive - in the morning, you can see and feel the results. My skin feels nourished and soft. (I will suggest you rinse your face off as soon as you get up, as I find the bit of residue remaining feels uncomfortable.)In general, this product does seem to be targeted more toward the 40+ market as an anti-aging and wrinkle correction product, used daily. I use it twice weekly, and am in my 20s.If you want a great product that shows fast results, I highly recommend the Shiseido - Bio-Performance Advanced Super Restoring Cream.'], 'author': u'MandieNRG ', 'date': [u'2016-02-06'], 'location': u'BC', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}
