name: White Charcoal Mattifying MakeUp Setting Spray
reviews: {'title': u'AMAZEBALLS', 'text': [u'My makeup artist for my wedding used this on my face after my makeup was applied to lock everything in for an epic all day and all night finish. I have always had oily skin and could never find anything to tame the shine and I must say, IM BEYOND IMPRESSED!! I even woke up the next morning and my face was STILL flawless!!!!!! Will purchase over and over again.'], 'author': u'lace1389 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-10'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Holy grail setting spray and primer', 'text': [u'I\'ve never experience white dots on my face so I\'m not really sure how so many people have experienced this ? I shake it really well and hold it quite far away from my face and it works amazingly ! I have oily combination skin and this setting spray is honestly the BEST, it literally makes my skin oil free for 12 hours, and after 12 hours I can just spray some on and it absorbs anything that\'s on my face. It\'s so light weight and It has the nicest minty smell opposed to most setting sprays that smell horrible. It\'s a little tacky before it dries so I find it also makes an amazing primer over top of porefessinal. Anyways this product saved my life and it\'s always going to be my holy Grail!!'], 'author': u'Shaybea ', 'date': [u'2016-11-07'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Need to change sprayer', 'text': [u'When I first used this product, is also got the infamous white dots on my face. I noticed that the sprItz was not fine enough, so I put the product in an empty urban decay sprayer and walla amazing. I like this product better than the all nighter. The finish is smoother and the staying power is superior. 4 stars for packaging'], 'author': u'JohnsJen ', 'date': [u'2016-11-06'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'No Bueno', 'text': [u'I bought this because I have super oily skin and I\'m always looking for products to control my oil. But this product is nowhere close to what I expected. I shook the life out of that bottle and it still left white dots on my face (that got worse as it dried-I thought it would dry clear) all in my hair, clothes, etc...I had to take my makeup off and start over. I was not happy about that. Will be returning this product.'], 'author': u'SamElizabeth ', 'date': [u'2016-11-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'If you purchased the large bottle of this, it will last you pretty much forever. I use three sprays down the center of my face, and three across the center of my face and I don\'t have to worry about being oily at all throughout the day. It\'s the best makeup setting spray I\'ve used, and I wouldn\'t put it past Boscia for it to be so nice. They seem to come up with everything. I actually hated makeup sprays up until I used this one because they always made my skin more greasy and made my foundations slide around, but not with this Boscia. I would recommend it for anyone with combo to oily skin who want to make sure they have a matte finish to their look all day. If you have more dry skin, it probably wouldn\'t be the best choice. Also, don\'t overuse it because I discovered it adds a little that plastic sheen that all anti-oil products get when you layer them up too much.'], 'author': u'eggspoynge ', 'date': [u'2016-11-04'], 'location': u'Brooklyn, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Ferulic + Retinol Wrinkle Recovery Overnight Serum
reviews: {'title': u'Great with the Ferulic Peel Pads', 'text': [u'I got this in the combo Serum/Peel pads and cannot live without either of them now. (I already bought a backup!} I had gotten some of this in sample packets in the spring and after Caroline Hirons recommended the peel pads, I decided to get the combo that is available online, and it has completely changed my nighttime routine. My skin is sooo much better! I hadn\'t realized just how good the texture of my skin could be until I started using this. The cost is a lot, but cost to quality ratio is right up there. I don\'t mind paying a price as long as the product is worth it, and I would pay a good $10-$15 more for this easily.The packaging is great. You don\'t have to worry about the product going bad if you haven\'t used it for a couple of months. I will buy this over and over happily because I love my skin so much now.'], 'author': u'TRippon ', 'date': [u'2016-10-15'], 'location': u'Phoenix, AZ', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'great support product', 'text': [u'I was given a set of peel pads and this serum from our brand rep. 3 nights gentle peel, then retinol peel, 3 nights extra strength peel, then media spa. So far this has worked great. I am very sensitive most products turn my face red and burn. This has not. If you are dry I do recommend a moisturizer afterward. This will be my new night serum. I am 45, fair skin, dry sensitive, and hormonal acne.'], 'author': u'scoot ', 'date': [u'2016-10-11'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Go To Night Serum', 'text': [u'I have been trying out a lot of night time products to try and find the right ones for my skin and nothing was working. I stumbled upon this one in my samples bag and I gave it a try. After one night I saw results; dark spots from acne and small bumps on my forehead had disappeared! I have been using it every night since (bought the full size) and it has kept my skin in tip top shape. I love this product!'], 'author': u'JackiePRVA ', 'date': [u'2016-08-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Black Pine Firming, Lifting & Antiwrinkle Night Cream
reviews: {'title': u'best moisturizer ever', 'text': [u'I love love love this cream. I use it both morning and night because my skin is dry. I cringe every time I purchase because of the price, but have yet to find anything cheaper that produces the same results. It\'s worth your time and money to purchase.'], 'author': u'kachens ', 'date': [u'2016-11-06'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Amazing Product!', 'text': [u'I have combination skin, 60+ age, and would definitely recommend this night cream. I use it along with the Serum, and Eye Cream as well. It does exactly what it\'s intended to do. Lines, wrinkles, sagging is greatly reduced after less than 2 weeks use! With continued use, you are able to maintain the results. It is rather expensive, but concentrated enough to be used sparingly so it will last longer. It will remain my Go-To product, along with my many other Anti-aging skincare products.'], 'author': u'Arv01 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': u'Raleigh, N.C.', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love the smell!', 'text': [u'I understand some people smell this differently than others, but what I smell is amazing. It reminds me of toasted marshmallow. It has a very warm, pleasant smell that I wish they would bottle up so I can wear it everywhere. The product itself is good. It\'s very moisturizing but still works well with my oily skin. I finally finished a full jar last night. The product lasted me 6 months so good value for the money. I notice now that my skin is a bit firmer and fine lines are looking more filled in. I\'m happy overall with the product but I\'m looking for something that brightens and helps dark spots so for that reason, I won\'t be repurchasing this next go-around but I can see myself going back to it eventually.'], 'author': u'bbatt ', 'date': [u'2016-08-25'], 'location': u'Northern UT', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'What is this witchcraft?', 'text': [u'I got this either as a 100 point perk or a sample a few months ago and hadn\'t tried it. Last night I used this after cleansing and toning with two other Sephora samples (Josie Maran Cleansing Oil and First Aid Facial Radiance Pads). I woke up this morning and stumbled into the bathroom, no contacts, no lights, and, even in my blind and dark state, glanced in the mirror and had to do a double take! I could tell that my skin was firmer and more lifted and I looked five years younger overnight!', u'If this had been around in late 17th century Massachusetts, its creators/users would have been tried as witches! That\'s how good this stuff is!', u'Also, it stung the tiniest bit for a minute or two on my ridiculously sensitive skin (cleansing oils even dry me out sometimes) and then it was fine. ', u'The scent is overpoweringly strong but it goes away quickly and it\'s worth it.'], 'author': u'readysetglow ', 'date': [u'2016-08-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'my skin looks better', 'text': [u'I have been using this for about 6 weeks now and my skin feels firmer and my face looks better. I personally love the smell and the packaging is beautiful. It was a splurge for my budget but I felt it was worth it.'], 'author': u'themoonlitnest ', 'date': [u'2016-08-17'], 'location': u'fairfax, va', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

Since I\'ve been using this, my skin has visibly improved--no redness, smoother texture. I also use the cleanser and serum, which also work very well for mature skin. Also, it has not caused any breakouts. Very pleased with these products!'], 'author': u'eabs ', 'date': [u'2016-11-07'], 'location': u'Boxford, MA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I\'m not sure if I would repurchase this moisturizer, I have acne prone + very sensitive skin so this was perfect. It was very lightweight which was great but at times I wanted something a bit more moisturizing. I have had this for about a month and it\'s already run out, this is a rather small container if you moisturize morning and night. I gave 3 stars because I wish it was in a larger size and less watery.'], 'author': u'shadowofseattle ', 'date': [u'2016-11-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

I use all my samples of beauty products when I am on vacation or out of town at a hotel. I have only used it twice, but what a difference it makes in an instant! It was a very light feeling moisturizer, and when you use the booster with it, you can immediately feel the slight tightening.', u'My husband could tell the difference from my normal moisturizer too! ', u'I\'m not excited about the price of the full-size jars, but this may be a concession I\'ll just have to make, because it is that good!'], 'author': u'ady8e80 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-28'], 'location': u'Sedalia, MO', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Capture Totale Dreamskin Perfect Skin Cushion Broad Spectrum SPF 50
reviews: {'title': u'everyday go to!!', 'text': [u'i\'ve been looking for a matte finish cushion for a long time, when this first came out, i immediately purchase this online. the coverage is very sheer, so if you need more coverage this won\'t be the one. This is very light weight, it\'s slightly scented (dior floral scent) which i don\'t mind. I like that it has a hight SPF, i been using the dior forever but the SPF is pretty low and i don\'t like to apply separate SPF, so i really like this one. overall, i like this cushion, this has become my everyday go to. easy and fast to apply, saves me time. If you are looking for a light weight light coverage, give this try. it makes your skin looks very natural and nice, its like your skin but better. the only concern i have is the puff, the puff works great and i love it, but i feel like it gets dirty over couple of uses. (maybe its just me, i can see little dust on it, it\'s like a dust magnet. but every cushion has the same problem. so you\'ll have to clean the puff before dipping back to the cushion.)'], 'author': u'nakita1994 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-07'], 'location': u'sacramento, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Amazing! Holy grail!', 'text': [u'I have combo skin with prominent pores on my nose and this product does not make me oily at all, more like dewy, and it blurs my pores! I have a hard time finding products that are the perfect consistency and coverage for me because I don\'t quite like foundation (too heavy), but I don\'t like tinted moisturizer (too light). This seems to be in between for me, which provides like a "my skin but better" look. I like more natural coverage, and just conceal blemishes with concealer. I wouldn\'t recommend this for those who prefer full coverage, or those who have acne issues. More so light to medium coverage. Definitely buildable to a full medium. I wear it for a full day (about 10 hours) without primer and do not need to touch up at all! Well worth the price because you get two cushions.', u'** I do wish they sold just refill cushions, if you already have the compact.... Less plastic and waste.'], 'author': u'cnyc ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': u'NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Very light but beautiful', 'text': [u'I can\'t wear "regular" foundation. Everything looks cakey and emphasizes dryness when I do. So, o only wear cushion foundation/bb creams. I\'ve got them all: Lameige, Amore Pacific, Sulwhosoo, Lanc\xf4me, Loeal... this one is my favorite, it\'s lightly scented (but it wears out immediately) and comes with a refill. There are three colors available on Sephora and four elsewhere. The color choice matched me (I got 20 and I\'m a neutral 20-22) but I can see much darker would not find a match. ', u'On your face, the coverage is matte and extremely light. I love how it blurs my pores and calms my skin, I love products that do double duty-skin care (high SPF!) plus makeup. ', u'I\'m 45 with dry skin and no wrinkles or problems otherwise do the coverage being really light is good for me, but if you like more coverage this may not be the best cushion and I\'d recommend the Amore Pacific or Sulwhosoo instead.'], 'author': u'czikimonkey ', 'date': [u'2016-10-15'], 'location': u'New York', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'meh', 'text': [u'This felt great on my skin. It didn\'t feel like I had a layer of makeup on, it was light and refreshing. For the record, I have oily, acne-prone skin, and am 31 years old. It doesn\'t provide much coverage, but is pretty convenient to throw in your bag for touch-ups throughout the day. The awful part of this though was the color -- it absolutely did not work for me. I have a golden-medium-dark South Asian skin tone. Even the darkest color did not work for me. It made me look grey -- literally like I had grey ashy skin. The Sephora representative who suggested this product seemed to be very knowledgeable and really promoted and pushed this product on me. He raved about how great it looked on me and emphasized that Dior "is very familiar with all kinds of skin colors." This cushion comes in merely 3 colors -- that doesn\'t seem "familiar with all kinds of skin colors to me." He was convincing and I walked out of the store with this ridiculously priced item. Returned.'], 'author': u'lamoni ', 'date': [u'2016-10-11'], 'location': u'Providence, RI', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'good for those not seeking coverage', 'text': [u'Lightweight and blends into skin pretty well; tradeoff is almost nonexistent coverage. Outside packaging is gorgeous, but the applicator retains more product than it should. Wish Dior used the same technology that K-brands use! Didn\'t keep as this is not enough coverage for me, and my skin did get quite oily after a couple of hours.'], 'author': u'kokomo7 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-06'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

name: Revitalizing Black Hydration Gel
reviews: {'title': u'Loveeeee', 'text': [u'This moisturizer is so good. I have had a hard time finding a good moisturizer that doesn\'t just soak into my skin quickly without doing anything. The cooling sensation is pretty strong the first time but it gets better and feels good. I use it at night about two pumps.'], 'author': u'bhocolate ', 'date': [u'2016-11-08'], 'location': u'Brooklyn, New York', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Oily skin with occasional dry patches.', 'text': [u'This moisturizes my skin without breaking it out. The amount you get is deceiving; you run out very quickly, and the jar is so hard to open to get the rest of the product out, I was not able to. I do like it though. The black also disappears into nothing unless you don\'t moisturize it into your face enough. It looks fine under my makeup aswell. It\'s very lightweight.'], 'author': u'trishanatalie ', 'date': [u'2016-11-07'], 'location': u'Tucson, AZ', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'13-17'}

{'title': u'so amazing', 'text': [u'I love the cool feeling I have combination skin and it works very good at not drying out the parts that need moisture but keeps my t -zone controlled also skin feels so soft I use at night . I haven\'t used long enough to say if it helps pores but I love this product'], 'author': u'RoyalT33 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-31'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great product, deceiving amount', 'text': [u'I loved this product but I really dislike the fact that I couldn\'t tell how much was left, so I had no idea when I need to buy more until I was all of a sudden out after barely having it for a month. It seems like there is hardly any product in the jar and you have no way of knowing. Too bad, because I really like the lotion but I can\'t bring myself to pay for such a small amount.'], 'author': u'MrsFrampton ', 'date': [u'2016-10-31'], 'location': u'Des Moines, Iowa', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Not the worst but questionable.', 'text': [u'While I loved this product.. the amount that you pay and the time spent using it does not add us. The face wash that goes along with this product I have had for almost 3 months. This Hydrating gel I went through in a month.. It is not cheap for such a small amount and the requirement for best results is morning and night. The amount we are given is ridiculous to think it would last more than a month. ', u'I will say, my face has never been more clear, I just wish there was more or the hydration was able to last longer. You definitely need to use the wash and hydration every morning and night.'], 'author': u'Stufflebear ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

name: Prime Time™ BB Primer-Cream Daily Defense Broad Spectrum SPF 30
reviews: {'title': u'Not impressed with consistency', 'text': [u'I have bought this product a number of times. I like that it has an SPF of 30, a small amount of tent and allows my foundation to go on smoothly. The last 3-4 times I\'ve bought this product the consistency will not come out of the pump. It starts out runny for the first few days and then is too thick to get out. This time I decided I would shake it really well before each use. This did not help. So I now have to unscrew the top before every use. This makes it very hard to get the product out towards the end. I\'m having to use a utensil to scrape out the remaining product. I mentioned this frustration to the Sephora cashier. She said she had never had anyone say anything about the product doing this. She told me to go and read the reviews. Unfortunately, I have decided to use another product I have found that I like better. It\'s more expensive but the coverage is better and it comes right out of the tube.'], 'author': u'Texas86 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'This is the only bb/cc cream that I have found that stays matte for a full 8 hours. I don\'t wear foundation and like the sheer coverage of a bb/cc cream but was having issues finding one that actually stayed matte as advertised. This one does! The only reason it is being rated 4 stars is because the pump dispenser has issues since the product is thicker. It will catch air and splatter the product all over as it "spits" it out. I found the best way around this is the bang the product on my counter a few times before using it every morning. I haven\'t had any splattering issues since.'], 'author': u'MacyLu ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'Great winter moisturizer', 'text': [u'I have combination, acne prone and very sensitive skin. Normally my face is more on the oily side than normal but with acne medications my face can get artificially dry. That being said, this moisturizer is great for winter/cold months or if you\'re using a strong acne medication which can be drying. It has a silk like texture that glides on your skin without irritating and also absorbs fairly quickly. There is a scent.. i\'m not the best at describing scents so this might be far out in left field.. but i think it\'s like a light nature perfume scent..? A little goes a long way which is good considering how expensive this is. I would say on the dry patches or areas maybe dab in a little extra moisturizer for a "second" layer after the first layer absorbs into your skin. If you are hesitant due to the price, ask for a few samples.'], 'author': u'theegg ', 'date': [u'2016-11-01'], 'location': u'Marietta, GA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'hate moisturizers and creams?', 'text': [u'i have always been the one to hate applying anything to my face that is thick or oily feeling. I rarely apply moisturizers to my face at all. This product makes me want to use it all the time!- i purchased it in a gift set and find i use the rejuvenating cream and eye serum the most. The only downfall of course is the price! it is so exspensive! If it solved all my problems I could justify the nearly $200 price Tag!'], 'author': u'LeahRooyakkers ', 'date': [u'2016-10-16'], 'location': u'Edmonton, AB', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u"Enhanced lines I didn't know I had", 'text': [u'I was looking forward to using this CC powder for touch ups and for light coverage after microdermabrasion or other exfoliating facials when I can\'t wear liquid makeup. Unfortunately, on first application this CC powder immediately enhanced fine lines I didn\'t know I had. Additionally, I use a retinol treatment (0.5 once a week), so I was also concerned about flakey and dry spots showing up with this. The final effect with this powder is a very dry appearance, and cakey when used over serums and moisturizer. I gave an extra star for the nice packaging. I\'ll keep looking for a more luminizing powder, probably a mineral makeup in a compact form.'], 'author': u'islandfruit ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'my favourite!', 'text': [u'I love, love, love moisturizer an have tried many different high end brands. {'title': u'not bad but not worth the hype', 'text': [u'Fairly good cream but tender to block my pores. I previously used clarins for many years, I liked the bobby brown foundation so I thought I\'d give the moisturizer a try. It\'s good quality but no good for my skin unfortunately. I\'ll be going back to clarins. However I love BB\'s extra rich moisturizer. Didn\'t block my pores and my skin was great. Just too expensive for my budget. {'title': None, 'text': [u'I have combination oily skin (that is also very acne prone) and I\'ve felt that this product has worked amazingly! reviews: {'title': u'AMAZING', 'text': [u'Clinique is my new favorite skin care line. I bought a cleanser, toner, the Even Better correcting moisture cream, Pep-Start and of course this smart night. I\'ve been using all of these products for about 2 months AM and PM. I\'ve tried so many PM skin correcting creams and finally I found one for me! I wake up NOT Oily and my face has a glowing and refreshed look. Two weeks ago one of my customers asked where all my freckles have gone why do I cover them up? name: Luminous Overnight Memory Serum Concentrate
reviews: {'title': u'Game changing', 'text': [u'I\'m 30 and a mother of two with very sensitive, acne prone, combination skin. I also live in Colorado which makes it so hard for me to have good skin. This stuff is truly a miracle serum. I don\'t see lines on my forehead anymore and it makes my skin glow with the perfect balance of moisture and controls oily skin. This is a must have for me from now on and will justify the price by no longer purchasing cheaper products that don\'t work.'], 'author': u'lovely234 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-12'], 'location': u'Denver, CO', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Outstanding', 'text': [u'I\'ve been using this product almost a month and can see the difference. My deep lines are diminishing.'], 'author': u'Erdy ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': u'Los Angeles California', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'love love love it', 'text': [u'I am so picky when it comes to face moisturizers and overnight creams but I\'m so glad this performs so well and doesn\'t disappoint. Everyone is noticing my skin is looking better.'], 'author': u'MsVanwolf ', 'date': [u'2016-09-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Star from Tatcha!', 'text': [u'Most of Tatcha\'s stuff is overhype in my opinion, but I found this serum truly outstanding and lives up to its fame. While browsing at Sephora one day another customer highly recommended this product to me, saying she\'s been using it and seeing results (her skin looks radiant by the way). So I broke the bank and got myself a jar and had been using for about a week now. The texture is a bit hard to get used to as its in a jello form, you\'ll have to use the spatula to scoop up product, rubbing it on the palm of your hand until it becomes oil form before applying on face (that\'s how I apply it). Once applied it\'s very refreshing and hydrating, and my face is instantly alive and complexion brightened. I haven\'t seen any miraculous anti aging effect yet but I enjoy using it every night. The scent is very soothing too. Besides being expensive and not very use friendly I love this serum from Tatcha. Compared to her $150 lackluster moisture cream I feel this serum is money better spent.'], 'author': u'lagirl33 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-09'], 'location': u'Los Angeles, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Disappointed', 'text': [u'I NEVER return things to sephora, I feel awful because I know the product will just be trashed, i always just try to make things work or use it up even if it\'s not my favorite. I really wanted this product to work for me, but the smell was awful, however I could get past that easily. The texture was not typical of a serum, it was like gelatin, and i didn\'t like the way it made my skin feel, it didn\'t make things smooth or even feel very hydrated. I noticed no difference besides breakouts. With the price tag I could not justify keeping this. The packaging was cute but I also really wish it came in a pump style or squeeze tube because this felt unsanitary regardless of the little spoon that came with it. This is not a luxury skincare product, just luxury packaging in my opinion, if this works for you, I\'m glad. If you like light textures and have really oily skin that doesn\'t break out easily, maybe this will work for you. I suggest asking for a sample first because it is a very unique product.'], 'author': u'alibassett ', 'date': [u'2016-08-28'], 'location': u'Alexandria, Va', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

name: Top Secrets All-In-One BB Cream Skintone Corrector
reviews: {'title': u'Perfect cool weather BB', 'text': [u'As a makeup minimalist, I look for multitasking products. This BB cream is heavier than I\'d want to wear in the summer, but for cool weather it perfect and eliminates the use of a separate moisturizer. Mostly I wear it by itself, but if I want to feel a little more made up I\'ll add a primer (Becca) before and finish with Smashbox Halo. The light color works for a variety of skin tones and the texture is, I don\'t know, dewy? It leaves me glowing but definitely not shiny.'], 'author': u'ReasonableJane ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

After trying other brands of CC creams, BB creams and tinted moisturizers, this is the closest one to the Chanel one that is no longer made, and probably better. name: Redness Solutions Daily Relief Cream
reviews: {'title': u'great for red skin', 'text': [u'I have super red/dry/irritated skin and this seems to soothe the redness after I shower. It feels amazing and I can see a difference right after I use it. I also use it with the redness solutions cleanser and I believe this stuff is helping clear up my facial redness, I wouldRecommend giving it a try!!'], 'author': u'Kayla44444 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-06'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"If you have rosacea don't buy!!!!", 'text': [u'So I suffer from rosacea pretty bad and unfortunately bought this product in the store instead of online where I should\'ve read reviews. It didn\'t even hydrate my skin. My skin is pretty dry during summer and somehow managed to still be AND oily??? I don\'t know if I broke out or if it\'s just my rosacea but it definitely did not help the redness whatsoever and honestly I think it\'s worse. I wanted to stay hopeful which is why I didn\'t return it but after using it all summer and no results I will definitely never purchase this again. I guess it works for people who just have slight facial redness but if you have rosacea or extreme please don\'t waste your money especially because it\'s pretty expensive!!'], 'author': u'Jewlsrhea72 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-31'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'worst product ever', 'text': [u'I bought the start kit for redness solution and never see any result, no even after a month... my rosacea still there plus my face got oily with this product and I also started to get the worst acne. I wasted my money with this expensive product... now I got stuck with something that doesn\'t help my problem.. :\'(....the product said: oil free ...smh this product is oily specially the wash... i had to rinse my face more then usual....'], 'author': u'skyblue16 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-06'], 'location': u'Boston, Ma', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Unexpected Greatness', 'text': [u'I saw the rave reviews and decided to get the travel size. The first time I tried it I got it on my lips and couldn\'t get the stickiness off of them all night. I was confused as to why everyone loved it so much. But the next morning (and every morning now) I wake up with glowing, fresh-looking skin. I have combination skin and my mom has dry, we both use and love it. I do feel like my other products (Drunk Elephant) are more effective when using this essence. I gave it four stars due to the alcohol content and strong fragrance. I\'m not sure why Korean products are so fragrant and alcohol heavy but this would be a dream product without the two.'], 'author': u'Susan0719 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-31'], 'location': u'Woodbridge, VA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'holly grail', 'text': [u'This madly leaves me so refreshed and hydrated when I wake up in the morning! This is a must have for dry skin during the winter! {'title': None, 'text': [u'I have very dry, dull skin and i also sometimes struggle with insomnia, which we all know takes quite a toll on our skin! At the time i bought this i was working two jobs--a day job and a night job--and was averaging 3-5 hours of sleep a night. This stuff SAVED my skin during that crazy time! It helped me to look refreshed on little sleep and kept my skin hydrated and healthy when i didn\'t feel like doing a full skincare routine. Now, i\'ll never go without it. When i use it along with my full skincare routine and a full nights rest, it looks like i just got a facial at the spa! LOVEEEE this stuff. i hope they keep it forever! And such a good price considering all the benefits!'], 'author': u'Lizkro ', 'date': [u'2016-10-30'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

I used another wash and kept on with this sleeping mask and it was GREAT. My skin felt amazingly soft and smooth just after a couple days. I have been using this mask for almost two weeks and it has been great so far! It\'s very nourishing and I haven\'t had any dry skin over two weeks even without moisturizers. Great mask overall.'], 'author': u'Vestelle ', 'date': [u'2016-10-28'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Phoenix Cell Regenerating Facial Oil
reviews: {'title': u"best oil I've used so far", 'text': [u'I have quite the collection of face oils and the Phoenix oil is by far my favorite. {'title': u'Love this oil!', 'text': [u'Super hydrating and skin texture improves with use.'], 'author': u'Amc98 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Worth every penny.', 'text': [u'This is the most expensive skincare product I\'ve owned by far, but the best. I noticed immediate results in a week. I pick at my skin all the time, bad habit I know, but this oil heals my scars so fast. I\'d say 2 days and an intense scar left from deep cystic acne, gone, as if it was never there in the first place. I also struggle with texture and this helps too. If you have dull skin get this! Your skin will look so healthy. As I have acne prone skin on my face, neck, and entire back; I go through this bottle fairly fast. If you just use it for your face it\'ll last you at least 6 months.'], 'author': u'wren10 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Fountain of youth in an oil!!!', 'text': [u'I love beauty oils so I have a rather large collection. I came across this one after I bought the face mist (another addiction) and fell in love with the ingredient list. I only use 3 drops after my night cream which is enough to do my face and neck area. Ps I also noticed that my cuticles are amazing ever since using this (some gets on my fingers and I now purposely rub it into my cyticles). I\'ve been using this oil for about two weeks and already noticing my concealer doesn\'t have fine lines to settle into under my eyes anymore. I can\'t wait to see the results after a months use!!'], 'author': u'Greeneyedgirl77 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-21'], 'location': u'Hamilton, ON', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'WORTH THE MONEY', 'text': [u'I\'ve only been using this oil about a week (and only in the mornings, as I use the Sunday Riley Luna at night) and WOW! My skin has already transformed. {'title': u'The perfect oil for Combo Skin', 'text': [u'My past experience with moisturizers/oils usually leaves me hydrated but breaking out/oily or not breaking out but with dry patches. {'title': u'All the letters on the bottle came off', 'text': [u'The product itself is fine - a bit floral (rose) smelling and leaves a bit of a sticky feeling but the odd thing is ALL the letters on the glass jar on the front and most of the back have come off - to the point that I couldn\'t tell if this was the day or night product. I think that\'s a bit odd. reviews: {'title': u'Woah!!', 'text': [u'I was not expecting a ton from this product but I picked it up based on a skincare reps recommendation and layered it on top of my normal skincare routine and it works beautifully. {'title': u'Legit magic', 'text': [u'I normally have combination skin with dehydrated cheeks. There was enough product in here to put on my cheeks, neck, and hands. Worked extremely well on hydrating my cheeks and also got ride of dryness and cuts on my hands! My face was hydrated for several days without moisturizer. Not only that, but I had a huge acne breakout from pain medication when I got my wisdom teeth pulled out and it completely calmed my skin overnight (maybe just one or two pimples remained). reviews: {'title': u'Amazing!!!!', 'text': [u'This stuff is pricey but it is awesome, very light weight, not greasy but yet moisturizing, it gives my face a heathy dewy glow, would definitely re-purchase again.'], 'author': u'hallrocks ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Miracle in a Bottle', 'text': [u'My dry skin has always been my greatest concern, more so as we are approaching the colder months. During the peak of the winter, my skin actually becomes so dry that it peels and hurts, and I was once again getting stressed over the fact that I was going to have to experience all of that all over again. So I made it a mission to up my skincare routine when I stumbled upon this product. Now I must preface this by stating that I have tried other face oils in the past and they have always felt heavy and have always broken me out in either little white bumps or pimples. Nonetheless, I had to make the choice of whether I was going to take the chance of breaking out or experience a cracking face in the upcoming winter months, so I obviously went with the former. Now, I must say that I am pleasantly surprised by this product. I\u2019m going to admit that I was a little shocked to see how small the bottle is, but then again, how much face oil are you really going to be using at a time. Fortunately enough, this product hydrates the fact with just a tiny bit. I used about a dime size all around the face. I was immediately surprised by how supple my skin felt after applying this product, and I mean literally IMMEDIATELY after. I know this sounds like I\u2019m exaggerating, but please take my word. I have used all types of hydrating lotions, creams, masks, and none of these products had done anything for my skin. It does not feel oily or heavy on the skin, and sinks in relatively quickly. It makes the skin feel moisturized and even after touching the face upon application, it feels hydrated and plump instead of being able to feel the oil on the skin. I went to bed hoping that this wouldn\u2019t break me out, and needless to say, I was once again amazed by how this product worked overnight. My skin felt extremely soft in the morning. Now usually when I wake up, my skin feels tight and dry, but my skin felt so soft and hydrated. It seems like it amps up the skincare products that I use afterwards. However, the trust test was upon makeup application. My foundation applied beautifully! No patchiness or dryness. My skin is actually glowing. I\u2019m using this in conjunction with the mist from this line, and they are the dynamic duo. I admit the price is steep but I promise you\'re getting MORE than what you pay for! I absolutely recommend this product AND this line for those with dry skin!'], 'author': u'impuLsen03l ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'THE BEST OIL.', 'text': [u'This product is divine. Seriously. I use it as the last step of my skincare routine and again to blend out my foundation, by putting a few drops on my Beauty Blender. It hydrates but also controls oil and pores. It smells so good I use it on my body -- there are flakes of gold in it!!'], 'author': u'frenchmermaid ', 'date': [u'2016-09-11'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Why is this so amazing?!', 'text': [u'Ugh I\'m so mad that this is such a great product. I got a travel sized bottle of this oil from another website and have been using it to tame my frizzy wavy hair. This really is a miracle product! My hair is super frizzy and wavy but if I brush it, it turns into a lion\'s mane. I use this oil on my damp hair after showing and when I wake up my hair is smooth, soft, and SUPER curly and defined. I\'ve never had my hair look so great before! The best part is that it doesn\'t make my hair look greasy. The only reason this isn\'t getting 5 stars is the price. I wish they would take the gold flakes out to cut the price, especially because they don\'t do anything and you can\'t even get them sucked up into the plunger.'], 'author': u'AJW818 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-04'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

It\'s my new jam!'], 'author': u'BeautyNtheBooks ', 'date': [u'2016-06-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Ultimate Revival Cream
reviews: {'title': u'Love it: Great Texture, Dewy', 'text': [u'I used to live in Japan so I bought a lot of SK-II because it was cheaper. Japanese women have the best skin on this planet and many of them use SK-II.', u'I splurged once and bought their Ultimate Revival Cream. It\'s expensive and I\'m torn about it because I really liked it. I liked the texture of the product and I like how hydrating and dewy it made my skin. With that said, you can also bulk up on the Facial Treatment Masks and it also does the trick. But yes, I really liked this cream and I will buy it again. I also protect my skin and wear sunscreen everyday.'], 'author': u'benji09 ', 'date': [u'2015-12-14'], 'location': u'Boston, MA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'too much hype', 'text': [u'I am 39 and I try to take really good care of my skin. I thought that this would be juat the thing, but its is greasy, really greasy. It takes so long to absorb into the skin I can only use it as a night time cream.The one thing I will say is that my skin is much more hydrated and you do not need to use much.I find that I go back to my old (yes to carrots) for my under makeup moisturizer.'], 'author': u'Poptart11325 ', 'date': [u'2014-03-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Very rich, thick cream', 'text': [u'When I bought this cream, I admit, I was a sucker for "the higher the price, the better the product". This is an amazing cream, very thick, very nourishing. My face has been so dry and tight from this harsh winter weather and this cream definitely helped relieve some of that dryness but it sits on top of my skin like a very greasy, heavy layer and it takes forever to absorb. I had to use oil absorbing sheets before I could do my makeup on top of it. I simply didn\'t have the time to wait for it to absorb then do my makeup routine. It is a very good night time cream and a little bit does go a long way. The packaging is beautiful but I think you really are paying a lot for the look and the brand name. I am still in my mid twenties so I did not see any anti-aging benefits on my skin.'], 'author': u'AsianNC ', 'date': [u'2014-02-01'], 'location': u'Charlotte, NC', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Not as effective as other SK-II moisturizers', 'text': [u'I was so excited when SK-II released this cream thinking that it would be the perfect accompaniment to my night time skin care routine in winter. The texture of this cream is incredibly rich and is best used when you scoop out a small pea sized quantity, warm it up between your hands and press it onto your face for a few seconds. The good, it does feel very good on your skin and relieves it of tight and dry patches in winter. The bad, because my skin is prone to breakouts with heavy oily products I had breakouts and milia after a few weeks. I gave it to my mother to use, she is in her early 60\'s, lives in a very dry climate and has sensitive combination skin like me but she found the consistency, wrinkle reduction and refining effects to be quite suitable for her. It also soothed her skin after all day out in the sun and the non-stop indoor air conditioning.'], 'author': u'tippers ', 'date': [u'2013-05-12'], 'location': u'Boston, MA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Almost, but not quite', 'text': [u'At first, I was quite impressed with this cream, but then I realized that my skin was feeling tight and was a little greasy. I tend to need creams with more hydration in addition to oil-based ingredients. I thought this would be it, and for the price, it should have all of the above.'], 'author': u'neatlyfab ', 'date': [u'2012-11-03'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Indigo Soothing Triple Recovery Cream
reviews: {'title': u'worth every penny', 'text': [u'I have incredibly over sensitive skin - to the point where simply putting water on it can burn at times. To complicate matters even more I have rosacea. After trying and wasting money on not only every small and big name skin care line out there I\'ve gone through my fair share of prescription medication too - both pill and topical form. I tried this cream on a whim honestly not expecting much... boy was I wrong! Yes it is expensive. It is a heavy thick cream and it does take some time to fully set in. I only use it at night or in the morning if I\'m staying in all day. My skin is combination and it will typically be oily during the summer months but I didn\'t find this too heavy at all. Within days my redness faded drastically. Do I now have geisha perfect skin? No...probably never will. But it is definitely a huge improvement than what I started out with. I pair it with the indigo powder cleanser and during the day I use the pore perfecting water gel moisturizer. I couldn\'t be happier with these products and while they are pricey it is worth it to me because I truly notice the difference it has made in my skin. Even my husband notices too! I will continue to repurchase and pray they are never discontinued!'], 'author': u'Kit1030 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Super sensitive Skin life saver', 'text': [u'I will say... I use their cleanser, and rice enzyme powder "exfoliant" (very gentle so I don\'t think of it of a scrub) before this moisturizer. One dab of this is enough for all over. I have had a very bad reaction to product testing. I was red and blistered all over my face. I had a rep put this on my face and I almost broke out in tears, I watched in a mirror, my blistering spots disappear. My face felt better immediately. I have not had any pain or burning since. This product and routine has completely changed my life. I promise it is worth the money if you have any skin disorder.'], 'author': u'Bridgetbishop ', 'date': [u'2016-11-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'just not for me', 'text': [u'I got a nice sized sample with an order. This is nice and all but really expensive! My face feels hydrated and kind of silly but it feels sticky. Smells better as I continue to use it but I don\'t like it. Will not purchase.'], 'author': u'inkedCaligrl82 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-02'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'soothing and healing', 'text': [u'I have fair skin, naturally strawberry blonde hair and I\'m 49 years old. I have sensitive skin and had just finished over using my retinol cream.... An hour later I had red and irritated bumps on my lower cheek and neck line. Which for me tends to be more sensitive to everything. I remembered I had tried this cream from a sample I had received in the mail. The first time I used it I used it like you would any other moisturizer but had tossed it thinking it was too heavy. However, as an RN I remember "recovery" cream in the description. So I I set out to find the rest of that sample and try a little on my irritated patches of skin\u2026 I put a little bit on each side of my face and jaw line ....within five minutes my face didn\'t burn or itch anymore. In the morning the red bumps were gone. I would not recommend this as a day cream but for me it is exactly what it says it is a triple "recovery" cream. It\'s my HG item for my sensitive skin. Remember a little goes a long way and you\'ll fall in love with it also. I also use it after aggressive anti-aging facials. It\'s high-quality and very effective. The packaging is also lovely and I just can\'t help loving the purplely cream too! :-)'], 'author': u'cinderchella ', 'date': [u'2016-10-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'combosensitive skin type', 'text': [u'I have combo skin and I\'m not sure this is the best for combo skin type or oily skin. It\'s creamy and thick and keeps your skin hydrated or basically oily the whole day. Hence this is good for those with dry skin. Surprisingly it doesn\'t irritate the skin because I have sensitive skin. If you still insist on getting this, and you have a sephora store nearby, just go ask for a free sample. It\'s enough to tell if this product will be compatible with your skin type. It\'s a good thing I got the sample first because it\'s not cheap.'], 'author': u'mizzyj123 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Overall, the product did not work well for me, and I could not get over the strong fragrance that never dissipated. The smell is not bad, but definitely a strong perfumed fragrance which is not something I want on my face. The product dried slightly tacky, or \'dewey\' as the packaging states on my combo skin (predominantly oily in the summer), and I feel like it did an average job of moisturizing. After a week of use, I noticed a drastic increase in small bumps and breakouts on my forehead and chin. If you look at the ingredients, there is also nothing that would affect visible pores like they claim, and for the price I expect a product with more beneficial ingredients. The strong fragrance with clearly related breakouts made me return this.'], 'author': u'kra5 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': u'New York, New York', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: PRE:EMPT SERIES™ Oil-Free Hydrating Cream
reviews: {'title': u'wow!', 'text': [u'simply awesome. lightweight and oil free and anti aging? love this and love the who pre-empt series. shea and squalene are hydrating without clogging. i am not sure why some think 70.00 for a moisturizer is expensive...it\'s your skin!!!! .it\'s also a 2oz jar, when others are 1,5 or 1.7. more bang for your buck.'], 'author': u'xyxy ', 'date': [u'2016-11-04'], 'location': u'houston, tx', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'THE BEST', 'text': [u'I love this. Its so hydrating and not greasy at all. Love that its also helps with preventing fine lines. It works wonders as my make up base that I dont even bother with a primer. My skin is combo dry just to give this review some context.'], 'author': u'foreverskin ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'very good moisturiser', 'text': [u'I got this as a sample and as soon as I am finished with my sample I\'ll be buying one for myself. I think this is a really good moisturiser but I took away one star because of its price. The quality of the product is very good, the packaging feels like quality and the lid closed nice and tight. it really is a good product. However, because of the moisturiser not being "super hydrating" and being a woman of a certain age who needs a deep hydration. I love this for young women and certainly would\'ve loved it in my 30s and early 40s! So if you need a light good quality moisturiser I promise you this is it! But if you\'re getting a little older and you need "deep hydration" in your moisturisers this won\'t be your winter go to. However in the summer in the south I\'ll still have a place for this in my lotions and potions drawer :) For those hot summer afternoons when you still wanna wear a bit of make up and don\'t want it sliding off of your face!! So mid 40s and below fantastic moisturiser! Ladies a little bit older in years might prefer something a bit heavier. My niece in her 20s loves it!! I was fortunate enough to get two deluxe samples somehow she talked me into giving her one! :-)'], 'author': u'cinderchella ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"It's definitely not worth the $$$$", 'text': [u'There are so many amazing moisturizers coming out at Sephora right now, in every price range, that I think this is buying for the name. It is a good moisturizer. No doubts about that. However, I think Perricone is always a bit more expensive then it\'s true value. I have an FAB moisturizer that is 1/10th the cost and in my opinion just as good. As for the first reviewer, Sephora has one of the best return/exchange policies out there I am just wondering why you cannot take it back?? If it\'s someone at the store giving you grief, take a page from my book and call Sephora Customer Care, They have never let me down. Bottom line, will not buy...and glad I got it as a free Deluxe Sample. Most Sephora staff will give you options in various price ranges if you want to find an anti aging moisturizer. Personally I love Korres. Just an opinion.'], 'author': u'kandt ', 'date': [u'2016-10-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

Really wish I could return this.'], 'author': u'allisoneyres ', 'date': [u'2016-09-27'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

name: Polyphenol C15 Overnight Detox Oil
reviews: {'title': u"Can't say enough good things about it", 'text': [u'I have been using this oil for about 3 weeks now after I read the reviews and decided that my dirt & sebum filled pores probably will benefit from it. This oil works it\'s major overnight and soothes any inflamed areas that I have in my skin. Seeing how I have struggled with severe cystic acne in the past and still get skin inflammation once in a while, this oil could not have been less than. A best friend. I noticed how with long-term use my skin is showing improvement in my skin texture; my skin is less congested and I am definitely seeing a reductions in whiteheads. I will definitely recommend it for people who have acne -prone skin or struggle with blocked pores and sebum overproduction.'], 'author': u'Xahramazh ', 'date': [u'2016-11-06'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Bought after reading reviews, so impressed!', 'text': [u'I was introduced to this product after seeing it on a blog, and then lost a good 20 minutes reading product reviews. i was hesitant to use an oil on my acne-prone skin (I have cystic, hormonal acne) but thought it was worth a shot. I have been SO happy with my purchase. My skin has calmed down - I have not had a cystic pimple in months! I feel like my skin is less irritated. I use 6 drops every night. If my skin is feeling dry, I put the First Aid night repair cream over the top. I also LOVE the earthy smell of the product. And lastly, using only 6 drops a night, I feel like this product will last forever!'], 'author': u'MegMed ', 'date': [u'2016-11-02'], 'location': u'Lansdale, Pa', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Solve my acne problem', 'text': [u'I was hesitate to use face oil due to my acne problem which has become worst recently. I tried so many skin care products and prescription acne gels, but none is able to calm my acne spread out until I use this face oil again. It saves my life with amazing results. I stop getting acne now. I start off with 2-3 drops then now 4-5 drops. When I wake up in the morning, my face is clean and fresh (I used to see oil on my face in the morning no matter what skin care products I used). I\'m 51 and still gets acne. Probably the face needs to be hydrated, and this face oil helps.'], 'author': u'chrisloknyc ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': u'NYC', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

It is so rich and nourishing for my skin, which tends to be on the combination side of things, though it has never caused a break out for me. I love how my skin feels after I use it!'], 'author': u'lsivas ', 'date': [u'2016-09-25'], 'location': u'San Jose, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'heavenly', 'text': [u'This cream has a texture and fragrance that I love, and a price that is very agreeable. I have used a much more expensive product, but it doesn\'t contain sunscreen so I\'ve been trying others hoping for a substitute. This does have an almost smoky fragrance (not at all heavy) that might not agree with everyone, but I really like it (and is similar to the other product I used). The SPF is no joke - I put it on in the morning (under makeup or alone) and sat at an outdoor table in full sun at high noon with no sunburn or tanning (I unfortunately have some freckles coalescing into age spots and don\'t want them to get worse). It is a bit heavy for summer but not terribly so and will be great in winter. Seems fine for wrinkles and sagging. I doubt it has any longer term benefits to reverse changes but blocking more sun damage is probably the best I can hope for.'], 'author': u'ljeanbq ', 'date': [u'2016-08-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'love', 'text': [u'I wrote a similar review for the cru elixir, I started using both at the same time, but here goes. I am not a skincare trend person...I have very sensitive skin so tend to find something I like and stick with it. I\'ve been using ole henriksen for years and felt that it was at the high end of my acceptable price range so never thought about buying something this pricy...however. I was in france recently and a friend asked me to pick some up for her as it is significantly cheaper there, so I got some for myself also. my skin looks AMAZING after just a few weeks of use. I use it on top of the cru elixir. it\'s so smooth and dare I say...glowing. I am 36 and just starting to get some light lines around my eyes and I have one particularly noticeable laugh line that has dramatically improved from use of this along with the cru cream. I\'m obsessed. now my struggle is going to be how to convince myself to pay full price when I run out :\'('], 'author': u'karitag ', 'date': [u'2016-05-10'], 'location': u'Denver, CO', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u"Can't live without", 'text': [u'I love this bb gel. I have very oily skin with acne and scarring. Some might be having problems with it because It dries VERY quickly, so you have to apply it really fast. I use the brush that goes with it and dab it on, and it works perfectly for me.'], 'author': u'Ari13102 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Balanced Pore Perfecting Water Gel
reviews: {'title': u'Great as primer for combo skin!', 'text': [u'I\'ve used this about 6 times now under my makeup as a primer and my skin has never looked better, nor have i ever received more compliments in my life! I have combo skin, my t-zone starts of extremely dry to the point where you can see flakes and as the day goes by i get more and more oily. Because of this i have to use more mattifying products or i will look extremely greasy by the end of the day. I apply this all over my face and then on my t-zone i apply a little bit of the makeup forever smoothing primer over top and my skin looks amazing! any foundation i apply over top of this looks better than ever. i am extremely pleased and hooked!'], 'author': u'mare09 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-08'], 'location': u'Toronto, ON', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'AMAZING!!', 'text': [u'I have only been using this for a few days and I have seen a HUGE difference! I have been having a hard time finding a great moisturizer that doesnt make me oily or make my make up fall off. This has been amazing! I read reviews before hand and I was skeptical but i thought, "I have tried so many things and nothing works I should just try it." So worth it!'], 'author': u'italianaaa ', 'date': [u'2016-11-07'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Yes!', 'text': [u'This worked for me! I find you have to let it sit on your skin and give it time to absorb but it\'s a great under-makeup moisturizer. {'title': u'50/50', 'text': [u'I tried this stuff for about a month or more now. It smells like starburst made their own face cream. It smells, heavenly. It\'s a light moisturizer, so if you have flakes, it won\'t take them away, but it will soften your skin. ', u' I recommend a second application, after it has absorbed. If you\'re looking for a light moisturizer this is the one. It makes your skin feel baby smooth and the smell is super soothing as you put it on. Now, as far as wrinkles and fine lines go, it really hasn\'t done much for me. My forhead is the main place I have been trying to work on and in thst area it absolutely did not prevent or help anything. However, near my mouth and smile lines, it\'s helped a tad. I\'m not entirely impressed with the anit ageing claims, but it is a great light moisturizer and I totally recommend it. So I did 4 stars. Because the anti ageing part isn\'t so great, but everything else, is.'], 'author': u'L2Sabbath ', 'date': [u'2016-09-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'High Hopes', 'text': [u'I realize that you really can\'t stop the aging process, believe me I do, but you can try to slow it down which is why I have been trying all sorts of "anti aging" "age-erasing" "fine lines & wrinkles" products. I purchased this product in the hopes that it would work far better than drug store varieties. I am not bowled over by this presults, even though it boasts "age-erasing". I am, however, okay with the fact that it does seem to be holding the progression of lines and wrinkles at bay. would I buy this again, maybe after I have tried a few other lines.'], 'author': u'dima61 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-29'], 'location': u'Toronto, Ontario', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

reviews: {'title': u'Excellent Toner', 'text': [u'Face feels smooth and clean'], 'author': u'gml0603 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-02'], 'location': u'Katy, Texas', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'Really great toner', 'text': [u'With my Uber-sensitive skin, I was not a big believer in most toners. My experiences have resulted in either irritation, drying, rebound oiliness or some combination there of. Seeing the fantastic reviews, I gave it a whirl. I was pleasantly surprised at how improved my skin tone and clarity was. My irritation decreased, breakouts diminished and my skin seemed ready to soak up the Aveda Calming Concentrate I recently switched to. Though I hate the cost of this toner, I only use a few drops per day, and the effect is has on my skin is well worth it.'], 'author': u'tamthebadass ', 'date': [u'2016-08-21'], 'location': u'St Louis, MO', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Smooth!', 'text': [u'I read many good reviews on this product and decided to purchase it, despite the heavy cost for a toner. They are not stingy with the amount, this will last as long as you don\'t accidentally spill it. The smell is very light and refreshing, as well as the application. I apply a couple drops with a cotton pad and it removes impurities left behind from cleansing my face but it does not dry out my skin-with is great. It feels hydrating, but it is not oily in any way. My breakouts have drastically reduced in nature thanks to three things: staying away from sodas, using a good face cleanser, and following up with this toner. I am very pleased and will repurchase in the future.'], 'author': u'Karensita012 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-17'], 'location': u'Houston', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Love the results', 'text': [u'Been using this night cream now for about a month now. My skin is loving it so so much! I\'m 58 yrs young, have never had skin issues ever until now. I\'ve started developing some light acne but it\'s enough to drive me crazy because I\'ve never had to deal with this before in my whole life, even when I was going thru menopause. I gave it 4 stars only because i don\'t like to feel tackiness on my skin and this cream is very rich. It\'s not horribly tacky it\'s just enough for me to feel it. All in all the results far exceed the tackiness. I also developed some serious dry patches on the temples and this cream has made them look and feel better. I would highly recommend this product to anyone who is frustrated with trying everything out there with no results. It is pricey but it lasts because you do not need a lot of it.'], 'author': u'luluxoxo ', 'date': [u'2016-10-28'], 'location': u'Sarasota, Fl', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

name: Sleep Tight Firming Night Balm with Echinacea GreenEnvy™
reviews: {'title': u'Amazing', 'text': [u'I have very oily skin. I was very hesitant to try this when I opened it and saw "the grease". However, this stuff is AMAZING. A little goes a long way. I use it every night after washing my face with the cleansing oil and then either the cleansing grains or glam glow cleanser. I use a few sprays of the facial mist and then apply this balm. I wake up to the most supple, naturally radiant skin. NOT OILY!!!! I think I may have found my holy grail. Ride or die.'], 'author': u'ButtonsBelle ', 'date': [u'2016-11-05'], 'location': u'Charleston, SC', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Heavenly', 'text': [u'I expose my skin to a lot of environmental elements living South Florida. At 26, my skin is getting tired of my abuse. This product is definitely a step-up from my normal lazy-girl routine. It smells heavenly and sinks right into my skin (combination-oily). So far, I have used it after a mask. The result is beautiful! My skin feels supple to touch and looks healthy. As for me, I am totally relaxed and ready for bed.'], 'author': u'YungT ', 'date': [u'2016-11-04'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'A New Staple Product', 'text': [u'I love this balm! A little bit goes a very long way, I use less than a pea size for my whole face. I layer this with my Youth To The People serum and RMS beauty oil and it\'s the perfect trifecta! I haven\'t been using this long so I can\'t speak to any long term effects, (although I see skincare as preventative rather than corrective anyway) but it smooths over my skin so nicely and definitely adds hydration. It\'s oily but extremely light weight and has the most pleasant slightly earthy but mostly clean and natural scent. Will repurchase, just probably months from now because I\'m sure I won\'t go through this product quickly at all.'], 'author': u'princessleah12 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-04'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Progenius Omega Treatment Rescue Oil
reviews: {'title': u'Great stuff', 'text': [u'I use this on my face as intended and mix it with my makeup. It\'s light (almost like water) which makes it great in my opinion. It doesn\'t feel like an oil and it absorbs relatively quickly. Once it dries, you wouldn\'t even be able to tell while touching your face that you put an oil on it, it\'s that good/absorbent. I mix one pump with my foundation/concealer as well. I had dry spots for a long time and my foundation was coming out cakey/powdery no matter what I did. I tried 5 different foundations and 7 different moisturizers/toners. Nothing worked. Once I began mixing this with my makeup, the dry spots disappeared and application of products was completely smooth and not at all cakey. For someone who typically hates oil anywhere on my body, I will definitely continue to purchase this product.'], 'author': u'emuhliy ', 'date': [u'2016-11-06'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Going fast', 'text': [u'I\'ve tried several face oils and this is one of my favorites. It\'s light, absorbs quickly, smells nice but not too strong and seems to make a true difference in skin texture. I go through it so quickly I should have bought two last time I ordered when it was on special! If you like face oils, this one is absolutely worth a try.'], 'author': u'beauty3257 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-24'], 'location': u'Milwaukee, WI', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'great for dry skin!', 'text': [u'I have really dry skin and I used about 5-6 drops of this before bed time every day and in just one night I noticed a huge improvement in my skin. reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'This is the BEST moisturizer EVER. I have dry, acne prone skin that gets irritated with pretty much any lotion/ moisturizer. Except for this one. I use it with a prescribed topical cream for my acne and it doesn\'t irritate it at all. I use once at night before bed, and after I wash my face in the morning. reviews: {'title': u'Great Night Cream!', 'text': [u'I love Caudalie skin products. I first tried the thirst serum and moisturizing sorbet after getting the free sample from my Sephora points. I loved the way it made my skin look. I then bought the night cream and love it just as much. A little goes a LONG way. My skin appears more even and less greasy. This formula works great for my combination skin and I\'m slowing adding additional Caudalie products to my collection.'], 'author': u'abaileygirl ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': u'McKinney, TX', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'comedogenic?', 'text': [u'I was so looking forward to using this after reading the raving reviews! I put it on woke up the next morning with 4 new pimples! And the rest of my face skin wasn\'t looking that great either. Checked the ingredients list and it has vegetable oil in it! Why?!? ', u'You can def skip this one if you have oily/sensitive/acne prone skin!'], 'author': u'trean7 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Effective, eager to see long-term results', 'text': [u'I received a very generous sample of this product in the Caudalie Get Glowing set. I have used this almost every night for a month (I\'m surprised and impressed it\'s lasted that long - a little goes a LONG way so use just a drop of product!) in conjunction with the Vinoperfect Radiance Serum (is it just me, or did that disappear from the Sephora website?!) and - maybe I\'m just psyching myself out here - but I really think I have noticed a subtle improvement in my skin tone. When I wake up I am always content with how my skin looks and feels. Definitely interested in picking up the full size soon to see if the results improve with continued use.'], 'author': u'JasmineShaw ', 'date': [u'2016-08-22'], 'location': u'Ottawa, ON', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Broke me out :(', 'text': [u'I love Tatcha (I use the sunscreen and cleaning oil daily), but this moisturizer was a miss for me. It feels and smells lovely, is nicely packaged, and is pleasant to apply. A little goes a long way and it does feel nice on your face! I think if you have more forgiving skin this might be a great fit, but if your skin is acne prone I would not recommend this.'], 'author': u'grace6824 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'This is a winner!', 'text': [u'I received this moisturizer in the gift set and immediately fell in love!! I love all tatcha products so far and this cream is a must have especially if you have dry sensitive skin. It goes on well and leaves your skin velvety soft. If anyone if struggling with liking this product do make sure and use the enzyme powder prior to applying this cream. Without proper exfoliation product just sits on the face without being absorbed. I reaped all the benefits when I tried the entire set, and I\'m very dry just for reference.'], 'author': u'MeganCave ', 'date': [u'2016-11-04'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Genius White Brightening Anti-Aging Cream
reviews: {'title': u'Good moisturizer, no real improvement', 'text': [u'So I purchased this with the entire genius line with high hopes that my dark spots and trouble areas would see vast improvement. Don\'t get me wrong, this is a perfectly fine moisturizer. But as far as the other benefits it is supposed to have, I haven\'t experienced them. It\'s not a miracle product. If you have reasonable expectations, you\'ll probably like it. I used the jar, but am looking for better solutions.'], 'author': u'newenglandgirl ', 'date': [u'2016-09-25'], 'location': u'Feeding Hills, MA', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Excellent cream! Bought it to treat sun spots on my face,neck and chest area due to years of sun exposure, an unfortunate side effect of living in beautiful Key West. I\'ve tried few different lines here and while they all worked, this one has given me by far the fastest and best results. Been using it for the past month and a half, morning and night and there is significant lightness and evenness to the skin tone. My complexion is more luminous too. Have enough left in the pot for perhaps another half a month for two months total. If you are using it only on your face and neck, then it will probably last even longer. My first time using Algenist line and very impressed by it so will order serum, facial wash as well as peel with my next order. Worth every penny. Highly recommended.'], 'author': u'Drag ', 'date': [u'2016-09-15'], 'location': u'Key West,FL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'love!!', 'text': [u'I have normal skin but I live in Denver where it is very dry. {'title': u'never seen such fast results before!', 'text': [u'I got this as the "challenge" sample and I have to say I was not expecting to see such noticeable results so quickly. Within a week my skin looked and felt completely different. I got another round of the sample set just to make sure there wasn\'t some other factor involved but got the same results again! I am in my late 20s so I don\'t really have any wrinkles, but what it did was even out my complexion, my skin was softer, and I had a nice glow all day. You definitely don\'t need to use very much so I\'m hoping this larger size will last a while. :)'], 'author': u'mfrances ', 'date': [u'2016-09-11'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Absolutely Amazing', 'text': [u'I\'m 48 and I\'ve been using Algenist products for about a year. This one by far has given me visible results but I do go for regular facials once a week, I feel that the product can be more beneficial if your skin is in tip top shape( not perfect but primed if you will) even at home facials will do bc even I sometimes don\'t have the time and energy to sit every week. Yes it\'s pricey but you DEFINITELY......DEFINITELY get your money\'s worth. You don\'t need very much, just gently glide your ring finger and grab a very small amount. This covers my face, neck and chest.'], 'author': u'inspireme68 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-07'], 'location': u'North Battleford, Saskatchewan', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I\'m in my early 50\'s & in search of a good moisturizer which would head off all the little wrinkles that seem to be cropping up every day. I was put off by the price (yeesh), but finally got one of the \'real results\' sample packs and gave it a try. In a week, I noticed a BIG difference. My skin looked softer, and a lot of the fine lines were much less noticeable. I sucked it up and bought the full size, and I couldn\'t be happier with it.', u'That said, a word about application size - the sample pack was supposed to last for what, 7 days? I used it for over a month without being stingy. This cream is super-rich, so if you dollop it on, your face will end up greasy. I just press my fingertip into the pot and that amount covers my entire face, no problem. The full size jar will likely last me all year.'], 'author': u'harmonyfb ', 'date': [u'2016-08-12'], 'location': u'Florida', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

name: Le Soin Noir
reviews: {'title': u'overpriced', 'text': [u'This product is packaged wrong and once air hits it, bacteria can grow and it\'s not as potent. It also has fragrance. For this price, those two factors alone make it unworthy to purchase. I was so disappointed. I even used the eye cream in the jar and it was the same. Sure, you feel some tingling but it didn\'t help or change. It\'s not something I would recommend nor use again. I didn\'t realize how terrible jar packaging really is!'], 'author': u'butterfly0052 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-26'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}
