{'title': u'The Holy Grail', 'text': [u'I have been looking for the holy grail of skincare to diminish acne scars and basically improve my overall, problem skin. I have used A LOT of brightening, products and treatments for evening skin tone. Everything I could find!! Before I started using this product, I had tried Caudalie, Dr. Brandt, Radical and more... specifically for evening skin tone, scarring and brightening. When I bought this Le Soin Noir, I returned the other products I was using, and I think it really improved my skin just to let the Noir soak in. My skin has never looked better! I\u2019m totally radiant, glowing and everyone around me has completely noticed!! This products smoothes the skin and the brightening components are exponentially profound!! I have only been using this about a month or so and I will never trade this for anything else!! It doesn\u2019t even say its for evening skin tone, but it\u2019s the best thing that has ever touched my skin!! A little goes a long way, search no more!!!'], 'author': u'CosmicAddiction ', 'date': [u'2015-10-16'], 'location': u'Raleigh, NC', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'good but too expensive', 'text': [u'I really need an ultimate skincare as I am stepping into 40. This product is one of the most moisturising cream that I had ever used. I am glad that there is still no wrinkle on my face - I guess this cream does help.'], 'author': u'anothernickname ', 'date': [u'2014-09-07'], 'location': u'Chicago, IL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

reviews: {'title': u"Don't ever discontinue!", 'text': [u'I practically lose sleep over the thought that this stuff could ever go out of production. It is hands down the best moisturizer I\'ve ever tried. It quenches my skin without being oily or heavy. ', u'I\'ve been using for at least 7 years, starting in my early 20s, and credit DayWear with keeping my skin looking young. I often get compliments on my complexion. When I\'ve run out and been too lazy to restock immediately, my skin looks significantly worse within days. Truly my youth serum!!'], 'author': u'CMasonD ', 'date': [u'2016-11-10'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Not rosacea friendly. Not enough SPF for a daytime moisturizer so additional sunscreen is needed. Oily residue that causes breakouts. Once I finish the jar I\'ll be moving on to another product.'], 'author': u'notofthisearth ', 'date': [u'2016-11-07'], 'location': u'Miami, FL', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Noticeable improvement in my skin condition', 'text': [u'My mum has been using this for about a year and her skin became so smooth, so I tried it. Before trying, I had multiple blemishes and some dark spots around my eyes. I\'ve got combination skin. I\'ve been using daily for about a week, along with the EL Advanced Night Repair Serum and NightWear, and my skin is noticeably clearer! My complexion is more balanced now too - not dry at all and not overly oily either. I did develop one blemish but it was likely hormone-based and disappeared overnight! The cream is luscious but not oily and absorbs completely in a few minutes. Going well so far!!'], 'author': u'AllyBally ', 'date': [u'2016-07-30'], 'location': u'Mountain View, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Like Woah', 'text': [u'So I said to myself lets go back to the basics.And so I did and I was not disappointed.I felt a different type of moisture locking into my face when I applied this day cream.I love the green cream has a cucumber scent to it and what not.Deff purchasing again."I love this product!!"'], 'author': u'that1mauiwowie ', 'date': [u'2016-06-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Finally found the perfect face lotion!', 'text': [u'After searching everywhere, spending way too much money and time trying to find the perfect face lotion, THIS IS IT. I can\'t believe I didn\'t think about or know about this sooner. This lotion leave absolutely no greasy film (which has been a big issue for me searching for a lotion and especially anything with SPF) it has a wonderful fresh Cucumber smell, soaks in right away and leaves my face feeling flawless. I got this as a sample initially and was blown away. If you are scared by the price or worried at all about trying something new, just ask for a sample size at your local store, you won\'t regret it at all.'], 'author': u'Kimuchan ', 'date': [u'2016-06-09'], 'location': u'Santa Rosa, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Future Response Age Defense Creme SPF 30
reviews: {'title': u'Love this brand but this creme is greasy', 'text': [u'I was recent introduced to the Amore Pacific brand and love the products I\'m using so far including cleansing foam, enzyme peel, toner, future response serum and future response creme without SPF. I decided to try the creme with SPF and was disappointed. The texture and smell are fine but it is greasy and leaves my face very shiny. I was hoping to find a good moisturizer with SPF but this one doesn\'t do it. I will continue to use the creme w/o SPF and apply a separate SPF.'], 'author': u'sephoraddictLA ', 'date': [u'2016-10-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

Although I would pay that, I\'m a broke college student at the moment :('], 'author': u'dottypaige ', 'date': [u'2016-08-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Expensive Sunscreen', 'text': [u'This moisturizer is just full on sunscreen in jar that is overpriced. Applied this and the texture is so thick and white like sunscreen, made my face look purple (I have a lot of red in my skin) AND made my face so shiny just like a sunscreen looks. No way you could wear this under makeup. Pass.'], 'author': u'fablove ', 'date': [u'2016-07-05'], 'location': u'Rancho Cucamonga, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Pretty Amazing', 'text': [u'I am always looking for good SPF products, and this one just made the top of my list - almost. I got this in the summer SPF kit and may have to buy the regular size. I have oily skin and this stays matte all day. I add one drop of Color FX liquid color drops and voila! Maybe a little mattifying powder, and I seriously do not have to touch it up all day even in 100 summer weather! The 2 downsides are that it\'s only SPF 30 and I prefer to go with SPF 50 on my face, and the price. But wowwww! This may replace my Laroche Posay SFP 50 anti aging serum!'], 'author': u'SToma ', 'date': [u'2016-07-01'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'Try this product without the SPF', 'text': [u'I first used a sample of this product over a year ago and was confused when I started breaking out. I exclusively use AmorePacific products as I have always found them to be gentle, non-irritating and effective for my overly sensitive skin.', u'Seeing some light wrinkles forming on my forehead, I decided to give this product a try but went for the version with SPF. Voila - problem solved. The SPF is what irritated by skin', u'If you\'ve had issues with this moisturizer but otherwise like the AmorePacific products definitely go for the non-SPF version. The non-SPF version is also paraben free', u'I have seen great results with this product over the last 2-3 months of use. Unfortunately, I do need to use more than a "little" so it\'s expensive for daily use. But seriously, it\'s worth it!'], 'author': u'suburbangirl ', 'date': [u'2016-04-06'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Even Better Skin Tone Correcting Moisturizer Broad Spectrum SPF 20
reviews: {'title': u'Cant live without !', 'text': [u'Love this product ! When I first started using it I didnt really noticed a difference until I stopped using it. All my spots started to come to back and I looked so spotty. I got my second jar and have hated my skin every time I run out of it. I have been using it for two years so I thought I would lay off it for a while to make sure my skin is not becoming immune to it. I cant find another product in this price range that I can see a difference like this one. I am going a month without, but cant wait to buy this product again.'], 'author': u'karbear11 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-20'], 'location': u'Chicago, IL', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'excellent', 'text': [u'This moisturizer is perfect. It\'s the right amount of moisture without being oily. It smells great and lasts a long time. A tiny bit can cover my whole face. I don\'t know if I\'d say it\'s made a huge difference in the evenness of my skin, though. However, it doesn\'t matter to me because the moisturizer itself is so great.'], 'author': u'treeadvice00 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-01'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'not life changing', 'text': [u'I love this day time moisturizer for the simple fact that it absorbs quickly, doesn\'t leave me flakey during the day (so long as I use a night time), and doesn\'t break me out. I think these things make it pretty special. I have some acne scarring from a few years ago, that haven\'t faded much though. Maybe it\'s because I don\'t use it everyday. I have been using it about every other day for a few months though.'], 'author': u'jesstris ', 'date': [u'2016-07-12'], 'location': u'Orlando, FL', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'life changing', 'text': [u'Ive used this already 3x in the past 5 years. First i broke from my hair lotion getting all over my face from the gym. Then pregnancy. After each break out, i get a scar. By the end of the jar i notice a HUGE difference in my skin. Every time its worked. It goes like this. I scringe about purchasing it, then i do. I use it, i get a couple pimples as it balances out my skin. Then it begins to breaks up all the dark spots. A few months later(Yes months not weeks have some patience) my skin is almost perfect. Now the other trick it is to stop breaking out...i drink liquid chlorophly 2x a day to clean my blood and stop the break outs. In a few more weeks my skin will be flawless again. Thanks to baby number 2.'], 'author': u'RoyalWifey ', 'date': [u'2016-07-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Another failed spf moisturizer for me. I liked that it was greasy and absorbed quickly into the skin. But it made me breakout just after one use, like every other spf moisturizer I\'ve tried. it also made my makeup slide around, and I\'m not even oily, more combination dry. I would recommend this to people with normal to dryer skin. this will be returned for me.'], 'author': u'jellybee ', 'date': [u'2016-06-22'], 'location': u'toronto, ON', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: The Original BB Set
reviews: {'title': u'Chalky Face Puttty', 'text': [u'I\'m new to the world of BB\'s and have been testing a variety of brands to find the correct formulation.', u' I found this one dreadful. The other reviews are correct in noting the paleness of the product. It didnt tone down and remained a chalky, putty looking mask sitting on top of my skin. Not the luxurious treatment I desire. ', u'I stopped after testing the first two in this sampler. ', u'I have mature skin: dry, random redness, assorted life battle wounds and a medium complexion.'], 'author': u'wendyrama ', 'date': [u'2016-10-27'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'each one is a gift from god!', 'text': [u'They go on like a dream and last all-day. I believe in the power of Dr. Jart!!'], 'author': u'Lemon0000 ', 'date': [u'2016-05-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'different spf really works for me', 'text': [u'I\'ll repurchase this when I run out. But I DONT THINK this is good for oily skin. I have combination to dry skin, mostly dry.'], 'author': u'Buyaofeifei ', 'date': [u'2016-05-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'The best BB creams!', 'text': [u'This is such an amazing value -- 2 oz for less than the cost of a 1.5 oz full size of any one of these BB creams, and you get to see which is your favorite. They all work really well even with my extremely fair skin. The premium and detox ones (in my opinion) provide more coverage, almost like a foundation, and the detox one appears a little bit darker than the others. On days when I want less coverage, I mix them with a little bit of un-tinted moisturizer for a more natural look.', u'They do not cake or settle in lines or creases, and all do a great job evening out skin tone and keeping skin hydrated (I have super dry skin). The disapore one is my favorite, but they are all good (and relatively similar).', u'Overall a great buy!'], 'author': u'Ftgreene ', 'date': [u'2016-04-28'], 'location': u'Brooklyn, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Was hesitant to spend the money on it, but the reviews sold me. I was looking for something lighter coverage than foundation that would also take care of my skin. Hands down this is probably the best product I have ever put on my face. I love that you get to try everything before committing to the full size tube, however, when I run out I may just purchase another set because I love being able to use a different one based on how my skin is that day. Black Label Detox is probably my favorite; I have very sensitive, breakout prone skin and BLD actually improved my skin within the first 2 or 3 uses. It does go on a little thick and a little fuller coverage than the other 3, but if I need to I mix it with a little bit of my regular face cream and it goes on perfectly. The Premium is my second favorite and has the sheerest coverage of the 4 BB\'s. I use it on days where I really want as close to a bare face as possible. Dis A Pore was okay, it didn\'t do a lot in terms of really diminishing my pores but covered nicely and also improved my blemishes/breakouts. I didn\'t love Radiance just because I don\'t necessarily want to shimmer all day, but I\'ve used it for nights out and it\'s just as good as the rest so I\'ll save it for that. I\'ve used all four with and without powder overtop and either way, they stay nicely all day without melting off my face (we will see if that holds true when the summer months come). My favorite part is that they are physical sunscreens, not chemical ones. Overall, would 10/10 recommend to anyone to use. One caveat, though, is that they only come in the fair/light skin tone. I\'m curious to see if they\'ll look okay once my skin tans in the summer.'], 'author': u'SarahFuhr ', 'date': [u'2016-04-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Complexion Perfector BB SPF 20
reviews: {'title': u'A Perfect BB Cream', 'text': [u'I have combination skin so I\'m cautious trying anything new. I have repeatedly found that I forgot to wash this off and end up wearing it until I wash my face before bed because it feels so good! This product surprisingly improves my skin when I wear it and looks very natural with good coverage.'], 'author': u'cote ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': u'Haiku, HI', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'worth it', 'text': [u'I\'ve been working for a little while to purge silicone from my face makeup and skincare products which is what led me to find this bb cream in the first place. Because of the price I contacted Omorovicza directly asking if I could sample it to assess what color I would be. Their team was so gracious and immediately sent me 4 samples (from the U.K.!) I have oily/combination skin that\'s light with golden undertones and with the last remnants of my summer tan the medium shade is a PERFECT match. I took pictures to get honest opinions and my friends all immediately asked where they could get it. It\'s like an insta filter IRL and fades naturally, not blotchy. I kept checking myself out in the rear-view while driving it\'s that good. I\'m saving the light sample to try in a few weeks when my tan\'s gone, but at least regarding the medium shade there seems to be flexibility on the warm/cool/tan/pale spectrum. Try before you buy, but I give it a 10/10!'], 'author': u'LauraRoseP ', 'date': [u'2016-10-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'worth every penny', 'text': [u'expensive but worth the money. a little goes a long way. also, don\'t be dissuade by the color, it adjusts to your skin. ', u'i have oily skin, i mean very oily. whenever i use this, i have to powder myself, otherwise, i would be an oily mess. (hence one star less)', u'my skin looks so great with this. so light.'], 'author': u'angie3384 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-16'], 'location': u'SF, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Looked great on for about 5 minutes...', 'text': [u'I was lucky enough to get a free sample of this. I have been wanting to try it for a long time. I\'m thrilled I didn\'t buy it. It\'s awful. It looked great on my skin for 5 minutes, then literally slid off my face. It made my skin incredibly oily and tacky feeling. I actually had to wash my face and reapply my makeup using another BB cream/brand. Save your money and pass on this one...'], 'author': u'mommygirl5 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Very impressed', 'text': [u'I have had mixed results with various BB creams particularly for day wear during work week. This one really stands out. It goes on smoothly and evenly, it is long lasting and my skin looks luminous. I struggle with combination skin with breakouts and dryness. I bought it on a whim but will continue to use.'], 'author': u'CharityQB ', 'date': [u'2016-05-23'], 'location': u'Morgantown, WV, USA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Micro Essence Skin Activating Treatment Lotion
reviews: {'title': u'Fights Winter Skin & Quicken Breakout Heal Time', 'text': [u'I\'ve been using this for about 3 weeks now, and I am convinced it is the reason why I haven\'t yet started getting that tight/flaky winter skin that I do every year around this time. I still break out from time to time, but I know it\'s not from this product. In fact, I believe this product is what is healing those breakouts more quickly, with less scarring as well. ', u'I use about 5 drops everytime I put this on, and from the looks of where I am at with the bottle, this should last me 7 months or so, not the full year like the Sephora rep convinced me.'], 'author': u'HaMyVu ', 'date': [u'2016-11-07'], 'location': u'Chicago, IL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"It's great but not for me !", 'text': [u'I absolutely wanted this essence to work on me unfortunately my skin is the sensitive type and reacted to it. I\'d woke every morning to tiny lil bumps which frustrated me. Every time I stopped using this essence for a few days, my breakouts would stop along with it. And when I\'d go back to it, those pesky bumps would return immediately the next day. This product was going back to Sephora.', u'However on the plus side, it made my dry skin extremely supple every time I applied this essence. Unfortunately not at the cost of these daily breakouts tho\' !! But I would definitely recommend this product this product for those who do not have sensitive skin. I think they\'d truly benefit from it. I just wish I did !!!'], 'author': u'CAModel ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

Merci!'], 'author': u'simplycandace ', 'date': [u'2016-11-06'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great cleanser!', 'text': [u'A couple of months ago I decided to switch to a korean skincare routine and started using cleansing oil as my first cleanser. After I finished my korean cleaning oil I decided to give Caudalie a try. I\'ve heard so many amazing things about this brand and I really wanted to love it. And I do. This cleansing oil has an amazing texture, feels great when I massage it onto my combination, acne prone skin. It gets rid of all of my makeup, I\'m pretty sure I would be fine using just this and not following up with a water based cleanser. I would say the only downside is the price...could be cheaper, it\'s just an oil after all but I think I will repurchase anyway.'], 'author': u'karod ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Awesome', 'text': [u'I should preface this by saying, after purchasing this product online in the States and then going to Germany, I learned it\'s marked up over 50% when it crosses the Atlantic to the U.S. Knowing this, I would definitely repurchase here in Europe, but don\'t know I\'d buy it in the U.S. again on principle, knowing how ridiculously marked up it is. (Does it REALLY cost $9 a bottle to ship westward? I doubt it.)', u'BUT -- this product is awesome. The creamy oil melts makeup very quickly (including eye makeup), rinses easily, totally non-irritating. Furthermore, it smells like oil (of course), but it\'s a very neutral oil smell, not like the pencil shavings fragrance I detected once in a rival brand\'s makeup removing oil.', u'Other reviewers have noted that the Caudalie product runs out fast. To be honest, this hasn\'t been a problem for me. I\'ve been using this twice a day for a little over a month now, and I\'m just barely beyond the halfway point in the bottle. Yes, the bottle is small, but if you use this judiciously, you\'ll be fine.', u'Put it on a dry face, wipe the oil onto your lash area first (that makeup seems the toughest to remove, with any product), give that time to melt while you massage the rest of your face, and rinse. Wipe your face, see how much is left around your eyes -- you will probably have to repeat, but that\'s okay. By the second round (if not the first), the makeup is gone.', u'I use 1.5 pumps the first time I do my face, followed by a single-pump, if that first attempt didn\'t get all the eye makeup completely off.', u'Then, in the mornings, on a clean face, I use just one pump. (When there\'s nothing on your face, that\'s enough. Really, this product goes a long way.)', u'I like using this because it\'s non-stripping and made with a lot of natural ingredients/without some harsh chemicals. I also love that my makeup removal routine can be one-step and the product doesn\'t irritate my skin (or eyes). Really, Caudalie\'s product is a fantastic choice.', u'All around, highly recommend!'], 'author': u'zingara84 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': u'Pennsylvania', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'AMAZING', 'text': [u'I\'ve been trying this out for about a month and I can finally write a thorough review on it. It\'s amazing! I will put this on my completely dry face and then get in the shower to rinse it off with only water. Of course that\'s when I look down and see all the make up running down the drain. That\'s when I will go in with my Murad cleanser and usually I would expect to still see more make up coming off my face but literally there will be nothing. That\'s not to say that you still shouldn\'t cleanse your face because you literally just used an or oil on it to remove makeup.. but this stuff gets everything off. Everything. Definitely worth the buy!'], 'author': u'RWilson ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'This saved the day!!', 'text': [u'So a few day\'s ago I had a really bad dry area near my lips and on my forehead from a previous product had tried, and very much disliked because it cause so many problems for me. I put on all over the rough patches, and layered Chapstick (Burt\'s Bee\'s of course.) over to really lock the moisture in and keep it from evaporating or seeping in too fast, and by the morning, I was back to my normal self, my skin felt so soft and smooth. Zero dryness!!! This product was absolutely amazing. It smells great, and works even better!!! I could definitely see how it would be Anit-aging as well, some of the fine lines around my smile were also gone by morning!!!!'], 'author': u'otterpopkid123 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-31'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Flora Hydroactive Cellular Face Oil
reviews: {'title': u'For dryer skin', 'text': [u'I am in my twenties with somewhat of sensitive dehydrated combination skin if that can give you an idea of my skin type. I think this oil is great for drier skin or like that really hydrating/heavy moisturizer feel if you\'re like me. It\'s definitely on the heavier side. Your face will still be a bit shiny (but not greasy like you haven\'t washed your face) for a while after application if your skin is like mine. I don\'t think it will be good under makeup since it feels a bit slippery but I haven\'t really tried it out under foundation yet. I was having some breakouts from stress, lack of sleep, and dehydration when I started trying this product out. After a few days, it really helped calm my skin down. My skin was no longer patchy. The breakout subsided. I think it got my skin back in balance. My skin looks plump and it started to get that healthy glow back after a week. I don\'t have much fine lines so I can\'t comment on that. Even with the ones that I do, I haven\'t seen much difference. The packaging is a nice and thick glass bottle. Accidentally dropped it once and it did not break (had lots of spills, 10 out 10 would not recommend testing this out. Please just take my word on this one.)The dropper works well in pumping up the product unlike a few other brands (looking at you, Josie Maran). I like this oil a lot but not sure if I would purchase again after I run out. It is really expensive but like all oil, you don\'t need much so it will last you a while. It\'s good, just not game changing. One major bummer is the scent. I was not expecting a full on apothecary shop rose oil scent. It reminds me of an old pharmacy I used to go to with my grandma as a kid. The scent itself isn\'t so bad. It\'s just really strong to me and it lingers on all day.'], 'author': u'vellop ', 'date': [u'2016-10-07'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I do see a difference in my skin. After 2 weeks my skin is smoother. However, I\'m not crazy about the smell. The smell reminds me of seasoned oil that you dip your bread in. I will continue to use it but will not purchase again. There\'s similar facial oils out there that have a better scent.'], 'author': u'elle72 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-26'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'my dry skin', 'text': [u'I have extremely dry skin I use about 5 drops mixed in with the anti-aging by Sunday Riley put it on my face and it is wonderful. Love it.'], 'author': u'Chaserbooty ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love Love Love!', 'text': [u'This truly does revive your skin. Amazing benefits alone or layered under Good Genes. My dry patches are gone & my skin is so plump & soothed. I also use this in my beard & neck areas because I shave daily. It helps relieve irritation for me wonderfully.', u'Very sad that this is discontinued now, so get it while it\'s still in stock. You will not regret it!'], 'author': u'dreamposh ', 'date': [u'2016-09-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Unbelievable!!!', 'text': [u'This is a heavy oil, as in not a dry oil. Since I have been using this (about 10 days) my skin has regained elasticity, is more even toned, hydrated and has a yourthful glow. I can\'t say enough good about Sunday Riley. My ritual: Shu Uemura Anti Ox cleansing oil, a foaming cleanser not sold at Sephora, Rose oil, and Sunday Riley\'s Tidal moisturizer with a drop of Luna and 1 drop of vegan glycerin. Excess goes on the backs of my horridly aged hands and they are coming back to life. I swear you could drop this stuff on an Egyptian mummy and it would spring back to life! My neck is even regaining tone, MUCH less sagging. I literally can\'t believe it. I only use Good Genes at night and always, always, always wear a good sunscreen. Holy Grail stuff I will ALWAYS buy and use as long as I can afford it. BTW, yes it is expensive, but you actually get quite a bit and a little goes a long way. I anticipate the Rose will last me 4 to 6 months using twice a day. Mad Love!!!'], 'author': u'holleeeee ', 'date': [u'2016-08-27'], 'location': u'Canada', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Grear option for oily skin.', 'text': [u'I love the Origins moisturizer from the Ginzing line, and that one would have been my HG moisturizer but unfortunately they don\'t make it in a squeeze tube! It\'s only available in a jar which I don\'t like. I decided to try this one because the packaging is more hygienic. It\'s also more convenient for traveling.I would say both feel the same on the skin--they aren\'t tacky and mattify pretty quickly. Makeup sits great on top, and they both leave the skin feeling soft.I didn\'t notice this moisturizer having any mattifying effects, but I only used it once at night so far. It does have a medicinal scent to it, but I\'m fine with that since I like using more natural products on my skin. It also has a cooling effect. If you don\'t like that, stay away from this product. The cooling effect only lasts for about ten seconds, though.Hopefully this will help with the tiny pimples all over my forehead and cheeks. I have textured skin and am hopeful that the salicylic acid in this will work.'], 'author': u'Lillsea ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: PURE Face Moisturizer
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'I have combination skin and my face is usually extremely oily in the T-Zone areas and my body extremely dry. I found that the product was way to thick for my face and actually made my face more oily. I used the product on my body and I ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT!!! The formula is perfect for hydrating my very dry skin especially in the colder weather. Will definitely continue to purchase for my body :)'], 'author': u'4Corinna ', 'date': [u'2016-11-07'], 'location': u'Brooklyn, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'I use this everywhere!', 'text': [u'Love this cream! Super hydrating and love how it absorbs into my skin. I use it on dry patches on face, body and hands, especially as the weather gets colder. I especially love that the cream is unscented, which makes a big difference to me. I have always had eczema growing up, so this cream helps me battle that issue effectively.'], 'author': u'NYCGirl818 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-04'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'The best moisturizer for the whole family', 'text': [u'I absolutely love Pure because of its simple effective ingredients. I use it as my daily moisturizer as well as my husband and I also lather it on my 4 month old as it was the only thing that worked for his hyper sensitive dry excema skin. I highly reccommend not wasting money or time on other products and stick to this one for the whole family.'], 'author': u'CristinaBarrele ', 'date': [u'2016-11-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'The perfect night cream', 'text': [u'I use PURE at night - it feels thick when I put it on but when I wake up in the morning my skin just feels lovely and smooth without any oiliness. Thoroughly recommend.'], 'author': u'Marette71 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': u'Park City, UT', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Wow! For my extremeley dry, broken down skin', 'text': [u'I\'m allergic to a common preservative used in everyday hygiene and cosmetic products, and as a result, I have extremely sensitive skin and I can get allergic contact dermatitis (i.e. the same rash you get from poison ivy) just from using the wrong public bathroom soap and touching my face with my hands afterwards. The result is I often have a broken down moisture barrier on my face which results in extremely dry skin. I\'ve tried to find a moisturizer heavy enough that works for broken down skin, followed my dermatologist\'s advice and got a drugstore brand known for sensitive skin, but it was clogging my pores and giving me little white bumps on my face. I tried argan oil, and while it didn\'t irritate my skin, it wasn\'t emollient enough, and once it absorbed my skin was dehydrated and dry again. I was excited to try this cream when I saw it pop up on the new products page because it has an amazingly SHORT list of ingredients. Nowadays people tend to look for a long list of anti-aging and revitalizing ingredients, but for me, all that means is a longer list of things I could potentially be allergic to. Now this stuff is amazingly emollient, and really locks moisture in. The tip about leaving a white layer on your face works wonders overnight! For the first time in months, I haven\'t woken up to parched skin! I even mix a little argan oil in (yes, my skin is THAT dry) and it works great! The cream is very thick, but its almost like a whipped texture, so it actually does go on rather light and its easy to smooth out. I am probably the rare case that has such dry and broken skin, but this stuff has worked wonders for me! If you have very dry and sensitive skin, I wouldn\'t definitely give this a shot.'], 'author': u'pinkypenguin ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}
ingredient: *Natural Preservative

name: Cellumination Cream EX
reviews: {'title': u'Wow...I love this!', 'text': [u'This is a great product. My skin is soft and smooth and my daughter insists that I don\'t need makeup with it. My mid-40s skin is looking great. I have been using it for a little over a month now, and even my dark spots are diminishing. I really love this cream. If it fits your budget, or if there s any way you can swing it, it is worth the price!I received a sample from SK-II to try for my honest review. In prep for the review, I did no research, deciding I wanted to have an un-biased reaction with no expectation beyond what the jar states.This product is definitely worth the price, you won\'t be disappointed in the results.'], 'author': u'KerryAC ', 'date': [u'2016-09-15'], 'location': u'Los Angeles, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'lux cream', 'text': [u'This is a very nice skin cream. It feels luxurious on the skin; it\'s silky and absorbs nicely. It makes my skin look younger: bright and dewy. I noticed the first few times I used it at night my skin was very oily the next morning. This effect seemed to lessen over a few days. I am in my late 30\'s and although I had oily skin was I was younger my skin tends more towards normal these days, so this was an interesting effect. As far as lightening dark spots, I was disappointed that I didn\'t see any improvement. Perhaps this effect takes time? I only used the product for about 6 weeks and about as consistently as a mom of 3 could muster. If price is not a factor, it\'s a great face cream. But if you need a lot of bang for your buck to justify the price, it\'s not a miracle worker. I would buy this again if offered at a lower price point. ', u'Disclosure: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review.'], 'author': u'leowmom23 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-07'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love this product', 'text': [u'I love SK-II as a brand. I tried some of their other products and love them as well. This cellumination cream is super nice. The texture is perfect and made my skin look and feel great. It\'s smoother and softer. My skin is also brighter. This was a product complimentary from SK-II'], 'author': u'chakrya ', 'date': [u'2016-09-06'], 'location': u'New York', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Lightweight feel which gives an instant healthy glow. Has a pleasant smell but not overly strong. Lucky for me this was a complementary sample, but the bottle is a generous fill which will certainly last a while! While just two weeks I do see my skin looking more refreshed, I am looking forward to seeing some of the brown spots lighten as I continue to use the cream in the future. Great so far!'], 'author': u'LaurNYCer ', 'date': [u'2016-08-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Lightweight, effective', 'text': [u'I\'ve been using this cream now for just over a month and have waited to review until I felt I\'d given the product enough time to see its effects. After the first week of using the product I was a little disappointed because I feel like the cream may of caused a few breakouts and I didn\'t even really notice much of a change in my skin otherwise. As I\'ve gone past my mid twenties I\'ve noticed that my skin has lost a bit if its luster and I was hoping that this would help revive that luster/brightness. After about a week and a half of use the breakouts had stopped and about two weeks I did notice improvements in my skins brightness and tone. At week four is when I really noticed a dramatic change in my skins overall tone and really feel that this cream has helped restore some of my skins luster. I did receive this product compliments of SK-II but my experience and opinion about the product are my own.'], 'author': u'dominthefog ', 'date': [u'2016-08-27'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

reviews: {'title': u'Good for combo/oily skin as well.', 'text': [u'As a combination oily skin girl, you would think I should avoid any form of oils but this one balances my skin flawlessly. {'title': u'holy grail', 'text': [u'I am a connoisseur of oils and I even make my own serums. I adore face oils. And this one is my holy grail. {'title': u'great product', 'text': [u'I really like this serum. And yes, it is very expensive. I\'m sure the fact that it was "hand made in a monastery by monks" has something to do with it. Not sure what difference that really makes to the actual product (other than the unique appeal allowing them to jack up the price). Personally I could do without that part if it lowered the price significantly..., but the product itself is still amazing. I only use it at night though because it takes a little longer to absorb (could just be with my skin type though) so I don\'t use it before applying makeup in the morning. But it works great when used, sparingly, in the evening ...and a little goes a long way. I would absolutely recommended this elixir serum. It\'s definitely a product I will purchase again.'], 'author': u'Lyonsdenn ', 'date': [u'2015-05-02'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: BUTTER DRENCH™ Restorative Rich Cream
reviews: {'title': u'I really like this', 'text': [u'I\'ve been looking for a moisturizer to help my dry skin as the winter is coming up. I just bought this a couple weeks ago and so far, I\'m really liking this product. I love the smell, it smells absolutely divine. I bought this online because I already tried it in the store, one of the ladies recommended me to get this if I like Bare Minerals. I trust the company and brand too, I have the foundation powder, I have for years now and I wanted to try another one of their products. This is something to get if you are struggling with dry skin, my skin right now feels smooth and nice. It\'s light weight and I can feel it absorbing quickly into my skin. When I do makeup, I like to wait 10-15 minutes after I put my moisturizer on.'], 'author': u'paigeysho24 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-27'], 'location': u'Orange County, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

It would be nice if there was more product in it however I will repurchase just because it\'s awesome!'], 'author': u'volsgirl20 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Just not cutting it', 'text': [u'I was a devoted user of the cult fave Purely Nourishing Cream, despite having oily skin it was incredible- my skin was luminous and smooth for years using it. I tried this and the gel moisturizer and I have sticky , itchy eyes and my complexion just isn\'t responding to it. It looks more dull and rough. something in irritates me- the scent is too much for a product that is supposed to be natural. It\'s a total FAIL. I am on to a different line for skincare. They\'ve ruined a GREAT line by taking away Purely Nourishing.'], 'author': u'edox ', 'date': [u'2016-07-16'], 'location': u'new york, ny', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'love it!!', 'text': [u'literally the best moisturizer of all time. I deal with dry skin and this works wonders. {'title': u'Amazingly luxurious, but ONLY for EXTRA DRY SKIN!', 'text': [u'I absolutely adore this moisturizer for day or night. It is extremely moisturizing and smells heavenly, and even absorbs quickly, leaving your skin feeling just like the name says, drenched and buttery! HOWEVER, be forewarned! I have extremely dry skin and I can only use this product 2-3 times a week. Any more than that and it breaks me out here and there, and being that I have very dry skin, it\'s rare that I break out, period. So, I would only recommend this product (and I do recommend it bc it\'s soooo indulgent) to those with extremely dry skin that need a little pampering indulgence!'], 'author': u'LauryH ', 'date': [u'2016-06-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Smart Broad Spectrum SPF 15 Custom-Repair Moisturizer for Dry Combination Skin
reviews: {'title': u'good moisturizer with affordable price', 'text': [u'I need a moisturizer to protect my skin from lights of TV/phone/computer after work when I\'m at home during evenings. I usually used expensive moisturizer for day and night. But for this several hours at home I decided to choose some less expensive stuff that is gentle and protective. It absolutely exceeded my expectations. This product is gentle and provide good moisturizing. It is also very soft cream that can be very easily spread over skin. The most important is that it\'s not expensive at all compared to other gentle moisturizer with spf. However, I feel it is not as effective as more expensive products and sometimes after applying, it makes my skin looks oily and dark.'], 'author': u'lilylittley ', 'date': [u'2016-11-06'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Best moisturizer with SPF', 'text': [u'I worked with the skincare specialist to select this moisturizer and I love it! name: Intensive Instant Moisturizer + Cream
reviews: {'title': u'good', 'text': [u'I really did like this got this as a sample and loved the smell some people may say it was over powering witch didnt for me I love it, my skin is oily and acne prone but this didn\'t make me brake out yes did get oily but if you buy a oil matterfier you don\'t have to worry much about your oily skin, when all my moisturizer are gone I may have to buy this, my down fall wish it had spf in it but other than that loved it'], 'author': u'baygurl11 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-07'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Amazing', 'text': [u'I was in need of a new moisturizer and wasn\'t sure which one to try, after all I did try most of the higher end ones and nothing seemed to be worth repurchasing. I got a sample of this in a mail order a few months ago and decided to give it a try. Hard to judge a product after only one application but it felt nice so I decided to buy the full size and I\'m so happy I did. I don\'t usually like buying products I have to stick my fingers in but I thought I would dip my clean beauty blender and spread it that way and yes it\'s amazing to say the least. Moisturizes well, and I have mature skin always thirsty, and not greasy or oily looking. It\'s light, and has a light clean scent that dissipates after a few minutes and you\'re left with smooth healthy looking moisturized skin ready for your make up routine. You get a good product and the price is unbelievable. I will be trying the night cream and I am now open to using more of the Sephora brand.'], 'author': u'skippy808 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Not worth the $25', 'text': [u'I was so excited to buy this product. When I got it home I followed the directions and applied it on a clean face. name: Ultra Repair Lotion
ingredient: Water, Glycerin, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Stearic Acid, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glyceryl Stearate, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Dimethicone, Shea Butter, Squalane, Phenoxyethanol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Caprylyl Glycol, Allantoin, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Hydroxide, Disodium EDTA, Chrysanthemum Parthenium (Feverfew) Extract, Camellia Sinensis (White Tea) Leaf Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Ceramide-3.
reviews: {'title': u'The perfect moisturizer', 'text': [u'To make it short, I\'d recommend this for anyone, whether you\'re on a budget or not, and for any skin type. For reference, I have dry to normal, sensitive skin. I\'m really sensitive to fragrance, and don\'t enjoy heavy or thick moisturizers, so this moisturizer is perfect for me. I mostly use it on my face, so one bottle lasts forever! You only need a small dime to nickle sized amount to get the job done. It\'s so light weight, I feel like it would work on most skin types, but I\'d be careful if you\'re super dry (because you might need to cream version instead, or maybe to spot treat). This works super well under makeup and sunscreen, dries super fast while sufficiently moisturizing, is cheaper by oz than many nice drugstore moisturizers, and has a very week fragrance so it takes oils really well. I like putting some nice smelling facial oils in it, and it absorbs the smells really well.'], 'author': u'DelaneyLove ', 'date': [u'2016-11-08'], 'location': u'Danville, Kentucky', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'First Aid Beauty Light!', 'text': [u'I\'m on my third bottle of this lotion. That says a lot, right there. I have been using F.A.B. products since the line began, starting with the great cream in a jar. When the lotion version of this moisturizer came out, I had to try it. My husband and I both use this daily as a facial moisturizer, and like it because it absorbs into the skin much more easily than the cream does. I like that it\'s a great base for my BB/SPF cream and cream blush. He likes it as a follow-up to shaving -- says it soothes his skin, keeps away dry flakes, and also makes subsequent shaving easier on the skin. With both of us using this daily, a bottle lasts a long, long time, The label is gender-neutral, and the lotion smells fresh, not perfumed, so works for both women and men. This lotion is lighter and easier to spread than the cream in a jar. Light enough not to cause any greasiness in the summer, but protective enough to keep my skin soft and healthy in the winter. This lotion is great for multi-tasking, as you can use it as a body lotion, too, though I generally don\'t use it that way because it\'s a bit pricey for that purpose. Lastly, I love that this lotion does not contain harmful chemicals but does contain anti-oxidants and natural skin protectants, I highly recommend this product. If you\'re unsure, ask a Sephora associate to provide you with a small sample so you can try it at home before you buy.'], 'author': u'cezanne ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Best lotion ever', 'text': [u'My skin is very sensitive and not a lover of lotions. This lotion was the best!! I not only had dry skin but I had creepy skin as well. It took care of both. I compare this with any anti aging lotion on the market!!!'], 'author': u'NancyGonzalez ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

I\'m so happy to have finally found something that clears up my eczema so quickly, and I will be using this stuff for ever!!'], 'author': u'rajackson ', 'date': [u'2016-08-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'AMAZING!!!', 'text': [u'While on vacation my skin became extremely dry due to chlorine among other things. Ran to the nearest sephora to get lotion and ran across this. Not only did it save my skin, but I fell in love. It\'s quite liquidy, which makes it easy to spread and apply. It has minimal smell, which I love, and it absorbs into my skin quite quickly. It leaves no residue and helps my skin look and feel amazing. The best thing I realized about this lotion was it continually made my skin more hydrated. The day after I first tried this lotion, my dry skin was gone! I highly recommend this to everyone, regardless of skin type, but especially if you have dry skin like me!'], 'author': u'emilydaliones ', 'date': [u'2016-07-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Superb', 'text': [u'I love this spf. It doesn\u2019t leave the white sheen that most spfs do. It\u2019s so versatile that it is almost nonexistent under my makeup. It doesn\u2019t cause my makeup to streak or crack throughout the day and it protects my face from the sun. I haven\u2019t used spf for most of my life and have developed tiny dark spots that I am trying to get rid of. This helps to lighten the spots and brighten my skin while preventing the formation of new dark spots. I\u2019ve tried Shiseido and the regular drug store brands like banana boat and coppertone, but nothing comes close. As seen in the picture the right side is my hand with the spf gently rubbed in. I usually follow this with my primer and then primer spray before I apply makeup. If anything it helps set my makeup and prevent the cakey look.'], 'author': u'Misskhan ', 'date': [u'2016-06-03'], 'location': u'Galloway, NJ', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great sunscreen, awful smell', 'text': [u'I\'ve been looking for a good sunscreen to wear under my foundation. I\'ve tried BB/CC creams in the past, but they always clog up my pores. Even the ones that say they don\'t. Plus, the color is always too dark for my very fair skin. So, when I saw this, I was excited. A BB cream without any color, but with SPF 50? I\'m in!', u'First, the good: SPF 50. Seriously, with skin as pale as mine, the more SPF the better. It\'s a thick moisturizer (which I\'ve noticed is common when you get into higher SPFs), and it goes on pretty much invisible. It melts into the skin and doesn\'t leave a tacky mess. Hours later, and my t-zone was still pretty dry, which is definitely a win.', u'The bad: that smell. It\'s got a definite chemical smell to it. I noticed it right away, but was hopeful that it would only be temporary. The smell dissipated after about an hour to an hour and a half, and I didn\'t notice it at all the rest of the day. Good, but not great. But then I picked up my makeup brush to apply foundation this morning and all I could smell was this product, and I hadn\'t even put it on today! Eww. Plus, I noticed that under fluorescent lighting, I looked even paler than usual, and that\'s saying something, because I\'m already pretty pale. Given the fact that I work under fluorescent lighting, I have to imagine I look mostly dead, which is not the look I\'m going for at work.', u'So, I\'m going to wash my brushes (I noticed the smell on my powder brush, too) and quit using this. For the price (and the reputation of the company) I expected a lot more.'], 'author': u'aquin12 ', 'date': [u'2016-05-06'], 'location': u'San Jose, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

name: Ibuki Softening Concentrate
ingredient: Water, Dipropylene Glycol, Glycerin, Sd Alcohol 40-b (Alcohol Denat.), Peg-8,Peg/ppg-17/4 Dimethyl Ether, Butylene Glycol, Trehalose, Phenoxyethanol, Peg-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Isostearyl Alcohol, Isostearic Acid, Carbomer, Betaine, Erythritol, Peg/Ppg-14/7 Dimethyl Ether, Alcohol, Behenyl Alcohol, Fragrance, Polyglyceryl-2 Diisostearate, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Sodium Metaphosphate, Potassium Hydroxide, Stearyl Alcohol, Phytosteryl/Octyldodecyl Lauroyl Glutamate, Limonene, Hexyl Cinnamal, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Benzyl Benzoate, Linalool, Lamium Album Flower Extract, Citrus Junos Seed Extract, Tocopherol.
reviews: {'title': u'my all time favorite', 'text': [u'This has been one of my main staples in my skincare routine. I change toners as I run out, moisturizers as new ones come in, and especially facewash! However, I found this a couple years ago when they first came out with the Ibuki line, and after washing my face and using toner, I will add a drop of my Sunday Riley Luna oil into this softening concentrate and pat it onto my skin. Followed by moisturizer and a night cream. In the morning, same routine except I add a drop of my UFO oil in. When I don\'t use it, I can feel my skin getting irritated which leads to more acne and bumps. This helps calm my skin down and gives it some moisture so that my skin feels baby smooth! Constant staple in my routine. I love it'], 'author': u'Hyunmi ', 'date': [u'2016-09-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'always check ingredients', 'text': [u'I\'ve been searching for a good toner for my combination, sensitive, acne prone skin. First off the fragrance in this product is extremely strong! Secondly, alcohol is the fourth ingredient on the list. It leaves a tacky, slightly oily feeling to your skin. I can\'t say I\'m really that impressed with it. Disappointed after all the great reviews, I will most likely be returning this and continue my search for a good moisturizing, oil controlling toner that is FRAGRANCE FREE!'], 'author': u'NatashaL7 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Amazing!', 'text': [u'I bought this product to use under a tinted moisturizer that was a little too dry for my skin. It goes on like water, but it does an incredible job to add moisture! I highly recommend it.'], 'author': u'allicat600 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-15'], 'location': u'Rego Park, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'love!!', 'text': [u'This product is absolutely amazing! I use it every night before applying moisturizer and it makes my skin feel so fresh and smooth. It also wears beautifully as a makeup primer, since it moisturizer so well and contains glycerin, which will make the skin tacky and allow the makeup to really bind with it.'], 'author': u'eb01 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-26'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Does As It Claims', 'text': [u'I received a sample of this in Sephora, I\'m a straight up makeup junkie, not much of a skin care girl since I have really good skin (so I\'ve been told) and really don\'t have a routine. However, though I have a young face I\'m nearly in the 30 range and was curious to try this sample. Last night I was amazed when I put it on my skin and let it dry. My skin was instantly soft, including today, silky smooth. I like the price point, would consider buying a full. Would love to see what long term use does. I only wish they made an alcohol free version but it doesn\'t deter my from buying.'], 'author': u'SabriDani ', 'date': [u'2016-06-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Custom Infusion Drops
reviews: {'title': u'Found a great foundation side kick', 'text': [u'Since in my 40\'s, my skin especially cheeks are getting drier. I needed something that will blend well with my foundation and keep it from drying out during cooler temp & Santa Ana winds, the F+Neroli REALLY works. I\'m very happy with this product. My skin keeps its moisture throughout the day & the foundation does not crack or have that greasy heavy cake.'], 'author': u'2Drycheeks ', 'date': [u'2016-11-02'], 'location': u'Arcadia, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

I add 2 - 3 drops to my foundation mix and I LOVE it.'], 'author': u'ZacharyM ', 'date': [u'2016-10-27'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"Didn't notice a difference", 'text': [u'Sad this didn\'t work for me. The smell is something I don\'t favor. I have the Vitamin C Radiance drops. I was hoping this would be a serum I could add into my skin care routine hopes of having more radiant, bright skin but I didn\'t see that with this product. When you put it on it you look like an oil slick. I also tried adding it into my foundation to make my skin look more dewy but I think I broke out mixing two formulas together. I wish this worked for me like it did for others. For reference I have oily skin.'], 'author': u'gm0ney ', 'date': [u'2016-09-15'], 'location': u'SF', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: ClearCalm 3 Replenishing Gel Cream
reviews: {'title': u"Doesn't really do anything.", 'text': [u'I really thought this was a great brand, but to put this on an oncoming blemish I expect something to happen over night or even a couple of nights in a row. I have even tried by wearing it during the day. It really doesn\'t seem to be doing anything to change the look or feel of the oncoming blemish. It is a nice feeling cream, is about it. There are definitely other things that have a more significant effect for calming blemishes.'], 'author': u'LHDavis ', 'date': [u'2016-11-10'], 'location': u'Mill Valley, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'nice', 'text': [u'Think it works ok. Doesn\'t break me out more. Love the scent (spa like).'], 'author': u'seraphina80 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-31'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'This gel cream is great for my oily skin, it adds a good amount of moisture and the slight cooling effect does clam down my skin from blemishes a bit. I also like that it contains natural ingredients.'], 'author': u'kamary ', 'date': [u'2016-10-26'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Ehhh, ok', 'text': [u'After reading the reviews, I was confident I had found the perfect moisturizer for my skin needs. I have scaring and blemishes, and this seemed like total package. I\'ve been using it for 2 months now, and I am still breaking out and it has done nothing for my scaring. It does provide good moisture without adding to my oiliness. Overall, not the best moisturizer as it hasn\'t done what I\'d hoped it would. It also has a strong, medicinal odor, which didn\'t bother me.'], 'author': u'jmcoppock ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': u'Creedmoor, NC', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Bust Beauty Extra-Lift Gel
reviews: {'title': u'love the smell', 'text': [u'Ive been using it for a few weeks now and love it. The smell, the texture and i can see a slight difference.'], 'author': u'SolorzanoJules ', 'date': [u'2016-09-27'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'This used to be an absolutely fabulous product. When I started using it few years back while I lived in London, I\'ve noticed the difference almost immediately. Particularly with regular use as it is accumulative effect. But I kept forgetting to use it every night so I stopped buying it. Then I decided to start again as my nightly beauty regime is now more disciplined. Been using it for the past two months every night. Does absolutely nothing. If I have never tried it, I would have assumed it needs more time but I did try it and it\'s almost like a different product. I am not sure if the formula is different here in US then in England or they changed the formula all together. As it is right now, it\'s complete waste of money. What a let down as it was amazing product and worth every penny.'], 'author': u'Drag ', 'date': [u'2016-09-12'], 'location': u'Key West,FL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'It works', 'text': [u'This is the only bust beauty product that actually works on me. The effect is not amazing but noticible. I have used three four bottles of clarins bust lift product, two of them are cream and two of this. The cream does not work nearly as good as this one so I think I will stick with it. One thing you may want to know, the effect is not perminant or even long lasting. One or two days after you stop using it, the effect goes away.'], 'author': u'scw93 ', 'date': [u'2015-12-08'], 'location': u'Cleveland, OH', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

The smell I do not care about it, but it is mild, does not bother me. The only problem: i will have to purchase one per month... Bottle should have 100mL!!!'], 'author': u'andreananda ', 'date': [u'2015-08-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Beauty Oil
reviews: {'title': u'Lightweight Oil', 'text': [u'I really do like this oil, I just don\'t like the scent at all, and scents in products never bother me. But anyway, I can look past that because this oil is so nice. It feels super lightweight and absorbs right away, sometimes I even forget I put it on. Despite it being so lightweight, it really is hydrating on the skin. I even like mixing it with my moisturizer before makeup in the morning. Will repurchase!'], 'author': u'princessleah12 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-04'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'In love with this oil', 'text': [u'Though pricey, this oil is well worthwhile. I put this on after serum and before moisturizers on my cheeks. This solved my dry cheeks when time for my foundation. It keeps my foundation moist ALL DAY. Plus it smells good/pleasant.'], 'author': u'2Drycheeks ', 'date': [u'2016-11-04'], 'location': u'Arcadia, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'10/10 recommend', 'text': [u'The first oil ever to not break me out or give me a whole bunch of white heads when I wake up the next morning. The only reason I was drawn to this product was the fact that it is all natural ingredients nothing artificial & it isn\'t just a bunch of essential oils mixed together. I have acne prone skin so I\'m very sensitive to ingredients. I\'ve tried so many oils that claim to "help" with acne but they only made it worse. I\'ve tried clarins, drunk elephant, Sunday Riley & a bunch of other big name brands that carry facial oil but none were working for me. This was a total impulse purchase but I\'m so happy I got it.'], 'author': u'KaylaAnnJ ', 'date': [u'2016-10-27'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'In Love', 'text': [u'My combination skin is very unpredictable. Sometimes it gets too oily or dry. This beauty oil is helping my skin balance out. My face feels soft and supple. I absolutely love that it is very light and it absorbs quickly without a greasy feel. I wish Sephora carried the entire line of rms beauty because it is divine.'], 'author': u'oingoboingoqueen ', 'date': [u'2016-10-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'worth the money!', 'text': [u'I have had horrible breakouts and scarring for years. I thought I\'d give this a try and I\'m so glad I did!! My skin has NEVER been more clear and radiant. It\'s almost like I have normal skin now. I have even spent tons of money on lasers and facials and this is amazing. Will repurchase. I also have extremely oily skin. This balances me out.'], 'author': u'nataliesmakeup ', 'date': [u'2016-10-02'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Regenerative Anti-Aging Moisturizer SPF 20
reviews: {'title': u'Love this product!', 'text': [u'This is a great purchase, even though it is pretty pricey. I have very sensitive skin, and this product works great for me. It is a pretty thick fce lotion, similar to a light sunscreen consistency, but it easily blends in. It provides great moisture without being greasy (I have combination skin). This lotion makes me face smooth to the touch and like all Algenist products helps minimize my wrinkles! Well worth the money for this product.'], 'author': u'dela5 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': u'Vacaville, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Pep-Start HydroBlur Moisturizer
reviews: {'title': u'great primer', 'text': [u'I use this product daily under makeup. My skin is early 30s and on the dry side. It feels velvety and leaves my under eye and cheeks smooth and soft. I have a scar on the apple of my cheek and this product really helps to blur my foundation (bareminerals complexion rescue) between my dry pale freckled skin and the pink shiny scar.'], 'author': u'smellyxkelly ', 'date': [u'2016-11-07'], 'location': u'ohio', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'best "moisturizer" under ever for under makeup', 'text': [u'I am a Clinique fan because it\'s the one brand i always keep coming back to for the past 15 years and is normally reliably good for my skin. Let me be clear this is more of a primer than a moisturizer. It\'s like a primer with a hint of moisturizer so I feel it\'s the most perfect blend for under makeup. My makeup glides on like a dream and doesn\'t crease all day. I have very dry skin and find this keeps enough moisture for the day to keep my makeup in place while not making me overly shiny after 8 hours. I wouldn\'t recommend this as a solid moisturizer. If you are going makeup free, go with something that is more hydrating.'], 'author': u'krowenj ', 'date': [u'2016-11-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'not so much', 'text': [u'I have tried many, no, actually, lots of moisturizers from Sephora. I really wanted to like this product especially given the name. But, it definitely doesn\'t blur lines or pores. Not much hydration. Kinda sticky. Will not buy again.'], 'author': u'beautygrrrrl ', 'date': [u'2016-11-04'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'hydrating but not blurring', 'text': [u'I seem to have the opposite experience of other people with this moisturizer: it hydrates my dry skin fantastically all day but it doesn\'t give my pores or fine lines any blur effect (really disappointing, this seemed holy grail status). I would repurchase just for use as a regular non-blurring moisturizer thanks to the fantastic ingredients but I also have issues with it pilling under some of my sunscreens. I hope Clinique refines the formula in the future so I can try it again.'], 'author': u'peoniesandwine ', 'date': [u'2016-10-30'], 'location': u'Dallas, TX', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'smoothing', 'text': [u'I decided to try this as a primer so my makeup would last all night during work. I have gotten broken out in the past by the dramatically different moisturizer so I was scared to try this but WOW! It makes my face so smooth and my makeup lasts! Also, no breakouts!'], 'author': u'lawilson ', 'date': [u'2016-10-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: DoYou Soy Milk Cream
reviews: {'title': u'hydration without pimples!', 'text': [u'What\'s not to love about this product? The packaging is adorable, the price point is reasonable, the scent is light and lovely, and the formula is effective. ', u'I have combination skin with some oily areas, and some really, really dry areas, and this has been an amazing night cream for me. I don\'t use it during the day because I don\'t need something quite this hydrating, but it is great for the nighttime, especially during winter. The best part is that it provides me with great hydration without breaking me out, and that has been hard to find. ', u'I def recommend.'], 'author': u'Maddie4444 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'wonderful product', 'text': [u'I am always on the hunt for a new moisturizer, so when I saw this online, I knew I had to try it. (they do not carry this in the store.) I love that you get a little Spatula with the cream, so that you don\'t have to dip your fingers in and contaminate the product. A little bit goes a long way and I imagine this jar will last 3-4 months. There is no fragrance it just smells fresh. My skin feels extremely soft and supple hours after it has been applied. I am excited to try their other products!'], 'author': u'ammerk ', 'date': [u'2016-10-26'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'awesome cream', 'text': [u'I hadn\'t changed face cream in a while I was stuck on my old one. But I\'m glad I bought this one it smells so good. Great hydration and you can\'t go wrong with the cute packaging.'], 'author': u'dlela ', 'date': [u'2016-10-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great value, great cream', 'text': [u'In the weeks that I have been using this cream, I have really come to love it. The product comes in a 3.5oz/100g jar, which means that it is roughly double the size of similar creams sold at Sephora and elsewhere. With this product, a little seems to go a long way: dipping the spatula into the product once provides enough cream for a full face. ', u'The cream itself has a lovely "chewy texture" (i.e., sticky and stringy) but sinks in very quickly and dries with a very natural finish. This cream keeps my skin hydrated all day long and has, I believe, helped keep my skin nice and smooth. I would give this cream 5 stars but it has a relatively strong soapy scent. I am okay with scents, but people who are sensitive might want to steer clear.'], 'author': u'kittykatlitter ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

reviews: {'title': u'LIFE SAVER!', 'text': [u'I\'m in my 30\'s, live in a dry climate and I am hypothyroid. I have tried countless products but nothing moisturizes like this cream!!! It keeps my skin moisturized, smells amazing, and isn\'t greasy at all. I hope they keep this product around forever!'], 'author': u'Sara86M ', 'date': [u'2016-11-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Game changer!', 'text': [u'I have tried a ton of moisturizers and I have to say, this tops it all. I\'m a huge Josie Maran fan but some days I just don\'t want to wear Argan oil. Even with my scaly dry skin, this butter balm seems to work better for me than the oil! The texture is perfect. It seems like a thick fatty cream at first but when you start warming it up and blending it in, it melts right in. My skin has never felt so fully hydrated and plump from JUST a moisturizer. Highly highly recommend!'], 'author': u'Taurus426 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Lovely and very thick', 'text': [u'The Honey Peach scent got me. The original didn\'t do a whole lot for my nose, and I\'m very particular about scent. I tried both the regular Argan oil moisturiser and this type, one on each hand, and I was more impressed with the butter balm. You don\'t need very much unless you are intending to slather it everywhere. I generally use this sort of product only for trouble spots like knees, elbows, feet. I expect this will last for quite a while. I have several other creams at home for different purposes, including the aforementioned slathering-all-over variety, but the textures are all different. Only get this if you enjoy a very thick body balm. It is not by any means a gloopy sort of thing. You can turn this upside down and it won\'t move. It isn\'t cheap, either, so I\'d also only buy it if you\'re like me and only plan to use it on a few smallish parts.'], 'author': u'Adrasteia ', 'date': [u'2016-10-27'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Mistake', 'text': [u'This product paled in comparison to other Josie Maran creams, the texture was very thick and difficult to apply. The small amount of cream was not worth the money, the scent was very subtle and inadequate. This would not be recommend to purchase.'], 'author': u'Bragg66 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-26'], 'location': u'Okanagan Falls', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Honey Peach is a winner!', 'text': [u'I didn\'t care for the honey scent when I went to my local Sephora, but instantly loved the honey Peach scent. After a couple weeks of debate on whether to spend so much on a body butter, I decided to buy it and have not regretted my decision. You can use very little to get so much moisture and a wonderful scent. It feels so luxurious! I\'ll be looking to try more products from Josie Maran now.'], 'author': u'kjxoxo ', 'date': [u'2016-10-25'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Total Age Defy Night Moisture Cream
reviews: {'title': u'hydrating', 'text': [u'i live in ontario and we are in transition between fall and winter right now, so up and down temperature is causing dry distress skin. name: Bio-Performance Glow Revival Cream
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'I normally use the bio performance advanced super revitalizing cream and I do think it\'s better than this one. I haven\'t seen any difference in my skin. I was hoping that it would help lighten my acne scars but it doens\'t. I also feel like this is less moisturizing than the other cream. I think this one is better for people who have combination to oily skin, I personally feel like it didn\'t do enough for my dry skin.'], 'author': u'pcollin ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Does what it says it does', 'text': [u'I have very dry skin around my eyes and mouth due to excema and this has done a good job of reducing that, it\'s not gone altogether however. I have broken capillaries around my nose and this product says it targets the capillaries but I don\'t notice much reduction. I do love the way it glides on. I\'m not sure it\'s worth the price tag just yet, but I will have to update after some time has passed.'], 'author': u'faerieeyes3 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-15'], 'location': u'Chicago, IL', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Love it!', 'text': [u'Worth the $. I\'ll use my clarisonic and then follow up with this and my skin has been even, not dry in the slightest, and bright. Love how fast it absorbs and how it doesn\'t feel thick or oily.'], 'author': u'Melis89 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-08'], 'location': u'Burbank, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Worth the hefty price tag', 'text': [u'I purchased this face cream after receiving samples of the eye cream in this collection/line. I fell in love with the eye cream, and purchased the face cream.', u'Overall, I\'m very happy with this cream. After using for about 3 weeks, my pored have become smaller, lines are becoming less noticeable, and texture is smoother. I feel like I look less tired and have recovered a little of glow I had in my 20s. I no longer have dry patches of skin on my forehead and jawline. I expected this cream to feel greasy, but it absorbs quickly into the skin. I\'m very satisfied.'], 'author': u'betsyloo ', 'date': [u'2016-05-03'], 'location': u'Salt Lake City', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}
