name: Capture Totale Intensive Night Restorative Crème
reviews: {'title': u'Excellent do-it-all overnight moisturizer', 'text': [u'I\'m on my 6th jar of this product, and I love it. It is very effective as both a moisturizer and lift/anti-aging product. It works especially well with Dior\'s Essential ONE serum. This is light, and absorbs quickly. I have combination skin, and while it is intensive, my skin isn\'t oily. My skin is in fabulous condition using this product -- and every time I get a bit cheap and try to avoid buying it, my skin suffers, and I\'m back to buying it again.'], 'author': u'kkrosequeen ', 'date': [u'2016-05-09'], 'location': u'Northern VA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'Amazing', 'text': [u'All the Dior capture range is amazing especially the night cream I started using it 4 months ago. It\'s hydrating, anti ageing. my skin has become smoother, fine lines have gone. I wake up every day my skin is so soft to touch. I would highly recommend it for women who wants to see a difference.'], 'author': u'Joolsie ', 'date': [u'2016-01-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'worth the money', 'text': [u'Love this moisturizer. I can see the results of how it\'s working on my skin and people are noticing too how bright and beautiful my face looks. That\'s amazing to hear and especially when you\'ve been using other moisturizers and have given me good results but not as incredible as this one. Very happy with Dior night time cream. My skin gets dry in the winter but not with this one and it has only been about a month that I\'ve been using this cream and the results are impressive.'], 'author': u'bambinita ', 'date': [u'2016-01-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Returned- not impress', 'text': [u'Returned. Prefer creams to gels and found it ineffective. Really underwhelmed.'], 'author': u'Kathryn416 ', 'date': [u'2015-12-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Mediocre', 'text': [u'I was really looking forward to trying this cream as it had high reviews. However after trying it for a week, I haven\'t found it to be intensive or very hydrating. I have to put on quite it bit and my skin still feels slightly dry. I have dry skin and it\'s worse during the winter. I\'m prone to getting dry and flaky spots. I much prefer Shiseido\'s Bio-Performance Advanced Super Revitalizing Cream but it was sold out during the VIB sale. For the price of this Dior moisturizer, I expected more. On a high note, the packaging is very luxurious and practical and it smells heavenly.'], 'author': u'jujuz ', 'date': [u'2015-12-02'], 'location': u'Chicago, IL', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Goē Oil®
reviews: {'title': u'smells bad and too oily', 'text': [u'the scent is very strong, smells bad, and it\'s very hard to wash off. it\'s heavy in oil and doesn\'t absorb very well. had to return the product.'], 'author': u'zeedey ', 'date': [u'2016-10-26'], 'location': u'nyc', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great multitasking product', 'text': [u'I\'ve used Go\u0113 oil for years for dry skin and dry hair, and love that it can help alleviate both without feeling or looking greasy. The scent is light, and you only need to apply a little to see results. (Which means that the tube, though expensive, lasts a long time.) I haven\'t found it particularly effective for patches of extremely dry skin (such as in very harsh weather), but under normal circumstances find that it\'s a versatile oil to have around either at home or while traveling.'], 'author': u'JessRachael ', 'date': [u'2016-09-14'], 'location': u'Atlanta, GA', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}
{'title': None, 'text': [u'Smells great and moisturizes very well'], 'author': u'Marina83 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'A favorite product', 'text': [u'I have used this on my face, in my hair, and on my skin, although I primarily use it on my legs after shaving. A little goes a long way. I love the buttery texture that melts into an oil\u2014it makes it easy to apply with spilling. The ingredients are fantastic. There is no added scent, but all those plant-derived oils have their own fragrance, though I like the way it smells. I have dry skin (and hair) and this is a perfect multi-tasker for long lasting moisture without being greasy. Most oils and creams just sit on top of my dry skin, but I soak this one up. Additionally, I love the softness and shine it adds to the ends of my hair.', u'I was overjoyed when I found out Sephora was carrying this, and immediately bought a new tube to replace the soon-to-be empty one purchased from a store that has since gone out of business. I\'d love it if there were a travel-sized version, since it would be perfect for my frequent flights and travels!'], 'author': u'ElleAMA ', 'date': [u'2016-07-10'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love this balm but too pricey!', 'text': [u'I wanted to try this balm for years and finally splurged and got it and I absolutely love it. I use it every other day to moisturize my hands, elbows, knees and at night I use it on my feet and heels to keep them soft. I especially like using it as an all over body moisturizer during cooler days. It is kind of thick but super rich and smells amazing, not too strong! The only reason I give this 4 stars is because of the price - this is so expensive to keep buying, so I\'ll only get it to pamper myself once in a while.'], 'author': u'drAms2017 ', 'date': [u'2016-06-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Face Finishing Moisturizer Tint Broad Spectrum SPF 30
reviews: {'title': u"it's amazing!", 'text': [u'I loved it, plus it smells amazing. My skin is super super dry so now I\'m using a deferent product but overall it\'s a great moisturizer'], 'author': u'MissBerti ', 'date': [u'2016-11-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'SO NATURAL.', 'text': [u'I love this stuff! I wear it everyday whether I\'m wearing makeup or not. Subtle but evens out my skin. Love the bonus of sunscreen. I add a few drops of the "no foundation foundation" to it (also with sunscreen) and that gives me the natural look I desire. (If you like glow, add a tiny drop of Sephora Luminizing Drops in Starlight). I feel like a chemist sometimes. I\'m always mixing products. LOL. Just smear a little face tint, the foundation foundation, and a tiny Starlight drop. Rub your hands together, then rub onto your face. Set with It "bye bye pores" powder. don\'t forget the blush and bronzer !'], 'author': u'candeesdandee ', 'date': [u'2016-10-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great Glow', 'text': [u'Perfect amount of moisturizer for daytime. I was never a fan of tinted moisturizers finding them faint and I would need other color from bronzer and blush. This product gives the perfect amount of color and stays for the entire day. The price is high, but a little goes a long way, so I suspect this will last 4-5 months easily. I have read comments about the scent being an eye irritant, but I\'ve not found it bad...and I am sensitive to strong perfume scents. I will be putting this on my Favorites list!'], 'author': u'debiburns ', 'date': [u'2016-09-05'], 'location': u'Salisbury, MD', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'worth the $', 'text': [u'LOVE this moisturizer! I often get compliments on my skin as it gives it a radiant and sun kissed glow. My face feels moisturizer all day, and I love that it has SPF 30. Not crazy about the price so I had taken a break and tried out more affordable moisturizers, but they didn\'t deliver the same results...so I came running back. I give this product 4 stars vs 5 stars because the tint of the moisturizer stains my nail polish color every time upon application and it stays on my nail - not cute. I started using gloves when I apply this to avoid staining my nails, which is not a big deal, but for $75 I shouldn\'t have to do all that.'], 'author': u'christynita ', 'date': [u'2016-08-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Product that delivers what is says', 'text': [u'First time I\'ve used a product like this, but not my first time for Perricone. It goes one looking slightly gray with little flecks, but transforms into a nicely tanned look on your skin. First day I put it too close to my eyes, which was a problem. So, avoid them by an inch (because I found even the perfume that wafts up to be irritating). But, great coverage, great SPF and nice feeling.'], 'author': u'CCharlotte ', 'date': [u'2016-07-13'], 'location': u'Philadelphia, PA', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

name: Do Not Age with Dr. Brandt™ Dream Night Cream
reviews: {'title': u"Really, what's with the vivid dreams?", 'text': [u'I really wanted to like this cream after receiving a generous sample of it. It felt great to the touch and on my skin, didn\'t have an overpowering scent, and my face felt great the next day.', u'Why the 2 stars?', u'You may notice a bunch of reviewers commenting that this cream gives them vivid dreams. I honestly thought I was the only one until I signed in and read all the other reviews. I have no idea how it is scientifically possible, but every single night I use this, I have insanely vivid dreams that are usually nightmares. Seriously, no idea how or why.'], 'author': u'reinah ', 'date': [u'2016-09-25'], 'location': u'Brooklyn, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Does what it says', 'text': [u'I\'ve been using this cream for about a month. My skin has always been on the drier side so I use night creams to keep my skin very moisturized- (I don\'t wash my face in the morning. I put on my day cream.) This moisturizer keeps my skin plump and glowing all through the day as day creams don\'t provide enough moisture alone for me. My skin is always really soft and a LITTLE goes a LONG way. A few dots planted on my face spreads evenly and covers a large portion. Sometimes I use a serum with hyaluronic acid prior to using the cream to boost its benefits. Overall, I\'m pleased with the product. As far as the dreams go- I don\'t experience anything like that. Lavender is a wonderful herb for sleep and relaxing, and I use a body wash and cream with Lavender in it so maybe I\'m used to its effects anyway.'], 'author': u'bneblu ', 'date': [u'2016-06-25'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'not for me', 'text': [u'I used this cream together with glow serum for a month and I dont see any changes. I\'m expecting to have luminous and glowing skin but I was disappointed. It didn\'t do anything, hence I see my whiteheads and fine lines getting noticeable. I would not recommend this. I\'m still looking for best night creams.'], 'author': u'Melvs ', 'date': [u'2016-06-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Fair, at best.', 'text': [u'I was hoping this would be THE CREAM that I would rave about with the hefty $135 price tag. Plus, it had glowing reviews. I used this in conjunction with Dr. Brandt\'s Time reversing cream. This is a nice cream. It\'s thick and moisturizing. It absorbs nicely and it gives me a fresh feelings, almost minty tingle, to my skin when applied. However, this did not give me good results after using for 3 months. It did not reverse time. It did not plump. My fine lines and wrinkles did not change. This is an average cream that you could find elsewhere at a fraction of the cost. Bottom line-- if all you\'re expecting is a nice cream, this is it. If you had high expectations as I did, you will most likely be disappointed. Do not recommend.'], 'author': u'DaniAdkins ', 'date': [u'2016-04-29'], 'location': u'Fredericktown, Ohio', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'love the cream, not the dreams', 'text': [u'I received a generous sample of this from Sephora. It makes my skin look radiant and smells fabulous for night- like lavender! After using it at night my skin looks perfect in the morning.', u'However, in my mind, it\'s not worth suffering through the strange dreams, like so many other reviewers have mentioned. I rarely remember my dreams and even more rarely have vivid nightmares, but this cream definitely brought them about. As soon as I quit using it, they stopped. A shame, really!', u'If it weren\'t for the dreams I would splurge on this even at the high price. It really does work wonders.'], 'author': u'gwils ', 'date': [u'2016-04-25'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'love!', 'text': [u'I saw results within a week!'], 'author': u'Naaatasha ', 'date': [u'2016-11-02'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Seriously helped with my sensitive skin', 'text': [u'I have eczema on my face and needed an alternative moisturizer for my face that wouldn\'t burn, (there are a lot of moisturizers that do as soon as they touch my skin). I absolutely love this product for the weeks I am off my prescription creams because it is very light weight on my the skin and gentle. I highly recommended for dry, flakey skin after exfoliation.'], 'author': u'Roxxiv ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Nothing special', 'text': [u'I have skin that is very dry (especially in winter or post-shower), and somewhat sensitive. I bought this based on the good price, despite being wary of the brand. It\'s not bad, though. I have to use quite a bit to really moisturize my skin, and it does feel a bit greasy. Have to let it settle in for quite awhile before I can start my makeup routine. My skin has broken out a bit since I started using it, but that may be unrelated - it\'s not exactly out of the ordinary for me, though I probably wouldn\'t use this if I were more prone to breakouts. It\'s not the greatest moisturizer I\'ve used, but it\'s not the worst either. I would probably buy again just because of the price.'], 'author': u'Knitsy ', 'date': [u'2016-10-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'made my skin worse', 'text': [u'My skin was getting even more dry not better. I knew it was because of this because once I stopped using this my skin got better'], 'author': u'jiji6789 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great for bare skin; not for under makeup', 'text': [u'I really like that Clinique brought in this \'cream\' version of the dramatically difference collection to target exceptionally dry skin. This is great for my very (dry/combination) sensitive skin and I love the way that it applies and feels. Immediately after applying, it does feel a bit greasy but that feeling quickly disappears after a minute or two. The one thing that really disappointed me is that applying a primer over this resulted in the product clumping and peeling off of my face so I will be using this as a night cream and sticking to the gel-formula which is a great barrier between skin and makeup.'], 'author': u'byrnebook ', 'date': [u'2016-09-20'], 'location': u'boston, MA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: Do Not Age with Dr. Brandt Time Reversing Cream
reviews: {'title': u'Very nice night cream', 'text': [u'I love this cream! I can see a change in my skin, some of my fine lines I cannot notice anymore and I have only been using it for a couple of weeks. I have normal to dry skin - tends to get dry in the winter so I am not sure that this would be good for oily skin. The smell is not great but I don\'t it because of the results. It\'s pretty pricey so I would recommend getting a sample before purchasing.'], 'author': u'linda254 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': u'New Haven, CT', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'I keep coming back', 'text': [u'I hate spending the money on this cream but I keep coming back to it after trying other things. I think the essential oils smell great but I can see why others may not like, it is more strongly fragranced than other creams. It is highly moisturizing without causing me any breakout. Makes my skin look more even and healthy. I got hooked from a sample. I really love this stuff. I usually use small amount once daily at night and it lasts me months. I buy one in summer and one in winter.'], 'author': u'kelsol ', 'date': [u'2016-06-21'], 'location': u'Ohio', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Very Hydrating!', 'text': [u'People have mentioned the smell, but I think it smells fine. It feels very soothing going on. I bought this Time Reversing Cream and also bought the kit that had a full size eye cream, small neck cream and night cream. All were wonderful. I like the whole line and I feel like it\'s nourishing my skin. I\'d be OK with the packaging not being so elaborate.'], 'author': u'Kathy100 ', 'date': [u'2016-06-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'This stuff smells to high heaven', 'text': [u'I got this as a deluxe sample in the Do Not Age set and it\'s a fair cream for people who have very dry skin, but OH MY GOD the smell is overwhelming. It never goes away even after the moisturizer has absorbed into your skin. The formula is also pretty heavy and generally I have more oily skin, so I tried using it on some dry spots on my arms and elbows just to not waste it. Even then, people commented on the smell thinking it was a perfume I\'m wearing.', u'I\'m not sure if the scent is artificial or not - it could just be what the ingredients smell like - but I\'m super uncomfortable putting anything very smelly near my face. This one clashes with any other scent I wear on my body throughout the day as well. Overall, it could be a good cream for some people but be mindful about the smell if you\'re thinking of purchasing it.'], 'author': u'sophiasophia ', 'date': [u'2016-05-14'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Average at best', 'text': [u'I hate to be a Debbie-Downer, but this product didn\'t "Wow" me. It is a very nice day cream. It is lightweight and moisturizes nicely. It\'s a beautiful cream. But lets get real. I need real results as an aging woman. I had high expectations when I shelled out $132 for this cream. It did not see any benefits it promised such as anti-aging, lifting, etc. No firming. No plumping. Just an average cream that is lightweight and absorbs well... something a $40 cream can deliver.'], 'author': u'DaniAdkins ', 'date': [u'2016-04-29'], 'location': u'Fredericktown, Ohio', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'My new love!', 'text': [u'I am so in love with this product. This treatment has a creamy velvety consistency, and once you apply it to your face it feels smooth and it absorbs within minutes. I have mature combination skin and when I wake up in the morning after using it my skin looks brighter and is definitely softer. I was experiencing some issues with texture and visible enlarged pores, and although I have only been using it for a week I can see some difference in my skin already. It hasn\'t performed magic, but I do notice that most of the texture is starting to disappear and my skin is also starting to look more even. It is expensive but I\'ve tried a ton of medical grade products and they haven\'t worked as well as this has so far. I will definitely continue using this in my skin care regime.'], 'author': u'Dimestorerecord ', 'date': [u'2016-08-03'], 'location': u'Lexington, KY', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

name: Age Arrest Anti-Wrinkle Cream
reviews: {'title': u'Perfect Cream', 'text': [u'Honestly I have nothing to complain about it.If you watch my skincare routine (at YouTube channel MyTopThingsss), it\'s my day cream nowadays.'], 'author': u'MyTopThingsss ', 'date': [u'2016-10-25'], 'location': u'Los Angeles', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'the best!', 'text': [u'I\'m getting fine lines and decided to up my skincare game to the max. Get this I did my research and this product is backed by a Nobel Prize anti-aging breakthrough and also the cheapest in the Prize winners so it\'s a no brainier for me. It doesn\'t smell the best but it\'s not discussing and I can tolerate it because it\'s the best. I use the serum, eye cream and this moisturizer and my skin looks amazing. When people find out how old I really am which is only when they ask for my ID (strange at my age to me) they say wow no way what\'s your secret? I say skincare is and should be your major splurge besides foundation. These items are put all over your face so they should be the best! Other items can be skimped on because most major makeup brands are owned by the same company as the drugstore brands. Research is key to good skin as well. I do use an exfoliant, sometimes a peel, hyaluronic acid and C but those items can be found in lower priced products in high amounts.'], 'author': u'HarlowJBD ', 'date': [u'2016-08-01'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'love this moisturizer', 'text': [u'I have been using this for about a month and I love it. It is very moisturizing and hydrating on my combination skin. name: Water Drop Hydrating Moisturizer
reviews: {'title': u'drying', 'text': [u'When you first apply this product, it feels very moisturizing. But it dries very quickly, and when it dries, it makes your skin feel even drier than before you put it on. {'title': u'Feels Great!!', 'text': [u'I have extremely DRY skin and suffer from acne around my nose and on my cheek bones. It\'s really hard for me to get my skin moisturized enough. I use two different moisturizers and a primer. I got this in my Sephora Play! box and I LOVE it. While my skin isn\'t drastically better, I do love the consistency of this product. I actually feel like my skin soaks it all up. It starts out thick and once it hits my skin turns into a lightweight water like serum. There is no strong noticeable odor and it doesn\'t make me break out out like other moisturizers. Definitely going to be buying the full size product!!'], 'author': u'cristinajasmine ', 'date': [u'2016-11-10'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Pure Serum-Mist
ingredient: Water, Butylene Glycol, Spring Water, Glycerin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Phenoxyethanol, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate.
reviews: {'title': u'Excellent', 'text': [u'I wasn\'t quite sure what to expect from this serum-mist as I had never purchased anything from this brand before, but I decided to give it a try based on the reviews. I\'m so glad I took the chance! This mist is very hydrating and makes my skin dewy without looking greasy. I live in Colorado and I\'m always on the lookout for anything that will help with the dry climate. This one is a keeper!'], 'author': u'3momco ', 'date': [u'2016-08-28'], 'location': u'CO', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Perfection', 'text': [u'I am a mist lover, and I usually love a mist with an oil like Caudalie, because I am very dry and dehydrated. I can not say enough that this mist has given me the hydration and moisture I need without making me feel oily or sticky. I also tend to get irritated in my skin very easily, and this helps to calm my skin, even after I shave, I spray a bit on, and the irritation/redness is almost immediately gone.'], 'author': u'VIBZ ', 'date': [u'2016-08-23'], 'location': u'Hartford, CT', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'My fav mist!', 'text': [u'My skin has been dry, flaky and sensitive lately due to pregnancy. I have been using this mist for only a few days and i can see significant results! To add on, it is scent-free and paraben-free!'], 'author': u'MummyC ', 'date': [u'2016-07-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'So Awesome!', 'text': [u'I love this stuff! I have super sensitive, combination skin, and this keeps my dry bits hydrated without leaving my t-zone oily! I use it before applying serums, and it really helps my skin soak up the products. Also, the delivery system of the bottle is amazing! It\'s like extremely light micromist, which makes it so that you don\'t use too much and that it evenly and lightly disperses over your face; as well as helping the product to last longer, since you aren\'t applying too much with each spritz.'], 'author': u'Christuhknee ', 'date': [u'2016-07-06'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'yaaaas kween!', 'text': [u'100% the best mist ever in all of life. This mist to die for! I use it for evvvvverything! Great for rehydrating my blender too!!!'], 'author': u'corinabousheri ', 'date': [u'2016-06-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Laser-Free™ Regenerator™ Moisturizing Gel-Cream
reviews: {'title': u'Love it!', 'text': [u'I\'ve been using this product for almost 2 months now and it is by far my favorite. I was a little hesitant at first because of the gel texture but I use it every night after my toner and I wake up with my face feeling 100% moisturized, smooth and not greasy.', u'I have normal to dry skin and I noticed it takes some time for the product to fully absorb into the skin so I wouldn\'t recommend using it in the morning under your makeup- I tried it and it left my face too silky and my makeup didn\'t apply very well.', u'A little goes a long way so I feel I have gotten my moneys worth and then some. I use the smallest amount and it covers my entire face.', u'Overall, I really love the product and will definitely repurchase.'], 'author': u'MichysMakeup ', 'date': [u'2016-10-27'], 'location': u'Miami, Fl', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Meh', 'text': [u'I loved the texture and feel of this gel-cream, but after a few uses I noticed that it wasn\'t completely absorbing into my skin and kind of felt like it was just sitting on my face. I initially thought that it was absorbing super quickly and was super excited about the product, but after seeing little to no difference in my skin I was skeptical. I tried using this after exfoliating so ensure the product was absorbed as much as it could be, but when I felt my cheek a few hours later I could still feel the product just sitting on my skin.'], 'author': u'balletchick22 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-13'], 'location': u'Westford, MA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'a-mazing', 'text': [u'Should win an award, my favorite moisturizer ever. {'title': u'Miracle Worker', 'text': [u'This is the only skincare product I 100% rave about. It makes my skin baby soft and smooth, like it\'s been airbrushed, even after using it one night. {'title': u'Holy Grail Mask!', 'text': [u'I received a sample of this and was blown away at how much I love this product. I\'ve been a die hard fan of another brand for my moisture mask needs and was skeptical at best when I decided to give this a shot.', u'I love the packaging. It oozes quality. I was in love even before I got to try this product.The sample I got was a generous size, so I\'ve used this enough to be able to say that this Florida girl will never go back.', u'I love the texture of this product. It is thick enough that it stays where you put it and has the feel of something you would find at a spa.', u'The scent is gentle and pleasing. No overwhelming perfumes here! (A HUGE plus in my book.)', u'I have uber sensitive skin and am always worried when trying out new things. I applied this the first time and could instantly felt my skin feel softer. I work outside in the sun a lot, and needless to say my skin if often dry and starving for attention.', u'I love that this didn\'t burn or tingle. I used a little makeup spatula to apply this and found that it distributed nicely and evenly with no trouble.', u'After just one use, I felt like there was an improvement in my skin. I felt like I had treated myself to a professional facial, but without having to leave home.', u'After three uses, some of the redness in my skin had gone away. (Yes!!! Something I have been struggling with for quite some time.)', u'All in all after sampling this I am hooked. It is WELL worth the price for the result that you get.'], 'author': u'NicoleKFl ', 'date': [u'2016-08-11'], 'location': u'Deltona, FL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Invigorating Night Crème
reviews: {'title': u'Not Very Good', 'text': [u'I love Ole Henriksen\'s Invigorating Night Gel, so I wanted to give this product a try. I found that it didn\'t absorb well, and it didn\'t moisturize as much as I expected. It left a kind of sticky film on my face, and I had to apply another moisturizer on top of it to get my skin as hydrated as I need. I used up the entire jar but I won\'t be buying this again.'], 'author': u'nickyjan828 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': u'Central Coast, California', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I have been using this creme over the Invigorating Night Gel and my skin is greatly improved. I was afraid to use both products since my skin is very oily. But I apply a thin layer of the gel, let is absorb, then a light layer of this creme. My acne is all but gone and my red spots are greatly reduced since using both products. I was worried about the shea butter, since my skin is oily and acne prone, but I\'ve not had any breakouts. My one forehead wrinkle is greatly diminished, too. Fyi, I alternate these products with my retinoid every other night, and I have not had any adverse reactions.'], 'author': u'MABinHouston ', 'date': [u'2016-07-14'], 'location': u'Houston, TX', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

name: BARE HAVEN™ Essential Moisturizing Soft Cream
reviews: {'title': u'Bareminerals?', 'text': [u'They seem to be leaving their roots. There are way too many unpronounceable, unrecognizable ingredients in their products these days. I returned this one.'], 'author': u'beachfront ', 'date': [u'2016-10-10'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Lightweight, Creamy, Soothing', 'text': [u'The first thing I noticed about this product is how lightweight it is. There\'s almost a watery texture to it, which allows it to spread thinly over the skin and absorb quickly, but it also is creamy and rich feeling. With it being so light, I feel like my skin is able to breathe while being moisturized. Also, I\'m not sure what ingredient causes this, but it makes my skin tingle in a subtle but soothing way. Surprisingly the product did not make my sensitive skin breakout. Overall, I really like the texture, the absorption, and the feel of it on my skin. I\'m curious to see how it will handle harsh New York winters, though!'], 'author': u'etoilerouge ', 'date': [u'2016-09-09'], 'location': u'Brooklyn, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'A keeper', 'text': [u'Like so many women, I\'ve spent a lot of time and money looking for the perfect moisturizer and finally, I\'ve found the one for me. It\'s lightweight but powerful, absorbs quickly and smooths the lines around my mouth better than anything else I\'ve tried. I\'m on my fourth jar, which is two more jars than I\'ve ever bought of anything else.I wanted to include a review so that women my age would know it works on "mature" skin, too.'], 'author': u'Kittycitty ', 'date': [u'2016-08-18'], 'location': u'Dallas', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': u'great product!', 'text': [u'I was hesitant to buy this product at first. name: Ibuki Protective Moisturizer Broad Spectrum SPF 18
reviews: {'title': u'Overall Nice lightweight', 'text': [u'This moisturizer from Shiseido is a great light weight spf moisturizer. It is very liquid-y more of a moisturizing milk. I use two pumps, allowing the first application dry before reapplying another. Mostly because I have very hard water where I live and like a really moisturized feel. I love all of shiseidos products, I have used them for years and haven\'t found something I didn\'t like. The Ibuki Refining moisturizer in my opinion is better than this one but I use and like both! They usually have "skin type specific" kits available at Sephora which is worth a shot if you see one pick it up!'], 'author': u'liljesss ', 'date': [u'2016-11-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Like this moisturizer a lot', 'text': [u'I need a moisturizer that is lightweight and has SPF. Trying to find this has been harder than expected. I want to feel greasy free and not sticky... this does product does this perfectly.I liked it so much that I used a bottle in less than 6 months which means I used it daily. It feels great on. It doesn\'t smell. I can wear it under makeup. I'], 'author': u'halfmydadsage ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': u'Toronto ON', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Not for Combo/Dry Skin', 'text': [u'I\'m 31 with combo dry skin and this just wasn\'t enough moisture for me. I just need more ka-pow in my moisturizer.'], 'author': u'tenderheart003 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-01'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great AM moisturizer!', 'text': [u'This mnoisturizer is light and comforting for my combination skin. The SPF is adequate for me as I\'m generally inside all day, so just covers me enough during my commute. I would add a heavier SPF if I were to be out in the sun all day. It sits very nicely under makeup and I experience no dry patches or breakouts with this. It also blurs imperfections and some days I can just use a bit of undereye concealer and not need to cover up the rest of my skin'], 'author': u'MeikoSama ', 'date': [u'2016-06-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

reviews: {'title': u'rose fragrance', 'text': [u'Deceiving name - this oil is not made from real roses, rather rose fragrance. Nope, can\'t recommend this product:('], 'author': u'swanfish1981 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-02'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'In love!', 'text': [u'I also received a sample of this product and fell in love with it immediately. To be honest, it is the first facial oil I have ever purchased because i was always afraid that oils would make my skin "extra oily" since I\'m already on the oily side. I usually wear it at night, after I\'ve washed and cleaned my face and I love how hydrated it leaves my face. It has a slight hint of roses but nothing unbearable. Definitely a must try.'], 'author': u'purplerose7 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great oil', 'text': [u'I purchased this item after reading the reviews. I only use in the evening. I tried to wear during the day, but it made me a little greasy.I use this under my moisturizer in the evening. It makes your face very soft. It feels wonderful! I see a lot of complaints on the smell. I\'m not a fan of rose (fragrance), but the smell only last for a few seconds. It\'s worth trying if your looking for a new face oil.'], 'author': u'stylebeauty1111 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-10'], 'location': u'Baton Rouge', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'First time facial oil purchase', 'text': [u'I purchased this oil to use with Bare Minerals Skinlongevity to replace the Sephora facial serum. I use one drop for daytime & two drops when I get home & wash my face. This is the first time I have purchased a facial oil & I am very pleased with this oil & really like its rose scent. It absorbs quickly but is not tacky, sticky or heavy.'], 'author': u'MercD ', 'date': [u'2016-10-09'], 'location': u'Chicago, IL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'a keeper', 'text': [u'I don\'t know if this stuff "changes my skin" but I do know I have a beautiful glow when I massage a few drops into my face before moisturizing. I have sensitive skin and this is a product that feels luxurious and smells lovely going on. I don\'t think the scent lasts at all, which is for the best, but I love it during my morning routine. Looking forward to seeing how it helps though the harsh Michigan winter.'], 'author': u'lumbergrl ', 'date': [u'2016-10-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Moisturizing Bomb Cushion Compact
reviews: {'title': u'Low coverage, not that moiturizing', 'text': [u'I have pretty dry skin but very clear skin. This, however, gave absolutely no coverage and I don\'t think it lives up to its "moisture bomb" name. It sits on my dry patches on my forehead, which creates a cakey look. I\'m quite disappointed.'], 'author': u'wulikaikai ', 'date': [u'2016-11-07'], 'location': u'Palo Alto, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Disappointed.', 'text': [u'If you have combination or oily skin, do not purchase. This will make you shiny throughout the day and even after three touch ups, it will still make your makeup feel like its melting. I used the Laura Mercier translucent loose powder and it still made my skin super oily. I have a tendency to have average combination skin and didn\'t have a problem with my previous foundation but this cushion is way too moisturizing and would be perfect for dry skin. I am so disappointed because I love the brand and been using their moisturizer for the past years... I hope they make a cushion less moisturizing and oil free!'], 'author': u'beautyinsider5 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great Value', 'text': [u'Over the last year I have try several Belif products which I all love and have incorporated into my daily skin routine. I decided to try this new Belif product as my summer product no longer matched my fading tan. To my surprise this came with an extra refill which makes this purchase that much better!!! The product is lightweight but covers my blemishes and does stay put the whole day. The color is on the lighter side but will be perfect in a few months in the dead of winter. I have also noticed less clogged pores and no acne since using the last 7 days. I am very happy with this purchase and it is worth 5 stars no doubt!'], 'author': u'xxvanessa ', 'date': [u'2016-10-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Best value', 'text': [u'Since this is my first cushion compact, I bought the cheapest one that I could find on Sephora after reading the few positive reviews on here. I love the buildable coverage and I was pleasantly surprised (after not reading the description very carefully I must admit) that it comes with a refill compact and brush, when other competitor products cost significantly more for just one. While I cannot compare this product to other cushion compacts, I have no doubt that this product offers the best value considering that it costs the equivalent of $21 per compact. I would especially recommend this to people like me who are trying cushion compacts for the first time.'], 'author': u'havanagila ', 'date': [u'2016-10-08'], 'location': u'Philadelphia, PA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'AMAZING!', 'text': [u'Love how this wears and feels on my skin throughout the day. Does not settle into fine lines or pores, does not break down and leaves your face feeling hydrated and moisturized without feeling greasy. I have dry skin so this is perfect for me. This is one of those foundations that actually looks better as the day progresses giving your face a beautiful healthy youthful glow. Love this cushion, will purchase again, and it even comes with a refill. Packaging-Solid well made and adorably cute, great for travel.'], 'author': u'TammyJo715 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-16'], 'location': u'Jacksonville, AR', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}
ingredient: -Ceramide: Concentrated, waxy lipid molecules that help prevent moisture evaporation and creates a protective barrier against external stimuli for maximum hydration content.

reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'Great product. I tried the travel size recently as was recommended this daily moisturizer over an Ole Hendrickson product. I must say I like it a lot. The only downside to this is the heavy price tag!'], 'author': u'Alimill ', 'date': [u'2016-11-06'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Love this moisturizer!!! I\'m 28 years old and never used a moisturizer before. A Sephora employee recommended this and I\'m obsessed! I highly recommend this Kate Somerville moisturizer and looking forward to trying her other products!'], 'author': u'cabishara ', 'date': [u'2016-11-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}
